title: Wonderful stay
review: This is our second family reunion at Longboat Key Resort and even though they are under a major construction renovation they have gone above and beyond to make sure our stay is excellent.  The “beach boys” Brian,Justin , Zach , Front desk personnel Elizabeth and Ryan, and all of the restaurant staff have been great.   We were fortunate to get one of the newly remodeled deluxe two bedroom units and it was spectacular.  Looking forward to future visits when the renovation is complete.    Thanks for helping us make amazing memories LBK resort.

title: Wonderful hotel, great service.
review: We visited for the first time for 5 nights over the holidays and have had a fantastic time.  The hotel setting is wonderful, amenities are fantastic, and room and food great.  Of particular note is the great service at the pool.  Jane, Lory and Paula go out of their way to make sure guests have everything they need.  Best poolside service I can remember!   We hope to be back!!

title: Awesome resort and great staff
review: We come all the time. It’s always the best vacation. This time we had Brian and Zach help us on the beach with umbrellas and they were so patient even though we kept asking them to move them to keep us in the shade.

title: Valérie
review: The beach has an amazing team in paradise, Bryan and Nick are just so helpful to make your journey even better. Sheryl , is also unbelievable , a unique  service. Those peoples just go all the way to  make you feel very happy. Happy to be at the longboat key club with a white sand unbelievable beach.

title: Sunshine and a Great Time
review: Had a perfect relaxing day on the beach! The beach service is fantastic. Brian took such great care of us all with a smile.   Also, shoutout to Cheryl who does all the beach F&B service and is just incredible. She’s efficient, kind and always in a great mood!

title: Great beach layout, awesome service
review: Brian did an awesome job of getting us set up. Beautiful beach, not too crowded and well maintained. Been visiting for a few years, always a great experience! Could use a few more amenities like jet skis for younger visiters, but awesome family experience!

title: Epitome of relaxation !!
review: Traveling from New York for thanksgiving to come relax at this beautiful resort! Amazing service and beautiful beaches! Brian was so great and helped to set us up with a perfect beach spot!! Can’t wait to come again next year!

title: Justin
review: We arrived at long boat key and headed straight to the beach.   Justin was working the beach and made us feel like royalty.  He immediately found great chairs overlooking the beautiful gulf. He was a terrific host and helped me and my wife have a great visit.   I would highly recccomend  longboat key resort

title: Beautiful property
review: My wife and i recently stayed at the resort. The renovations are not a big deal and they are doing a good job with keeping the place looking great. The service is great! Shuttles are quick and efficient. Shout out to Richard.  The pool at the marina is very nice and Peter is fantastic! Friendly, funny and attentive.  Tennis gardens are amazing! Top notch facility. We hope to return!  Beach is beautiful and the tiki bar is cool.  Highly recommend the Resort at Longboat key

title: Peter Provided Fabulous Service
review: We are new to the Longboat Key Club Moorings so far it has been a wonderful choice to Moor our Boat the Cape San Blas Inn. The Amenities are spectacular Amanda @ Portofino’s is a true delight. Nick & Zach on the Beach side are very friendly, helpful and professional. Now the real winner is Pete @ the Marina Pool always there to assist but knows to give you space truly one of Longboat Key Club Moorings best assets.

title: Beautiful Beach
review: The beach and service was amazing. Brian took such good care of us as we relaxed on our beach bed, ordered food and cocktails without ever needing to get up. Water was so clear we could see the bottom of the ocean. Thanks to Brian for making our stay that much better. I will be back!

title: Ruined Honeymoon
review: My family and I have been staying at the Longboat Key Club & Resort for over a decade so naturally when my husband & I wanted a relaxing honeymoon we chose to stay at Longboat Key Club & Resort. The day of our flight came (we're from New York) & we called to extend our stay only to be told our "reservation fell through the cracks" so no one contacted us to tell us that our beachfront room reservation was now a golf course view room due to construction. It was 40 minutes before we had to leave for the airport so we were disappointed, but agreed (after being offered nothing in return & having to ask for some sort of compensation). We arrive to Longboat Key Club & Resort to find that there was no pool, no lobby, no restaurant in our hotel (so where would we use our $200 credit?).…

title: Fabulous experience
review: We spent 2 days this week on the beach and must comment on the service. The beach is beautiful, my favorite place to walk in the world. The resort staff are exceptional, tending to all our requests. Need to mention Justin and Luis who extended the nicest hospitality. Also, Cheryl and Paula for their cheerful attention. Finally, Jane who brought chilled face cloths to cool us off. A lovely touch and much appreciated. A perfect beach experience.

title: Great Service
review: The service on the beach was excellent! The friendly staff was accommodating and attentive to my needs. The bar and food service on the beach is over the top. Thank you Jane, Zack, and Cheryl for making my day so enjoyable.

title: R&R
review: Dear Ron_LBK  Thank you for your kind review. Glad you enjoyed your time with us.  Thanks for the kind mention of bar, food and beach service as well as Jane, Zach and Cheryl.    Rick Benninghove Resort General Manager Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com 941-387-1567

title: Longboat Key club
review: Jane, Zach and Paula make the beach experience extraordinary! Paradise! Even with everything under construction, it was wonderful on the beach. Service was first class. They always go above and beyond to please!

title: Amazing in every aspect!
review: Dear Joyce815 Thanks for the "5" review and for noting service was first class.  We appreciate you being with us.  Thanks for the kind mention of Jane, Zach and Paula!!  Rick Benninghove Resort General Manager Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com 941-387-1567

title: Amazing like always
review: Great location, delicious food and drinks, comfy beds, super clean, but the best part is the BEACH service! Jane, Paula, and Zack were amazing and short of personally fanning us, we felt like royalty while spending a glorious day relaxing on this most gorgeous beach. I almost felt guilty at how much attention they paid to us getting us cabanas, chairs, lounges, tables, umbrellas , drinks, lunch, and even lavender ice cold towels. Thanks for spoiling us beyond what we would ever ask for and making our day special.

title: Lack of communication & overcharging
review: Dear reaganrichard: Thank you for the "5" review!  Please don't ever feel guilty.  We are here to take wonderful care of you and please come back so we may spoil you again.   Thanks for the kind mention of Jane, Paula and Zach.   Rick Benninghove Resort General Manager Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com 941-387-1567

title: A  truly horrible experience start to finish
review: I’ve been coming here for the past 10 years and like always it is amazing. Ignore those other 1 star reviews - they clearly didn’t read the resort was under construction until spring of 2020. They are doing a large scale renovation which was definitely needed, but it doesn’t interfere with the top level of service provided.  Jane, Zach, and Paula took care of us on the beach getting us everything we needed and more.  The short 5-10 minute drive to the circle is awesome as well.  I fully intend on coming here the rest of my life and I’m glad that they are taking the time to renovate the amenities to help continue the level of world class they already are.

title: BEWARE!!!!!  So upsetting when you’ve looked forward to a beach holiday for a year!! Horrendous and unfair!
review: We booked this holiday in October 2018.  The hotel was hailed as one of the best in the area and the facilities and pool looked great for my 12 year olds first experience in the US!   We checked in at a strange building that didn’t look like the website had shown a year ago...not grand at all.  The desk didn’t seem large enough either for a huge hotel. But we were tired, it was late and dark and we’d had been up for 24 hours and ready for our bed!   We were taken to a soulless building and shown to our room...which was very nice...but tired in parts. Lamp shades wonky...and the air conditioning was so ridiculously loud it kept waking us up! It didn’t feel particularly clean either!   On waking the next morning I could here lots of beeping and clanking. Having left a construction…

title: The best beach service!
review: My husband & I are members of the Longboat Key Club & decided to go relax yesterday at the beach. Jane and Paula were FABULOUS! Jane helped us get settled in our chairs & checked on us several times. Paula took our food order quickly after we arrived, and in no time our lunch was brought to us. It was delicious! Jane & Paula made our afternoon very relaxing, fun, and delicious!

title: Amazing beach service
review: Jane and Paula attended to every request...Jane even came to adjust our umbrella as the sun began to set!  Kindly moving the towels as she saw my husband struggling to keep the sun off him, we were touched by her kindness. Thank you for helping us to enjoy a fabulous afternoon

title: Great beach service
review: We were at the resort beach today and had a lovely time and good lunch. Jane and Paula were terrific. My wife and I both had chicken quesadillas for lunch and they were excellent. I would highly recommend this resort.

title: Beach staff excellent
review: Dear KenFiji Thank you for the "5" review" .   Glad you had a wonderful time with us.  We appreciate you recommending the resort and thanks for your kind mention of Jane and Paula.  Rick Benninghove Resort General Manager Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com 941-387-1567

title: Beautiful
review: Beaches are so soft they feel like carpet. Staff is extremely professional and goes beyond to make you feel more than comfortable and with a very luxurious feel.  At the beach, Justin was almost like your personal butler. Dressing your beach chairs checking on you. And dishing out the island's best places to eat and play! If you are looking for a luxurious getaway at an affordable price, look no further than this resort!

title: Still good under construction
review: Dear Nancyegreco: I agree that the beach is amazingly soft. I also appreciate that you mention the butler type professional service.  Thanks for the mention of Justin.  We look forward to having you visit again .  Rick Benninghove Resort General Manager Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com 941-387-1567

title: Husband and wife
review: We spent 5 days at the hotel in October.   As always our stay was excellent.   The guards at the gate are friendly and competent.  The people at check in were excellent.   The golf was good and the starters on the course did a nice job.  The construction did not disrupt what I wanted to do.   The only thing that I would improve was the beach staff and the staff at the bar by the beach.  I read the reviews with all the praise for these people and do not get it.   The chair/umbrella guys are slugs.  The bartenders are indifferent.     Overall, though it was a good trip.

title: Justin at LBK Club beach made our day
review: Great service and extra friendly beach staff. Jane , Jake and Paula were there for our every need. The beach was exceptionally clean . Good food service and drinks were very good. We will be back next year

title: Awesome service and sunsets!
review: My friends and I spent a few hours on the LBK Club Beach on Sunday 9/29. Justin took great care of us - setting up lounges and umbrellas and making sure we were comfortable. He also brought us perfectly chilled lavender-scented towels, which were a lovely treat on such a hot day. He made our beach day a really memorable experience. If you’re headed to LBK Beach, ask for Justin.

title: Family Trip
review: This hotel was lovely. There was construction happening, but it was not intrusive. The beach crew was helpful, especially Justin. The first night when my family came in, the beach area was about to close, Justin helped us, answered all our questions and helped us to plan for the next day. The children’s play area was delightful, I am looking forward to coming back when the pool area is done.

title: Great beachside relaxation
review: Had the opportunity to slow down and relax beachside. Justin really took care of us, graciously setting us up and continually checking in. Many thanks to him for giving us an easy afternoon!  Excellent location — would return here for the beach itself — but the beachside service from Justin really gave the experience an incremental edge.

title: Great day at the Beach on LBK
review: Justin was Great kept the Beach clean and organized!! Paula delivered awesome drinks!! This is the Best Beach on LBK 🏖 Food is Awesome,  Service is Fast and the Beach chairs are super comfy!! Great Resort for Families  😍🥂☀️

title: Family
review: Justin offered great Beach Service, setup our chairs and umbrella right on the water, brought us ice cold towels for our face, was a great day on the beach!! Longboat Key Club is a great family vacation spot, highly recommend!!

title: Peter at the pool is like no other.
review: He is courteous, helpful and keeps the grounds exceptional. Thank you Peter! You can see the pride he puts into his work, a step above. We know the day will just that much better when he is there. The team is all great but Peter clearly stands out.

title: Great service
review: My husband & I came back to  celebrate our anniversary since we were married here. Kane & Justin took great care of us on the beach & surprised us with champagne & strawberries in our room. They made us feel just as special as we did on our wedding day!

title: Fun in the Sun!
review: Great job Justine! Had a great stay at this resort beach is absolutely gorgeous no need to go see another beach! Would recommend going to Beer Can Island for an adventure though! Highly recommend this resort. Sooo many sea shells!

title: Zack and Jane are the BEST.
review: Excellent beach service from Zack and Jane. All the staff is really wonderful and pleasant. True hospitality service. Best beach service ever with towels, chairs. They even have water and ice available which was great because you can get thirsty swimming in the ocean and being in the sun all day. You will see nests from the turtles that you observe.

title: Great resort!
review: Even though the resort was under renovation management and staff did everything they could to minimize disruption to guests.  Jane, Zack, Lori, Kristen, Ed and others of our beach, bar and front desk staff made our stay extremely enjoyable.  Once the renovation is complete we will definitely be going back as there will be even more amenities available.  Our room was great!  And all the staff were fantastic.

title: Great friendly service by Peter at the marina pool
review: We enjoyed a wonderful afternoon at the marina pool, at the Resort at Longboatkey Club. Thanks to Peter for his excellent and friendly service. He was highly accommodating! Welcoming too.   Celebrating 20th Anniversary. Stayed at Islandside  for our honeymoon on 1999. Renovations are underway at the Islandside pool now. But the marina pool was a good substitute. Thank you, Peter!

title: Returning Guests for 2 week vacation. A couple of outstanding employees!
review: 2 week Family stay in a 1 bedroom lagoon property. Was concerned about the amount of construction and lack of beach front pool during our stay but was assured by Virgin rep that it was still a great holiday.  The construction did not bother us at all, noise was kept to a minimum, the staff were all friendly and accommodating and we frequently used the pool available next to the Marina which was nice and quiet.  Over at the Marina pool during our stay we were mainly looked after by Paula (food/drink service) and Peter (Pool/towel service).  These two members of staff went above and beyond what is expected of them and I can honestly say that they made our holiday special.  I do hope when the main beach front pool reopens that the Marina facility stays available to hotel guests as…

title: Family holiday for 3 weeks in july/august 2019
review: Dear mhowe2019:  We are very pleased you enjoyed your second visit with us.  Thanks for your kind review of Paula and Peter. They are great representatives of the team.    Yes, the marina pool will still be available to you once the main pool opens. We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com 941-387-1567

title: Great location, hostile management
review: The hotel is going through renovations but this did not affect our visit at all, we have been coming here for almost 30 years. The beach is beautiful and the staff on the beach amazing thanks to Jane Nick Zack Jake Ian Jeremy Luis Justin Megan and not forgetting Cheryl. I hope we have not missed anybody as we had a brilliant service every day for 3 weeks. Thanks to Sherman who as always was very helpful.

title: Best beaches in the world all to ourselves
review: Dear Manatee123456:  Thank you for your "5" review and for thanking so many of our Key Players.  It is so wonderful that you have returned for 30 years and we look forward to seeing you next time as well.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com 941-387-1567

title: Under renovation but Very Good +
review: We have a trial in Sarasota coming up and I wanted to try this well known resort for a night.  It is a beautiful location on Longboat Key with gorgeous beaches but that’s where it ends. Granted part of the resort is under construction but the building I was in was completely deserted excepting me. Still the hugely expensive room was a closet, far smaller than a Motel 6. There was no hot water. The tv was a 19” circa 1998 tech. The furnishings were at best ok.  But when I called to inquire with the manager about the size and lack of basic necessities the Millennial Assistant Manager responding actually lectured me about being demanding while pool and one of the buildings was undergoing refurbishment. No apology; no attempt to help.  Rude, sneering and superior.

title: Great stay at Longboat Key Club Moorings
review: We stayed at the Moorings for 3 nights in late August 2019.  The facilities and staff are excellent. Restaurant had good food.  In particular, Peter, the pool attendant, provided outstanding customer service!  So close to Publix and CVS you could walk there.  And we learned to play pickleball on their courts, so much fun. Will stay here again!

title: Beautiful Resort Get Away
review: Glad you enjoyed the Moorings and the team there treated you well.

title: Beach service
review: Amenities and food are incredible. Unfortunately undergoing a major reno but have been going here for years and even with the renovations it is well worth staying here. Golf, beach spa and great restaurants!  Something for everyone

title: What a vacation!
review: Dear beckyjhavener: Thank you for your "5" review.  We appreciate your staying with us at this time.  Luckily we have multiple guest buildings so we can keep our improvements away from occupied buildings.  We look forward to seeing you again.    Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com 941-387-1567

title: Relaxing beach morning!
review: This resort has WONDERFUL beach services. Jake and Jane were so polite and very helpful with anything we needed. The drinks at the tiki bar are also wonderful! I definitely would get a umbrella for a even more relaxing beach lounge.  Highly recommend coming here for a relaxing beach vacation!

title: What a great day at the beach!
review: This is a gem of a resort. Although there are extensive renovations being done to the hotel, the beach is open and the staff here are phenomenal. Kudos to Cheryl, Jane, and Austin for making this a wonderful day.

title: Lovely day at the beach!
review: Dear robertcR3550YR Glad you had a great time staying with us and Cheryl, Jane and Austin took wonderful care of you. We look forward to seeing you soon.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com  941-387-1567

title: Always Amazing!
review: The LBK is one of my absolute favorite places!  The beach is nothing short of spectacular. Even though extensive renovations are underway at the pool and main building, the beach is stunning. Yesterday and today were beautiful and the service was beyond compare. Best part:  Lavender endures iced towels!  Nice touch LBK!  Justin was the leach attendant yesterday and Louis was there today. Both gentlemen were polite, friendly and helpful. Kudos to a great staff!

title: Longboat Key Club
review: Dear K S  We love that we are one of your favorite places. Its ours also :)  .    Glad you enjoyed your cold towel service.  We look forward to seeing you again very soon.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com  941-387-1567

title: Brian is the best!
review: We’ve stayed at Longboat Key Club several times and we always love it here. The main building is undergoing major renovations right now, but the service is still amazing. The service on the beach was wonderful. Justin C brought us nice, cold lavender towels to help us stay cool. What an unexpected nice touch!  We rented bikes and rode around the island. The young man at the concierge was so friendly and helpful. It’s been a wonderful visit, as always. We can’t wait to come back.

title: Amazing Day Without Rain (finally)
review: Brian made sure to elevate our special Day at the beach. From being attentive to accommodating, he covered all of our needs. The services at the resort were spectacular despite the facelift the resort is going through. Bravo!

title: Awesome Service & Oceanfront Room!
review: Dear srqlp Very pleased to hear you found the services at the resort to be spectacular.   We look forward to seeing you again very soon.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com  941-387-1567

title: Great experience
review: We visited in August and it was nice and quiet while they’re undergoing renovation. Had the best beach service from Louis and Jane- they’re very helpful and pleasant and made us wish we could stay longer!  Loved our stay at the Resort at Longboat Key Club and will definitely come back.

title: Pretty Great
review: Dear ab983: Thanks for taking the time to review your stay at the Resort at Longboat Key Club. We hope you will come back very soon.  We are running great specials through the end of the year.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com  941-387-1567

title: Beach vacation
review: Staff is nice and attentive, great amenities in a great location. Go to saint Armand’s circle. Restaurants on property are good, but to truly get the experience go to all of the great places around it. I recommend Anna Marie oyster bar a lot more upscale and tropical than you would think

title: Best Beach Staff Around
review: Some friends and I vacationed this past weekend at the Longboat Key Club where one of our friends is an owner/member. Our stay was something out of a movie, everything was perfect. I specifically wanted to take time to recognize Jake, Justin, and Bryan (I think I got the names right) who were working the beach on Saturday. Each of these young men were respectful, attentive, and exceptional employees. From setting up our umbrellas to helping us take great group pictures we are so thankful for each of them and their kindness. Can’t wait to be back!

title: Beautiful and World Class
review: Dear Jwein10:  Thank you for the "5" review!  So glad your stay was picture-perfect.  Thanks for the kind mention of Jake, Justin and Bryan.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com  941-387-1567

title: Beach Vacation
review: Our company had the opportunity to host our Annual Staff Retreat at this resort last week and it was simply fantastic. First class accommodations with world class service. The suite we were in for our meetings was brand new and decorated to the nines with a elegant beach flair. Great place to do business and enjoy one of the most beautiful settings on earth.

title: Great visits to the beach club!
review: Dear hkasten:  Thank you for the "5" review!   We greatly appreciate your company hosting your retreat with us and I'm glad it was fantastic and you received world class service.   Happy to hear you loved the new suite also.  We look forward to seeing you again real soon.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com  941-387-1567

title: Birthday weekend
review: This is our 9th year coming to LBKC. We love it!  Perfect location and beautiful beach, but the staff is really what makes this spot exceptional.  We have made friends through the years and appreciate Sherman, Dawn and Greg!  Also thanks to the great beach and beach wait staff this trip- Jane, Mark, Justin, Brian, Jake, Nick, Lou and Jeremy.  You all do an amazing job!

title: Beachin’ It!
review: My girlfriends and I have been coming to the resort for the last 8 years and each one is better then the last. Even through renovations the hotel goes above and beyond, especially the beach staff. Jake and Justin set us up in the afternoon it was so hot they even brought by iced hand towels soaked in water and lavender oil, the ocean was calm enough for paddle boarding too! Still have full service bar for the beach, Mark made sure we stayed hydrated. Can’t wait for what year 9 has in store!

title: Excellent service
review: Dear Marybeth123456: Thank you for the "5" review.  So very happy that you have been visiting us for the last 8 years and you continue to have a great experience.  Good to hear the iced towels are a hit and keep you refreshed.  We look forward to seeing you again next year.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com  941-387-1567

title: Amazing people, amazing marina resort!
review: We would get up each morning to sip out coffee on the balcony and from 7am Justin and Jake are down on beach setting it up. They would greet us professionally and made sure we got everything we needed. The boys really hustled to keep us out of the sun, even brought by fresh cold lavender towels when it was hot. Needless to say can’t wait to come back and ask for Jake and Justin.

title: Another brilliant stay.
review: Dear bethcT84UO: Thank you for the "5" review. So glad you made the most of your time here and started the day on the balcony at 7 am.  We appreciate your kind mention of Jake and Justin and we look forward to your next visit.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com  941-387-1567

title: DO NOT USE FOR YOUR WEDDING
review: We sailed in as a family 3 years ago and it has been our favorite place to stop on our sailing trips ever since!   We loved coming back and seeing Dave who is so incredibly patient guiding us into the slip, James who drove us around, charming and helpful as ever, and meeting new friends Alex and Peter.  Peter was the most gracious host at the beautiful pool, helping us with whatever made us more comfortable- even staying and chatting with us through a big storm one day!  His hospitality and stories made the storm not only bearable but a fun memory!   The restaurant was also amazing - loved our waiter Tito and the incredible Italian fare.  Thank you again for a wonderful and beautiful stay- we will see you all again!  Sincerely, Guy, Holly, Izzy and Evie

title: 25th Wedding Anniversary - Bummed Out, Okay Resort
review: We stayed few days and requested ocean view room and we were put in a garden view room, notice there were a number of ocean view rooms that were available, they insisted they were 100% full. The resort is always right, so a garden view room it was. The property seems dated, as well as the room and could do with a refurbishment of at least the rooms. The pool was average and was roped off so we couldn't do laps in the pool. Seems the pool was catered only for children and adults to stand around and cool off and splash in the pool, no chance for people who actually would like to swim in the pool.  We checked in for our 25th wedding anniversary and the staff seemed to show little interest, very disappointed that we were not offered anything, even some bottled water would of been…

title: Fun and Relaxing Week with the Family
review: Dear Traveler_Pro I apologize that you were unable to get into an Gulf View room for your 25th anniversary.  I appreciate your other comments as well.    The chairs on the beach are included in the resort fee, but the umbrella is an additional charge. I would be more than pleased to speak to you at any time concerning your stay.  We do look to continually improve and your feedback is appreciated.  I am please you had fun while here.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com  941-387-1567

title: Vacation under Construction
review: We had a great time at the Resort at Longboat Key Club. We were concerned at first because we heard there would be construction going on, but we didn’t notice anything during our stay. The private beach was perfect and the on beach staff really went out of their way to take care of my whole family. They would set up chairs, umbrellas, towels and had plenty of beach toys available for the kids. The assistant manager, Jane and the whole beach crew Brian, Jake, Justin and everyone else who waited on us were amazing, they really pampered us. The food and drinks were great, many healthy options and large servings. We could not have been happier with our relaxing stay and great experience.

title: great Staff st the Beach
review: Dear NeilCrew Thank you for the "5" review.  I am so very pleased that you had a very relaxing stay and great experience. Thanks for your kind mention of Jane, Brian, Jake and Justin.  We look forward to seeing you again very soon.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com  941-387-1567

title: Amazing Staff and Great Beach
review: We recently stayed at the Resort At The Longboat Key Club during their extensive renovations and it was a wonderful experience. All the staff went out of their way to make it a wonderful experience. Specifically the beach staff, Jane, Brian and Cheryl were awesome and took care of our every need. I highly recommend visiting even with the renovations. It was a great vacation!!!!

title: Pool was great
review: Peter at the cool was amazing. Kind helpful and attentive. Next time we visit we will definitely be coming to stay with y’all and take advantage of the whole pool side. We also loved the gentleman playing the steel drums!

title: Summer getaway
review: Dear Shellrhea Thank you for the "5" review. Glad you enjoyed the harborside pool and Peter took great care of you.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com  941-387-1567

title: Used to go every year for a month but they have doubled their prices so we are out.
review: My children and I stayed here for 5 nights over 4th of July weekend. We stayed in building 5.  The suite was spacious and clean but quite dated. To say a "golf view" was a bit of a stretch.  If I ever returned I would not stay in this particular building again. The beach is beautiful and the attendants very polite and helpful.  Having to drive 3 miles to use a pool was not exactly fun.  My whole visit at this resort felt more like I rented a condo and you were on your own. Not exactly a pampered weekend.

title: Beach assistance
review: Dear 806adriennec: Thank you for being our guest over the holiday weekend.  I hope you will visit us again and experience one of the Beach view buildings next time. I'm sorry you did not like the location you were in this time.   Please feel free to reach out to me if I may assist in future reservations.  Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com  941-387-1567

title: Great stay - despite surprise of renovations!
review: Good tennis program. Nice beach and pool. Lots of restaurants on site, none of which are great. Super location but was in need of renovation.  Well they renovated and doubled the prices, guess we will go elsewhere.

title: Great Destination and Friendly Staff
review: My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed The Resort at Longboat Key Club. The staff was very friendly and extremely helpful. One staff member who tended the beach area, Adam, was exceptional with his service level to us when we utilized their private beach area.

title: LBK is the best of Florida
review: Dear OUBob  Thank you for the "5 review".  We are so pleased you had an excellent stay and appreciate your kind words concerning Adam.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in Hospitality, Rick Benninghove | Director of Resort Operations   The Resort at Longboat Key Club

title: Great Beach Service
review: We have been coming to The Resort at Longboat Key since we got married here eight years ago. We’ve stayed at least a dozen times. The resort always delivers and their beach is world class. Jeremy, Mark and Adam make sure you have all the needed accommodations while lounging Oceanside. They provide truly top notch service and should be commended for their work. It’s an amazing place that is sure to get even better considering the investment currently being placed in improving the property. Can’t wait to come back later this year!

title: Weekend at the resort
review: Dear LalocandainKY: Thank you for the "5 Review".   Its so wonderful to hear that you were married her and been back so many times since.  Thanks for your kind words concerning Jeremy, Mark and Adam.  We look forward to seeing you in a couple months again!!   Yours in Hospitality, Rick Benninghove | Director of Resort Operations   The Resort at Longboat Key Club

title: Very Impressed!
review: We have been coming to LBKC for 8 years and the beach service has never been better! Adam and Jeremy were both professional, remembered us from our last visit and great with the kids.   We highly recommend LBKC and all of the amenities.

title: Remarkable service
review: 1st day here. Checkin was great. Loved our remodeled unit. Even better than the last one. The pool was gorgeous and had everything we could ask for. Service from Peter and Ania was top notch. We can’t wait to come back.

title: Awesome service
review: What an amazing stay.  Just wanted to give a shout-out to Jane and Zack, who took care of our whole party (a huge wedding party) for the entirety of our visit.  They work incredibly hard, develop relationships, and provide hands-on service that enhances the stay of the people at the resort to a great degree.  So appreciated and we'll be back.

title: Longboat Key Club
review: This resort is so nice and peaceful, and the workers are so helpful! Especially Freddy, he’s awesome! Freddy and all the workers are always making sure our stay is nothing but the best! Love this place

title: Our pool staff was amazing!!
review: Jane was absolutely the best!!  She had our chairs ready to go for us with towels every morning!  She was the hardest worker I know!!  We loved hanging out at the pool all day and she made each day easier and extra special!!! Thank you Jane!!!

title: Vacation days at the pool on the marina Longboat Keys
review: Awesome vacation at Longboat key! Sure hated to leave this morning! Although, the resort was going thru Construction and the pool was not useable. We took advantage of the pool located at the marina and we were definitely not disappointed! The pool, the view, the food and drinks, and most importantly the staff were Awesome! Pete and Paula sure made our vacation even more memorable! They both went above and beyond! You don't meet many people like that every day!

title: Pool Day
review: While the Resort is going thru some construction we took time to use the pool Porta Fena that the resort is providing while the construction is taking place on the one that was being used at the original check in location. If your planning on a stay try the pool its supper nice and the food and service is the best Pete and Paula will take great care of you and the food is awesome! Highly recommend

title: Love this place!
review: This was our fourth visit to the Resort at Longboat Key Club. The location is great with St. Armand’s restaurants and shopping, Mote Aquarium, and water sports nearby. Onsite restaurants offer a variety of good food. The beach staff is awesome, setting up umbrellas and chairs, keeping us apprised of weather conditions, and serving beverages and food. Our gulf front junior suite was comfortable with a beautiful view. The only negative comment would be the room service. We ordered room service 5 days out of 6 and, unfortunately, the orders were not correct. Missing items were the norm. We’ve not had this problem with our previous trips so not sure what was going on. Bottom line is we love it here and are looking forward to our next visit.

title: Luxurious Fun in the Sun!
review: We visited the Resort at the Longboat Key Club over the 2019 Memorial Day Weekend. The property--the grounds, the facilities--were well-maintained and beautiful. The service was exceptional. Every staff member that we encountered was courteous and helpful, from the spa attendants to the restaurant staff, to the pool and the beach staff. The pool staff in particular--Jane, Lory, and Paula--were all just fabulous! We will certainly return in the future, though I should note a major renovation of the Resort began after the Memorial Day Holiday.

title: Pool Service at the Marina-Peter!!!
review: Cool service just began at the marina pool this week. we couldn't have asked for better service than we got from Peter. He was so accommodating and it's the best service we've had at the marina or at the beach resort.  We hope that this new service at the marina pool with chair covers,  bar and restaurant service will continue beyond the remodeling of beach club.

title: AMAZING SERVICE
review: We spent a week at LBK Club Resort and all of it on the beach. Peter was a beach attendant at the Resort and provided the most amazing service. He was friendly, helpful and kind. All resorts should have employees like Peter. We will definitely be back due to the phenomenal service.

title: Loved it
review: We had the most amazing vacation and enjoyed everything the resort offered! The beach, and beach service, was incredible! Peter helped us on the beach and made sure we had everything we needed throughout the day! Highly recommend the resort and be sure to ask for Peter on the beach!

title: Amazing service
review: Amazing service especially at the beach! All the servers and staff were so kind and made each day so much more enjoyable especially Peter who was so nice and personable and made our vacation so much better! He went out of his way to make sure we had everything we needed!

title: Best Vacation Ever
review: The Resort at Longboat Key Club was top notch from the moment we arrived.  It truly felt like everyone there went out of their way to make sure we had the best time ever. Jane at the pool made each day perfect.

title: Great service!
review: As usual, the staff at Longboat Key Club Moorings never disappoints. A shout out to Peter, who made our poolside experience so relaxing and inviting. We look forward to enjoying the summer at LBK. Tom and Doris  Aboard Ourtime

title: Good vibes to changes
review: As always Longboat Key Resort and Moorings never disappoints.  The staff is key to making the experience amazing.  Peter our host made us appreciate the term full service.  He was charming and delightful.  Love living aboard here.

title: Spring getaway
review: This resort is beautiful, beach is great, staff very friendly, my only gripe is that the room, as beautiful as it was, had roaches, several roaches, and they did nothing to really help us, they basically just ignored us.  I did write a letter to the GM, but never heard back from anyone.  I just think that for the price we paid, we deserved better accommodations, they should have moved us immediately, but they did not!!!!

title: Memorial Day Week-End
review: My wife and I visited The Resort at Longboat Key Club over Memorial Day week-End 2019.  We had a great time, the beach and food were outstanding.  We were especially grateful to Jane, Paula and Lory at the pool deck and beach.  These three ladies made our trip very enjoyable.

title: Great family resort, super friendly staff, wow!
review: We had a great weekend at the LBK club and have to share with everyone.  The staff was SO friendly and outgoing it really made you feel welcome.  Especially Jane, Paula and Lory who were working the pool deck area all weekend.  They were so fun and friendly and made our day.  The beach was SO pretty and the property was impressive.  We stayed at the marina which was also top notch with deck hands and dock workers at the ready to help with lines, fuel, pump outs etc.  We can't wait to come back.  We stayed 3 nights and it felt like only one.  Such a great place.

title: Great experience with customer care at the Resort at Longboat Key Club
review: Forgot together with our family to celebrate my parents 50th wedding anniversary at the Resort at Longboat Key Club. Beautiful beach, please, and resort facilities. Customer care was really first rate! Staff members Jane, Paula, Lory, Michael, and Zack, I'll took great care of us. First right customer care all the way! Thanks!

title: Throwback to family resorts
review: Great resort, about to embark on a MUCH needed remodel. Even though it’s dated it’s beyond lovely. The employees go above and beyond. Jane, Paula & Lori at the pool work harder than any one I’ve ever seen and with huge smiles on their faces. Gorgeous beach too.

title: Jane,Paula, and Lori
review: Jane, Paula, and Lori are always wonderful and helpful staff members. Whenever we come to visit Longboat Key we look forward to interacting and working with them. They're are huge assets to the resort and club.

title: Great time!
review: 3rd time visiting & we love it. Love lounging at the pool. Jane, Paula & Lory are all so great & attentive.  You want for nothing with these ladies. Umbrella up, umbrella down, no back up again!  Drinks & food served right at your lounge with a smile & friendly banter.  So relaxing

title: What a disappointment!
review: We only arrived today but such a disappointment in many ways. We are in building one and our room is pleasant with a lovely view of the beach.  However, the entrance is like walking through an underground garage!!! I would not feel safe entering on my own at night. The pool is small and characterless and not a place you would want to relax around. Luckily there is the beach and the Gulf of Mexico. The lobby is small and not at all welcoming.  Some areas of the hotel are due for refurbishment commencing the day we leave and I wished we had been made aware of this by Virgin before we booked as it is certainly needed! The hotel considers itself to be 5 stars but from what I’ve seen, it would only rate 3/4 stars.

title: Val In Long Island, NY
review: We had a great visit, made perfect with the impeccable service provided by Jane and Paula, on the pool deck.  Food was terrific and did I mention the magnificent weather. The hotel will be remodeled over the summer and fall but this week was great.

title: A wonderful resort to relax
review: The physical plant is good but a little.  This should be fixed with a major redo/upgrade schedule to start after Memorial Day and be completed by early next year.  The staff throughout the resort are wonderful and make a visit so enjoyable, but the stars are Jane and Paula at the pool and beach.  Their positive attitude, courtesy and helpfulness make our stay truly memorable.

title: Pool/Beach Staff
review: Having just returned from a further holiday at this resort we would like to again commend  Jane who controls the pool/beach area. She is the most dedicated, efficient and caring person, who holds the whole area together. When she is not there, the difference is very noticeable.. She goes out of her way to ensure that each individual guest is cared for in a special way, remembering names and needs. A tremendous asset to the Hotel. Likewise Paula who is part of the Pool Bar staff undertakes her duties in exactly the same way. Always has time for the guests and a tremendous sense of humour, definitely "service with a smile" at all times. Again a excellent asset for the Hotel.

title: Excellent service!
review: Jane & Paula at the pool are the hardest working women in show business! They always make sure your umbrella is where you want it & your food & drinks are timely.  The only negative is that my husband was traveling on business, & you can’t use cash or credit at the bar/restaurant, you must room charge everything. Made it a little difficult for me, so hopefully they will rethink that aspect. Otherwise the resort is outstanding & staff very friendly.

title: Less Than 2 Weeks’ Notice to Major Construction After May 27th  – Outrageous
review: We are more than very disappointed that we received an email, with that Less Than 2 Weeks’ Notice to Major Construction to the resort – Outrageous!  After a great deal of time choosing and planning not only our destination but even longer to decide on the very best accommodation, we were excited and looking forward to our annual family holiday at the Resort at Longboat Key Club.  This was booked over 5 months ago and yesterday we received the email of major disruption work that will materially affect our experience.  We will now have to select another Hotel and as this is later in the session the cost will increase, we are more than disappointed with the haphazard, unprofessional, non-caring delivery of the message and information that has been delivered late. We are furious and…

title: Gorgeous Beach Resort with Fantastic Service!
review: The resort is really superb... great location on the beach, every amenity imaginable and lots of choice in dining. The waterfront service provided by Paula, Jane and Mandy was really noteworthy - they are all so professional. Also, St Armand's Circle is just a five minute drive... We will certainly return for a future stay!

title: Ms
review: Excellent accommodations and wonderful poolside service from Jane and Paula!! Everyone was so accommodating, the beach was clean, music at the pool and always looking to see we were satisfied. Massages at the spa were excellent!

title: Business trip to Longboat key, this is 7th time there
review: The room was very comfortable and clean. The employees were very courteous and helpful. The beach is beautiful with chairs, umbrellas, and cabanas. Bicycles are available and are include with your stay. Paula and Jane were our servers at the pool. So nice and on the ball.

title: Resort and pool
review: I have to say the best part of staying at the resort was the service at the pool by Jane, Paula and Peter. They absolutely treat everyone as if they are the most important guests at the resort. Very Gracious with a great attitude. My wife and I will remember this trip fondly and will stay here again and again because of the staff.

title: Second Visit
review: Last year was great but this year exceeds all expectations. When we arrived (early) Ryan pulled out all the stops and got us accommodated earlier than expected. The room, cleaning services and facilities are top notch. Around the pool Jane and Paula do everything to make your stay as comfortable as possible. Almost impossible to reposition your bed or put up an umbrella without Jane beating you to it. Always there to help!! Had a meal in the in-house restaurant. Very good indeed both in terms of service and quality. Looking forward to next year already after the renovations are carried out.

title: Another great visit to Longboat Key Club
review: We are regulars who visit the Longboat Key Club every year. It’s so great to come back to familiar faces who are always so delightful. Jane around the pool is so helpful. Sheryl is a delight and always happy to help us with our food and drink orders on the beach as well as all the other staff at the club! Thank you as always.

title: Longboat Key
review: Great, big room and very clean.  Easy access to beach and pool.  The food and drink at the restaurant was very good and the service was excellent, from the bars to the front desk to the valets to the cleaning people!  Great place to stay and close to shopping and restaurants!

title: Great rooms, nice pool, few games and activities for kids
review: We had a two bedroom apartment which was clean, nicely furnished and very comfortable. The beach, pool and pool bar are nice as well. The biggest downside is that there are few activities for kids (ping pong and corn hole). The shuttle to St Armand Circle is very convenient.

title: Resort
review: Had a great time at this resort. The ladies(jane,lory,paula) at the pool were so nice and always there for your needs. The beach,view,people,room were outstanding. Everything was always clean and food very good.

title: As little or as much as you like to do
review: Was there for seven restful days.  Great service all the way around.  Paula for pool service is fantastic - and all were great.  Was amazed how much Jane of Boucher Brothers did around the pool constantly and her attention to detail was flawless.  (She never seemed to rest, never intrusive.)  Food was very good.  Facilities very, very nice and well maintained.  I understand at the end of the month they are going through a significant renovation.  Can't wait until my next trip.

title: Amazing service!
review: Peter, our beach side service, was amazing and made our trip so much better. He was enthusiastic, personable and just so friendly. Overall the resort is beautiful, the amenities are clean and the food and drinks excellent! Would recommend to everyone!

title: Beach
review: Very clean beach with great amenities. Peter went out of his way to provide exceptional service and take care of all customer needs. Would definitely recommend this location to future guests. Thank you again Peter!

title: Awesome service
review: Came here with friends and had a great time! Everyone was so friendly and the beach was very clean and relaxing with great amenities. Peter always made sure we were always taken care of and had a great experience!! Would highly recommend.

title: Poolside service extrordinare!!!
review: We have been coming to this resort for years and once again have to compliment the staff at the pool for superb sevice. Jane, the pool deck attendant is great. She is friendly and approachs you as soon as you walk towards a chair ready to set you up with towels and umbrellas. She keeps the area clean and picks up towels as soon as someone leaves. A real hard worker. Paula is the drink and food attendant and she is the best. She recognizes us when we return and always greets us with a hug. She is amazing and hard working. We never have to look for her to order something because she keeps a constant eye on everyone and what they need. These two ladies make our time at the pool so enjoyable. They are the friendliest and hardest working emplyees! LBC is lucky to have them!

title: Beach cabana boy
review: Nathan was the complete package for  helping us get situated on your beautiful beach.   Very helpful and a hard worker.   When you at the beach please request Nathan !! The beaches are absolutely beautiful. Be sure you get to witness the sunrise and sunset !

title: Fantastic Stay
review: My husband & I come here 2 times a year staying 3 weeks each time.  On our stay last October we met Jane, the pool attendant (apologize if this is not her title -- she does act like a manager and perhaps is one).  Jane is one of the most pro-active, professional and friendliest people we have ever met.  I have nicknamed her "The Energizer Bunny," as she is constantly in motion making the rounds and asking, or anticipating, everyone's needs. She is an asset to the Resort and it would not be the same for us without her!!

title: Resort, Golf and Golf Coach
review: Our room was lovely and had all amenities.  The purpose of our visit was to take intensive golf clinic with Roberto Borgatti.  Amazing coach who is fantastic at helping you with all of the technical aspects of your personal game.  Beautiful golf courses.  I highly recommend Roberto.  Best restaurant was Portofino, but all of them were very good.

title: Spring break
review: This place is great. Beach is amazing, this water front property met and exceeded our expectations. The pool is also awesome, almost as awesome as Jane the pool attendant. Keep up the great work. Will be back many more times. Thank you .

title: Dr. S
review: Absolutely the nicest place with the nicest people Paola, Jane and Lori are better that family  Extremely welcoming and polite Will go out of their way for anything to make you feel more comfortable  Can’t wait to be back again... and again  Dr. S

title: A huge thanks to Longboat Key Club
review: The staff at Longboat Key Club Resort deserves a five-star rating. Jane, the pool attendant, is the hardest working person that I have ever seen. Lory and Paula the poolside waitresses are amazing. All three totally love their job and do unbelievable work. Hats off to Sherman, Amanda, and Tina at the front desk and concierge area/reservations—could not be more helpful. We are frequent visitors of this resort—it’s always fantastic. Thank you!!!

title: Service not up to price
review: Beautiful beach and great service at beach - thanks Peter!Enjoyed great dinner at Sands first night.  Room very nice. What they need is attitude adjustment for staff and service overall at resort. We had a bet for 3 days regarding sugar packet on the ground outside our room that was finally picked up. Seriously for the cost of rooms this should never happen. Also had to ask for lightbulb to be changed in bathroom that was burned out. Breakfast buffet was disappointing other than the omelet station. Difficult to find selections that were healthy- yogurt with fruits and granola had fruits in syrup-  when I said something to server she could have cared less. Definitely push the buffet but did not seem that busy that kitchen couldn’t offer more variety at this time of year.

title: oodles of noodles
review: as other reviews have stated, the resort is dated.  just walking to your room, you can see it has not been updated for decades.   our jr premium suite provided us with beautiful sunsets, we enjoyed having a washer dryer to dry swimwear etc, but the rest of the room was just so so.  old bathtub, not a cool old tub, just old. housekeeping was spot on.  room clean, tons of storage  we arrived about noon and our room was not available to us until after 4.   upon checkout, we asked for a late checkout (1!) and were told absolutely not.  must be out by 11.   now about these noodles.   for such a large resort, there is one small pool.  good luck trying to actually swim in it without getting whacked with a noodle or floatie.   it is wall to wall screaming kids.  i was the only adult in…

title: Not worth the money!!
review: We stayed for four nights at the Resort at Longboat Key and were REALLY disappointed with the quality of rooms/restaurant and pool areas etc. What they don’t tell you on the website is that they’re about to start a two year refurbishment program! The a/c in our first room kept us awake all night clunking and banging (they kindly gave us an upgrade as a result) but the a/c in the second room wasn’t any better. Then at check out, they completely screwed up our invoice which took about half an hour to sort out and two phone calls to our travel agent in the UK. Would we stay here again? Absolutely not! It definitely wasn’t worth the money.

title: Girls Beach Day!
review: We were in town for a getaway weekend and headed to the beach at the Resort. Adam R took great care of us the second our feet met the sand. He was a true gentleman and went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable. Big shout out to him!

title: Best Vacation Ever!!!
review: The Resort was top notch.  Everyone made sure we were always happy and taken care of.  Jane took the BEST care of us at the pool.  She went above and beyond everyday to be sure we, and everyone there were comfortable, had everything we needed and she was always the friendly face we looked forward to seeing every morning.  We look forward to going back very soon.

title: Wonderful Family Getaway!
review: We spent a week at the Resort at Longboat Key Club over our 10-year-old's spring break.  We absolutely loved it!  We stayed in an ocean view junior suite, which had a small kitchen and closet washer/dryer.  The service was phenomenal, particularly at the pool and beach.  The pool service staff treated you like you were a guest visiting their home.  You could see it especially with LBK members, who interacted with the staff like close friends.  In particular, Jane at the pool was friendly, professional and just a pleasure to chat with every day!  Jane and the other pool staff really added to an amazing week.    A few minor complaint - the service at the pool was quite slow at times and the food just ok.  Likewise the Italian restaurant by the golf course was decent, but we found…

title: Waste of money
review: For a resort that is close to $500 a night, the service was horrible and disappointing. This was our first stay and definitely our last. Extremely hard to find beach servers on the weekend, bar was full, and outdoor pool restaurant was also full. Our room had duct tape all over the curtains, TV did not work, and one of the lights was out. Keep in mind this was a beachfront room. Very disappointed because we were told so many amazing things about this place....spend your money somewhere else!!!! At least the beach was beautiful! So disappointed.

title: Pool
review: Jane is amazing. She took such great care of our family we love her. Thank you Jane for making our stay fabulous . The pool was great and the service was spectacular. Thank you Jane and longboat key club

title: Perfect  Sunny Month of March!
review: We rented privately for the month of March, so we were unable to use property amenities...Bar's and Restaurants. But we were able to use pool, chairs, and towels!   The pool staff was absolutely the hardest working, kind and professional team I have had the pleasure to meet! Jane, son Zack, and all the pool team helped us on a daily basis and went above and beyond to make us feel at home. Jane is truly a treasure and one of the hardest working individuals...She is a keeper!!!!! Oh, and the beach was Beautiful, as well!

title: Excellent place for a weekend getaway!
review: We loved every second we spent here! The resort was nice for the value, the private beach was amazing, and the beach service was excellent.  We had a suite overlooking the ocean and it would be perfect to accommodate a small family. It had the luxury of a kitchen, two balconies, and a separate living room.  Though we only ate breakfast at Spike n Tees because we had a breakfast credit, it was really very good. The reviews weren’t great for the restaurants so we left the resort for lunch & dinner.  The beach had a full service restaurant & bar, large chess board, corn hole, large Jenga, volleyball net, and kids play area. The food was actually pretty good and there are plenty of drink options to accommodate everyone.

title: Amazing service
review: Not only was the weather amazing and the pool and beach so clean, well taken care of and family friendly but the service is absolutely amazing. At the pool area, Jane was especially amazing. Jane is not only extremely nice, helpful and accommodating but she remembers your name and favorite chairs each day you are there and frequently checks in to make sure you are taken care of. Jane was absolutely amazing and made our stay better than we could have ever imagined!! Will definitely be coming back as soon as we can!

title: Nice resort. Definitely dated. Value will not be found here.
review: RaLKC is a near top end resort on Longboat Key. It is clear that it’s best days are behind it. It is tired. Full stop. Tired. But, having said that, it is clean and we found the staff/service ... well, serviceable, not extraordinary, but pleasant.  The problem is really when you try to link the resort, it’s amenities, it’s tiredness, with its prices. There is a disconnect for certain. Value will not be discovered regardless of how hard you try.  The real disappointment is when you realize that the high room/suite rates then have a resort fee tacked on along with 4-5 different taxes, which is disappointing yet understandable until you realize that umbrellas are $25, the cabanas are $35 on the beach, the bikes included in the resort fee are very worn, etc...  all in all, just…

title: 80’s resort and overpriced
review: The property needs a refresh.   The rooms are nice, clean and roomy.   But the property overall is just tired and dated.  The staff was friendly but overall service wasn’t great.  The food is overpriced and not anything special.  The service on the beach was hit and miss.  They don’t want you to bring food or drink to the beach, but good luck getting service.  One day, we say our “server” once all day.  Also, most of the staff handling towels and beach service were really good.  However, if you go later in the afternoon (after 3) they’ll actually tell you they’re too busy to help you because they’re already putting up chairs and umbrellas.  And, they were rude about it on this one day.  Not what you expect from a resort.   Overall, we were pleased with our accommodations, except…

title: tired resort - not worth the money
review: we stayed here on recommendation from several years ago...wish I'd have read more up to date reviews....we booked a premier junior suite with the word "luxurious" on their website...and take exception to the word suite - which indicates a separate room to the bedroom, and Luxurious - no where near....the room was  tired and the bathroom the equivalent of a 2/3 star motel...... Although lip service was paid to our complaints, they said there were no better rooms to move us to...and all the rooms were being refurbished in June....not much use to us....and I felt this should have been mentioned on their website. When I asked for a reduction to reflect this, there was absolutly no offer from the Customer Service manager - just the re-iteration of the date of refurbishment...We were…

title: Really enjoyed our stay for the second time.
review: Dear pamela060:  Thank you for spending a week with us and for taking the time to comment.  A Junior Suite is defined as a room that has a separate living/Sitting area (although not a separate room).   Our junior suites are 650+ square feet in size and include a seating area with a sofa and chair as well as a kitchen and washer/dryer.   We also offer one and two bedroom suites which range from 960 Square feet to 1800 square feet in size. As we are running full during high season we did not have those suites available upon your request.   We are undergoing a renovation later this year and we do reflect that in the booking screens of our website.   We are currently rated very highly and do find our rooms are priced fairly.  Thank you again and I am sorry that you did not find it to your liking.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com  941-387-1567

title: You can’t pay me to stay here on vacation!
review: This was my second visit to this resort.  The hotel rooms are good.  Not overly luxurious but nice and clean with a good view of the gulf.  We really enjoyed both golf courses and food at the "Whiskey Tavern" is excellent.  There is also an Italian restaurant that has very good food.  Great staff at whole resort.  The only drawback is the price.  Quite expensive for this resort.

title: Great people at the beach and pool
review: Dear Michelle R  Thank you for being our guest and for your review. Glad you enjoyed the resort and in addition to the suite, you enjoyed the golf courses and the Tavern and Whiskey Bar as well as Portofino.  Thank you also for your kind mention of our team members. We are lucky to have such wonderful staff here. I’m sorry you felt the price was expensive.  We hope to see you again soon.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com  941-387-1567

title: definitely not worth the money
review: I gave this place 2 stars because of the view of the beach and being right on it. The food in the restaurants was good, but pricey. As far as the rest of the review, this hotel is way over priced. Our room was extremely small and the walls were paper thin. We could hear a family of 5 with screaming kids all the way up until bedtime. You could hear every word that was said. At night, the amount of light in the room was over-whelming. If I had not had a sleep mask I could not have slept well at all.  I don't know how this place gets such high reviews. We will never be back.

title: Great beach and location.
review: Overall property is great, with beautifully manicured grounds and beach. The hotel is a little outdated and could do with some modernization (stucco and tile everywhere) but it kind of works for the beachy feel.   Loved our time on the beach. Justin C from Boucher Brothers took care of our clamshell and daybed set up. He was very attentive and made sure we had everything we needed throughout the day.  Mandy and Mark brought us drinks on the beach all day. They were absolutely fantastic and work so hard to compensate for a poorly set up system. Service was slow but it was not their fault. Someone please get them a mobile POS and a bigger bar. It's crazy to think 2-3 waiters can serve 150+ people with a bar that's 500 yards away (and also serving an additional 100 people at the…

title: poorly maintained. Don’t bother
review: For 7 years our party of 3 has stayed at different gulf coast 4-5 star resorts for both a spring trip and  a fall trip and assumed from the advertising it should be top notch. First off the door to our room was dirty and had chipped paint. A fresh coat of paint would have been an easy fix. The room had low ceilings and outdated furniture. Everything seemed scratched up and the flooring seemed old and stained. The bathroom had stained and a slow draining tub. The bathroom exhaust fan sounded like a rocket engine when flipped light on.. For a new guest room there was just 1/4 of toilet paper roll. We are capable of putting on a new roll  but there wasnt an extra roll in the room. The bathroom pocket door between vanity and bed area was completely jambed shut so no privacy if you…

title: Nice marina and excellent staff
review: We visited here via boat and were welcomed by a distinguished gentleman with a British accent who helped us into our slip. We plan to return as this is a very nice place with excellent Marina, restaurants and friendly people.

title: Perfect winter getaway.
review: Dear Dougw914:  I am so very pleased that you enjoyed our marina and you were so well taken care of.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com  941-387-1567

title: Great beach and service
review: We came with members to enjoy an afternoon at the beach.  We had five appetizers and pitchers of Margaritas.  The beach was clean, towels were plentiful, service to set up with umbrella was quick and efficient.  The food was excellent and plentiful.  This was definitely an enjoyable experience.

title: February school break
review: We spent a lot of time at the pool with our kids while we were there. Jane and Paula, who worked at the pool were amazing. They made each day at the pool (and beach) comfortable and enjoyable. We were upgraded to a Gulf view room which made our stay extra special. The sunsets were amazing.

title: Very good Tennis facilities
review: The Tennis gardens are a superb tennis location, just a shame that they are a few miles drive away from the Resort. They used to be at the hotel. Soft clay courts and beautiful gardens. However, the Hotel Beach view is currently spoilt by dredging and the noise can be very annoying. Fortunately, the smoke was blowing away from the beach most of the time and the smells are not too bad. Shame we were not told in advance of our stay. Without the dredging we would definitely visit again.

title: Beautiful resort, right on the beach
review: We had a wonderful stay on LBK. Perfect wheather. A group of us ( all tennis players) come here every year and love it.   The tennis facility is spectacular, All clay courts. The used to have a nice little cafe right there  (had a really good salad) Last year it was not as good as the year before.  Major bummer- we arrived expecting to have breakfast only to discover it was closed. Apparently it is completely closed as we couldn’t get lunch after we played   It’s a huge facility...with NO food. You can’t even get an ice tea.

title: Our sixth annual visit
review: We love Longboat for the relaxed atmosphere, excellent customer service, and blissful beachfront location.   The resort is shortly to undergo refurbishment and in places, it isn’t overdue. However, rooms are spacious, it is comfortable, safe and secure, surrounded by green spaces, and we feel like we are coming home when we visit.  It’s our happy place and we adore it.

title: Great location and scenery for spring break
review: We stayed in building 3 on the 3rd floor with a great view of the water.   Checking in was fast and the room seemed recently redecorated.  The kitchen was well equipped and the beds and pillows were comfortable.    Had dinner at the Tavern and Whiskey restaurant about 3 miles away that served us ** excellent** steak and seafood dinners.  We spent most of our time at the beach.  Lou and the other beach attendants were helpful and cheerful each day.   We have a great visit and would recommend it to others with our without kids.

title: 3.5 Good but not great
review: I liked but did not love this place but I would come again because the tennis is excellent.  I have stayed at several tennis resorts e.g., Ritz in Naples, Phoenician in Scottsdale, JW Marriot in A-Z The Boulders & The Broadmoor in Colorado, Marriott in Marco Island so I have a good sense of these types of tennis/golf resorts.   Room: clean and in good condition, service is very fast and good. Spacious with nice sitting area, view of the ocean and pool. Double vanity. Shower/bathroom is small.  Food: Bkft at Sands is not good. I tried it 3x. Service is slow, tables not thoroughly cleaned and very slow & disorganized service. The price for the buffet is $20 which isn’t bad but the buffet is sub optimal with minimal health options. Their is a bar in the main lobby which is pretty…

title: Fabulous location with private beach
review: This hotel is in a fabulous location and the staff at the pool, particularly a lovely lady from Argentina serving food and drinks. The beach currently has some work underway and the noise and smells would be a problem if you were staying for a while. Rooms do need an update and it is very expensive when you add 20% plus tips to all food and drinks. However, the tennis courts (although a few miles away from the hotel) superb.

title: Beautiful beach!
review: We spent a week at Longboat Key, and loved the quiet, pristine beach, and the excellent tennis facilities. The people are very nice, guests and staff alike. A special thanks to Jane at the pool for getting us set up so comfortably each day, and always doing it with a smile. Housekeeping was great too!

title: Wonderful location
review: We have been to long boat key before but never stayed at this resort. While we have stayed at other very nice hotels in the area, this one was our favorite by far. The location cannot be beat, it is right on a beautiful beach which never feels too crowded, even on spring break. The staff is very attentive and friendly. We look forward to returning next year.

title: it seems to be slipping
review: the positives, we had very good daily breakfast at Spike N Tees. The people at the beach were very accommodating with chairs and umbrellas. We also had some good lunches, the food is above average to very good. the negatives, the elevator didn't work from morning to evening and we were on the 4th floor. I don't mind the stairs but 5x's up and down got a bit much. We were in building 5. we also went without air conditioning on 2 evenings and the temp was 78 and we did not sleep well. The second evening we called the front desk after they fixed the air conditioner at 5pm, broken again by 8. We asked about the phone and they told me that the phone wasn't working and they didn't realize it until the next morning. really??? We were comped the resort fees and one night stay…

title: We Love This Place! Ask for Riley in the beach
review: It was our 3rd visit and we will go back again!  The rooms are well appointed, the service is prompt and friendly, food is great, amenities awesome, and the beach is beautiful.  And, don’t lift a finger at the beach.  The staff does everything for you.  Riley set up our beach chairs, towels, umbrella and checked in with us regularly.  We had a great trip and can’t wait to get back!

title: The Staff, the gulf and great people!
review: Just returned from a 6 day trip at the Longboat Key Club Resort. Although we were not members, we were treated as such. Fantastic service and a smile from Jane at the pool every day! Lori and Paula always there when a cocktail was needed. Katheryne at the front desk a long with Amanda were a pleasure to deal with! Kristin at the lounge and outside bar was always on point with her service.  Shout out to Sherman the Concierge who helped us extend our stay just one day longer because we did not want to leave!   Need I say more...We will definitely be back next Spring!!

title: No Value at Resort at Longboat Key
review: Many of us Northerns will put up with just about anything to get our of our cold, snowy winters. Sadly, that seems increasingly true of Florida’s once pristine West Coast as it does of the over-developed East Coast. Having been swayed by the the Longboat Key Resort’s enticing website, we just returned from two disappointing weeks. Everything is a la carte; nothing qualifies as AAA.   We stayed in a so-called “luxurious beachfront suite.”  Here’s is what we experienced. The single entrance to our third floor suite was though a parking garage--via a single slow elevator Once we reached the sidewalk, we were looking at a large paved parking lot. Landscaping was minimal; many dead or wilted bushes. There were no stairs leading to the beach from our floor; just the elevator/staircase…

title: Perfect location and great people!
review: We arrived from Massachusetts for 4 nights needing to relax from the cold weather we left behind. The people at this resort are so friendly and helpful always making sure you are comfortable and happy. So needless to say we were finally relaxed after a few days of needed sunshine and pampering. A shout out to the pool and beach staff. Jane who runs the pool area is outstanding as well as the people at the beach who attended to our chairs and food orders. Lori at the pool was always making sure our glasses were full and we were well fed at all times. I must say the staff was friendly in a very genuine way, not just because they have to be which can make or break a stay for me. Totally would recommend any Opal properties..we have stayed at a few and they are great.

title: Beware the Dredging
review: Having travelled over 4000 miles for ".....a private balcony that welcomes fresh sea breezes and serene beach views”.  It was a great disappointment  to discover the reality of the noise of dredging and toxic smoke from the dredging on the beach. Fortunately, our room did not face the eyesore directly. However, it meant that we did not use the beach for our entire stay. You could even hear the noise at the pool. It is surprising that the reviews of the resort are so positive, and only 1 mentions the loud noise and smells from the dredging. We would never have travelled all this way had we have known in advance. The staff at the resort were all great and the whilst the food and drinks are expensive, (plus they add 20% plus extra for an additional tip), the service is exceptional.…

title: beautiful spot, great people!
review: The beach at Longboat Key is just beautiful with soft, white sand. The employees of Longboat Key Resort were just as amazing.  Jung at Guest Services, Anna at Barefoot's Bar and Grille, and Reilly and Jeremy at the Beach, all gave great, friendly, service.  By far the best employee at the Resort was Jane at the pool and recreation desk.  Jane went out of her way to give exceptional service and showed a genuine interest in every guest.  Assisting us with bike set-up and ride suggestions to making sure I was not overheating in the pool as I was doing my FluidRunning workout, Jane  went above and beyond to make our vacation at Longboat Key Resort great.  Thanks Jane!

title: Horrible experience with no resolutions
review: Thank goodness we were only booked for one night at this "resort".  Our room was in a condo like unit across from the main building. The carpet was tattered and fraying in several places.
