The unit was really dirty. There were even hand prints on the wall from either make up or tanning cream.  I was even disappointed with the in room coffee maker...it had only two coffee packets both of which were decaf!    We were starving after a long flight & therefore went to eat at the main building's bar.  The bartender was super nice but lets get to the food.  Ridiculously expensive. My fiance' got a steak which was NOT hot but he was so hungry he ate it anyway.  As hungry as I was I could not eat my cold plate of fish and vegetables.  I humbly told the bartender my entire plate was not…

title: Lovely and Relaxing
review: Dear Missyms11:  I’m sorry to hear that your one night stay was not what you expected.  I would be more than pleased to go over your stay with you and can be contacted though my details below.   It is our sincere goal for each guest to have an absolute flawless experience.  I look forward to speaking to you.  Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com 941-387-1567

title: Sunshine and  Beauty
review: Spent a lovely day by the pool and Gulf......beautiful area!  We had wonderful poolside service all day long.  Our cocktails were delightful and our meal was freshly prepared and extremely good.  It was such a relaxing day.

title: Pool Time
review: The pool area is great.  Jane is terrific in securing a lounge chair complete with towels and a cover for the cushion, along with an umbrella if needed.  And Paula is a terrific waitress around the pool area ensuring you always have a full glass and a full stomach!!! The combination makes for a wonderfully relaxing  poolside experience.

title: Pool side service
review: Dear longbote  Very pleased to hear you had a very relaxing experience at our pool and that Jane and Paula provided exceptional service.  We look forward to seeing you soon.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: PLEASE use reusable containers at the beach
review: A group of 6 women just spent the weekend poolside. Jane was very attentive and moved umbrellas and chairs to accommodate us all together. Although we did not use the outdoor wait staff they always asked if we needed anything etc. Really nice people all around.

title: Peter made a great day greater
review: Dear joi e:  Thanks you for the “5” review and for the 6 of you spending the weekend with us.  I am happy Jane was able to take great care of you.   We hope to see you again for another girls getaway.   Yours in hospitality,    Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Weekend beach fun 🏝
review: Lovely time at the beach, however it was extremely disappointing to be served beverages in single-use containers. The LBKC produces so much plastic waste when there is a simple solution. Please get with the times and implement the use of plastic wine glasses etc. It is a cheap and realistic solution.

title: Longboat key vacation
review: We had the pleasure of being served by both Jane and Paula at our stay at the longboat key resort club, poolside. They were friendly helpful and so gracious. They made us feel special regardless of the fact they were serving many guests at the pool. I would highly recommend a stay here and request both women to assist you with your poolside needs.

title: Pool and Beach make everything great!!!
review: Dear wkirshenbaum: Thank you for being our guest and for the recommendation the resort as well as Jane and Paula. We are pleased you enjoyed your time here.  Yours in hospitality,    Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Pool and Beach Service
review: I’m currently sitting on the beach overlooking the Gulf of Mexico! The next level service of Jane, she’s no plain Jane, poolside is second to none! Peter on the beach is also very accommodating keeping us perfectly shaded! Shout out to Paula and Lory for poolside drinks and eats as well as a friendly smile!  Armanda and Sherman at concierge have made our dining great every night!!!  This is our third visit and we will be back for sure!

title: Great family resort!
review: Dear jackie539: We are very pleased that you enjoyed your third visit with us and we can’t wait to see you again.  I agree that the team is what makes it so special.  Thanks for the shout out to Jane, Paula, Lory, Peter, Amanda and Sherman!! Yours in hospitality,    Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Super Jane
review: The service at the pool and beach is exceptional! Thank you to all and a shout out to Jane for her always friendly greeting, eagerness to help, and keeping towels picked up. Non stop energy! Thank you!!

title: Pool staff
review: We have been visiting for the season and want to commend both Lory and Jane for their attentive service. We appreciate being well cared for. They have been consistently professional , helpful and have gone the extra mile to make guests like ourselves  feel comfortable. They are so personable and will be one of the reasons why we will return. Great ambassadors of hospitality for the Resort at Longboat Key.

title: Pool attendant is a gem
review: Dear Copnnie1225:  Thank you for your kind review and for complimenting Lory and Jane.  We hope to see you visit us again soon.  Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Best pool attendant
review: Jane, the pool attendant has made our days at the pool easy and pleasant. She is always on hand to adjust the umbrella or chairs, making sure we are comfortable and she always does this with a smile. Jane is a true gem!

title: Pool manager Jane
review: Dear UWS110:  Thank you for the "5" review and for your compliments on Jane. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Pool Manager Jane
review: Jane has been our pool attendant for the five days of our visit so far. She is amazing, never stops, has an outstanding personality, and sees to it that our needs are met. She’s a true pro and we look forward to her incredible service for the rest of our stay 🌴😃.

title: 38 special trip
review: This was a fabulous trip for our group even if we were younger than the average clientele.  Jane was exceptionally hospitable at the pool. She was personable, professional and always hustling to make sure guests were enjoying their time. She was a breathe of fresh air at this resort during our visit. We applaud Jane and her staff at the resort.

title: Review
review: Dear Sarahj  Thanks for your kind review. We are pleased you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to seeing you again soon.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Pool supervisor
review: Jane the pool attendant by the pool was fabulous!!  Held chairs for us and hustled her tail off!  Resort was nice as well!  Drinks were good. Once again did I mention how good Jane was??  She kept it real!!

title: Escape from midwest winter
review: Thank you for your review.  We hope to see you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Amazing Resort!
review: Our pool supervisor Jane made the environment so enjoyable with her constant energy and attentiveness to everybody’s needs. Proof positive that a friendly smile and positive attitude make a great place greater!

title: Jane is amazing
review: Stayed here for a week and Jane was absolutely incredible. Love her. Wonderful service!  Can’t wait to come back next month. :). Highly recommend longboat key club for any type of travel. Family, business, honeymoons. Absolute perfection every time

title: Could be outstanding
review: Dear Kat M Thank you for your kind review.  We appreciate that you highly recommend us and you found it absolute perfection.  We look forward to seeing you next time.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Swimming Pool Service
review: The location is outstanding.  The beach is beautiful. All the accommodations are dated and the entire ambiance is very quiet and older.  Everything closes by 10 pm.  The restaurant menu and food were standard fare.  The golf courses are convenient but certainly not the best we have played. The people employed at the golf course and attached restaurant were really great.    Entire experience was average and probably not worth the cost.

title: Bringing back memories
review: Dear Ditcher Thanks for taking the time to review your stay.  Glad you found the location and beach outstanding.  Sorry you were not as thrilled with golf and the dining.  We appreciate all feedback that we receive.  We hope to see you again.  Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: I have a home on Longboat Key, but several times, I host meetings for my company at the Longboat Key Club.
review: I spent a lot of time by the swimming pool. I highly rate the service that I received from Jane and Lori. They were very attentive and met my pool side needs. Jane and Lori are great talking to people

title: Perfect Vacation
review: Spent the time at the pool and beach. Jane and Paula were truly outstanding!  They could not do enough for us and remembered our preferences. We will be back!  We have traveled extensively and this service is the best.  Linda and Raymond Gosselin

title: Excellent stay!
review: Dear Raybo100: Thank you for your very kind review.  We are so very pleased to hear the service was the best and that Paula and Jane were exceptional!  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Poolside Service
review: Spent the majority of our time here poolside with 5 days of exceptional service by Jane, Paula and Lori! The staff made the vacation relaxing and enjoyable and accommodated every last request. We could not be more pleased with our stay here :)

title: Jane
review: Dear Iko28 Thank you for taking the time to review us. Happy to hear that Jane, Paula and Lori made your time enjoyable.  We look to see you again.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Jane and Paula
review: Jane, at poolside service, is exceptional. She made our vacation at the Resort so easy and comfortable. She is attentive, professional and most of all kind and friendly. The Resort is lucky to have such a dedicated employee.

title: Even though this was the worst vacation I have ever had I would go back in a minute!
review: Temps in the 50’s, two days of rain, and illness still could not overshadow the great features of this resort.  The beach area is tremendous, multiple pools, the golf courses beautiful and convenient, food was good and the service plentiful.  We spent too much time in our room due to my husbands illness, so if we found any problems it was nitpicking the room.  Then drop it in a great place like Sarasota???  perfection!

title: Resort and staff are top notch
review: Dear AudreyO We are ready for you to come back for a re-do without the sickness or rainy weather.  We will be sure to have our Florida sunshine out for you next time.  We look forward to seeing you again. Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great Babymoon!
review: Loved our stay at this resort. Lots to do...golf, tennis, pickle ball, biking. The rooms were spacious and clean.   Even though the weather was slightly chilly, the staff at the pool area were delightful. Paula and Jane were so attentive and friendly....made our days the best

title: Can’t wait to go back!
review: Dear Becky B Thank you for staying with us and the wonderful review.  We look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Best on the beach!
review: We had a wonderful time at Longboat Key Club’s resort on the Gulf of Mexico. The setting along the ocean was stunning. We were upgraded to an ocean view suite, which made the stay all the more special. The resort itself is elegant and relaxing, and the heated outdoor pool is wonderful. The service was impeccable. Everyone went out of their way to take care of us. A special shout out to Jane, Paula, and Lory at the pool. They were awesome! Our one request would be to have a more relaxed option for dinner besides Sands Point - we would have loved if Barefoots Bar stayed open until 8 or 9 pm for a burger and drinks. All around, however, we had a wonderful stay and will definitely be back!

title: Longboat  Key Club is a hidden gem in south Florida
review: We had the best service, clean facilities, genuine employees who really want you to feel special and make your vacation the best. The nail tech at the spa even gave my daughter a free pedi with her mani just because she could squeeze both in and want her to feel fancy. The rooms were gorgeous, too notch everything. Quiet walls and dark curtains created peace night sleep and naps for kiddos. I can’t say enough good things about this place, we will definitely be back!

title: First Class Resort in Every Way!
review: We just spent a week there and everything was first class. Great room with a great view of the Gulf, conveniently located near lots of shopping and restaurants, well equipped fitness center, and every one of the resort personnel we dealt  with couldn't have been more pleasant and helpful. We're looking forward to returning.

title: Lovely Get Away Spot
review: I found this spot through TripAdvisor and I was not disappointed.    The rooms were very clean and well appointed.  You can not beat the ocean view rooms--absolutely gorgeous!!  My room had a balcony that was clean and very comfortable.    It was a great spot to watch the sun set and to watch dawn break over the ocean.  The parking was semi-covered very close to the room.  The spa was excellent-both the salon and spa services were great.  NOTE: This is a walking resort.  It is spread out and walking is the easiest way to get from one spot to another.  The front desk is very happy to arrange a ride from place to place for you, but often times walking is faster.

title: Fabulous place to stay
review: We loved the room, the gym and the pool - a fabulous resort hotel. What made it for us was the kindness & attention of Jane at the pool - nothing was too much trouble and she looked after us well, thank you. Special mention to Paula also, despite the fact she is a Wolves fan 😂. We will be back!

title: Excellent!
review: This is our second visit to the resort. Fantastic stay. The pool staff Jane Paula and Lory couldn't do enough for us! Would recommend this resort to everyone! Our room junior suit overlooking the beach was really lovely. On a beach walk saw Rays and year before saw dolphins. Marilyn and Lesley xx  England

title: Lookformeonthebeach
review: Excellent resort. Great view, friendly helpful staff. Amenities at beach and pool are great. Special mention to Jane at the pool and bike rentals, Jeff at the beach hut - excellent :) they both work very hard and enhance the experience for all

title: Reviewpoolside
review: We have had an absolutely lovely visit here and were so well taken care of poolside by Jane and Paula. We were here with four young children and they were always available to help us with anything we needed for the family and we’re both good-natured and lovely. We will definitely be back again !

title: Great time at the pool!
review: This was our second January vacationing at the Resort at Longboat Key Club.  The team at the pool - Jane, Paula, and Lory - made our time wonderful and ensured we didn’t want for anything. I think Lory even had maintenance turn up the sun for us.  Brava ladies!

title: Beautiful resort
review: I visited in January for three nights with my husband. There was an issue with the room we booked and the manager quickly resolved it and upgraded our room. We ended up with a large two bedroom two bathroom unit overlooking the ocean and pool. It was furnished and decorated very attractively and was spotless. The three balconies connected and provided extra dining and lounging space. The full kitchen was lovely and well stocked. The bathrooms were nice with an extra vanity outside of each one. The mattress and bedding felt luxurious and we slept well. We used both the heat and AC while we were there. There is maid service twice daily and they do an amazing job. The pool, hot tub, and beach area are all beautiful and well maintained. The pool attendant, Jane is awesome and really…

title: Wonderful vacation
review: Left Atlanta’s cold weather in January for some R &R at Longboat Key. Had a great vacation. Beautiful beach which was groomed daily. Great golf course staff. Gorgeous sunsets. Personnel at the pool were terrific. Jane, the pool manager, and Paula, the waitress at poolside, were amazing!  So friendly and energetic!  Great golf lessons with pro Mark Anderson!  Loved being here.

title: Shout out to Jane and Paula on the beach, and Jean and Linda at the reception desk!
review: Enthusiastic, positive staff working on a COLD beach - thank you for your wonderful service!  Additionally, the reception staff team of Jean and Linda are the "dynamic duo" who are friendly, helpful and go above and beyond!  Longboat Key Club is lucky to have these dedicated staff persons.   On the other hand, there are a few "beach chair and umbrella" staff who have "attitude" and are not customer friendly.  Overall however, this resort has dedicated staff, and lovely grounds and amenities.   AND, the view can't be beat!

title: Wonderful resort
review: The chief and I planned on taking a boat trip to Sarasota so we looked around and found that this resort had everything we would need—marina, golf, and about 7 or 8 minute drive to st Armand’s.  Alas the weather didn’t cooperate so we drove up anyhow and what a nice place. The staff were all so accommodating and helpful and the beach and pool areas are top notch.  There are 45 holes of golf and varied eateries spread out through the the resort.  There is a resort fee but it includes bikes, beach, health club, shuttles and so much more you don’t mind paying it! Highly recommend this place!!!

title: Beautiful hotel in a beautiful position.
review: My husband and I stayed for 3 nights in this hotel, which is positioned on the beach, in beautiful grounds accessible on free cycles. Our room was a large contemporary suite with a large bed, walk in dressing room with two wardrobes and a vanity unit. The separate bathroom had a toilet, basin and shower over the bath.The suite contained a kitchen with hob, microwave, washing machine and dryer. There was plenty of good quality crockery and glassware.To eat on was a breakfast bar and four chairs. The seating area was contemporary and comfortable with two large tT.V.s.These facilities were very useful as we made our own breakfasts here. There was a large balcony with large table and four chairs along with a sun lounger. The pool area was very good with plenty of comfortable sun…

title: Rooms need mechanical updates
review: We stayed in a beautiful 2 bedroom unit. It had amazing ocean views. The people are very nice and this should have been a 5 star review ....but...  When the air conditioning turns on it is SO LOUD you can not hear the TV or have a normal conversation. The toilets have to be handled a certain or or they keep running.   THE WORST INTERNET SERVICE  I have had in any hotel. When I called the front desk they asked if I had an IPhone. I said yes and they said the internet has trouble with iPhones and Ipad’s. What!!!!  Did they not know that most of their customers have Apple devices!!  Had to call an 800 number and after getting all of the family’s devices on, it only last for the day. I refused to call again. So effectively this resort has NO WIFI!!  I hope the manager spends some…

title: Gorgeous beach, rooms a bit dated
review: This was our fourth stay at Longboat Key Resort.  We stayed in a deluxe 2 bedroom facing the Gulf.  The room is very spacious with two large bedrooms, a kitchen, dining room, 2 washrooms, laundry facilities, 3 televisions and a large balcony.  We really like the deluxe 2 bedroom units but they are a bit dated.  Housekeeping was quick to make up our room each day.  When the ice machine in the freezer didn’t work a staff member came to the room very quickly and got it working.  The beach is lovely, wide, clean and you can walk for miles.  We were disappointed when told we had to pay for a beach umbrella each day.  The resort fees should include a beach umbrella for every two lounge chairs.   The beach umbrellas are $25/day.  There are sand shovels and pails for kids to use.  There…

title: People are Amazing
review: Just want to let everyone know how wonderful the following people have been to us from the Staff Without their wonderful service; our vacation would not be  As enjoyable   Sherman Young Amanda Schlachter Lory DeLosier Paula Jane at the Pool Elizabeth Center

title: Paradise
review: Have been going back for years, most relaxing vacation you will ever take.  Best beach and accommodation have ever been to.   Day at the beach and night at St. Armani’s Circle for dinner is like heaven.  It is a hidden treasure

title: Pool side service
review: Jane, Paula and Lory make your poolside experience enjoyable and care free-service is excellent when these ladies work! The margaritas, burgers and entertainment add to a relaxing atmosphere! Will definitely return for another stay!

title: Relax by the pool or on a white sand beach
review: The Resort at LBK is a fabulous place to take a few days off and relax.  The sunsets are breathtaking and walks on the beach end with lots of sand dollar finds.   The poolside bar and beach restaurants are filled with delicious food and the hardest working staff.  Shout out to Jane, Lory and Paula.  Always friendly and on the move.

title: Jane
review: Excellent service throughout our stay! Jane was so friendly and helpful we really appreciate her and all she did for us while at longbot key!! Always with a smile on her face and a wonderful attitude to be around. Thank you Jane! Thank you, Stephen

title: WONDERFUL POOL STAFF
review: The service at the Longboat Key Club pool was amazing! Jane is always there to greet you with a smile, and help you find a lounge, umbrella , and a table by the pool. Paula provided spot on poolside drink and food service, and Lory was also a delight.

title: N/A
review: We have been coming to the Resort at the Long Boat Key Club for almost a decade. Some of the faces have changed but the experience is consistent thanks to Jane at the pool and Jersey Josh at the beach!

title: Amazing trip
review: The service was incredible thanks to Jeff and Joey  Very nice hotel, nice beach  Drinks and food delicious We would highly recommend   The pool was little bit to warm but still refreshinh Weather was great

title: Never been disappointed
review: My first stay was on my wedding anniversary and it was great! The property is very private,but close to everything.Also the property and rooms are well maintain.It's situated on a beautiful good swimming beach.You have a few places to choose from to eat no need to go into town.The food is excellent.Food and beverages are also served on the beach which is always a plus for me.Staff is warm and friendly.Great spa too. Resort feels and is very safe only guest allowed.My husband and I have been back several times and never disappointed even upgraded. In my opinion I can not imagine anyone not enjoying their stay. Romantic and quiet family atmosphere. My last stay was in the summer of 2017 and look forward in staying again.

title: Visit to lbk
review: The grounds are lovely. The staff is wonderful.  Everyone is polite, friendly and makes you feel welcome.  The food is very good at the poolside restaurant and breakfast buffet.  The rooms are a nice size but very tired looking.  In much need of a makeover. Needs updating.  Decor is dated and carpet frayed.  Lots of outside noises. Overall a nice long weekend

title: Great beach set up with incredible service
review: As Floridians we rarely hang out at the beach. Entertaining special friends so we decided to hang out at the Resort at Longboat Key for the day. As members of the club we enjoy amenities. Jeff, Louie, And Mandy had everything set up for us upon on arrival. They checked in on us without being invasive. Jeff let us know about all of the things available such as cornhole, giant beach chess, etc. The team made us feel like vacationers which was so much fun. Lunch and cocktails were outstanding and all around fabulous day thanks to Jeff, Louie, and Mandy

title: This place rocks!
review: We visit here often and we absolutely love this place. Every employee is fabulous and they always remember our names.  How do they do that!  We especially love Jane, the poolside princess.   We are excited for the upcoming renovations and improvements.

title: Best ever!
review: I love the club and spend a few days each month we visit.  I always sit with friends around the pool and the service is always great.  Especially Jane, Paula and Lory.  As always friends had a ball.  Thank you for being such great people and always making it fun!

title: Amazing, seriously amazing, service.
review: The service at the Resort at Long Boat Key has absolutely been of the highest caliber I've encountered over decades of travel to a wide variety and range of resorts and hotels.  In particular, Paula and Jane (as well as Lory, the concierge Sherman, personal assistant) have been truly outstanding. Warm, kind, friendly without the overly solicitous affect I've found in some upscale locales.

title: Family Vacation
review: Dear Relax08040096044: Thank you for the five review and your kind mention of Paula, Jane, Lory and Sherman.  They are an outstanding group.  So happy that you loved your experience and we look forward to seeing you again.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Poolside service by Jane and Paula never disappoints! They are so pleasant and make sure their guests are happy.
review: The hotel offers a full range of amenities and has regularly scheduled trips to Publix and St. Armand’s Circle. You can shop the boutiques, have a bite to eat and enjoy a stroll around town.  The beaches are beautiful with views of the breathtaking sunsets.

title: Babymoon
review: Jerseytripper: Thanks for the “5” review.  Glad you loved the amenities and nearby shopping.  Thanks for your mention of Jane and Paula.  We would love to have you back soon for another breathtaking sunset.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Pool Service
review: We stayed at the resort at Longboat Key Club to spend some time together before our first baby arrives. It’s the off season, so the resort was virtually empty, which was fantastic. The service has been exceptional, particularly Jane and Paula at the pool area. They’ve both been kind and attentive to us, remembering our preferences and taking time to get to know us.

title: Buffet services
review: Dear jaclyn675:  Thank you for being our guest and your “5” review. I am happy to hear you found the service exceptional and your kind mention of Jane and Paula.  We look forward to seeing you again very soon.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Waitress/servers
review: Second time at LBK Club and everything is terrific.  Jane and Paula are just great at the pool.  Golf is also very good. Restaurants and bars on property are also top notch. We will be back next year in December.

title: Leadership Event - Big Group Over 200 ppl
review: I booked a leadership conference at this location right before Thanksgiving for over 200ppl and I have to say this property and the staff treated us better than a Ritz. Amy Anthofer my organizer was incredible to work with.  Karen, Tiffany and Dan who was my original salesman took great care of us. Banquet team was spot on and over did themselves. Golf Club staff at both clubs where fantastic - Terry O Hara made our golf experience great.   Not to forget the beach setup crew they were extremely accommodating fun and easy to work with keeping our group organized.   Longboat Key Club overall treated us first class.  If you are planning a small or larger group event I would not question the decision to book here! Thank you!   Toby

title: Poolside Love
review: Jane is the mamma bear of the pool. She anticipates your every need and fulfills them without batting an eye. If she sees that you like sitting in a particular area, she'll make sure to have that area set up for you the next morning. The moment you're ready for some shade, she's already opening the umbrella. And when you're ready for some lunch, she's already called over the the waitstaff. She makes everyone feel like a welcomed guest in her home.

title: 25 years and counting
review: My husband and I have been coming to the resort for about 25 years because we love the location and the casual and relaxed atmosphere.  Sadly this year we could not swim in the sea due to the red tide and there were so many dead fish washed up on the beach that it wasn’t very pleasant to sit by the sea.  We sat by the pool and were so very impressed by Jane, who almost single handedly runs the entire operation with such energy and warmth.  Lory and Paula are also superb as the dream team servers, they know what you want and who you are by name.  Despite the fact that the suites could do with updating we hope to be back some time soon.

title: Poolside experience
review: Awesome week with the very helpful Jane! So patient and accommodating as our large group did not have it together! Made us feel great with frequent stops by our area. She is a great addition to your staff!! Michael McKinney

title: Excellent staff...
review: After spending a wonderful week as a guest at the Longboat Key Club, I want to especially compliment the staff - so very knowledgeable, warm, helpful and friendly.  Special thanks to Jane, Paula, Anya, Lori and Valentina.

title: Friendly Staff
review: Joe and Jeff down by the beach were so friendly and helpful setting up all the equipment needed to enjoy a perfect day! They were willing to answer any questions and help in any way, making our day even more enjoyable.

title: My Favorite Place
review: Longboat Key Club checks all the boxes for me. Large apartments with large balconies very nicely furnished, lush grounds, no ugly commercialism anywhere near (convenient Publix), great food, poolside dining, elegant restaurants, beautiful beach and great service, even lovely parking lots. From my first day on the beach meeting the attentive and friendly Luis to check out, it was all five star.

title: Vacation
review: Dear Ed S Thanks for the “5” Tripadvisor review and the 5 star mention.  Your comments are greatly appreciated and I’m very pleased we were able to check off all the boxes for you.  Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: THIS IS SIMPLY FANTASTIC
review: Jeff and Joey are the best! I love the longboat key club! It’s my favorite place in to he whole world!! I come here every year and hopefully we will next year too!! Best place in the whole entire world!

title: Excellent service!
review: Dear haley888: Thank you for coming to see us every year.  We are very pleased it is such a special place for you and thanks for mentioning Jeff and Joey. Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Incredible stay!
review: We had a great time but what really enjoyed me to write this review was simply being unconditionally served and attended to by the pool attendant Jane. She did phenomenal job along with the rest of the staff.

title: Beautiful resort and amazing staff!
review: Phillip O Thanks for the "5" and for mentioning it was an incredible stay.  Jane does a wonderful job, I agree!.   See you soon.  Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Excellent Place
review: I had such an amazing time at Longboat Key! The staff was incredible and the property is just breathtaking. I want to personally thank Jane, pool attendant, for all of her hard work!! She is very attentive and has an amazing personality. Thank you for such a great stay!!

title: Excellent place to stay particularly in a Laggon View Room
review: Dear Mary S:  Thank you for the "5" and nice comments about the resort as well as Jane.  We look forward to you returning for another great stay!  Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beautiful place to be
review: My husband, Rich, and I just came back from a weeks stay at Longboat Key Club Resort. I have to give a special shout out to Jane and Paula out at the pool. They both helped to make our stay awesome. The beach was beautiful and the room was perfect. We loved the room, it had everything we needed and then some. My husband and I will be back!!!

title: Great place
review: Great place.   Everything very clean and staff very professional, especially Jane at the pool, who had our chairs and seat covers ready very morning and was ready to answer all our questions    The only drawback was the red tide, which didn't allow us to swim in beach.

title: Fred F    " Poolside fun with family"
review: Dear alan c: Thank you for taking the time to review us.  Glad you found the place great and the staff very professional.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beach and Pool
review: We totally enjoyed our recent stay at LBK Club.  The pool was great for grand kids and adults, made even more fun by Jane and Paula.  They were both extremely pleasant, very helpful and truly attentive. We have been to LBK Club many times but Jane and Paula made this stay very memorable.

title: As lovely as I Remembered
review: Dear Discover.... Thank you very much for the "5" rating.  Great to hear that you had a memorable stay and happy that Jane and Paula took such good care of you.  Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Awesome service!
review: My wife and I spent a wonderful day on the beach  Our visit was enhanced by the great attention we received from William "Will" Slage.  The lounge chairs were very comfortable, and the umbrella privided much needed shade   Overall we were very pleased with our visit  and can't wait to return.

title: nice rooms
review: Been here a few times this time not as good,pool food waited 40 minutes for food when it turned up it was cold,when you spend the thick end of £5500 you dont expect some clown on the beach to try and charge you $20 a day for an umbrella especially they have always been free

title: Great family vacation
review: Dear Ex-Lockie:  Thanks for taking the time to review your stay.   I would be more than pleased to speak to you at any time.  I apologize the food took longer than it should have. I hope we were able to rectify that for you.  Yes, we have been charging for the umbrella for several years now.  We do offer a "Beach Package" where you can have the umbrella included daily as well as a F&B beach credit.  This may be more to your liking in the future. I'm happy you liked the rooms. Thank you very much for your comments.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Amazing hotel and service!!!!!
review: We vacation a lot and this is the best poolside service that we have seen. Jane and Paula made our stay fantastic. Highly recommend the longboat key club for a family vacation. The beach has white sugar sand and is groomed every morning.

title: Excellent stay at the LBKC
review: Dear flowerwilliam: Thank you for the "5" review.  I am very pleased you enjoyed it for your family vacation.  I agree the beach and its white powder sand is amazing.  Thanks for your mention of Paula and Jane.  Hope to see you again soon.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Bad golf experience
review: Had a wonderful stay at the longboat key club. The pool service as well as the drink service was exceptional thanks to Jane and Paula. Always had a fresh towel, a table for our drinks and an umbrella to keep us cool.

title: Beautiful
review: I have stayed several times here and every time come back the standards are just as high.  It has a fantastic beach with willing friendly attendants.  The pool is surrounded by lovely greenery making it really eye catching.  The food is good for a pool restaurant and they will deliver it to your lounger.  The check in staff are excellent and in booking the accommodation the reservation team are helpful.  The accommodation is outstanding with not a single issue.  It is spacious avd well designed with fabulous wrap around balconies.  The sunset is both beautiful and amazing as for a period there are emarald stripes apparent ....fascinating.  So I will say this is my favourite place to visit when I come to the USA and does The keys so much justice.  If you haven’t been you should…

title: Such a great experience
review: My husband and I visited this resort as our first trip together while being pregnant. The incredible pool host Jane did SUCH a good job of making sure I stayed hydrated and comfortable every time she saw me out at the pool! The whole experience was wonderful but she was truly the highlight of my trip. I wish everyone loved their job and looked out for the needs of others the way that Jane does!  What a great experience!

title: Relaxing !!!
review: Jane and Paula have to be the best team your resort has matched up . We have been coming  here for 5 years and there smiles and positive attitude are contagious!! It makes it really easy to relax!!!!!!

title: Pool Staff
review: Jane and Paula are A1! Great service, great personalities! Jane is very quick to help with umbrellas and towels. Paula is very attentive with whatever you like on the food and drink side. Makes us really look forward to spending time poolside.

title: Million dollar view, fantastic service
review: We have been at the resort for 2 weeks & the service in every aspect has been exceptional. A particular shoutout to Jane & Paula for whom nothing is too much trouble & who always have a smile. The location is glorious, yards away from the beach & magnificent sunsets. But it's the people who make this the perfect place

title: Great Waterfront Resort
review: Loved the room, service, beach and golf. Close to downtown and all that the area has to offer.  Close to airport, Good place to bring the family.  We had our grandchild and it was what we were looking for.

title: Fantastic Place and a Fantastic experience
review: Nick and Josh were so good to us today! They made sure that we were taken care of at all times and always comfortable. The amenities that they have at this resort are wonderful. You can read a book by the water on one of their chairs or take a nice relaxing nap on their beach beds! We had a great experience and the beach is relaxing and quiet, just as a getaway should be! You will not regret coming here one bit!

title: Paula and Jane
review: Paula and Jane very good !! Amazing team are this two ladies!! I was in my terrace all day and I got tired to see them working hard and so happy!! So happy with the service!!! I hope see them next time!!

title: Family R&R after Disney madness
review: We came to The Resort 10 years ago and had fond memories after the chaos of a family trip to Disney so repeated the format this year. Its great. Excellent customer service from all departments which is something many US establishments claim but increasingly few deliver on. The pool staff are superb and can't do enough for you. The Resort is in need of refurbishment, which new owners are apparently on the cusp of doing, in order to bring it into the 21st century but it is clean and well presented.

title: Great visit
review: Came away very much impressed with my experience at this resort.  Everything about the property and it's proximity to everything gives an incredible convenience to anything you'd need or decide to do throughout the stay.  The location is beautiful and relaxing anywhere spent outside, the pool is open and spread out and the beach is serene.  Jane was a peach whenever visiting the pool, and Matthew took great care of us on the beach.

title: Beautiful week
review: We've been able to enjoy this trip at the absolute fullest, really a wonderful stay at this wonderful resort.  Visiting the pool or the beach is a convenient walk away and the setup is certain to be effortless.  The staff were attentive and happy to provide us whatever setup needed.  Matthew had been very helpful at the pool, and on the beach took great care to keep tabs on us the rest of the week.  Only sorry to see it end.

title: Relaxing
review: After 6 days in Disney/universal we booked this hotel for 3 days relaxation before we fly back to the UK !! From the moment we arrived it was clear that relaxation was just what we would get. Paula and Jane who look after the pool area and serve pool drinks were amazing and couldn’t do enough for us. Even our 11 and 13 year old girls have commented on how amazing Jane and Paula are. Would definitely recommend even just for the amazing pool service

title: Amazing service
review: After a short intensive Disney week it’s been an absolute treat to be at this hotel. The location is first class but what makes this hotel stand out is the service. We were looked after by Paula our lovely Argentinian drinks lady and Jayne who who looked after our every need at the pool so we didn’t have to lift a finger. I’d say 4 star hotel but an incredible 5 star service!!

title: Great family trip!
review: What a great week, and Jane at poolside was absolutely fantastic, she could not have been more helpful!  We are looking forward to the remodel, we come here every year and we were able to tour the updated rooms. Lovely!!!  Paula at the pool was so personable and kind, and was such a breath of fresh air!

title: Great Resort
review: This is the second time we have stayed here. It hasn’t changed much in 10 years and needs updating but the rooms are a brilliant size and all the facilities are fabulous. It looks like work is being carried out on the entrance so maybe updating the room deco is next.  A very special mention has to go to Jane and Paula by the pool. Nothing is too much trouble for either of them. Whatever you need. Thank you for making our stay so relaxed and enjoyable.

title: Relaxing Week
review: The Resort was not crowded so it was mainly the residents who used the resort pool, workout, etc.  We enjoyed our week. Staff was very complimentary to services.  Jane, who worked the pool area was superb.  She was always making sure we had towels, water, chairs, and that we were comfortable.  She really enjoys her job and you can tell she passed on hospitality to us.   I am definitely going back.  They are already under construction - rooms, etc.  We had a great room facing the ocean and it was heavenly.  Everything was clean and nice.  It was a suite so we had everything we needed as far as coffee, water and refrigerator for goodies we brought back to the room.   My sister and I just relaxed and enjoyed the workout facility.  We did a dozen of classes on the beach, in the pool…

title: Amazing
review: We have just spent 4 days of a 9 day stay at this stunning resort , right from our check in ( Linda ) we think or Lin was just so welcoming and lovely , nothing was to much , we have a lagoon suite which although not in main hotel is quiet and very roomy , just a perfect room  We have witnessed dolphins and manatees from our balcony  The beach is stunning , white and clean with so much wildlife around  A special mention to Jane and Paula at the pool , customer service beyond belief , not just usual American have a nice day but really passionate care for customers ! They have both made our trip extra special .   Thank you so much. Mike and Paula from the uk

title: Thomas Graham w/ Prestel Family
review: Paula and Jane at poolside were Excellent and accommodating.  Love the resort - we have been coming here for 12 years.  Have never been disappointed.  Poolside is wonderful, love the frozen lemonades.  All service personnel have been very polite and willing to accommodate all of our needs and wishes.

title: Jane and Paula. — Poolside
review: This resort it wonderful-  especially the staff poolside. Jane made every effort to keep us comfortable, and Paula was always asking if we needed drinks or food. We were so impressed with these wonderful women. They should be highly commended.

title: Sands Pointe Restaurant
review: Recently visited longboat key resort for a business purpose and dined at the Sands Pointe Restaurant. We were taken care of by a server whose name I do not recall and a trainee named Natalia. Although she was presented as a trainee I must say that Natalia went above and beyond when taking care of us and it seemed as if she wasn’t training at all. The customer service was absolutely exceptional and I will definitely be back per business and personal related reasons. I would like to highlight that her attention to detail was extraordinary, she was a step ahead at all times.

title: Nice stretch of the beach makes the place ok
review: Pros: the beach is nice and the tennis courts are plentiful. The mediocre: the rooms feel dated, elevators are squeaky and slow. The bad: breakfast was truly lousy. Maybe go with the buffet option and you will leave satisfied, but we made a mistake of ordering off the menu. Orange and grapefruit juice might've been the worst we have had in the last decade and we are in FL people! And eggs Benedict - stay away from those. For some reason the chef thinks that they have to hard-boiled, the potatoes were overdone and tasteless.

title: Especially Nice and Friendly
review: My husband and I just stayed at this resort for business.  We frequent resorts for business meetings and while most of them have friendly staff, clean accommodations,etc, this one was over the top.  Every single person we came in contact with went over and above what would be expected and gave superb service.  Room was clean and quiet, had a beautiful view of the Gulf of Mexico,  and was easy to get to main hotel area with pool and restaurant.  Pool area was beautiful with a salt water pool, easy access to the beach via a boardwalk, many staff members everywhere you turned to tend to your every need with smiles on their faces.  If we ever get the opportunity to visit this resort again, we definitely will.  Kudos to all of the staff for an extremely pleasant stay.

title: Excellent stay
review: Amazing time at the Resort! Jane was so sweet, personable and attentive to our needs at the pool. She greeted us every morning with a warm smile and had our towels set up in the perfect spot each day. Paula was such a friendly poolside server too! Both took a lot of pride in their work and genuinely seemed to enjoy their guests. Great work, ladies.

title: Horrendous
review: We have stayed at this resort a number of times over the years.  We were Not staying here on this occasion.  We had called to see if the Club was taking outside reservations for their Sand’s Pointe restaurant.  We were told yes and the reservation was accepted.  Upon arrival we were denied seating as we were not staying at the Club and were not members.  They did indeed have a reservation for us with a phone number they never bothered to call.  We asked why the reservation was accepted and they blamed that on their J-8 staff.  They were completely beside themselves over what to do.  Fortunately for us a business associate heard the commotion and volunteered their Club account to accommodate us.  The staff seemed stunned.  The restaurant was virtually empty.  We were seated at a…

title: guest service at this resort
review: this was my second stay at this resort, the staff, service and accomodations were all exceptional. when it comes to hospitality, this resort sets a high bar. Jane and the servers made us feel very comfortable poolside .

title: Wonderful visit..
review: Yet again such an amazing time was had by my wife and I at Longboat Key. This is a resort of pure luxury..  from the moment you arrive.  Huge thanks goes to Josh on the beach for always being so friendly, attentive and going the extra mile.

title: Pool staff
review: Jane at the long boat key club’s pool area is the BEST! She’s very attentive, friendly and exceeded our expectations. She made the 4 days we spent there very pleasant. Thank you Jane!  Michelle from NH

title: Sales
review: Jane around the pool was fantastic. Friendly with a smile at all times. She made sure we were well attended to. Each day of our visit she made sure we had everything we needed. She made sure the umbrella was always in the correct position to keep sun off of me.

title: Pool service
review: Paula is an awesome poolside waitress!  She is attentive, polite, funny and makes you feel special!! She remembers our group from year to year! She brings drinks and food quickly and pays attention to make sure your drink is never empty.

title: Jane the pool attendantPaula pool waitress
review: Jane the pool attendant was incredible!  She attended to our every need! Paula our waitress is a long time favorite.  These two ladies made our stay even more enjoyable.  They are an amazing team, always smiling and laughing.   We will see you next year!

title: Pool attendant Jane!!!!!  Paula !!!!!
review: Jane you were amazing!!! Our days at the pool, bike riding -great suggestions on where to ride.  everything you did for us ——you are a ROCK STAR!  Paula!!!! You remembered us. To be greeted with a huge upon our return made us feel so welcome.  You are the world best juggler - taking care of so many people at the pool, helping out when other staff is overwhelmed. You are so kind and generous!  Marko - Paula!!!!

title: Fantasic Employee
review: My husband, Stan, & I just returned from a 3 week stay at this beautiful resort -- our 6th stay here.  This trip was enhanced, immeasurably, by Jane, the pool attendant who was not at the resort when last we were here in April.  My husband uses a walker and, on day 1 at the pool, Jane greeted us with her beautiful smile.  I explained that my husband would be better sitting in a chair, rather than a lounge.  Jane told us to pick where we wanted to sit and she would follow with a "set up."  She promptly picked up a chair, 2 lounge covers (one to place over my husband's walker to keep it out of the hot sun) and 1 for me for the lounge and several towels, including one for Stan's chair.  She then offered to get us water.  Jane never stayed in one place, as she constantly made the…

title: We had a wonderful 5 days at the beach.  Longboat Key Club gets it right.
review: The accommodations, view and service were fantastic.  Our families met there from two different parts of the US and Susan at the front desk was fantastic at getting us rooms that best met our needs.  At check out we had a misunderstanding about a charge on our bill.  The lady at the front desk (sorry I don't know her name, but I'll tell you she's Asian, so she can be identified), really worked hard to be sure we were satisfied.  I'd also like to mention the great beach and pool crew, especially William, Jake and Jane.  Can't wait until we can return.

title: Excellent resort.
review: Thee resort has everything on offer and is well managed. The rooms are excellent with quality furniture and a well organised kitchen cannot fault this property. The pool area is a must with everything needed there with quality assistance. During our visit Jane made us very welcome and provided all our needs around the pool, well done young lady. Must return and the new entrance will be completed by then.

title: Beautiful breach, and views
review: Staying in junior suit with a beach view. The room is clean, and has a balcony. The beach has chairs included with the room which is nice. Also offers shuttle service throughout the resort. Doing some renovations on the entrance which will be nice when finished.

title: Wonderful wedding and family vacation spot
review: We stayed at the resort for a family wedding. We enjoyed our days at the pool getting wonderful service from Jane, Paula and Lori! They certainly made us feel welcomed with their friendly personalities, went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed, and made it easy to relax and enjoy the days at the pool. The food and drinks were delicious! Our Jr Suite was beautiful with amazing views. We'd love to come back.

title: Great resort for a romantic get away. Awesome resort staff!
review: The resort was beautiful. The rooms were large, clean and had amazing views. The pool area is very nice and the beach has super white sand. The resort staff were so kind and friendly. Jane, the pool side chair set woman, up even found me a sand dollar on the beach, above and beyond!! Kristen, Joe and Ed, poolside bartenders, were so nice and great to talk with. This is our 3rd year there and we are already planning to returning next year! We love Longboat Key and this resort. Thank you for another amazing get away!!!

title: Downtime in Longboat key
review: Just finishing up a two week break at the beautiful Resort at Longboat Key club. Amazing white sand, lovely sea views but shame about the Red tide as it stopped us swimming in the sea. Hotel staff did everything they could to help improve the situation and the beach was ‘hoovered’ every morning.   Check in was simple and straightforward although we arrived late at night.  Beware however, they will swipe your credit card for $100 per day to cover the resort fee and contingencies during your stay. Everything is then charged to your room as the resort is cashless. You will get any outstanding balance returned at the end of your visit but you need sufficient credit on your card to cover this as well as other purchases for your trip.  As hotel occupancy was low and we had requested…

title: Jane (pool)
review: Dear FMF23: Thank you very much for spending the two weeks with us.  Greatly appreciate that you had a wonderful time and we were able to upgrade you in order to accommodate the ADA requirement.  We greatly appreciate your comments on the bathroom layout and ease of use for your husband.  Thank you as well for your other comments and for your specific mention of Paula, Jane, Lori and Allie.   We are very pleased that our hotel was the best you have stayed in in years and we look forward to having you visit again.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Amazing!
review: Jane has been a rockstar.   We were greeted by her day 1 and continued to be welcomed by her wonderful personality daily.   A resorts level of satisfaction is based and their employees and Jane will keep me coming back!   Thanks for making our vacay with a new baby peaceful and memorable. ❤️

title: Pool
review: We love Jane!  She made our pool experience the best. Incredibly attentive and helpful. We will come back for sure.  She made us feel extremely welcome. Make sure you see Jane when you get here. She’ll make your day

title: Jane (pool)
review: Dear Rokey3: Thank you for your kind mention of Jane.  Happy you had a great experience with us.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Pool was awesome!
review: First time traveling to the Longboat Key Club. We entered the pool area and was greeted by Jane. She was very friendly, personable and attentive. She made sure we had everything we needed to make our stay most enjoyable!  Thanks Jane!!

title: Mrs Alison MacLeod
review: Dear LoriC Thank you for your kind mention of having a great stay and Jane taking care of you.  See you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Best Place to Stay on the Key
review: Jane was amazing at the pool! She was friendly and warm and made all the guests feel welcomed! Her attention to detail is amazing! She takes the time to get to know you personally and is truly amazing!

title: Wonderful Vacation
review: Great place to relax.  Jane was a great pool attendant .  From umbrella’s to drinks she was wonderful .  Room was large and the staff was extremely accommodating considering the red tide. Bikes are provided so we loved our bike rides each morning.

title: Almost great
review: Dear Pam Q: Thanks for mentioning your vacation was wonderful.  Happy that you enjoyed the bikes as well as the large room.  Also thanks for the kind mention of our staff and especially Jane.  We will see you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Anniversary to remember
review: The resort is top-notch but its age is showing.  Renovations have been initiated but will take a couple of years.  The reservation personnel are professional but their knowledge base is questionable.  Great golf and tennis facility

title: Great place to vacation
review: Thanks for taking time to post your review. Glad you enjoyed the Golf and Tennis. Yes, we will be undergoing renovations (one building at a time) during the next offseason.  We hope to see you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: An Oasis from your real life!
review: This was our second visit to Longboat Key. From the time we arrived we felt special. We were allowed to check in early to watch our college football game which was a very pleasant surprise. The concierge was easy to work with in meeting our special requests in celebrating our anniversary. We will definitely return!

title: Wonderful experience
review: We had a lovely experience celebrating our 10 year wedding anniversary here. Been here several times and love coming back. Jordan, our beach guy, made it a super special day with some lovely additions, including complimentary prosecco. Just made it a top notch memory.... red tide was in full effect, which can’t be helped, but the staff was always apologetic and made it a wonderful experience anyway. Beach was clean and lovely, so was pool and bar.

title: Excellent service
review: Dear BridgetteV: Thank you for spending your 10 year wedding anniversary with us. Thanks for mentioning hos clean the beach and pool bar was as well as mentioning Jordan.  We look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Best Pool Service
review: We have visited many times and always enjoy our stay, this year the service reached an all time high, we were particularly impressed with Jane who attended to our every need at poolside, thanks to the entire team at Longboat Key club, John & Mary Gribbon

title: Perfect location
review: Dear johngribbon:  Thank you for continuing to return to us these many times.  Very happy to hear the service was at an all time high and especially Jane made a favorable impression on you.  We look forward to seeing you next time.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Best Birthday Surprise Ever
review: Jane at the Pool gave the best service with all of our needs!  Paula and Lori were amazing with food service. We were so very happy with each day that we stayed. We can’t wait to come back  We also think Sherman is the best Concierge

title: My favorite place
review: I’ve been here several times.  I’ve tried other resorts in the area, but this is by far my favorite.  Feels like home!  Beautiful beach, wonderful accommodations, great bar. There are several great restaurants on the grounds.  Have been to them all.  I’ll be sure to return again

title: Guests
review: Dear Debbie D:  So happy that we are your favorite resort. Thanks for mentioning the great restaurants we offer as well as accommodations.  We look forward to welcoming you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Pit Stop on Florida Roundtrip
review: Great service.  Jane and Paula were terrific.   Great resort.  Private beach.   Came at the end of red tide.   Staff was very helpful in every way.   Great food at the Sands Restaurant.   Definitely will come back

title: Happy Campers and a beach bum
review: The plans had been for a stop on each coast, before a drive to visit my mothers cottage in beautiful St. Augustine.  The travel itinerary was sloppy and hastily organized, but fortunately our visit was planned for only 3 days and 2 nights on the West coast.  We arrived unfamiliar with the ongoing situation, and considered changing things up and leaving pronto if conditions were limiting us to our rooms and patio only.  The majority of people were said to stay on the pool, but some welcome and insightful discussion with members of the pool staff helped us gain reassurances that the conditions of the beach had been steadily improving.  Matthew could be always counted on offering up an early morning report to allow us to plan accordingly!

title: Views to die for!
review: Our annual holiday sees my family spending almost 3 weeks on sunny beaches, and my oldest spends every chance he can in the sun.  We arrived unaware of the red tide situation, and were fortunate enough to be mainly pool-siders and not missing much from beach swimming.  Luckily the pool staff on hand were wonderful. Jane was a delight, and Matt or Joe were always happy to answer any of our questions

title: Great stay !
review: Currently here, hotel is great. Room is very spacious and well equipped. Staff can’t do enough for you, very accommodating. The pool is lovely and not too busy. Special mention to Jane who is outstanding!  We are here during red tide so can’t go into the sea, such a shame but not the hotels fault and the view from our suite is breathtaking! Will be back!  Thanks to Ryan for fixing the WiFi too :)

title: No response from Director of Resort Operations
review: Stayed at Longboat Key Club in July 2018.   On arrival the entrance to the property was a building site as they are changing the entrance road, so didn't look great.  We booked the resort as it had two separate courses to play and one was onsite, a short stroll from the accommodation.   However, once we had arrived, we found out that the Links on Longboat course was closed, as were the driving range and putting green.  So if you wanted to play, you had to get a shuttle or drive a couple of miles up the road to the Harbourside Course.  This course during our stay had only 18 holes out of 27 open, so out of a total of 45 holes advertised (and paid to access) only 18 were open in the 9 days we stayed.  My daughter is a young junior golfer and the idea was that she could walk to the…

title: Nice location with kitchen efficiency and laundry
review: We had a lagoon view which was very nice so I imagine the ocean front is even better. Nice large comfortable room with laundry and large bathroom. Pull out couch for my son who visited for a night was convenient.  The beach was spectacular nice facilities. Gym on premises was very good.

title: Poorly maintained
review: I have no idea how anyone could give this resort a good review. Also, using the name resort is a joke. This is far from a resort. I have stayed at a holiday inn express along a highway that was nicer and cleaner than this so called resort. Long lines at check in, dirty room, broken shower, stove, and tv. Staff was rude but, relented and moved us to a new room. This room had water leaking from the ceiling into the kitchen. Staff just put a bucket to collect the water. No offer to move us to a new room. The only difference between old and new room was a better view with different problems. The refrigerator was leaking water and did not work properly. The ceiling had water spots throughout from old leaks. Washer machine and dryer were very dirty and old. Pool was okay, nothing…

title: Ehhh
review: The website & Instagram pictures of this hotel are a bit deceiving. Although the location is great (because it is right on the beach), the hotel needs serious updating!! I went during red-tide so the place was relatively quiet & empty (which is perfect for relaxing) but if you go during this time, be prepared to stay away from the beach area & for the pungent fish smell which is everywhere!   The food in the main dining area were both good - although food & drinks are a bit overpriced as I would classify the hotel a 3.5-4 Stars - most definitely not a 5.   Pillows were amazing, bed comfortability was ok. Room and hotel were clean.   Service was pretty good. Paola (poolside) was very attentive & friendly!

title: Amazing holiday
review: We stayed at Longboat after a hectic week at Disney! We chose this place as we wanted some luxury and relaxation and that is exactly what we got. We stayed in a 1 bed suite over looking the ocean and although red tide was here it didn’t spoil the view!  The room had everything we needed and the maid service was fantastic they came in twice a day and we never wanted for anything. The service round by the pool was the best we’ve ever had. Jane and Joe got our family( we travelled with other family so 8 of us in all) set up with lounger covers and towels and nothing was too much trouble. The drinks and food service was first class with the ladies, especially Lori and Paula ( I think that was her name) so friendly and welcoming they really made our holiday. We ate by the pool a…

title: Good but GREAT if I could choose my room
review: I have stayed at this resort several times.  I have always tried to book a room in the smaller annex and not in the large resort.  Each time I have been successful.  In January I made my reservation and stated my preference.  They explained that I can have a preference but can not be guaranteed.  On my arrival I was put in a pool and ocean view room which was not what I wanted.  I hate the pool noise and I was with my husband for romance... and quiet.  They moved me to another room that had a view of trees.  Finally they settled me in to the room that I requested.  I booked a suite.  It took several hours and complaints.  After that the stay was perfect!  I am planning another trip in September and would LOVE to stay there... If I could be guaranteed a room in the annex on the…

title: Impacted by Red Tide...
review: This was our third consecutive year visiting this resort so we obviously like it. However, this trip we invited more family for a 3 day stay coming from Orlando.  The resort was beautiful as always but the biggest issue was the Red Tide that affected most of the Gulf Coast.  When we arrived, we could instantly smell the foul odor and knew something was wrong when the beach was completely empty.  We were told not to go in the water and we would not have risked it anyway.  I have 2 major issues with this!  Obviously the Red Tide was not the fault of the Resort and the pool, grounds, & room were great as always.  However, NO one told us about the Red Tide when we made the reservations.  We only made them two days before our arrival so it was already impacting the beaches.  They…

title: GREAT Location But Doesnt Live Up to Opal Resort Standards or Our Expectations
review: First stay ever at the resort and occurred during a period of "Red Tide". Nothing the resort could do about that. First, the praise: The location is great, the pool was large and clean, the pool staff were super. Lunch and drinks poolside were very good. Check-in and out were efficient. The concierge was helpful recommending restaurants and shopping. in Sarasota.Parking was plentiful. occupancy was low perhaps due to Red Tide, so it was quiet and peaceful, off-season.  Downsides, all surprising for a resort, an Opal property and a not-inexpensive room rate, the fact that:  - there was not ONE upholstered chair in our oceanfront room -- a first in our lives in ANY hotel. The only comfortable place to sit and read, talk on the phone or use our computer tablets was to sit in bed…

title: Edwards summer trip!
review: Dear lotsasalsa:  Thank you for being our guest.  Based on your description, I believe you stayed in the guest room.  It is our only room-type without an ice-maker and washer/dryer. For the guest rooms we do deliver ice upon request.  The majority of everything we offer here are over-sized Junior suites and One and Two bedroom suites.  These contain ample seating areas, desks and full refrigerators with ice-makers.  We are working towards our upcoming remodel and planning to change the layout of the few “guest rooms” to allow more seating space in them.   We will also be doing the lobby as well.   We hope to have an opportunity to see you again.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beautiful Beach , nice hotel.
review: Hotel is right on the beach which is glorious. Soft silver sand, clean water and some lovely shells.  The hotel is large with tower blocks. The check in was easy and we got a room with a sea view. The room was large with a nice kitchen. There was a lompng corridor where there were wardrobes and two sinks. The bathroom was a disappointment. It was small and the shower was in the bath. It felt pockey. The view of the sea were lovely. The room was clean and well serviced. The food at breakfast was good. The dinning room was small and the food was inconsistent.at dinner.  Some dishes were delicious, other sonny ok. The service was good. The pool area is very noisy with groups of people shouting and having there own music blasting. Beach is peaceful and there are plenty of beds. You…

title: Dated property with average service
review: Dear Dublinlady28: I am very pleased to hear that you had a good experience with us and glad that you found the location on the beach glorious.  Happy that you were able to enjoy the silver sand, clear water and lovely shells.  I am happy to hear that you liked many of the features of the suite and I will note your thoughts on the bathroom for the next remodel.   The pool is generally quiet, but I think you may be referring to the day we had a group in that area.  We hope to see you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Red Tide & 3rd class treatment but you pay for 1st
review: This resort is part of a lifestyle community for “snow birds”. The property is clean but the decor is quite dated.   The pool bar is small and not very welcoming.   Ideal for families that need a bit more space in the room and a kitchenette for breakfast or snack prep.   Direct ocean access is what motivated our extended family to select this site for the reunion.  Keep in mind that traveling off the island from here can take some time as you have to pass through the town circle/shopping area and it is bumper to bumper mid-day.

title: Leadership Weekend on my Birthday Weekend!
review: Dear Walblec: Thanks for taking the time to review your stay with us.  I’m thinking you may have come several months ago as the middle of winter is when we see the “snow birds”.  I am glad you found everything clean.  I’m please you enjoyed the direct ocean access and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Birthday trip delight!!
review: I travel every week for work, so a family vacation is really important.  Paying to stay at a great resort and get some quiet time with my wife and kids is really important to me.  So where to start....  First, the Sarasota area is being hit with red tide currently.  So unless you like walking on the beach with thousands of dead fish, don’t go!  Red tide is terrible and you can’t go into the gulf water and the smell is brutal.  So that was a huge issue for the stay.   So please check to see if its gone.  The hotel will not necessarily tell you, so check the news.   Second, the hotel had booked out the hotel to a Medical Conference and their families.  I have to believe they occupied 80% or more of the hotel for the last 3 days of our stay.   So image you have red tide so you…

title: Amazing
review: My husband and I got married here 6 years ago, but didn't get to enjoy all the amenities due to the wedding.  We decided to stay 3 nights without our children and I got a good deal with an umbrella and $75 barside food and drink credit.  It was windy the whole time we were there, so you couldn't use an umbrella.  I know they can't control the weather, but I was disappointed to learn I wouldn't be credited for the umbrella.  Had I known, I would have purchased the breakfast package.  The view from our oceanside room was absolutely spectacular! I could live there!  The room was clean, the bed was comfortable, the Keurig was wonderful and I absolutely love it there.  There is a $24 resort fee, which includes bikes....yeah! I do think they could include bottled water for free in the…

title: Great location
review: Dear LovetheBeach821:  I am pleased you had a wonderful memorable stay with us.  It’s nice to hear that you returned after getting married here in the past.  Glad you enjoyed everything even though there was some wind while you were here.  If you were not able to use the umbrellas due to weather, we are happy to use the credit somewhere else.  Give me a call so I may review your billing.  Thanks for your kind mention of the bartender as well as the drinks and food.  We look forward to having you with us again in the near future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: A tad disappointing on a stunning location
review: Overall this was an unfortunate time to visit as it is the red tide . The property is on the gulf and the smell is awful . The property has great amenities including golf, tennis, spa and beach . The rooms include suites and hotel rooms . The suites have nice kitchens with laundry in suite . The rooms are large and. clean with nice patios. They are fully equipped .  The staff was nice but not particularly helpful .

title: The Catalyst Event for FH
review: Dear laj2e7: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay.   Unfortunately, the red tide made it to our area about the same time you came.   It is now getting better with each passing day. Glad you also enjoyed the other amenities on the resort including golf, tennis and spa.  Our team members goal is to do whatever we can to make your stay enjoyable. I would be happy to speak to you at any time.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great Service
review: We are Floridians and travel statewide very often. This resort is on a splendid location. Our expectations were quite high as we selected this place for an extended weekend to celebrate my birthday.  Again the beach is stunning and the service was outstanding, from the front desk on The rooms were spacious and very clean, but somehow a bit passe' We were short on toiletries, but, again great staff, they took care of it immediately.  This would not have influenced at all the rating, but the "beach and pool" part of the resort instead did.  We were looking forward to relaxing on the beach, but because of the wind no umbrellas were allowed. We definitely understood the safety concern, but we could not stay too long, under the Florida sun in the summer. We wished to move to the pool…

title: A short stop on a great tour.
review: A really nice large hotel situated directly on the beach front and we were lucky enough to get a beach view room with a fantastic view. Unfortunately due to the red tide ( come on US you really need to sort this distressing problem out if possible) we spent the time around the pool.  A big shout out to Jane the lady around the pool who was super attentive and made up for the lack of beach time, and deserves a pay rise (She never paid me to say that :)   The Chissell family from the UK

title: Friendly and accommodating staff
review: Dear wchissell: Glad you enjoyed your suite with a fantastic view.  I’m very sorry we experienced red tide during the time you were here. Glad you enjoyed the pool and very happy that Jane made such a good impression on your family. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Very disappointing after visting here for 20 years
review: We came with a large group for a business retreat.  While our group was large I felt like the staff really bent over backwards to make us feel welcome and enjoy our visit.  Jane in particular was incredibly friendly and accommodating.  Our first day here she graciously offered to set up loungers and get us towels as well help us get situated and offered to answer any questions we had.
