Then on a busy Saturday she again helped us find loungers and shade while also accommodating the other guests as well.  She never lost her cool and was always approachable.

title: Amazing location but some issues
review: Dear BethG: Thanks for being here for your business retreat.  Glad you were very happy with our staff and that Jane was very accommodating.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Wonderful as ever
review: My husband and I chose LBKC for our 25th wedding anniversary to recreate our honeymoon from years ago.  We have celebrated many anniversaries and birthdays at LBKC over the years.  Upon our arrival, all seemed great!! However, it deteriorated quickly for multiple reasons!  Our first evening, as we were getting ready for our anniversary dinner out, housekeeping entered our room with our music playing, my hair dryer blowing, all lights on, clothing on bed, at 5:40 pm for turn down service....she made her way into our room and appeared at the top of the hallway to our bathroom where I was drying my hair, naked!! She stood there to show me she had turn down offerings. She stood there several seconds staring at me, I yelled for my husband, who was getting in the shower, to go and…

title: Ok.. Do Not Expect Luxury
review: LongBoat Key is a beautiful area with beautiful beaches, shops & restaurants. LBKC is on Condé Nast list and Amex fine hotel & resorts, so we picked this resort. It was VERY disappointing!  The lobby needs a complete gut job- very 80s. the Sand Point restaurant needs to be remodeled. The carpet needs to be pulled up. The lobby bathrooms- just look at the wallpaper It’s not at all what you would expect for a Fine Hotel & Resort.  Our room was a junior suite with beach view about $450/night- again outdated (room 4301).We had an issue with our room and were immediately changed to a different room in the same category but that room was completely updated (room 4405). Grounds need to be updated. The tennis courts at the entrance need some maintenance, and the pool needs to be redone-…

title: Lots of good... a little not so good
review: Dear viajeelmundo  Thank you for taking the time to review us. Thank you as well for your suggestions.  We are preparing for our upcoming remodel.  Thank you for your kind mention of Paula and Jane.  I’m sorry you did not find the same service with the beach staff on this occasion.  I have met with their manager to review.  We pride ourselves for incredible service throughout the resort so I do hope you will come and experience us again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Fabulous!
review: Stayed here during 4th of July on recommendation from friends.  We LOVED the location and the beach.  Beautiful powdery sand and walks for miles… with great marine life watching (dolphin, baby stingrays, big crabs, and tons of fish).  The hotel beach staff were great - bringing adult beverages to our lounge chairs while we read and relaxed.  Perfect!  Our room was a very nicely decorated jr suite with double balcony and a full kitchen.  We had a beautiful view of the water.    I gave the resort a "4" because of the "not so good".  Our room was located on the 6th floor of building 3, directly over the pool, which was full of VERY noisy families all day, every day (needless to say, we never used the pool).  Sitting on our balcony one evening, all we heard was an army of kids…

title: My Stay At LBK 2018!!
review: Dear Laurie W Thank you for being our guest.  We greatly appreciate the comments you have made.  Holidays in Florida will typically increase the number of families enjoying all of Florida’s Beachside resorts.  If you are trying to avoid that, I would suggest visiting when school is back in session.  I’m glad you enjoyed your junior suite and you found the staff to be great. We hope to see you again in the future. We do have 5 out of our 7 buildings that are away from the pool deck.  We would be happy to speak to you on location options on your next visit.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great Family Vacation Spot
review: Absolutely amazing stay. I took my wife here for her 40th birthday. Upon arriving, the hotel had placed a bottle of champagne and chocolate covered strawberry's in the room with a birthday card for my wife! We stayed in the junior suite with ocean view. The ocean view rooms all face west so you get the beautiful sunset views right from your patio. The hotel has room service is quite reasonably priced. After spending all day on the beach, we had rood service deliver dinner and ate on the patio every night and watched the sunset.  The hotel sits right on the beach. We were in building #4. It is a very short walk from the building to your chair on the beach.   The staff at the resort are extremely friendly and helpful. From the time we checked in, until the time we checked out, the…

title: Thank you!
review: I am very happy we chose to stay at the Long boat key resort. We were initially looking into other places instead but we had such a wonderful time here. The beach is beautiful. It was a little windy this week but Jordan on the beach was very kind. He was super accommodating doing the best he could given the circumstance and made our beach day very enjoyable.   Thanks to the staff all around!

title: Great time!
review: I came to the resort with some friends and we had an amazing time! The beach was so relaxing & the view was gorgeous. Jordan was very helpful & professional on the beach. He was very accommodating & also gave us some good recommendations on restaurants in the area. Looking forward to going back again!

title: Great Vacation!
review: A friend and I came down to Longboat Key Club for a short vacation to take a break from work and relax. Our trip was very pleasant, and the beach was exceptionally nice. The whole staff were very nice and professional. If you’re ever in Longboat Key, check this place out - you won’t regret it!  P.S. If you’re on the beach, ask for Jordan. He went above and beyond to make sure our beach experience was perfect!

title: Great experience!
review: My girl and I went to Sarasota for the weekend and had an amazing time at lbkc. Our room was perfect with a great view of the gulf. Jordan on the beach was very helpful. He had some great recommendations for restaurants in the area and some fun nightlife downtown. We have an overall great time. There were some minor issues with our food but was rectified quickly. Highly recommended.

title: Spoiled
review: Great place!!!  The beach is beautiful, the staff and the service is STELLAR.  The resort itself is a little older, dated : doesn’t have strong enough WiFi to support streaming movies for the kids, older alarm clocks with no aux option, or plugs near the beds for chargers (which is just a way of life now) but maybe that’s designed to keep you outside which is where you should be!!  Don’t recommend for smaller children, they will get bored but if you need to relax, this is the place!!  Jane at the pool is super friendly and energetic and she will not let you lift a finger! That sure makes a working mom feel special. Allie will serve you cool drinks and snacks with a smile!!! Thanks ladies!!

title: The pool area felt like my private paradise
review: Relaxing has never been so easy sitting by the pool, my wife is forever thankful to Jane for her expert positioning of the umbrellas whenever the sun was getting too hot. Usually i come home beet red, and now i’m golden brown thanks to the care and observation of the pool staff. Before I was even able to put my belongings on a chair, i was having them set up with Jane without even having to ask me, and clean towels were always provided and the chit chat was actually fun and sincere! Will definitely recommend.

title: Best place!
review: My husband and I decided on a last minute trip to Longboat Key with our 15 month old. We absolutely have loved this place! Jane, the amazing pool gal, does anything to help you. She is so hospitable and took good care of us while we lounged by the pool.

title: Mr
review: Nothing special for the price. $495 per night plus taxes for summer rate. My sons room was $1150 plus tax per night. It was worse than my room. Only one pool for multi buildings. Rooms are outdated. Mattress needs replacing. If u sleep on edge u roll off. Needs new carpeting in dining room. Beach is nice. The waitstaff was very nice especially at pool. Paulo and Jane were the best. Attentive and friendly.

title: Poolside service and great beach
review: We had a very nice stay!  Getting away prior to school and fall sports begins.   The beach was beautiful and very clean. We had a lot of time by the pool and Jane took great care of us. Probably one of the hardest working people I’ve seen not only at this resort but in any resort.  Always looking to help make people feel comfortable and going above and beyond keeping poolside clean, safe and relaxing for all visitors!  Thank you Jane!

title: Wonderful stay at longboat
review: I have just returned from a one week stay at Longboat key Resort and was delighted in my choice of hotel. Some years ago I stayed in a different hotel in Sarasota which was not near the beach and therefore it was great to have a beachfront hotel. My family of four stayed in a two bedroom suite and the living quarters and kitchen were very well appointed. I definitely recommend paying for a sea view room as the view of the beach was sensational. There is a supermarket close by and, like many of the hotel guests, we decided to make use of the kitchen facilities and eat breakfast on our veranda to enjoy the beautiful view. The beach in longboat was fantastic and very clean and well groomed. We particularly enjoyed beach front walks. The hotel is a 10 minute drive from st armand…

title: LBKC beach day
review: Christian was super helpful getting my husband and I all set up to enjoy our day at the beach! He was so friendly, great customer service and very accommodating!! We are highly impressed with the staff here!

title: Longboat Key Club Resort
review: Nice Hotel, excellent room and views. Watched the manatees most days from the room. Rooms really spacious and well equipped. Housekeeping really did well as rooms were immaculate.   We felt $30 a day for a beach umbrella on top of the resort fees was a bit of a joke. Pool bit small for the number of people who were there.  St Armand’s circle a short drive away however it is a reasonable drive if you want to go out to Sarasota so it’s perfect if you want to stay local but if you want to do some exploring be prepared to spend some time in the car.

title: Family vacation, 6 nights, July 2018
review: The location is great. We were able to ride bikes to St. Armands circle, downtown Sarasota is about 10 mins away by car, Anna Maria Island is also close, about 20 minutes away. Mote Marine Lab is very close, and we enjoyed visiting there very much, they offer a lot to see and to do (cruises, kayak tours, etc). Staying at this resort you can be as active or as relaxed as you want, tons of things to do around, but the rooms are quite and peaceful. We had a Lagoon View Jr. Suite Room, and it was great. The view from the balcony is amazing, the room is very comfortable for a family of 4. The housekeeping staff is very attentive. They checked our room I think 3 times a day. You can leave your room for an hour any time of the day, and if you leave Service Please sign, you can be sure…

title: Stunning Views, just shame about initial experience
review: Longboat Key as an area is superb - we have just returned from 9 days staying in a 2 bedroomed beachfront deluxe suite (slightly misleading the description of the room!!).  When we arrived at our 'luxurious' suite, we were taken aback by two things, (1) the stunning view we had from our suite, and (2) how disgustingly dirty and worn the suite was, particularly the kitchen (picture attached).  We stayed in room 4407, and had to request management to come and see to rectify the issue as best they could - they sent a maid up who spent over around an hour clearing the kitchen (thats how bad it was) and they did agree how bad it was!  The cupboards were also handing off!  Room 4407 needs work!  Other than that the stay was great - the staff in general were very friendly and helpful…

title: Beach Experience
review: The beach experience provided by the resort is one of the most exceptional i have ever experienced. The Seat coordination is just perfect and the employees provided by the resort were absolutely incredible had a great time overall. I think the employees name was Christian, he was so helpful in accommodating just what we needed and then checked in on us throughout the day to see if we were comfortable and you can’t get better than that while you lay on a beach!! 😍

title: Great day on the beach!
review: Beaches are beautiful here, with super white sand you feel like you are in the tropics. Christian who helped us with our beach amenities was awesome and so accommodating. Whatever we needed he made a point to get it for us.

title: Our family of 7 .....A week at Longboat
review: This resort was absolutely wonderful...The rooms were spotless, the staff ALL went out of their way to be so nice and the pool and beach were near the best we’ve ever been to...and so close to shopping & great restaurants...I am disabled & was able to walk out to the beach because of the boardwalk....I wish I could remember everyone’s names because everyone was out of their way helpful....Jane and Paula, Joan and Taylor at the pool & towel area, Daniel & Anja at the restaurant, Amanda and Kevin ....This vacation was one for the books....What a class destination....

title: Perfect
review: We had the perfect stay! Beautiful resort, great food, perfect accommodations and wonderful beach. Our room was beautifully decorated, had two large bedrooms and large patio overlooking the pool and beach. Location was very convenient. Service was top notch. Our favorite place to be was the beach and the beautiful water and sunsets. Activities included paddle boarding, kayaking and finding shells. Jordan was amazing. He helped us with our beach umbrellas & chairs, and gave us tips on things to see and do. He was so polite and very knowledgeable. The servers at the beach were also very helpful. Thank you for a great vacation. We really enjoyed it and look forward to returning.

title: Pool Area Help is A+++
review: I recently vacationed at the resort at Longboat Key. Much of my stay was spent around the pool. It makes a difference when you visit a property and the staff/ workers are polite, friendly, outgoing and helpful. One of those individuals was Jane. She was always smiling, upbeat and I noticed the great energy she had all day. This makes a difference as a vacationer. It is the little things that make you want to come back to the resort. Jane is one of those little (BIG) things.

title: Pool Staff Made Our Visit!
review: As long time vacationers of the Longboat Key area, we already loved the area and think the beaches are FANTASTIC! This year we decided to stay at this resort. It's an overall great place and had many redeeming qualities but I just have to brag about the pool staff. We stayed for a little over a week and were always delighted to see Taylor and Jane. They went out of their way to accommodate us, bring information that the hotel had failed to provide upon arrival, and just take time to see how we were doing. They truly took our experience at a new place from extremely average to absolutely stellar! Our family is already looking forward to coming back next year. Thanks Taylor and Jane!!

title: Jordan saved the day on the beach!
review: Just a little over a week ago I had a day with my family at one of our favorite spots, the  Longboat Key Club. We chose to venture down to the beach that day and I told a gentleman that we wanted the Queen bed, as well as several chairs. Neither were brought to us at first and we were only given two chairs. When I asked where everything else was, he said I had never told him I wanted anything else. Essentially telling me that I was in the wrong.  I was frustrated and he said he would get it straightened out. I knew what I said and he was putting the blame on me. Then Jordan came over (I assume he was some type of manager and if not he deserves to be) he had the utmost respect for our situation and brought over everything we had asked for himself instantly. Then to put the icing…

title: Awesome at Longboat Key Resort stay!
review: Dear BenL: Thank you very much for taking the time to review your day.  I am very sorry it did not start as it should and the team member miscommunicated to you.  Our sincere goal is to take great care of you from the very first moment you contact the property.   Thank you for your kind mention of Jordan and I’m glad Jordan was able to turn your day into a special one.  We hope to see you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: What a great experience!
review: Clean nice place to stay with family the beach was clean and Jordan who was a fellow Jersey boy now living in Florida was excellent super professional excellent service and very knowledgeable of places to eat recommended the Columbia Restaurant and spot on !!!! Staff are an asset they represent the quality of your business and Jordan was the man!!  Thanks for our great trip here food also in-house well done great preparation!!! Clean family place if you need any extras a Publix and cvs about 4miles down the road the resort map is a little tricky🤤!

title: Beautiful Beach, Superb Staff
review: Dear mrmar87: Thank you for the kind “5” review!   Very happy that you found the resort clean and a great place to visit.  Thanks for the kind mention of Jordan.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Gary & Lou
review: The entire trip was fantastic, we had 2 people over 70, 2 people in their 40’s 2 I’m their 30’s and. A 6 year old, so we were diverse in our likes and wants, but that didn’t stop the amazing staff from giving us the best service we have ever received at a resort! Jane from the pool was absolutely amazing, the first day we were there she set us up at the pool, laid out our towels and made sure our umbrella was in a good position. From that point forward Jane had our chairs and towels set up for us before we even arrived at the pool, so we didn’t lose a minute of fun in the sun. She even helped carry all of my things down to the beach (my 6 year old was refusing to carrry more than his sand toys) when she didn’t have to. She always checked on us and knew exactly who was in our…

title: Summer Vacation
review: Beautiful and private beach spot! Relaxing and quiet. Pool side was great, Jane set us up with chairs and towels each day and was very friendly. She got us in touch with the Spa and found details about a dinner event. Lory refreshed our drinks and brought our lunches! Great service ladies. Thank you for making our stay extra memorable! The Jones family

title: The resort at longboat key
review: Jane at the pool area was just amazing!  She helped to make us feel Comfortable and helped our vacation to be so relaxing!!!   The service and  wonderful personality of Jane was beyond A+ service!!!!     Such a wonderful resort to stay at! The beach and water is post cRd worthy and the rooms and service at the resort is certainly the best we’ve ever had!!!

title: Jane and Paula
review: We absolutely love the pool and the beach for our family time at longboat key… Jane and Paula take such good care of us at the POOL - always :-) we love getting to spend our summers here :-)The beach is beautiful… Within walking distance… Warm water and clear water… You can find shells and the water some days or so, I can take my four-year-old out to the knee high sandbar to enjoy the waves there

title: Great resort
review: So far we are really enjoying our stay. A few minor issues but nothing they did not correct. We didn’t have shampoo only body wash and they brought some with no issues at all. They didn’t have tooth brushes but most resorts don’t anyway.  We went out for dinner and when we came back we had a plate of pastries and a small bottle of brandy.  The beach is beach is beautiful , white sand blue water. Very private!  We upgraded our room for the extra $75 a day, you get a poolside credit if $75 and umbrella service.  My only complaint is we couldn’t use it the day we checked in, if we did we could use it the day we checked out. I do believe for the amount of money you are paying for the resort and the resort fees,the umbrella service should be included. You are only allowed to use the…

title: Great Beach!
review: Have been here before and am a previous apartment owner. Have returned because  beach is so beautiful and beach service is terrific. Was shocked to find I had to pay for each beach umbrella and beach chair. Its not that I can’t afford it , it’s just that at a five star hotel providing the best in luxurious accommodations at a premium price I wouldn’t expect to be hit with another charge. They don’t do this at other top resorts and it disappointed me. Nevertheless the resort is beautiful and I had a great time.

title: Perfect Trip
review: We had a quick trip to the beach and the room was outstanding.  The beach was perfect and people who are not staying at the property don't stay there because they can't even buy a drink. It was a very nice experience.  The food was SUPERB and the service was even better.  Mercedes on the beach was a gem and took complete care of us!  Our air went out in our room and the sofa mattress was not appealing but the staff made it right so quickly we were not inconvenienced. It was such a great experience we sought out other Opal properties and have another stay at Lido Beach in a few short weeks.  Worth the price! It was a high quality stay in every manner.  The service was exceptional.

title: WONDERFUL MANAGEMENT
review: These guys have it down pat. They have just gotten a new outdoor restaurant manager. This guy is all over the place all the time. He is talking to all customers and all the staff. It is actually fun to watch him work. The level of energy and focus on the customer he has injected in the business has been GREAT!!!

title: Great beachside service by Jordan and the yeam
review: Spending a couple of days vacationing at the Resort at Longboat Key Club.  Beautiful beach!  Jordan made sure we were wonderfully situated on the beach each day with chairs, towels, umbrellas and great beachside service.  Excellent attention to detail remembering our names and our preferences.  His help made our visit that much better.  Thx Jordan!

title: Delightful resort
review: We visited Longboat Key Club for 2 nights on a 5 night Gulf Coast Florida vacation. This resort was the nicest and most relaxing by far. The accommodations were worth every penny. And my wife was very pleased visiting nearby Armand Circle. The shells my wife found on the Long Boat Key beach were better than Sanibel. A Sanibel resort we booked for a similar price was terrible in many ways. Next visit we will return to Longboat Key!

title: Pool service
review: Pool and beach service is what makes this resort special. Umbrellas and towels and chair covers are all provided.  The orientation of the pool and chairs and umbrellas means always being protected from the direct sun. Summer in Florida is such that as long as you can stay covered and occasionally get wet—— sitting outside all day is fantastically relaxing.  Jane is incredibly helpful and attentive in setting up the chairs.  The food and bar staff is consistent year to year which means the employees are happy and love the job and the company.  For us, sitting by the pool, it means great service.  Very few places on the West coast have the pool and beach and service so well covered.

title: Great Stay!!
review: Last day at this Amazing place!! Pool time and beach time!! I have to say the experience at the pool was beyond amazing!!!  Jane with Boucher Bros. at the pool is top notch with how she cares for the guests!! She took care of us everyday and went out of her way to make our stay relaxing and inviting!! Loved her updeatness and chatting with her!!! She is a great addition!!  David on the beach made sure our umbrella was at our liking and wouldn’t even let me take my towels back to return them! He hustled up and said he would take care of them for me! :)  Paula, Lory, Mercedes and Mandy took care of us when we were hungry and thirsty and were great to see everyday!! True gems!  The staff is beyond friendly and courteous!! We definitely enjoyed our visit and will be back!! Look for…

title: Wonderful resort stay from beginning to end
review: My husband and I stayed here for 4 nights. Greg in concierge was so thoughtful and accommodating - we stayed in room 1203 which was beautiful and spacious and located in a quiet and secluded building 1. We were greeted with a complimentary chilled bottle of nice champagne for our anniversary and welcome note which was very generous and touching to arrive to. Greg was very helpful and answered many questions throughout our stay and always remembered us which was impressive given the size of the resort. He gave us many nice suggestions to maximize our stay experience. The property was clean and safe and has a Gorgeous beachfront, walkable sand for miles and miles, and also a beautiful saltwater pool with terrific waitstaff for drinks and food. Christian and Jordan on the…

title: Terrible Service. Something's changed.
review: I've stayed here annually for the last 5 years.  All the comments re: old rooms are accurate.  This room had a broken deadlock, leaky fridge, mildew in shower, broken phone and elevator out of service. But I've ignored it because the location is beautiful. This time though the service was poor too. Housekeeper forgets to put shampoo in the room? It happens. But it's not okay to take almost two hours to get some after calling. Room service to use the food credit that was part of room rate? Can't use it because they were too busy. No toilet paper. No turn down service several times leaving no towels. Mystery bill charges.  Beach service was slow since two servers were fighting with each other. One didn't want to work because 'it was hot'.  When I checked out I told the front desk…

title: Costly beach charges!
review: This is our 3rd visit to Longboat Key Resort. Prior to arrival, we had requested a high floor when we booked our holiday.  On check in the hotel had allocated us a ground floor 2 bed suite.  They said that they never received the request.  We were very disappointed with this and would have settled for any of the other 9 floors.  They said they were fully booked and could do nothing about it for that night.  After standing our ground, a receptionist called Susan said she would sort something for us.  We stayed on the ground floor for the first night and then moved to the 7th floor for the rest of our stay. The 2 bed suite was a bit dated, and hadn't been refurbished since our last stay quite a few years ago.  Compared to other high end hotels it could definitely do with a revamp,…

title: Everything I was hoping for!!!!
review: Dear Tonifermanagh: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay and offer feedback.  Happy that you love the location and are looking to come back to us again.   Sorry you did not start out in the location you were looking to be in, but very happy that Susan was able to move you up to one of the higher floors. We are never able to guarantee location as it depends on who checks out on a given day, but we work very hard to exceed our guest’s expectations for their stay. All of our Elevator A/C’s are currently up and running well and I apologize that you had an issue while you were here.  Yes, we have charged for the beach setups for a couple years now and as you can see from our prior Tripadvisor reviews, our guests are very happy with the service levels there. We do offer packages online that include the chairs and Umbrella, so I would recommend you book that package for your next stay if this is important for you.   Thank you again and we hope to see you again soon.  Yours in hospitality, Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great pool service!
review: I’ve stayed at Longboat Key Club almost every June for the last 10 years. This year I have had the BEST service from the pool staff who are managed by Boucher Bros. I especially loved Jane + Taylor! They were extremely pleasant each day and always ready to help me with my poolside needs.

title: Cristian
review: rebeccaconley78 Glad to hear you had a wonderful stay and you enjoyed the service you received at pool by Jane and Taylor.  Look forward to seeing you again next year.  Yours in hospitality, Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Dated Resort on a Nice Beach
review: Cristian took such great care of us with a smile and a sense of humor! Hooked us up with a beautiful set up to enjoy the incredible beach day. Would definitely recommend him highly! Excellent service :)

title: 40th Wedding Anniversary Visit
review: In it's hey day....about 25-30 years ago...I'm sure this was on heck of a nice resort. But now, it's just another dated resort on a beautiful beach which is so typical of Florida. They tried, but it's like putting lipsitck on a pig. We came in early June and the place was deserted which made the resort even appear older. Service was fine. If your idea of a vacation is modern, plush surroundings, this is not your place. The price is way too high for this resort.  It get's the job done most probably for those in their eighties.

title: Make them quote all their rates!
review: Firstly, my most sincere thanks to Amanda on Concierge for ensuring that all the finer details of our special stay were looked after so perfectly!! Love you young lady, many thanks! XxN   Now for the reason we come to this beautiful resort. We don’t play golf. We don’t play tennis. As 60’somethings we don’t use the kiddy friendly pool. We enjoy the fabulous, restored beach!! How fantastic it is now compared to the storm-devastated condition in 2016.  But it would be for nought without the Beach “A” team. There’s quite a few guys working in shifts, but the Medal d’Honneur goes to Jake, Chris and David - and by the way the latter is not included just because his lovely Mum, Susan, is English, he’s a proper part of our Beach “A” team!  I suppose I’ve got to add Ozzy, if only for 2…

title: Family trip tradition
review: We come here each summer as a family from multiple locations in U.S. It is a perfect place to getaway as a family and enjoy what the Gulf has to offer. Perfect location on the water and the beach is ideal. All buildings are right near the beach & pool. Definitely recommend doing the Toes & Sand package. Service was outstanding by the pool as it is every year- especially from our favorite Paula. She is the best! All others were great as well except one person working the front desk that we shared in the resort survey. We had friends traveling there from Dubai who also had the same issue. If you have problems with a rude staff member at check-in and check-out, I would just ask for another associate which we did. I am one to never complain about anyone working at any place I visit-…

title: Beautiful experience
review: Location that deserve a stay in the need of spending time and having a relaxing stay. The breakfast is good and the the courtesy of the staff very high. Rooms are clean and equipped in a reasonable way.

title: Outdated and worn
review: Just checked in and ready to leave. The room is so outdated. 1980 kitchen and furniture. Elevator floor is not stable. Motel feel. If you enjoy dated timeshares stay here.  Beach looks nice. Will head out tomorrow.

title: Stayed in Better Resorts for the Price
review: Complex is spread out. They don't offer golf carts shuttles to other buildings. They say you can drive there in 4 minutes or walk there in 14. Other resorts I've stayed in offer golf cart shuttles.  Food is OK, not great.   Topper is the building I was in was 4. It had 1 elevator. The 3 days I was there the elevator went down and placed Out of Order once each day. Average time to fix was about 3 hours. During one of the down times I was sitting outside the elevator. 3 guests who had just checked in showed up to go to their rooms were not told it was out of order. To say the least they we're happy.  Spa Jaccuzzi by pool was out of service on a couple of times as well.

title: Summer vacation
review: Great hotel. Room was amazing with a great view. Hotel staff all very friendly, great drinks at the pool and great food at the restaurants! I would highly recommend and will definitely be back again one day!

title: Great summer getaway
review: This was the second year we went for a couple of days the rooms have a beautiful gulf views  and all the amenities you could ask for . the bagels and lox for breakfast is wonderful The staff were very accommodating especially Lynda at the front desk Everything you would like from customer service Will be going back again

title: The best beach experience !
review: We just left the beach at Longboat Key club and had a very pleasant time on the beach our beach attendants Josh and Thomas were amazing they helped us to our spot and had a wonderful conversation walking there and then put up our umbrella and got our seats ready for us contacted our server and sent April over which was just as amazing she was very gracious and got our orders quick. This is exactly why we keep coming back here to the beach we always are treated.so good !

title: Spa Vacation
review: My husband and I wanted to do a spa vacation for a change of pace and selected the Resort at Longboat Key Club. We are very pleased with the outcome of booking 5 treatments (one for each day, for each one of us) during our stay. From special ritual treatments to deep tissue massages and facials we very appreciative of the masseuses' abilities and use of good products.  The highlights were the special ritual treatments, the Longevity and the Tranquility. Both were 110 minutes of bliss!! We were fortunate to have Casey and Karla performing these treatments. My skin has never been smoother and we both left the spa feeling revitalized.  We love the location of the Resort at Longboat Key Club with its multitude of beautiful golf courses, a private white sand beach, with comfortable…

title: Horrible Customer Service
review: I stayed at the resort with a group of friends last week. The room, beach and pool were great. The customer service that was experienced during our stay was the worst I've experienced in all of my personal and business travels.  I have never felt like I was "out of place" at any place I've traveled - and I experienced this exact feeling while I was at the Resort at Longboat Key Club.  I believe that the employees at this resort could take a few lessons from Starbucks and have a few Diversity training sessions for ALL of their staff.  There was also confusion with the deposit amount and confusion with the final billing.... Which is still unresolved. Overall, $2700 has been the cost of the room (for a 3 day stay).  I will be traveling to Cabo next month and will be staying for 6…

title: last day
review: i’ve been coming here for years and am just now starting to realize what i’m missing when i leave. we decided to finally get the bed and it was well worth it. we had the comforting shade of the cabana and the sand chairs that can go in the water. we asked our beach attendant Freddy for the food and beverage service and it arrived immediately and we had a full on meal and drinks right on shore. it’s the life that i want to always be living.

title: Sunny day on the beach
review: The beach here is amazing. i’m so glad we are on summer break. the service on pool and beach is amazing. Jake and freddy on the beach were amazing. food and drinks are always here handy.  will definitely be back next time

title: Amazing service and perfect location
review: We just had the pleasure to enjoy a 2 nights stay at Longboat Key Resort. We arrived late evening on Friday and head straight to the beach to capture the perfect sunset and enjoy the warm water. That was a great start! As soon as we arrive, valet was very attentive, polite and make us feel special to stay there. Waitress was more than dedicated and brought us a bottle wine near pool even if the pool bar was closed. In short, it is a very nice hotel with a 5 star service. Beach is picture perfect with white sand, as great as those in Australia (without the long haul!). Beds are extra comfy.

title: Not worth returning
review: We were very excited about our trip to this resort in April . My husband is a golfer and I’m a beach person.  We had a beachfront room with a lovely view. The room was small, and quite dated. The bathroom  was tiny! For the price of our stay we expected much better! We ate on the property for several breakfasts and a dinner. The ambience was non-existent and the food was over-priced. When we went for dinner we were told  Long pants only for the men or eat on a level above the main dining area. I’m sorry I didn’t take pictures. Although the restaurant was poolside, it is a dark and gloomy place (note: the local restaurants were very backed up and we couldn’t be seated til after 9 at each one I called).The food was okay but nothing to write home about. Very expensive  I don’t mind…

title: Great  experience at the resort at Long Boat Key
review: We absolutely love this place. The staff is incredible. Leo who runs the pool and beach area is amazing. His staff is really incredible!  Ozzy and the whole crew.  Food is great. The beach is beautiful!

title: My time at the LBKC
review: It’s a beautiful resort with great service. Jayna the pool girl was very helpful with finding me a seat and making sure I had everything I needed and Jake was very kind at the desk by the pool. We further went to the beach and were greates by nice people who treated us well. Would defiantly stay here again in the future.

title: Beach service
review: Excellent service at the beach from Jordan. Super friendly and accommodating. Ensured we had the shade we needed all day! Beautiful turquoise water and white sugar sand. Spacious rooms and close to St Armand’s Circle.

title: Really delighted with the whole experience
review: Stayed for 8 nights in June. The junior beach view suite more than meeted our needs - it was lovely and spacious, fully equipped with everything you would want for a longer stay (although we only really used the kettle / crockery/cutlery and fridge/freezer)!.  Lovely comfortable bed with great pillows - just what is needed for a peacefull nights sleep. House keeping was excellent.  My only one tiny little moan would be  - I tried to make a couple of local calls using the phone and for some reason I could not be heard by the receiver so I had to go to reception to use their phone - not a huge problem.    And .... I do feel that the charge for unberellas on the beach is excessive, as is $150 for the 'full works' comfy beds on the beach - really - make the price more realistic and…

title: my stay at lbkc
review: Jayna Perry was the absolute best pool girl I’ve ever had serve me. Jake was also very helpful, he brought over shade to keep me safe from the heat. The resort was so nice and beautiful, I will definitely be back again.

title: Day at the beach
review: The pool is amazing! Perfect way to cool off after a day on the beach. Jayna and Jake provided us with great service. The resort is five star. I will definitely be back. I will recommend this place to everyone!

title: The Wedding Party
review: Hands down the best place to stay, and much of that is due to the hard work and dedication of the staff. Christian is the man! He had the beach ready and waiting for us daily, and made sure we had everything we wanted each day. If you want the best vacation you can have, come here and ask for Christian aka The Man!

title: Christian..aka Johnny Depp
review: We absolutely love Longboat Key resort!!  Florida is an an amazing place to visit and it’s even better to live here!!  Our cousins from Tennessee stay here twice a year and love it!!  Christian  was amazing and such a hard worker...he has a great attitude and was so helpful!  He looks like a young Johnny Depp and is adorable!  Thanks Christian😉

title: Amazing beach help at Longboat Key
review: Longboat is always an amazing place to stay but we have never had better help on the beach than on this trip. Met Christian (who tremendously favors a young Johnny Dep). He worked tirelessly all day and always had a smile on his face We experienced a sudden wind storm and he jumped in and helped secure flying umbrellas. At sunset ran into him again. Still working but still smiling. Amazing vacation!

title: 20th Anniversary Stay at Longboat Key
review: Positives: Location is incredible.  Got the room we requested and were presented with a nice plate of strawberries and a card wishing us a happy 20th.  Luis and Joshua on the beach were excellent when we needed benches we got them even when the weather was not great.  The first day Mercedes was taking care of us and was attentive and helpful even when the beach was a lot busier.  Bar service was also great especially when it was wet and soggy – Ed and Kristin on different days took care of us and again service was excellent.  Negatives: When you pay $500 per night (with tax etc.) for a king suite you expect that level of service at ALL TIMES.  First day – was awakened at 6am by the alarm clock – housekeeping hadn’t turned it off from previous occupant.     Day 3 – our room was…

title: Love this place
review: Great mini vacation! Clean and nice. Jordan at the beach was awesome when helping set up our chairs and umbrella, very friendly and accomidating! Came with my fiance and family, and couldn't be happier.

title: Love the beach!
review: Christian was awesome and the beach is beautiful! He helped us set up our chairs and made sure we were comfortable. We’ve been coming here for years and he is one of my favorite employees I’ve encountered so far.

title: Great Vacation Location
review: This is my fourth year staying at the resort.  The accommodations are wonderful. I have a huge room with a kitchen and balcony overlooking the ocean and can watch the sunset every evening.  The rooms are beautiful and spacious perfect for a family. The beach has powder white sand and the water is blue and green.   The staff provides excellent customer service. Christian always helps me find the perfect spot on the beach and sets up my chair and umbrella and even checks in during the day to make sure everything is perfect. The food and drinks are delicious and they have several restaurants on site or it’s a short drive to St Armand’s Circle for shopping and food. If you are looking for a resort that takes care of everything for you this is the place to visit.

title: Great staff!
review: A few of my girlfriends and I are here for a bachelorette and everything has been amazing so far! The bellhop at the front ( who’s last day was on my arrival day unfortunately) was a wonderful greet at the front and Christian (providing beach services) has been incredibly friendly, welcoming, and have already made our stay so easy and seamless. Definitely would recommend!

title: Staff was amazing!!
review: Everyone at the resort was so kind and helpful. The two women at the front counter helped me check in early. Very early. Christian at the beach also rocked!! He helped us get set up for a long day of beaching fun.

title: Just Go!!!
review: Wow! What an experience. I came a few weeks ago with my boyfriend and the beds were comfy, sheets were clean, and the pool was delightful. Our pool attendant, Ashley, was very accommodating and sweet to us and went out of her way to make us comfortable. The drinks were yummy and she made us feel like royalty! I will definitely be back, excellent hospitality!

title: A little piece of paradise
review: We stayed here back in November for one night and this hotel really has the wow factor. We stayed in a beach view junior suite and it was jaw dropping it was huge I couldn’t believe it. We had a massive balcony overlooking the beach, a walk in wardrobe and a kitchen it was insane. It is a little pricey but you get what you pay for and it’s ideal for a special treat.

title: Beach Attendant
review: I had the pleasure of staying at Longboat key Resort a couple weeks .... it was one of the best mini vacation I have had in a long time ...   the service on the beach was excellent...   I still can’t get over the beautiful and spacious lay out of all the beach chairs beds and umbrellas it was breathtaking  ...  we had the pleasure of meeting Luis Velez one on the beach attendant he went way over broad to make us feel special , while we were there and his manager Leo was Also super nice !!!! Thank you Luis & Leo for a fun fun weekend !  We will definitely recommend this resort to all our friends and family !

title: Excellent
review: This was our first visit to this hotel .We had an ocean view suite, everything was provided from toiletries to washing powder. The rooms were spacious and comfortable. We liked the fact we could decide at what time they would come to clean the room. All the staff were extremely friendly, Taylor at the towel station at the pool and especially Christian at the beach who was especially helpful to me as I had a broken foot.  We would not stay anywhere else .

title: Always an amazing time!
review: I have been to this resort a few times already this year and each visit surpasses the previous. I was greeted by an amazing staff, and the beach is absolutely gorgeous. Jake remembered me and took amazing care of my family and I. Thanks Jake for making me feel like I'm at my home away from home.

title: Bugs epidemic
review: The hotel was fine, but there was a bug epidemic that we couldn't even stay in the pool area. The weather wasn't very good, but this can happen. The service overall was good. For the price that they charge, it could offer more benefits. The breakfast is good, but too expensive.

title: Sand in the toes
review: Where do I start, from our early morning tennis lessons to golfing in afternoon oh yeah and did I mention the beach. Where could you go wrong. Jake took great care of us on the beach and needles to say we had a great time.

title: family
review: me and my family have been coming here for year and there is a good reason for that, this service is out standing. from the inside dining to Jake setting us up on the beach can’t go wrong here, will always be back.

title: Summer is here
review: Glad to be out of school and back home for the summer. The weather has been out standing we have had the best beach set up thanks to Jake and Ozzys help. We had drinks coming all day and even got to to golf one afternoon.

title: Staff good/ dated decor
review: We booked a king room gulf view with their special add on ($75 of food/drink and beach chairs/ umbrella daily). This was a good deal for us!! When we checked in, our room was small, with view of the pool mostly... glimest of the gulf. We went down to the desk and asked for another room. They did accommodate us and gave us a junior suit in another building. The buildings Are like condos...your door walks out to the outside...The buildings are ot connected...So, when it rains ( which it did) your walking outside to the lobby.  Now for the disappointing part... The room decor is dated, Dirty tile floor grout, old tier look s, not resort quality, beds were not resort quality nor were the pillows... They were very "used"!!!!  The weekend we were there, the love bugs were horrible (…

title: Thank you!
review: We are on our last day of our visit today- We have been members for the past few years and absolutely love the Longboat Key club. A special thank you to Christian who went above and beyond to make our last day here very memorable!

title: Amazing ocean views, fabulous accommodations , wonderful staff, GREAT LOCATION!!!
review: Spent ~$750/night. We stayed in a 2 bedroom 2 bath suite, with  full Kitchen in building 3... bldg one gives you sunrise views. Bldg 2 sunset views and body 3 gave you the amazing ocean front. It should be noted that the sunrise pic I too came from the corner of our amazing full length balcony. WOW!  Initially, we hopped over to the Ritz in Napes. Incredible beach, but the red tide and Shelly beach can’t compare to Long boat Key...the location, beach and accommodations(full kitchen & two bedrooms (loved the Sylvie @ the spa) and EXCELLENT equipment at the gym. Armand Circle a bike ride away (if you’re up the challenge). A quick five min drive by car). Not overly tourist, so great blend of nightlife and relaxation.   If you’re looking for an incredible location with breathtaking…

title: Beautiful Visit
review: The resort at longboat key club is a gorgeous place with even better service provided. Beach attendants Jake and Christian were extremely attentive towards my friends and me and even took the time to explain their knowledge of sea turtle season. We even saw a group of 5 dolphins just off shore. Love this place- will definitely be back!

title: Beach attendants
review: Christian and jake were so helpful in getting us set up for the perfect day at the beach! We saw a group of dolphins just a few feet away! The resort is beautiful and the drinks are delicious. Cannot wait to visit again!

title: Amazing staff and resort
review: Having a membership here is absolutely amazing. The staff is splendid and the views are impeccable, and you can often see dolphins swimming just feet away. Jake and Christian at the beach are awesome, very attentive and helpful- fun too! A must stay as a resort!!

title: Meh....
review: While the beach here is gloriously beautiful that's where it ends.  Very, very average hotel touting itself as upscale.  Rooms need a facelift. You get nothing luxurious for your $459 a night.  Oh wait....the robes are nice.  Service at the bar and restaurant by the pool is terrible.  The name of the game is wait...and wait...and wait...and all this waiting for poor to mediocre food. When we went down for breakfast we were told breakfast had ended. We then asked if we could get lunch to which the waiter nodded, threw two menus on the table, walked away and never came back  Portofino is another mediocre restaurant.  Our chicken parmesan was served with the chicken wing attached.....gourmet? I think not. The pasta that accompanied it was overcooked and tasteless.  You'd be better…

title: Destination Bliss
review: The Resort at Longboat Key Club offered a day of relaxation on the beach through a kind, professional and attentive staff.  Our host, Josh Thomas, was the BEST!  The property is beautiful, the staff is top notch, the food and dining is excellent and you can't beat the view!  This is our favorite place to wind down and relax in Sarasota.

title: Amazing resort !
review: Stayed last weekend at the resort, had a wonderful experience! Staff was extremely accommodating and attentive. Jordan made sure our beach day was comfortable by putting seat covers on our lounge chairs. Many resorts I’ve stayed at in the past don’t pay attention to those smaller details. Its the little things that separate the good from the great!

title: Smiles in the sun dental seminar
review: 6th year. Love this place!  Staff could not be more accommodating.  Jordan on the beach had the group set up each morning.  Great food...great beach...great place Had my family this year and they had the best time...look forward to next April and haven’t left yet

title: Awesome time 😊
review: I had a really good time here. The staff is very nice especially Jordan. He helped me and my girls with the umbrella. Resort was incredible. Love the private beach. The only part was not cool was that we couldn’t pay for our drinks right away and had to charge it to the room. Maybe you guys should change that.

title: Longboat key beach service
review: Christian was absolutely wonderful. Incredibly attentive and seemed genuinely happy to help in anyway possible. I’ve been coming here regularly for about 3 years and he truly went above and beyond my past experiences. Wonderful experience and a great addition to the club as a whole.

title: Excellent resort with private  beach
review: Very impressed with the property By a golf course On white powder sand beach  Spacious junior suites Good service Other amenities like tennis courts etc Nice swim pool alongside beach Clean and well maintained

title: sun rays
review: it’s so beautiful today, me and my family have been coming for years. it’s crazy to think back home it’s cold and snow on the ground while i’m sitting beach side. jake and jordan have helped us out so much

title: jordan is awesome
review: jordan and jake were very professional and fun when setting our chairs up. they definitely made our experience better by being so personable. i lost my sunglasses and jordan helped me find them. they were very expensive. i will definitely be back.

title: Only the best
review: My family and I keep coming back every year to the Longboat key resort and we can’t get enough of it. The beach is great and the service is impeccable, the beach team goes above and beyond to make sure you are making the most of your day. It is great to comeback to see the friendly faces of Jake and Joshua

title: Avoid!!!!
review: During our stay had a chance to talk with a few of the employees. Extremely dishonest and deceptive management.  Seems to be typical here in Florida according to the employees we spoke to. We will not come back to this resort again!!!! Avoid at all costs.

title: Amazing Stay
review: We visited here for 5 days when we toured around Florida, the beaches here are amazing, as are the views of the golf course and the Marina is beautiful also, the rooms were very good, clean and tidy with all facilities that we needed. Car parking was easy and plenty of space available. The complex is gated with a security hit so very safe to wander around at all hours. The Marina is a short stroll away or transfers are available with golf carts if you arrange with reception. Food at the pool bar and drinks were very good and reasonably priced. The views from our balcony were amazing and we defiantly want to visit here again sometime, especially to see all of the beautiful houses at the top of the drive. Not far from St Armands circle for good food, shops, breakfasts and evening…

title: Day at the beach
review: We started or day at the tennis courts got a good work out in. Grabbed our lunch up at the pool bar with Ed. We then went down for an afternoon at the beach it was awesome.  Can't wait to come back Jake took such great care of us

title: Great experience!
review: We had a wonderful experience on a girls’ trip! Jordan was so helpful and got us all set up with anything we needed. It was a great day and he was very attentive and nice. We were so appreciative of all of his help! Great customer service.

title: Great trip with great service!
review: Me and my girlfriend went on vacation and stayed at this resort. It was absolutely wonderful with the best service all around. Jordan law was especially helpful when we were on the beach. He went over and beyond to make our experience great! Highly recommend going.

title: Jordan
review: My friend and I had a great day at the beach. We walked, talked, and laid out for hours- maximum sun exposure for two girls from the city! We met Jordan who was very personable and friendly. He was super helpful in giving recommendations for bars and restaurants and we hope to see him at one of them this weekend!

title: Great beach
review: The beach is so beautiful! We took a long walk on the beach and had a nice swim. At the beach club we met Jordan, who was great! He was very friendly and so helpful. He gave us great tips on places to go!

title: Nice place
review: We’ve visited before and it’s always a nice place with nicely appointed rooms and an amazing beach.   I would save most of the customer service is just okay. The beach guys really hustle though and I thought they had a great service mentality. Jordan law helped us and we thought he was great!

I went to the beach with some girlfriends and my experience was wonderful! Cristian welcomed me with a huge smile, assisted me with chairs, even helped me get some towels that I’ve forgotten! And to highlight my day, I saw some dolphins jumping in the water; how exciting! Beautiful property & great staff!

title: Great resort
review: My family and I had so much fun at the Longboat Key Club! We had wonderful weather while there. Our children mostly wanted to stay at the pool. Taylor, and the entire pool staff, took such great care of us. They even blew up the kid’s floaties! We will most certainly be back. Such a hidden gem.

title: 4 Diamond....I think not
review: Hubby and I went for a 2 night getaway.  First the good (don’t throw the baby out with the bath water) - we liked the public place amenities - the beach is spectacular and pool warm and hot tub v nice. Spa was well maintained and relaxing. Food at barefoot bar and golf course restaurant and room service were all v good. A little annoying that they charge extra for beach chair and umbrella.  Then the “where we expected more” for the price pt ($375/night for balcony overlooking golf course), room esp bathroom was outdated. Communication amongst staff lacking (housekeeping never came), when I called front desk for fresh towels it took an hr and housekeeping to arrive. When they did they disregarded privacy sign on our door and after 3 knocks and our saying “come back later”…

title: Stunning location
review: We have visited this hotel before but not stayed. The location on the beach is stunning. The room was spacious and well set out for a family. The view from the balcony of was amazing. Portofino and Whiskey Bar restaurants and service were very good Richard the shuttle driver was excellent. The whole place is felling very dated and needs some investment. The suspended ceiling in the lobby and main restaurant is shocking, looks cheap with mismatched patch repairs and rusted air con units. Bear in mind this is the first impression of the Hotel. We stayed at the end of our Florida theme Parks holiday for 2 days chilling on the beach and it fitted the bill perfectly. But spend some of that money you are charging and bring it up to date!

title: Absolutely Beautiful!
review: Stunning views.  Soft, white sandy beaches.  Perfect for families or for a girls relaxing weekend!  Friendly staff, clean rooms with comfortable beds.  Christian was very attentive to our needs while lying on the beach.

title: Some people are easily pleased!
review: Had high expectations of this hotel as Longboat is a classy place. We were quite disappointed. The location on that beach & the grounds are lovely, being close to St Armands Circle is also great but that’s where it ends for us.  We arrived early evening & went straight to the pool area & the bar. The outside area was grubby especially the bar area which was just simply dirty... you can see from the photos it’s not clean & just a mass of wires/leads & general clutter/rubbish. The counters & the chairs were sticky. It felt yucky. No excuse, no matter how busy. We certainly didn’t want to eat there. Apart from that, the room was ok with a beautiful, peaceful bay view but generally was let down by poor quality bed linen & towels & a dated bathroom. We left & went to Marco where we…

title: Great staff!!
review: Very nice place . Great staff. Christian on the beach stands out . Got us a great spot on the beach and great server. He kept Checking on us throughout the day and made sure we had everything we wanted . Thanks Christian

title: Staff amazing!
review: We just had a great time at long boat key club -the staff there is truly wonderful! Mercedes our beach waitress and restaurant waitress was the best! She was so accommodating and pleasant and just fun to be around! My kids loved her and she took great care of us!  Leo from Boucher Brothers management at the beach and bicycles was a great man! He welcomed us daily and set us up every day. He even fixed a bicycle and switched seats for it so my 10 year old could ride! Always a smile and wonderful to talk to. Pleasant and always smiling- people like this make you want to come back!

title: Uncomfortable
review: Felt very uncomfortable and stalked by the employees with my every move, especially my daughter. She took a sip of my drink to taste it and instantly they suspended me from buying alcohol here, which is fine because I don’t drink much on vacation anyway. Other than that, the resort is very pretty, just don’t make the mistake I did LOL!

title: Spring in the air
review: All of the employees here at Longboat Key Club are very very very friendly and provide excellent service! Especially Jake, he always greets me with a smile and let us use his sunscreen when we left ours in the room! Our room has a beautiful ocean front view and an easy access to the beach and pool!! I would recommend this resort to anyone wanting a nice quiet place right on the beach! They also have very good restaurants and are close to the St. Armand’s Circle, which has amazing shopping and cute places to eat at!

title: Great beach service
review: I have visited many resorts around the world but I have never experience such a great service offered by the beach attendants at Lbkc. Ozzy at the beach treated us like family and made sure we had everything we needed. Make sure you get an ocean view room because the sunset are amazing

title: Family vacation
review: The resort at LBKC awesome, the beach is beautiful and very clean, the rooms are very big and with amazing views from the gulf of mexico. The service at the beach is great specially Ossie was very polite and friendly

title: Beach service is awesome
review: Christian Vela took great care of us everyday - friendly, great service - remembered our names, and helped us find great spots on the beach! We had drinks and snacks when we needed them and a friendly face every day.

title: Family Spring Break - Good but not Great
review: We stayed for a week during the kids Spring Break. We wanted to stay close to family living in Sarasota. It seems to be one of the better locations in the area as the beach is nice and you are away from the crowds of Siesta Key. Our stay centered around the pool and beach so we can't offer comments on the tennis courts (there are many) or the golf course. We stayed in a junior suite on the sixth floor in building 3. The room has a full kitchen, stackable washer/dryer, dishwasher and small balcony. The room was fine but is  a bit dated and on the plain side. The pullout and rollaway ($30 a day) mattresses seemed overdue for replacement. We were overlooking the pool which came with a fair amount of noise. I'd recommend one of the other buildings or a high floor. The fitness center…

title: Disappointing
review: We went with a family of five over spring break.  Resort facilities are a little worn, but nice.  Service was disjointed and a bit annoying.  We needed the room a bit before the 4:00 check in and asked the front manager if it was possible.  To get us out of her hair she lied and said it was being inspected, but it wasn't ready for another hour.  We had a Jr. Suite which is set up for four people.  Every evening we requested another towel so we had 5 and then the cleaners would only replace 4.  We asked the concierge to see if something was open for kids and he gave us the phone number to call for ourselves.  Our kids play tennis and the only clinic they were allowed to attend was a kids clinic where they mix levels and ages with only one very unenthusiastic pro. No private…

title: Bad first day
review: Just got here. Been here 8 hours and not great. Surprised by all of the 4-5 star reviews.  Room so old- needs updated. Hinges falling off, dirty and not stocked.  Came down from room. 2 bartenders, 1000 people. Waited 20 minutes for someone to even look at me.  Pool ancient, small and million kids below age 6.  Came to pool restaurant at lunch, waited honestly 2 hours for meal and got many “I’m sorry’s”, even from the manager twice. Brought food which was pretty decent. No comps AT ALL on bill. 2 hours, wasted our afternoon and nothing but I am sorry.   Went to beach after longest lunch ever. Guy charged us $25 for beach umbrella at 2:45pm. Cleaned up towels, brushed off sand and got our own towels.  Wanting drinks for wife and myself- no one waiting on us at all. Help!!! This…

title: Location, location, location
review: Beautiful resort hotel on Longboat Key and we loved our room - a junior suite that had a full kitchen, a small washer and dryer, and a balcony where we could hear the gentle roar of the waves.  Staff at the front desk was welcoming and helpful.   So what are the downsides?  The "resort fee" - really do they need to insult us with extra charges when the rooms are already $600-$700 per night?  The fee covers a van service to nearby shops and restaurants -- but not at night when you might need it.  they want you to stay and dine at their restaurants which are pricey and average.  The fee also covers chairs at the pool, but not at the beach - sort of.  We had two chairs included with the cost of our suite, but no umbrella or cabana, that was extra.  The surly beach attendant tried…

title: So glad to be here
review: We are here on spring break it's so much fun. We have been here for three days and I am dreading going back. Jake and will have made sure we were well set up everyday. He weather has been great hotel is so big has so much to offer

title: Spring break
review: Dear Shannon D:  Thank you for your review.  We are very pleased the weather has been awesome and you enjoyed the hotel.  Thanks for your comments on Jake.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great stay
review: We have had such a great time on our spring break! You can never be bored when you come to this place so much to do! Jake and ozzy helped us so much got us whatever we needed. Food and drink service is fast and food is tasty

title: Spring Break
review: Dear Isabelle:  Glad you enjoyed your time with us and that Jake and Ozzy were helpful.  Happy to hear that you found the food tasty and service fast.  See you next time.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Me and my family
review: Coming back to the resort after a while of being gone was great. The staff has maintained their excellence throughout the years. Now they have way more beds and it’s a reasonable price for an all day experience with a breath taking view. I would recommend it if you like your privacy, they set you up with your own little section. David at the pool set me up right near the jacuzzi spa. Jake and Ozzy set up my king size bed at beachfront and I couldn’t have asked for anything better!! Thanks for a great spring break LBKC!!

title: Can’t believe we are here!
review: Dear troybroice1999:  Thank you for your review.  We appreciate you coming back to see us each year. Thanks for your kind mention of David, Jake and Ozzy.   We look forward to seeing you again.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Best resort on longboat!
review: The family and I have been coming here since I was 10 we have been beach every year since I love it. With shopping near by and dinning so close it’s like you never have to leave. Kids sit pool side while I relax on the beach what could be better. Jake and ozzy made sure kids were well taken care of so we could actually vacation

title: Spectacular vacation
review: My three friends and I came down to the resort for a week from Illinois. The food at the restaurant was amazing and the resort provides a lot of different activities. Bikes being one of them. The beach was gorgeous and the service was great. William and Jake were particularly kind and helpful. Awesome vacation

title: Outstanding getaway
review: Dear Kylie :  So happy to hear that you and your 3 friends had an awesome vacation at our resort.  Thanks for mentioning that you enjoyed the food and activities including bikes.   We look forward to seeing you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Spring Break
review: We had a very fabulous relaxing trip to Longboat Key Resort. Can't say enough about the courteous, friendly and helpful staff at the resort. A special thanks to Susan at the registration desk for making our trip a 10!!    And the beach staff was always on top of your wants and needs, especially Cheryl. Thanks to everyone for fantastic vacation getaway!

title: Spring break
review: Dear mcmaiberger:  It’s wonderful to hear that you had a fabulous relaxing trip with us. Thanks for your kind mention of Susan at registration and Cheryl from our waitstaff.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Nice Beach, Poor Service
review: Jake helped us get set up by the pool area and helped with any questions we had about the resort. He was always there just when we needed something and if he couldn’t help, he knew actually who could. Very kind and helpful guy. Loved the stay!

title: So much fun!
review: Had such a great time at the resort! The service was great, especially from William and Jake, and the pool and beach were beautiful. 10/10 would stay again! It was really nice lounging by the beach, making sand castles, getting yummy drinks, and talking to the lovely employees.

title: beach is awesome
review: Dear Darcy H:  Thank you for the kind review. We are pleased you had such a wonderful experience with us.   Also, thanks for the kind mention of William and Jake.    We look forward to having you back with us again soon making sandcastles on our beach! Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Wonderful day at the beach
review: what an amazing day we have had on the beach. we are here in from indiana Jake and william took amazing care of us whatever we needed they got it. will be back for years to come always a great time. thanks to sherrly for getting us cold drinks

title: What a stay!
review: Dear Tori C:  Thanks for coming to see us from Indiana.   Great to see you had fun and will be coming back soon.  Thanks for your kind mention of Jake, William and Cheryl.   Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great beach experience
review: My friends and I came down from Indiana for a week. The weather was gorgeous! William and Jake took care of us at the beach. They brought us towels and made sure we had our every need. Couldn’t of been a better day!

title: Beach greatness
review: We stayed at the resort for 3 nights and we loved it. Food and drinks were awesome and the staff was really friendly ! Ozzy and Jake took great care of us at the beach. We highly recommend this resort to all of friends and family!

title: Family Vacation
review: Dear Katie S:  Thank you for your kind review.  We are so glad you enjoyed your 3 nights with us and you loved the Food, Drinks and Staff!!   Thanks for your recommendations.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Amazing Resort
review: The resort at Lbkc is awesome , the beach is kept very clean and beautiful, we have stayed in previous resort and the standards were low compare to Lbkc. The beach attendants are very helpful and well trained. Big shout out to Willi , Ozzie and Jake

title: Pittsburgh couple
review: Dear Lissa S:  Thanks you for your kind review.  I’m glad you found the resort clean and beautiful.  Glad to hear you found the staff to be helpful.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Always an amazing holiday
review: What a wonderful place to go.  Everything was just perfect from our room to their restaurants!  Jung at the front desk couldn't have been nicer and more accommodating.  Then there was Paula at poolside; so attentive and sweet.  Can't forget Leo who was just the nicest guy at the towel/chair cover hut.  The one and only complaint we have about the resort is that housekeeping did not respect the Privacy tag on our door.  We brought it to managements attention and were assured it would be discussed.  We plan on making this our new Florida destination and are already thinking about our 2019 booking.  Love, love, loved it!

title: Amazing location - needs a little refresh
review: We stayed during a busy February vacation week.  The resort's location on Longboat and its beautiful beach cannot be beaten.  We found the staff to be warm and friendly and in some cases maybe a bit overwhelmed.    Our room was a 1 bedroom suite with a pullout and we brought an air mattress.  Full kitchen and washer dryer were great amenities.  The kitchen and bath may have been updated more recently than some of the other reviews - but the furniture definitely need updating.  The pullout as reported by my 14 year old and then confirmed by me - was extremely uncomfortable. He ended up just sleeping on the couch after 2 nights - not ideal as he is already 6 feet tall.  The resort has lots of good things going for it - it just needs some updates to the rooms and internal processes…

title: Fabulous beachfront resort
review: Dear Sue R: Thank you for taking the time to review your time with us. We appreciate you staying with us during February.  Glad you found the beach amazing and the staff warm and friendly.   Also, we will be sure to thank Marissa, who you specifically gave a shout out to.     Yes, our beach package is sold online as a daily credit.   If that was not understood, I do apologize.  Please give me a call at the resort so I may address that for you.  I do apologize that you felt the service was lacking in some areas.    We are here to provide top level service to our guests and work very hard to do so.   I hope you will consider returning so we may be sure to provide you a memorable experience.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Touch of Luxury combined with a relaxed vibe
review: Rented a 1 bedroom suite for 5 nights. Expensive but wonderful. Had a separate living room and bedroom plus a kitchen and 2 separate bathroom sink areas and a washer and dryer. Had a big balcony with a beach view. Spectacular views. Very nice resort with lots of amenities although they do charge for those. Wonderful beach. Would have given it an excellent but the furnishings and bathroom are a little dated and it is expensive. Good location because it is right when you get onto Longboat so you aren't dealing with all the traffic.

title: Great experience
review: Dear janedom:  Thank you for your review and for being our guest for 5 nights. So glad you found the resort wonderful and enjoyed your suite layout.  I agree the views are spectacular.  It takes your breath away.  We are remodeling the suites next year as we do this under a time cycle. Look forward to seeing you again.  Yours in hospitality,   Rick Benninghove  Director of Resort Operations  Longboat Key Club and Resort  rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Wonderful Beach Experience
review: We spent five nights in a “so-called” junior suite.  It was perfect.  The room layout is ideal and includes a lovely king size bed, small fully equipped kitchen, sitting area, large bath area and nice balcony.  Also, has a washer and dryer.  Easy self-parking without added cost.  Pool and beach are lovely.   Food and beverage fairly priced and good.  Close to St. Armand’s circle which has many good restaurants and shops.  Also, there is a CVS and new grocery store three easy miles away.  There also are three golf courses and a marina nearby.  Our suite was pricy but on balance worth it.  Only negative is that the bath was in need of updating We will Return.

title: Great staycation spot
review: Jami was great ! She made an already beautiful day spectacular! She was very attentive to not only us but all her guest! She made us feel comfortable while at Long Boat Key Club But also gave us many recommendations on where to go for dinner and a night out!

title: Great timing!
review: Visited for 5 nights during the 2nd week of December. Great value for a Premium King Suite. Stayed in Building 3 on 6th floor. Had a great view of the gulf and pool. Beat the crowds and the resort was nice and quiet. Loved the kitchen and having a washer and dryer in the unit was a bonus.

title: Vic and Ellie want to Thank You for making our second honeymoon so relaxing and wonderful within your attractive resort.
review: We wanted to take the time to say a huge Thank You for oru fabulous long weekend recently at the Resort at Longboat Key club. We were treated royally by so many there.  the Front Desk and Concierge workers were wonderful with their excellent suggestions and setting up dinners at great restaurants. The pool area personnel went above and beyond what was expected.  Our delightful room was always straightened up when we returned to it.  the orchids and Chocolates were a lovely touch on our pillows.

title: Amazing weekend!
review: Service with a smile really does make you feel like 1 million bucks. Jami had a smile that would light up the pool deck. Everything she did, she did everywhere she went had such a great big smile. Love the attitude love the restaurant love the beach and pool can’t wait to come back and visit Florida.

title: Amazing!
review: Visiting longboat key club is definitely one for the books. Having a pool and beach so close together is so convenient for vacationers. Also having the best staff in the world work for this company makes me and my family want to return every year. The poor girl Jami was very sweet with everyone she met.
