She was so nice to my kids while they played in the pool and helped everybody in her path no matter how busy she got. Can’t wait to come back!!!

title: Amazing girls trip!
review: Jake and Alex  were amazing ! They made an already beautiful day even more amazing! I feel they went above and beyond and were very attentive to our needs! They made us feel comfortable while at Long Boat Key Club But also gave us many recommendations on where to go for dinner and a night out!

title: Awesome day!
review: We are here escaping winter. This weather has been amazing can't believe it. Ozzie and Jake have helped us with all our needs! We even got to go golfing it has been a wonderful stay we will always be back!

title: Amazing day and Great Service
review: Such an amazing first day at long boat key club!! Jake and Alex were so awesome got our chairs and so helpful. This is the most perfect place!! I love this beach, the food, the crystal clear water with the best of friends. Third year in a row!!

title: We Loved It...But there were a few things...
review: Let me say first off that I and my family really enjoyed the resort.  With that being said there were a couple things that bothered us:  1.  When we arrived they asked for our credit card and charged us $600 for incidentals.  I'm sure this is their policy, but a lot of resorts will amass charges and then charge at the end of the stay.  It feels weird to be charged $600 for services not rendered yet.  2.  Every charge at the resort is charged a service fee (@ 20%) so be careful that you don't "tip" again, unless you want to.  3.  We loved the beach and enjoyed that their was a waitstaff on the beach for drinks and food.  4.  The pool is a good size, with good depths for kids of all ages.  5.  Golf is a bit pricey, but the course (Links Course) was beautiful and the club rentals…

title: Beautiful resort with great service
review: We have stayed at the Longboat Key Club several times and we always have a wonderful time.  Located directly on the beach, you cannot ask for a better location.  Upon check-in, Katherine was very efficient and friendly.  We were in a 1 bedroom golf view suite.  It was very clean and had a nice view (although I would highly recommend the beach view suites which we typically stay in).  Our shower was not draining well and we called the front desk and someone was up quickly and fixed it immediately.  We had room service several mornings and it was delicious.  The prices for room service, as well as the restaurants are fair if not low compared to other hotels/resorts in the area.  The beach is beautiful and the pool was great, including the service.  We had such a great time that we…

title: Mediocre at best
review: Beautiful beach but poorly run hotel. Front desk chaotic and ill informed. Staff throughout hotel does not seem particularly service oriented. Had to make multiple calls to get things in room fixed. Although there is wait service on the beach, had to wait an hour until server appeared. Food at the various restaurants of property was poor and overpriced. Overall this is a mid level property that is pretending and charging like a 5 star property. Rooms over pool area, which are most of them,  are noisy.

title: Jake the beach boy!
review: Jake and Ozzy were incredibly helpful with setting up our chairs and helping out with the kayaking! Jake was especially friendly and kind when answering all of the questions we had!  The beautiful day at the beach was a 100% success thanks to Jake’s friendly face!

title: The answer is always yes
review: I am writing this review whilst still in the resort. We are coming to the end of a three weeks stay, which is the longest we have ever been here. It is our 6th visit, however, this is my first review on TripAdvisor.  Location, beachfront and the facilities are, as everyone else has said, superb. However I wanted to complement the staff. The manager, Rick, it’s very much hands-on. When I spoke to him recently he was actually in the pool area handing out towels. He is very much  Front of house and available to the guests at any time.  The concierge team I dealt with, Sherman, Amanda and Landyn  are absolutely fantastic. Every request you make of them i.e. may I, can I, is it possible to… the answer is always yes.  I can say this great authority as I made a lot of requests!    The…

title: Beautiful place with one major negative
review: I'm staying here for three nights for a much-needed vacation. Just arrived today. Have a junior suite with Ocean View, views are amazing, Suite is large and well-appointed and very comfortable. Beautiful property. Just checked in today and so far very happy. However one major negative that people should know before booking. Smoking is allowed on the balconies. My room has a beautiful balcony that views the ocean. It's one of the major reasons I chose this room and to spend more money on it. However when I'm out on the balcony I smell cigarette smoke because others are smoking on their balconies. In addition if I wanted to leave my balcony door open to get the fresh ocean air and breeze in my room, I would have the cigarette smoke smells waft into the room. This is a major…

title: A little noisy
review: Overall, a lovely hotel/resort but do they really need the leaf blowers going 4 days a week?  Couldn't sit on the porch when these things were running and it really took away from the resort feeling that they are trying to convey. I know that you need gardeners....but the noise was way over the top!!  An update could happen anytime now as bathrooms and furniture was a little worn, but this didn't take away from a wonderful holiday.......just reduce the noise and it would be PERFECT!

title: Bugs!
review: The resort sits on a beautiful stretch of beach, with soft sand and gorgeous water view. The pool has plenty of seating and a bar.  We stayed in a suite, which was very spacious and well appointed- even had a washer/dryer. (Although outlets for charging phones are not near bed. One of my pet peeves as we like to be able to see time during night, etc. we had to move a nightstand to access a nearby outlet. EWWW) The back patio had a table and chairs and a lounge, with a relaxing view.  This is where the good ended.  On our second day, a transformer blew and we lost power during the night. While this can happen anywhere and in no way is fault of resort (to best of my knowledge), the way the staff handled it was disappointing,  I called front desk to report outage, and they told me…

title: Top notch vacation resort!
review: The resort’s great asset is it’s hard working employees!  Pool attendant Megan who seemed to run tirelessly all day catering to guests various needs. Supplying towels chairs and smiling always! Awesome

title: Beautiful Location
review: We stayed in a beachfront Jr. Suite.  The view was amazing with the surf and sunsets. Though adequate, the unit needs an update.  Furniture is outdated, tiles in bathroom are grungy at the base from age and everything has a 80's feel.  Mattress was not comfortable and sagged at the sides.  Having a washer/dryer in the unit is a plus.  Staff was friendly and professional.  The onsite restaurants were fine.  Longboat Key is a wonderful spot with the beach, restaurants and shopping.

title: Lovely day at the beach
review: My friend and I️ came down from Michigan and had a lovely experience. We went down to the beach and Logan and William took great care of us. They made sure we had our every need and adjusted our umbrella as soon as we asked. Megan and cherol took our drink orders and had a smile on their face. Overall our experience was wonderful.

title: Excellent facility, staff and food choices at Resort at Longboat Key
review: Beach club is excellent Nice clean well maintained beach with gradual water slope Umbrellas, beach cabanas, food and beverage service Plenty of space Adjacent to pool, bar and restaurant  Convenient parking

title: Amazing
review: I’m here every year and absolutely love it. My waitress was awesome and specifically Jake and Ozzie were unbelievable on the beach. They set me up and got me fresh fruit water, a great touch. Can’t wait to come back!

title: Excellent stay
review: Had a wonderful time. Weather a bit cold but atmosphere amazing.  Pool staff Lory  and Paula made our stay.  Will definitely be back in future. Rooms junior suit fantastic. Saw dolphins from our room. Beach was so white and clean. Marilyn and Lesley England xx

title: Tired but trying
review: Great beach and pool--everything else not so much. First, check-in had not received a reservation from their res-service so that required a new set of solutions. Next, the rooms are so dated with laminate on cabinets damaged and bed needing a new mattress. Totally a disappointment. Moreover, house-keeping failed to empty trash or remove empties and provide new glasses, and soap/hair care products. Just not good quality standards. The best--ROOM SERVICE!!! That team rocks!! Let the F&B group run the entire place!! SO OVER-PRICED when the similar rate at Four Seasons or Ritz.

title: Truly an amazing resort
review: I was booked to stay here with my son in December and after reading some disappointing reviews I was concerned!  Well I needn't have worried as it was amazing from the moment we arrived. On entering we were greeted with a "welcome to paradise " followed by " we have upgraded your room" and boy what an upgrade! As my son has a disability we need to spend a lot of time in our room and our room was lush, we had a sea view, a massive balcony, the most comfy of beds in a spotlessly clean room, The staff at the resort will go out and above to please you but we never felt they were constantly after tips, just really polite and helpful, I wouldn't hesitate to book this hotel again, it's lovely Big thanks to all at longboat key club.

title: zach was a great employee
review: This place is amazing.  The food here was fantastic whether you're at the pool for lunch or the restaurant upstairs for dinner.  Also I would like to mention Zack on the beach.  He was great loved his attitude and he really cared about us.

title: Great time!
review: I had a great weekend in Longboat Key! So glad I chose this location to stay while on my visit to Sarasota. Although I’m a Florida native, the change of scenery was perfect for me. Thanks to Jami for being so welcoming!

title: Vacation
review: Our stay here was great!! Being from up North the “chilly” weather didn’t stop us from laying out by the pool. Ask for Jami if you get the chance, she’s upbeat and friendly making you feel very welcome!

title: Too cold outside to be enjoyed
review: Stunning resort with all the amenities. Beautiful beach with chaise loungers, umbrellas, you name it. Gorgeous pool and tiki bar.  Extremely polite friendly and knowledgeable staff. The only problem was the weather. It was unusually cold to enjoy any of it. Would love to go back. The 1 complaint we had was that we called the front desk on 3 occasions because all 3 TV’s in our suite never worked properly. Each time they apologized and assured us it would be taken care of. It was not.  Not thrilled with the selection on their brunch line up. Disappointing for the cost.

title: What a great time!!!
review: I came to spend the day with some friends but mostly family who frequent the resort.  There’s so much to do here!  I loved the food and drinks by the pool and beach.  We spent most of our day on the beach and Zach took great care of us.  A big shoutout to him and the rest of the team out there.  If you’re looking for somewhere to hangout on the island this is it.

title: Beachside excellence
review: This gulf front property has clean spacious suites with breath taking views of the sunset . The Sunday buffet was amazing and there was ample food selection . When visiting the Sarasota area, this property is the place to stay . The service the staff provides is first class. We can't wait to come back !

title: Great Place to spend the Christmas Holidays!
review: We last visited the hotel in August 2016. We enjoyed our stay so it was an easy decision to make a reservation for the Christmas Holidays. We arrived late on Christmas Eve due to bad weather in Toronto. We were greeted by a friendly desk clerk. We booked a Jr Suite with a Lagoon view .   The room was large with the same layout as the previous room that we stayed.   There is a fully equipped kitchen with a large fridge, dishwasher, microwave & washer dryer.  We love the lagoon view. The suite has a large balcony with a table & lounge chair.  There is nothing better than waking up to the view with  a cup of coffee & looking for manatees & dolphins swimming in the lagoon.  We tried the breakfast buffet on Christmas morning. The selections are incredible. You can get specially…

title: A wonderful resort in a great location
review: LBKC offered spacious rooms, a scenic location, great restaurants and wonderfully attentive service. The only down side was the $58/day "resort charge" applied despite the fact that we had a busy schedule and no interest in the many fine resort attractions.

title: Terrible...bad attitude...will take no responsibility
review: This does seem like a regular holiday Inn or run of the mill hotel - not a resort. Unfortunately, our main problem we had was that our holiday was ruined by theft of my backpack which contained all of my medications, laptop, iPad and very expensive sunglasses.  There was NO cameras at our building or in the elevators and the staff was very defensive saying that they don't need cameras there (like WE do in NYC) because they don't have "that type of crime."  I have no clue what he was talking about. We have never had an issue in NY and I am also not sure why this place thinks they are impervious to theft. This happens everywhere. Very arrogant and cavalier.  I will be filing a Civil claim for sure.  They also entered our room before our checkout time AND when we had a DO NOT…

title: another amazing trip
review: I love coming to Longboat Key Club. The location is phenomenal, very clean, the ambiance is great and the service is absolutely fabulous. I had the greatest experience with Jake he welcomed me with a smile, made sure that I had the best spot on the beach. I didn't even need to look for him because he was always checking on me. I will always come back and look specifically for Jake. Thanks Jake for making Longboat Key a great stay!!!

title: Winter vacation
review: The resort at LBKC  is one of the most beautiful resort I have ever visited. During our stay the weather wasn’t that good that’s why we spend most of our time by the pool. The service was all around great, Ossie the pool attendant was very friendly and welcoming ! We will come back next summer !

title: Wonderful, Amazing, Beautiful
review: This place is amazing.  The weather was really nice, the beach is about 100 Meter's away if that.  Our room was spacious and large we had a view looking over at the beach and the Mexican sea.  The staff were very friendly and helpful.  Loved this place went with my partner and we were blown away.  However the restaurants weren't for us tho, so we always ate out instead at the restaurants on site. We had hired a car for the week so we wanted to explore rather than stay in one place.

title: Pool and Beach
review: What a wonderful stay the staff was very helpful and accommodating. First class service what a great feeling to not have a care in the world. Leo not only was great at the pool and the beach but was very knowledgeable of the area.Great stay can't wait for next vacation.

title: Christmas stay
review: My wife and I have just enjoyed our stay at the resort over Christmas 2017' We asked for help with our luggage upon checking in and Jim the bellman took us to a large suite overlooking the golf course which was more than we could have expected it had everything we would need other than the 2 beds we had requested upon booking  with our travel agent. Jim acted quickly and spoke with Melodie the reservations manager who found a 2 bedded room with gulf views in  quiet area We happened to mention we would have preferred a longer stay in the resort Melodie kindly took over the necessary rearrangement of our pre-booked schedule  which involved phone calls and e-mails to make this happen, that was greatly appreciated Melodie. Along with Lynda on the front desk  the professionalism of…

title: Disappointed in our stay
review: We stayed at Long Boat Key Resort about 13 years ago and loved it but this time it was a totally different experience.  We paid $ 2,000 a night to get a beach view room and ended up with a first floor pool view and partially handicap room that needed updating.  The appliances and cabinets were very old.  The tub would not drain properly and the garbage disposal did not work at all.  Not worth the money.  The worst part was my nephew who is allergic to eggs had their pizza which the staff assured us did not contain eggs.  He lost a whole day from being ill.  I complained on a couple items and would have moved to another hotel but everything was booked.  We normally stay at their sister property The Edge Water Hotel in Naples and that is definitely worth the money.

title: Resort needs a facelift
review: This is the second time we have stayed at the Longboat Key Club - the first time was in April 2015.  In the last 2.5 years I think this resort unfortunately has gone downhill.  The rooms are in serious need of an overhaul.  The bed and pillows were so uncomfortable I barely slept.  The decor looks outdated.    On our last day housekeeping never came, despite them calling me to schedule time to clean our room (4:00pm after multiple calls to ask them why they hadn't cleaned).  They finally sent someone up at 4:45pm after yet another call to remind them - she was wonderful but she wasn't supposed to be assigned to clean our room and at that point there was no way we could vacate the room for her to properly clean.  We also had to ask for toiletries to be restocked instead of…

title: Three to three 1/2 stars
review: We stayed here for 6 nights and had a two bedroom suite in building 3 overlooking the beach. The view from the room was wonderful with spectacular sunsets. The room was very large, but overall I would expect more from a high end resort. For the cost I was very surprised.   The evening we arrived, the check in person gave us keys, a map, the car permit, and no instructions or information as she was distracted by another guest.  There was no bellman to be seen. Not a problem as we drove around the corner to unload our luggage ourselves. We were surprised to find the carts for the luggage locked up. We then made multiple trips to the room to unload.   The resort is dated. There are old phones in the rooms and clocks that one can put older iPhones on. The king bed is too soft.  The…

title: Fun fun fun
review: We had an amazing day at the long boat key club.  The beach amenities were such a great time Nikki and Jami were great fun and were there to supply us with great service.  Kudos to you guys for the superb service.  Can’t wait to return again.

title: Wow
review: When staying at a resort anywhere in the world, the staff should always give 110% effort for every single guest. And I can honestly say the pool girl gave that and then some. I’ve never seen so much hustle from a pool attendant before, and to do it with a smile is impressive. Cannot wait to come back next year.

title: If you looking to relax long boat key club is the place to be
review: My fiancé and I stayed here for a few days and it was very relaxing, we stayed in building 3 with breathe taking view of the gulf, most our time was spent relaxing on the beach. With chair side service it felt like we didn't even need to lift a finger, the beach attendants were very accommodating. Zach had set us up with two lounges in the front with a very friendly attitude. He also recommend places to visit in the area while on our holiday. Would highly recommend.

title: BEACH days
review: My family came to escape the freezing cold and get some sun on the beautiful Gulf beach. Ozzy and luke the beach attendants were AMAZING they had great attitudes despite it being very busy and also extremely helpful. All in all a great family vacation and a very beautiful resort.

title: Pool and Beach
review: We visited the Pool and Beach at the Resort with our family. The beach crew especially Leo worked very hard to make our visit very enjoyable.  This is truely a first class establishment !!!   We will be sure to visit again.

title: Great Service
review: Dear CarGuy75: Thank you for your kind review and we are happy you found us as a 1st class establishment. Thank you for your kind mention of Leo and we look forward to seeing you again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Christmas vacation 2017
review: I would highly recommend staying here at the Resort at Longboat Key Club. Nikki helped us out and she is a great worker. She helped set us up and she kept checking in on us to make sure we continued to have an amazing day. If you are in Florida in the Sarasota area you need to check out the Resort at Longboat Key Club and hopefully Nikki is working to make your day that much better.

title: Beach day
review: Dear Adriana A Thank you for taking the time to review us and for being our guest.  Thanks for the kind mention of Nikki.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Christmas 2017
review: We spent  3 days at this resort the location of our room over looking the Gulf of Mexico was to die for. We recommend building #3 Gulfview. The staff at the pool bar was very accommodating with our special requests. The pool attendant Nikki was very helpful and Knowledgeable of the whole resorts happenings. The Beach staff was very attentive and accommodating, thank you Ozzie and Leo We will be back we promise...

title: Solid sarasota resort
review: I visited the west coast of Florida for the first time and enjoyed the Longboat Key Club.  Overall, the resort was pleasant and our trip went without a hitch.  I would like to point out a few things.  1)  Junior Suite - it was an ample room that fit 5 of us with a roll away.  It had a 4-person table and chairs that separated the kitchen (serviceable) from the sleeping/living space.  We didn't cook but did have breakfast daily in the room.  it worked fairly well.  We had some light bulbs out and they fixed it quickly.  We also needed some help getting set up and the bell man was great.    2)  Beach - The beach is white sand and large and water was very calm.  The hotel has a two rows of chairs, umbrellas and sleeper beds they call cabanas.  We found the beach to be pleasant but…

title: Great Spa
review: Dear Aisleseatguy Thank you for your very thorough review. I am glad that overall you enjoyed your stay and would return to us again.  Great to hear that you enjoyed the Tennis Gardens and that the team there was helpful.  We do offer complimentary shuttle service there as well as all other destinations on our property.  We also have bicycles available without additional fees.  I’m sorry you did not like the charges for umbrellas and other upgrades on the beach.  We do include a set number of beach lounge chairs depending on the size of the suite and the umbrella or bed upgrades are additional.   Happy to also hear you consistently received great waiter service as well as the live music.  We do also highlight families and offer daily Camp Loggerhead camp, basketball, tennis, golf, corn hole, outdoor chess, beach volleyball, included bicycles and other activities. We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Returning guest
review: We stayed at the Resort on Longboat Key for a friend's wedding recently and had a great time at the resort. The staff are great and the views are outstanding. The only downside is the food which is OK but pretty standard hotel fare- except for the wings which were great. Of course we waited till the last day to try them or I would have probably eaten them everyday.  The spa is five star with steam rooms in the mens/womens bathrooms. I would recommend allotting yourself enough time to enjoy the steam room after a massage.

title: Just Wonderful
review: Dear clane826: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. Very pleased that you found the Spa 5 star and enjoyed the steam rooms.  I do apologize that some of the food items were not to your liking.  Glad to hear you had a great time with us and we look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Our room was terrible but the resort pretty darn good
review: Our go to place near Sarasota. Quality accommodations and the off season rates were perfect. Pool and pool bar are excellent, staff is friendly and resort fee permits golf, tennis and well equipped health club. We were in building 5 and had no issues; not much of a view but we knew that going in; ocean view is available at relevant rate.  Good restaurant on premises and service is available by the pool. Beach is well maintained.

title: A very comfortable destination to get a tan in December
review: The junior suites are wonderful with living room sitting area and a kitchen with stove top refrigerator and washer/dryer...elegant but casual...what a great time to visit when there aren't too many people here yet

title: Fabulous resort with extraordinary staff
review: Dear manewman1945: I am very pleased you had a great time and enjoyed your junior suite.  We look forward to welcoming you back with us soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Awesome Resort Hotel
review: My husband and I have been traveling to Puerto Rico in November for over 40 years.  Because of the devastation from hurricane Maria, we were forced to find another place to go this past November.  Our travel agent highly recommended The Resort at Longboat Key Club, and the result was perfection.    The grounds, our accommodations, the staff....cannot find enough words to describe how fabulous everything was.  The staff...every resort would want to hire this staff, from the reception area, to the restaurants, to the pool area.  I have to give special commendation to one of our pool attendants, Megan.  She seemed to know what we needed or wanted before we did, and there she was offering her services.  Jami was another excellent pool attendant. Lori, Paula and Megan made sure we…

title: Beach day
review: Dear SherryChef: Our hearts break for our friends in Puerto Rico and we look forward to their recovery.     We are glad you found us and we greatly appreciate the wonderful review that you have given us.  I know our staff including Jami, Lori, Paula, and Megan appreciate you mentioning them by name.   We hope to have you with us again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Excellent Service, Every Time!
review: Second time staying at this resort for the weekend and it was just as good as the last time I stayed a few years ago. The room this time was on the second floor of building three. It still had a beautiful gulf beach view but a few palms blocked some of the view. Last time we stayed on the 5th floor and the gulf view was just awesome. The beds at this place are so comfortable and the room is always immaculate. Sliding glass doors takes you out onto the balcony with awesome views of the one and only sunset. Great beach and pool. The sand at Longboat beach is so fine with the water so clear and pristine. This was our getaway anniversary weekend and we really enjoyed it. My wife always loves this place. She was so complimentary of a deep tissue massage that I reserved for her at the…

title: Nice resort!
review: My husband and I went for a long weekend get-a-Way! Beach is beautiful and we stayed at the lagoon which was serene and quiet.  Watched the dolphins and manatee as we drank coffee in the morning. Very close to the Uber’s to Sarasota and St. Armand’s. The beach resort attendants were on point! The only complaint was it can be noisy with wedding guests and conference people. We did complain about the ATV driving up and down the beach a million times collecting towels starting at 4 pm when the service stops at six. The very next day the ATV was no where in sight so it was much appreciated that they listen and take action! I highly recommend this place and we will be back!

title: Awesome
review: Dear Amy H: Thank you for highly recommending us!  Coffee while watching Manatee and Dolphin sounds like a perfect start to the day. Glad they came through to say hi! I do apologize for the use of the 4 wheeler during your enjoyment of the beach.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great vacation
review: Very beautiful resort, a place where you can scape the fast paced life of the big city, The  beach is beautiful and we saw dolphings almost every day, The beach staff was  great, Ossy, Jake and Katia the server were very friendly  and helpful. I'm going to miss this place for a long time

title: Much needed R&R!
review: Dear Newham23: Thank you for the kind review.   We are pleased you found the resort beautiful and members of our team were especially helpful.    It certainly never gets old seeing the dolphins make their visits.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Thank you pool help
review: We just spend the most relaxing vacation we ever had. The resort at LBK is all around a great place,  great for families and couples, We spend most of our time by the pool were we were able to relax, have  great food and drinks. The pool staff was great Jamie and Paula the pool server were really nice to us. The sunsets at the beach are incredible especially if you have a ocean view room, we were able to enjoy the incredible escenery from our balcony. The beach staff was great Will and Ossie were very welcoming and they gave us an awesone beach bed deal in our last day

title: We enjoyed our 5 night stay!
review: We arrived on my birthday after a long journey and there was a bottle of wine in our room, which was very much appreciated. Thank you staff at the resort. Thank you to concierge Sherman who is always nice and professional and very helpful. Jami at the poolside was excellent and set us up daily at the pool, she even got us water with ice and lemon! Paula was super friendly and good fun and very nice to me when I received news about the death of a family member back home. I won't forget her kindness. We enjoyed great breakfasts poolside. Will be back with our grandson, possibly in the early summer.  Thanks again, everyone.

title: Vacation
review: Dear Patricia C: Thank you for your kind review. Glad you enjoyed the wine as well as great service from Sherman, Jami and Paula while here.  We are sorry to hear about your family loss.   We look forward to seeing you next summer.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Quiet, Relaxing Trip from Orlando
review: We just had the best 3 week vacation ever. Love The Longboat Key Club.  I want to give a shoutout to the pool girl “Megan”, she was so attentive always found the right lounges and would make sure we had an umbrella when we had enough sun.  Very hard worker.  Can’t wait to come back!

title: Still good but depends on what you are looking for...
review: Dear erossi1946  Thank you for the kind review. We are so very pleased you enjoyed your 3 weeks with us!   Also, thank you for your kind mention of Megan.  Look forward to seeing you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Clean Comfortable Convenient with a Great View
review: My wife and I were looking for a nice place to celebrate our 28th anniversary.  We wanted to drive no longer than 2 hours from our home in Celebration, Florida so we had a lot of options.  I decided to go south and Longboat Key was an excellent choice.  Our room was in building 2 on the 3rd floor.  Although a higher floor would have provided better views of the Gulf, the junior suite was beautifully appointed with a large outdoor patio.  The kitchen and refrigerator were convenient although we did visit a few local restaurants.  The beach is beautiful with chairs included in the resort fee.  The staff was very friendly.  Unfortunately, the weather did not cooperate on our 2nd day so more time was spent at the pool bar.  Longboat Key is a very quiet location with everything…

title: This place is great!
review: We love the resort at LbKC, the beach is awesome and the service is outstanding, the beach attendants are really friendly and they would go out their way to make your day special. We love drinks that the make at the bar and Katia the server was awesome. Big shout out to ozzy at the beach for his great service

title: Anniversary getaway!
review: This was our first time visiting the resort. We had a Junior suite facing the Gulf which was amazing! We could watch the sunset from the balcony in our room. Our stay was short, only three days, but it was a memorable one. We are beach fanatics, and our experience was made that much more wonderful thanks to Ozzy, Jake, and David! The actual day of our anniversary we spent it at the beach from 9am until 7pm (sunset). We were catered to in such a wonderful and professional way that we didn’t want to leave. We had lunch at the beach and snacks later on. The beach staff is truly wonderful!! Thanks again Ozzy for everything!!!

title: Awesome vacation
review: The resort at LBKC is beautiful with the most amazing beach. In here you can also find golf courses and a spa, the service at the beach is great and all the beach attendants are really friendly and well trained. Big thanks to Ozzy for taking care of us !

title: fall 2017
review: This was our second visit to Long Boat Key Club in four months.  Each visit gets better.  Our junior suite had great views of the beach and a large outdoor ground level patio.  One evening we had a corporate event.  The food was excellent, as were the presentation and service. The resort went beyond expectations.  Whether you are traveling as a couple or as a family this is a resort for you!

title: Weekend gate away
review: Everything about this resort is great. The rooms are big and spacious and the ocean view is incredible! The feel of the resort is very upscale but also relaxed. The pools are crystal clear and the service is top notch. The food and drinks are also delicious. Our time on the beach was also spectacular. We had a luxurious queen sized bed on the shore and our attendant Ozzy made our day even more amazing. He was so attentive and caring! Our waitress Kathia was also the sweetest and kept our drinks flowing! This was the best getaway!

title: Beautiful resort
review: The resort at Lbkc is awesome , the beach is really quiet and perfect to relax, at beach you can find lounges and beach beds. The service at the beach is great and the beach attendant would make sure you are well taken care of. Big shout out to Ozzy at the beach m

title: Amazing beach
review: We have just spent six glorious days here and had a wonderful time. We have been coming here almost annually for the past 25 years and it never disappoints, in fact this time the beach was better than ever due to the recent renourishment.  The rooms are very comfortable and we like to be able to have breakfast and lunch in our suite. We always like to stay in building 4 as it has the best views and is very quiet.  We will be back.  The new furniture on the beach is lovely too.

title: If You Like Being Pampered
review: My husband and I went to Sarasota to celebrate our 40th wedding anniversary and stayed at the Longboat Key Club. It was fabulous! The property is older but what makes the experience perfect is the staff. They are there for you. Whether it's sitting on the beach or at the pool, a friendly staff member offers you beverages and checks to see if you need anything. They booked our dinner reservation at Portifino's and offered to shuttle us there. I highly recommend this hotel if you want to be on the beach in Sarasota. We will definitely stay there again.

title: Family trip
review: The most besutiful beach in florida. The lbkc has every thing you need to have an excellent vacation. I highly recommend the queen size bed and the service offered by ossie at the beach. I cant wait to come back to this place with my family again

title: Best girls vacation
review: The resort at LbKC is awesome, my friend and I we had the best time in our vacation. The beach attendants were friendly and professional. Ozzy went above and beyond to make our day unforgettable ! We highly recommend the resort to all our friends

title: Perfect November Beach
review: Perfect beach day in November! Jake was our cabana helper and helped us with anything we needed and was so polite. The beach was just perfect, the resort was just excellent and we could not have picled a better place!

title: Such a great time!!
review: We had such a great time, the beach was beautiful, we had such an amazing day and our friends who visited for the first time- we were so glad we chose this place. Jake was so awesome and helped us with anything we needed and hopefully next time he’s here when we come back, we couldn’t have been happier!

title: The beach!
review: Me and couple of my close friends came to enjoy the LBKC today! It was beautiful out today Jake and ozzy made sure we were all set up! They were amazing took care of our every need! Great service and great food!

title: Paradise
review: This resort is like a slice of heaven - beautiful clean, white- sand beach with great service. Lovely pool with a great bar service and menu. If you’re looking for serenity and top-notch service, I highly recommend. Jake & Ozzy, the beach attendants were very accommodating, helpful and friendly! A+ service.

title: Vacation at LBKC
review: The resort at LBKC is great, the staff attention is awesome, the beach staff and the food and drink staff were the best, especially Ozzy and Alexander that took great care of us. We will come back for sure !

title: Amazing service for an amazing day!
review: I came to Long Boat Key Club today to enjoy the beautiful weather. I was attended by Jake B he was made sure I was comfortable and even positioned my chair perfectly facing the sun 😁. He came by to check on us multiple times and always had a smile on his face when we asked for something. I am never let down when visiting Long Boat Key Club and I will always come back. Thanks Jake and crew.

title: Chilled vacation
review: My fiance and I love travelling and we love the florida beaches. The longboat resort is gorgeous and the staff is very helfull and caring. Every body have a great attitude and friendly approach especial at the pool and the beach, Megan and Allie the pool girls were great taking care of us and at the beach Ossie and Sherryl were awesone too.

title: Lovely Resort
review: Dear Travelhigh1 Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest.  Glad you found the resort gorgeous and the staff helpful.  Thanks for your kind mention of Megan, Allie, Ozzie and Cheryl!  We look forward to seeing you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Golfing and the beach!
review: Stayed for 10 nights, overall the Resort is good. Staff very friendly and helpful. Stayed in a beach front King Room and could not fault the view we woke up to every morning or the beautiful sunsets overlooking the gulf. Whilst the room was ok and serviced very well, the rooms do need an upgrade, especially the bathrooms which was very tired looking and past their best. The resort does not accept any money and everything is charged to your room. There is a resort fee which covers beach towels and wifi but if you go on the beach it will cost you extra for umbrellas etc. Beach is great and the resort does offer service for drinks and food. One tip we found if you order the pizza's in your room they are huge. We found out when we ordered two for two of us, they would have lasted…

title: Remarkable beach service
review: Dear Susane N Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to review your stay.  I am very pleased you found the staff to be very friendly and helpful as well as enjoying the suites beautiful view. Thanks also for your suggestions on the room as well as your comments on the size of the pizza.   We hope to see you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beach and friends!
review: We came down to the beach today to be greeted by Sherman he gave us fresh towel. It was pretty breezy today so jake and will made sure our umbrella was pointed the right direction and came by to check on us all day!

title: So This Is What Incredible Service Like
review: Dear cvbntyt: Thank you for the “5” review .  Glad you enjoyed your time with us.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Another fantastic visit
review: My relatives have a social membership at the resort and invited all siblings & spouses for an afternoon at the resort. While my two brother-in-laws golfed, the rest of the group met up at the lobby and were escorted to a beautiful spot on the beach where umbrellas and lounge chairs were already being setup for us.  As one of our members of our group has an issue with walking long distances, a very kind employees brought a beach wheel chair and pushed them most of the way to our spot.  Friendly and concerned staff is the first impression from the start which is a very good reflection on the resort itself.  Before getting on the first application of sunscreen, cocktail orders were already being taken. We laid out, took pictures,  and chatted for awhile since we don't see each…

title: zach and jake!
review: Dear Njtravelerrjo: Thank you for your kind review. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed the service at the pool and beach area as well as your lunch and drinks.  Yes, we are ADA friendly and even have a transfer chair for the pool as well as a beach wheelchair.  We look forward to seeing you again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Favorite Staycation resort
review: This is our second year holidaying at Longboat Key Club Resort and yet again, we weren't disappointed.  The hotel runs like a well oiled machine, with such excellent service and attention to detail. A special mention has to be made of Anna, one of the beach servers. Each morning she had a smile on her face and always remembered key information about us and what we liked. Everyone worked hard on the beach but she truly was on another level, a real asset to the hotel. We experienced a couple of issues with our television and fridge but both were dealt with immediately. The rooms are spotless.  Each day we returned to a clean room, even our dishwasher had been emptied. The same applied each evening...again always with a smile. I love this hotel and will of course return again.…

title: Nice Hotel beautiful view
review: This hotel has a nice location right on the beach and if you are lucky you can see dolphins swimming nearby in the early morning. There is a nice pool and bar area.  Units are condo style with living area and small kitchen. The staff are friendly and the food at the restaurant is very good.  The only negative is the unit we were in was somewhat worn, particularly the bathroom area was in need of sprucing up. Pay attention to the posted flags at the beach for swimming and for jelly fish and other issues.

title: Great resort!
review: Dear summervac: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. Glad you were able to see the Dolphin making their appearance and you enjoyed the pool and bar area.   I am pleased to also hear you found the staff friendly and the food very good.  I appreciate your comment on the bathrooms and posted flags.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: World Class Resort -  Relaxing Break
review: You get what you pay for... This resort is pricey but wow it's awesome. Great service including on the beach. Very clean and the rooms are well appointed with everything you need.  Plenty of parking. The staff is super polite. Bed is very comfy.

title: Timeless!!
review: Dear sjpic: Glad you found the resort to be awesome and the service great as well.  Come and see us again for another rest in a comfy bed.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great customer service
review: Our association has had a fall meeting at the LBKC for 23 years in a row and intend to keep coming well into the future. The property has always been in immaculate condition. The golf courses, pool, and beach are always excellent. This is the perfect place for a business meeting, mixed with some extended relaxation time.

title: Amazing Beach Service
review: We had two perfect days at the beach. Leo and his staff were extremely friendly and tended to all of our needs. The beach bed was well worth it, nothing better then a nap on the beach! The umbrellas and cabana kept us nice and shaded on a hot afternoon. I would strongly recommend this beach for a relaxing, quiet vacation!

title: Such a great trip
review: Dear beckyl493 Thanks for your kind review. So glad you had a relaxing stay and that you loved the beach and the beach bed.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Short vacation
review: Zach and William helped us today on the beach.  We had a such a great day on the beach bed that they set up up for us and I have to say that their service was great.  I would recommend the bed to anyone wanting a great experience. Thanks guys!!!!

title: After the Hurricane
review: Dear DarbyD: Thank for your kind review. I’m glad you enjoyed the beach and Zach and William were helpful in your enjoyment. We look forward to seeing you again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: dated property / bad management
review: The resort at LBKC is great! The staff was super friendly and welcoming, we spend most of our time at the beach. The service at the beach was outstanding Ozzy and Will took care of us and treated us like royalty. I highly recommend the drinks and the pool bar and having lunch at the beach is a must !

title: Labor Day Stay
review: Property is a little outdated.  Pool area definitely needs to be updated.  Beach is nice.  We waited about two hours to get our food near the pool area the first night and it wasn't great either.  Next night we asked concierge if we could get a reservation at Portofino and he said they were full until 8:30 and my husband asked if he could call them and check for us and his response was that he just got off the phone with them a few minutes earlier and they didn't have any space.  My husband called directly and surprise surprise they had availability at 6pm for us!  Pretty disappointed with that.  Portofino on the other hand was great food.  Poolside food was ok.  We asked for rooms on the same floor as my sister and her family were there and put us 6 floors apart!  Okay stay but…

title: Great location, friendly staff, but...
review: Dear RST1977: Thanks for taking he time to review your stay.  Sorry you had the issue with your Portofino reservations.  It is always our goal to take care of your reservations. Even if the concierge had just spoken to the restaurant, they should have called again to see if anything had changed. Glad you enjoyed your dinner.  Rooms are located based on roomtype and sometimes separate roomtypes are not physically near each other.  If you come here again, please call me directly and I can help with locations.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Heaven on Earth!
review: The location was nice and most of the staff were friendly, I would have bumped this to a 4 or even considered a 5, but the thing that really bugged me was that the suite's A/C is fixed to not go below 72 degrees.  This was quite irritating, considering that we like to sleep in a cold environment and not a lukewarm environment (also factor in August Florida humidity).  When we called to ask if there was something that could be done, we were told that it was impossible and they offered up some box fans to us.  The guy who delivered it to my room told me that a management decision was made because they had a guest who had set the temp at some abysmally low temperature and it froze up the condenser.  I get that, but why choose 72 degrees - I know for a fact that 66-68 will not…

title: Simply the Best
review: Dear SW Thanks for being our guest.  Our low limit on our A/C’s is 69 degrees.  This is to eliminate the challenge of Florida humidity on the system.  Yours should not have been 72, but 69.  I do apologize for the inconvenience.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Labor Day Weekend Trip
review: Our family finally took a well deserved, week long vacation, deciding that going to the beach was a must.  We chose this resort at the last minute, and it turned out to be one of best vacation destinations, if not the best.  Beautiful, lush and well-kept resort with plenty of restaurants and beautiful pool as well.  The most relaxing, stunning, beach we've seen, with water so clear and easy to swim.  We were fortunate that the weather was perfect.  We stayed in a deluxe two-bedroom room with a beachview that was so luxurious, clean and comfortable and had everything we needed.  We can't wait to go back!

title: Labor day!
review: Whats better way to spend a holiday weekend then the beach! The sun was shininf all day, Alex always made sure we had cold drinks. Jake us up on the tip of the golf on this big beaitfiul querm size bed, service was amazing. Love this place.

title: Weekend Getaway
review: My husband and I went to Longboat Key Resort for a weekend away with friends.  It was also our wedding anniversary and when we walked into our room the first thing we see is chocolate strawberries, bubble and and anniversary card on the kitchen table. Totally unexpected and a nice surprise  The hotel rooms are spacious and clean and the large balcony is also a bonus.  Our room had a pool and ocean view.  Highly recommend a visit and we will be returning guests for sure.

title: Another amazing time at the LBK
review: Our family has been coming to the Longboat Key Club Resort for many years and it never disappoints.  The resort is in a great location.  Close to tremendous restaurants and right on the beautiful Gulf.  The beach staff is outstanding.  It's always great to see Nevan at the beach.  He took terrific care of our family as always.  Nevan makes it a priority of his to ensure you have everything you need.  It's nice knowing in advance he is there to make sure you are all set with chairs, umbrellas and anything else you may want.  He makes the beach that much more enjoyable and relaxing. Sherman as always is the king of the concierge.  He knows everything about the town and is great on recommendations and assisting you in any way.  He always has a smile on his face and really cares…

title: Family weekend
review: We have been coming to the resort for over 23 years and so far this year has been our best vacation. The beach services are great, the staff is super friendly and well trained. Big thanks to Ozzy and Will for making our day special

title: Back for the long weekend
review: I love coming back to the resort at LBK. The staff is great and very welcoming, they always have a smile on their faces. The pool was a little overcrowded for my taste so I was at the beach most of the time. Big shout out to Ozzy and Will for their great service

title: Great place to stay again and again!
review: This was our 2nd visit to the Resort at LBK and it was just as great as our first.  First of all, the beaches are the reason to visit.  The sand and the gulf waters are some of the best in the world and the grounds of the resort are perfectly maintained.  We requested an ocean view room and it did not disappoint.  The rooms are spacious and the kitchen and washer/dryer are very useful. The rates for this room level are a bit high but worth it if you're staying for a longer duration.  Although a standard room at this resort would still be great b/c you're not in the room much anyway.  The staff are extremely accommodating and pleasant.  The staff at the beach are friendly and greet you with a smile every day.  The Resort is also conveniently located to restaurants & shopping. St.…

title: Great family holiday
review: Dear VacationsForever: Thank you for the “5” review!!  I agree that the beaches are some of the best in the world.  I am pleased you loved your view and you found the suite spacious.  Thank you for the positive comments on the staff as well.  We hope to see you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Amazing location for a family retreat
review: Fantastic family holiday at the beach. Setup and staff were excellent, especially at the pool. The kids adored Allie who was super helpful and a great credit the resort. Would recommend to anyone who wants to relax with the most beautiful beach with gorgeous sunsets.   We travelled with 7 and 5 year old kids who both loved the beach and the pool.

title: Friends
review: Dear hotelbill: Thank you for the “5” review!!  Thank you for your positive comments about Allie at the pool as well as the rest of our staff.  Thanks for recommending us to others. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Day at the beach
review: You can't beat the sunsets on LBK and the cool white sand.  We were able to see dolphins just a couple of metres off the beat each morning.  Resort is close to great restaurants and shopping.  You really feel like you are in a tropical location.  Yet you are 5 minutes away from downtown Sarasota.  Rooms were nice.  We had a two bedroom deluxe beach view.  Good room 3707. Recommend it for sunsets and being able to eat breakfast and lunch on the terrace. Full kitchen and laundry machines.  Bathrooms need some fixing.  The pool though is too small given the amount of rooms and also golf club and social members use it.  You couldn't always get chairs and then you couldn't swim laps because the pool is packed.   Food was unhealthy bar stuff at the pool.  Not what you expect at a top…

title: Celebration of our 45th wedding anniversary.
review: Amenities&service at the restaurants, pool & beach were excellent.The pool & beach staff who were courteous & super helpful were Leo Chang,Jami, Osmany, Alexander.Susan (front desk) was very friendly.

title: Amazing Resort
review: Dear 5gonz: Thank you for your kind review.  I am pleased you found the restaurants, pool and beach excellent. Thanks for the kind mention of several of our team members.  We look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Gulf-kissed and sun-bleached ❤️
review: This resort is absolutely beautiful.  Very well maintained and very beautiful.  Right on the beach and also has a gorgeous pool area.  You can eat inside or outside and there is also a pool bar.  We had breakfast and lunch there and the food was delicious.  They upgraded us to a jr suite and it was wonderful.  Kitchen, living area, bedroom, huge bathroom and two closets.  Beautiful balcony with lounge chair and a table with four chairs.  We will definitely return to this resort.  We loved it and didn't want to leave.  It was definitely like being in paradise and everyone working there was so nice.

title: Never Disappointed At This Resort
review: Dear maryo302015: I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us.  Great that you enjoyed our paradise!!  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Nice but Overpriced
review: This place is love! Perfect romantic getaway. We went to Clearwater and around Tampa and just when I thought Clearwater beach is stunning, my date brought me to Longboat Key. I am swept away! The sand, sun and sea experience is nothing quite like it. I am from the tropics so the feel of humidity and 70 degree water is priceless!

title: Beautiful Property.  Pool service could improve.
review: At almost $500 per night, the resort is a bit overpriced.  We spent hours at the pool and couldn't even find someone to pick up our empty drinks or take orders for new ones.   The property is sprawling and the beach is beautiful.

title: Resort fun at its finest
review: Dear Geoff_RoadWarrior:  I’m glad you found the beach and property beautiful.  I’m sorry that you did not find the poolside service fast enough.  It has been reviewed with management of that area. Thank you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: "Amazing Resort"
review: My first time visiting the area and I am happy that we stayed here. The beach was beautiful and includes two chairs and towels while you are relaxing and enjoying the sand and sun. The pool area has lounge chairs and food/beverage service along with towels. I may have liked to have another area just for adults as the kids did take over the pool area.  The food for breakfast and lunch can be served pool side and was really delicious.  The room had a small kitchenette with Keurig coffee maker, mini fridge and freezer, sink, cups, drinking glasses and silverware. Our room had a balcony overlooking the gulf with two chairs and small table amazing sites to see. The king size bed was very comfortable and tv has direct tv access. The wifi is free which is great especially if your on a…

title: Best resort in Sarasota!
review: Dear Christine D: Thank you for the very kind review.  We appreciate you being our guest as your first time to the area.  Glad you loved the beach and found your suite well stocked.  As per your comment on the pool, we do not have another pool in this area, but our pool located at our marina is available to you if you are looking for a quieter spot.   Glad you were able to utilize the complimentary wifi as well as the fitness area.   Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great experience
review: Our room was beautiful! We had been upgraded and had 2 levels, which led down to the beach. Food was fresh and service was very prompt and friendly. Out of all the vacations I have every taken which have been quite a few, I will remember a specific employee forever! His name was Nevan, he worked at the beach and he was the kindest soul I had ever come across. Special in a way that he was so hard working, caring, and has the purest heart! Out of all the greatness and beauty of the resort, Nevan made my vacation special and perfect!!

title: The best beach resort in Bradenton and Sarasota.
review: I stayed at the Longboat Key Club for a law firm retreat and it was incredible.  I loved our junior suite room with amazing views of the Gulf of Mexico, and the tiki bar poolside was the perfect place to lounge the day away.  The resort is close to St. Armand's Circle with all of its shops and restaurants.  We had dinner at Euphemia Haye and the Lazy Lobster, both of which I highly recommend.  It is pricey, but you cannot go wrong with the Resort at Longboat Key Club.  I have stayed at all the high-end properties from Anna Maria to Siesta (including the Ritz, Longboat Hilton, and Lido Beach Resort), and this is my all-around favorite.

title: Great anniversary trip
review: Dear FloridaFrancophile Thank you very much for your very kind review.  Glad you found your stay to be incredible.  Very pleased that we are your all-time favorite over all the other area properties.   We look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: First Class
review: We stayed in a ocean facing king suite for our anniversary trip We splurged on the room size since there were just two of us but the room could easily accommodate more people. Had a great kitchen and washer and dryer. The bathroom was huge!  We picked the package with $75 food and drink credit. The food was great.  We ordered in suite a lot. We did however find out that the credit was only for use in the restaurants so we had to pay for the I suite meals. There weren't many people on the beach and all of the staff is fantastic!

title: Lovely Resort
review: Dear okiehog: Thank you for the “5” review.  Very pleased you enjoyed your anniversary trip with us.  Happy that the suite met your needs well.  The package you mention sounds like our Beach package which includes an included umbrella and a $75 Food and Beverage credit through the pool and beach area.  Thank you again for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Top Notch Resort - One of the Best!
review: We stayed here as a surprise on our 50th Anniversary given by our family. Upon arrival & waiting for our room they advised us we had been upgraded to the 2 bedroom suite which is over 1,800 square feet, WOW!! In building 4, ground ocean front. This villa has its own private beach area & huge ground floor balcony. The entire staff was very attentive to all our wants & needs. Never had to drive once we parked. Amanda, the Concierge was the sweetest along with entire front desk staff. The outside pool area staff needs to pick it up a notch. What a beautiful perfect journey for our 50th! Hope to return again.

title: Beautiful resort
review: The resort at LBKC is great for families , young and old people. At the resort you can find a beautiful  beach, great restaurants and an awesome spa. The rooms are spacious with great view of the Gulf of Mexico. The best part of the resort is the beach services, the beach attendants are professionals and friendly specially Ossie. We will definitely come back again

title: Quiet Oasis - Great for Families
review: Longboat Key...one of our favorite gulf barrier islands nestled in between Anna Maria to the north and Lido & Siesta Key to the south. What sets this place apart from the others for us is the tranquility, relaxed and quiet vibe.    Having stayed here multiple times with an upcoming stay I figured what better time than now to leave a review.   I started coming to this resort back in 2012/2013 when I first moved to Tampa. Since then we have come here every year for a staycation. It is our favorite place for beach comfort.   Our last stay was during Labor Day weekend in 2016. We stayed in a deluxe 2 bedroom beach front suite. We opted for building 4 as it is slightly away from the potential noise of the pool as we were staying with young children.   The good....the location cannot…

title: First time of hopefully many
review: Loved this place! Fantastic room in building C - great pool staff and ocean staff. Our room was wonderfully decorated and even had a a washer and dryer. The staff does all they can to make your stay a good one.  Food here is good. Lots to do surrounding the resort, but no real. We'd to leave

title: Relaxing Vacation
review: My wife, daughter and I are staying at the Resort at Longboat Key Club. Our stay is relaxing with wonderful accommodations. We ordered room service for breakfast and enjoyed the delicious meal on the convenience of our balcony, overlooking the Gulf of Mexico.  Our room is steps away from the beach.  On our arrival at the beach, we were greeted by an attendant who setup two lounge chairs and a beach cabana for us. The chairs were free but the cabana was $35 plus a gratuity.  Our beach attendant was Osmany and he was very friendly, accommodating, and helpful in getting our beach location established.  He helped to make our beach day much more convenient. He even brought us towels and ensured our cabana was well anchored.  Having a young daughter, Osmany's help was especially…

title: Perfect resort for families
review: Dear ManifestingDestiny:  Thank you for being our guest and for the “5” review.  We are very pleased that your stay is going so well and that you love the accommodations.  Great to hear room service breakfast went so well also.  Thanks for your kind mention of Osmany on the beach.  I’m glad he was able to take great care of you.  Enjoy the rest of your time with us. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great experience
review: Everything is superb. Leo and his guys on the beach, Steven at the pool bar. Pablo and Mercedes at the restaurant made me and my family feel great. Will be back for sure because of all this. Strongly recommend this place.

title: Relaxing vacation!
review: Dear Emartell01 Thank you for your kind review!  Thanks for your kind mention of Leo, Steven, Pablo and Mercedes.   We greatly appreciate your recommendation of us.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Girls weekend
review: The best part of the hotel is that it is right on the beach! The resort has private property with chairs and umbrellas available. We ate at Sands Pointe for breakfast every morning and for dinner one night - excellent! Marius at dinner time was especially friendly and attentive. I also appreciate that the double room we took had a kitchenette with a microwave, fridge, utensils, and plates. The service was superb. If one employee were to stand out, it would be Neven on beach. He put in a lot of effort to make sure my family and I were comfortable and stayed cool on the beach.   There is a Publix down the street and a really good fish restaurant nearby called Dry Dock. The shops and restaurants of St. Armands are just a five minute drive away.   Thank you for a relaxing vacation.…

title: Great vacation!
review: Dear lalorobertb: Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest.  I am pleased you had a great stay and loved the beach as well as the restaurant.  Thank you for your kind mention of Marius at Sands point and Neven at the beach.    We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great vacation
review: We had a horrible experience with Tutle beach resort and ended up here! AMAZING . Relaxing, professional first class all the way.  Food is expensive.  Location is outstanding.  Cannot say enough.   Lovely staff Amanda was great!

title: Family Vaction
review: Me and my family have come to Lviv in the past and we have always loved it! The resort has really grown and stepped there game up this year! The beach was huge and the man jake on the beach team really helped us out! He always made sure we were in shade and had dry towels

title: Great place
review: Dear Robbie H: Thank you for the “5” review! I’m glad you had a wonderful stay with us again this year. Thanks for your kind mention of Jake as well.  Hope to see you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Wonderful
review: Staff polite and helpful  Wide beautiful beach Gulf of Mexico warm at 86degreed Easy accessibility to Tampa and Sarasota airports Minutes to St. Armand's Circle and shopping  Eat at Tees and Spikes overlooking golf course Dinner at Portofino to overlook marina Columbia Restaurant and Shore on St Armands Circle Golf and Tennis  Great family or romantic get away

title: Long Weekend Getaway
review: Dear RNA123 Thank you for your Kind review and for being our guest.  I am pleased enjoyed your time with us and glad you found us so conveniently located to both nearby airports.   We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Vacation
review: We recently stayed for my husband's birthday.  Our junior suite overlooking the gulf was lovely. The concierge,Amanda was really helpful, and she sent chocolate covered strawberries and wine to our room. The beach was beautiful. The staff was helpful.  Parking is convenient.  This was our second stay.  Would come again.

title: Family weekend away
review: The resort at LBKC is great place to bring your relatives tonhave a great time. The service all around is terrific. The beach attendants will go out their way to make sure you are having a great time st the beach. Big thanks to Ozzy and sheryl for their amazing service.

title: Excellent family vacation
review: Dear Isabel M: Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest.  I am pleased you found the service all around to be terrific.  Thanks for your kind mention of Ozzy and Cheryl for their amazing service. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Amazing Vacation!
review: My wife, three children and I returned to The Resort at Longboat Key Club this summer for the third time in four years. We have fallen in love with this resort and the area and plan to continue our annual trips. The location of the resort is prime for beach days (on the newly rejuvenated, beautiful beach) and quick access to St. Armand's Circle as well as Sarasota.  The resort itself could not be easier for a laid-back and comfortable environment.  You may get the feeling the resort is aged but the rooms and common areas are well-maintained and have been improved each year we visited.   What makes this place over the top is the people.  Each person at the resort, from the management to the staff, is incredibly friendly, accommodating, and thoughtful.  A special shout out to the…

title: Disappointing
review: Dear JaredP33: Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest!  I am so glad your family was able to make the best of your time here and you have been back so many times.  Thanks for noting that you see improvements each time you come as well as I appreciate your kind words about our staff and specifically housekeeping team.   Thank you for recommending us and we look forward to seeing you next time.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Still amazing.
review: Our family visited the resort for a week and have had an amazing stay. We stayed in a Deluxe Two Bedroom suite which was extremely large. Enough evening seating room for about 8 to 10 adults and very comfy for four! The beach is amazing and Ozzy was awesome on the beach. They took perfect care of us along with Kristen. The water is perfection. So clear. Gorgeous shades of teak green and blue. We will certainly be back!

title: Beautiful place
review: We stayed for 3 weeks and it's so lovely would of stayed another 3 weeks if we could , it's in such a lovely setting ,fantastic beach and because of the layout you feel as if you're on a private little island ,we stayed in building 7 on the 3rd floor and the views of the lagoon were outstanding ,everyday a manatee and her calf were swimming just below our balcony and dolphins were swimming past and the bird life was amazing , we come from England so would never see so many exotic birds , what a place . I read some people saying it was a bit out dated but we thought it was old Florida style we loved it .  The people that worked there were outstanding the service was 5 star we didn't come across anybody without a lovely smile and a real welcome .Everybody talks about the beach…

title: Weekend at LBK Club
review: Dear sophieNorthEngland: Thank you for your “5” review and for being our guest.   So happy to hear that you had a successful 3 weeks with us.  Seeing the Manatee make their rounds never gets old and is certainly a true enjoyment in buildings 6 and 7.  Thanks for your kind mention of the staff teams, the reception, the restaurant and bar, the beach crew and the entertainment.  Specifically, Roy, Dawn Marius, Alexander George and Sally thank you!!  We hope to see you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: DISAPPOINTED
review: We live locally and just wanted an easy, relaxing weekend at the beach. This is exactly what we got.  We will definitely stay at the club again.  The room was very large with a great beach view patio.  The food was great, there was live music at the pool, and the beach is private and beautiful.

title: Paradise on earth !
review: Dear Amanda M: I’m please you had a successful weekend with us. Glad you found the room to be large with a great patio.  Thanks for mentioning the great food, live music and private beach.  We look forward to seeing you again for your next local escape.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Amazing experience
review: I have been staying at this resort for 10+ years.  Last year alone, I stayed 8 times.  This resort has increased fees and changed rules but has not followed through with service.  The staff is not friendly and seems "put out" if you bother them.  This includes front desk, housekeeping, and beach attendants.   -the elevator in blg 4 has been broken for two years..guests do get stuck in it.  It has happened twice on two different occasions when I was there. -A/C unit failure because they had not changed filter -no coolers or soft coolers on the beach...they want you to buy their drinks which are hot by they time you get them -25 dollars a day for umbrella rental and you aren't allowed to bring your own -if you refuse to take down your own umbrella..they will call the police...I…

title: !! CONSUMER ALLERT !!
review: For the cost of this resort they should not nickel and dime you over beach umbrellas.  Real hassel on the beach.  The guy in charge of the beach is a real Nazi. They should real realy get ridd of that guy. Most resorts in this category make it easy to enjoy the beach.  Umbrellas and chairs set up at the beach for their guests to enjoy.  Not this place.  Realy takes away from a relaxing experience.

title: Gorgeous beach views
review: Dear Florida R: Thanks for taking the time to express your concern.   We take every comment seriously and have reviewed it with our team.   Please note that we are currently offering a “Toes In The Sand” Package that includes a daily Umbrella at the beach as well as a $75 Food and Beverage credit.  It is being offered at an exceptional value and should alleviate the concern that you have.  Hope we have another chance to offer you our hospitality. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great resort
review: This is one of the most beautiful beaches I've ever seen. The view from our room was amazing. Yes this seems to be an older resort but the wonderful service and beautiful ocean views make it all worth it! Every staff member we encountered was over the top pleasant and ready and willing to make our stay wonderful. Highly recommend!

title: Nice Beach Resort
review: Dear savannahshae:  Thank for the “5” review!  I am so glad you found our beach to be one of the most beautiful beaches you’ve ever seen.  I agree as it is stunning. I also appreciate your mention of the over the top pleasant staff you encountered.  Thanks for recommending us.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Very nice resort and great beach
review: My husband and I stayed at Longboat Key Club for five days recently.  The resort is large and has many activities to keep everyone entertained. we had a premium junior suite.  A large room with a kitchen,sitting area, king bed and a large dressing/ bathroom. The view  from our room was beautiful. The beach one of the best you will ever see.  The staff was pleasant and efficient.  Overall a nice  experience.We ate at Sand Pointe and Portofino restaurants on the property. The food was very good.

title: Back in paradise
review: We loved coming back to the resort , my family and I have been coming here for over 8 years now. It is always great to see the friendly faces of the beach attendants that always have my set up ready before I arrive to the beach. Big thanks to OZZY , jake and Sheryl. We will be definitely coming back every year.

title: Longboat key
review: The beach was awesome! Jake was super helpful. Overall loved the trip. Food was yummy too! Would definitely recommend. The staff always comes around and asks us if we need any help or anything. Really great vacation place.

title: Great resort
review: The resort at LBK is great, beautiful facilities with friendly staff , the beach is very clean and beautiful,the beach attendant are very welcoming and professional, big shout out to Ozzy for his great service !

title: this place nickels and dimes guests
