review: The apartment was spacious and great to have washer and dryer. The bathrooms are dated with a shower over tub and shower curtain. The tub was dirty everyday. I stayed there 2 weeks. The hotel charges for lounge chairs and umbrellas on the beach. This is new since I was here 8 months ago. The daily resort fee covers the lounge chairs but not the umbrellas, so sitting on the beach is  $30.00 extra daily.  The pool tiles were extremely dirty. The food is above average but not memorable.  This hotel should rethink charging for every little thing. It is a major turn off.

title: Top Shelf
review: Excellent resort. Food, service and rooms were all great. Pricey but that's to be expected. Had a great time with my lovely wife on our 30th anniversary. Great for adults who want a top notch get away. Don't think it would be great for kids.

title: Best place for vacation at lbk
review: I stayed for one night with my fiance and would have been happy to stay longer. Beautiful accommodation and fantastic service. The beach view from our room was breath taking. The beach services are great, kayaking in the gulf is a must ! The beach attendants are friendly and professionals specially Ossie that helped us at the beach

title: Surprise Fathers Day getaway for my hubby was best ever thanks to the Resort at Longboat Key Club
review: This was one of the nicest little 'getaways' we've ever been on! The accommodations, customer service and amenities are exceptional - and oh, did I mention the food??? The food was amazing! We can't wait to come back.  The staff are so nice and gracious - and we were surprised with a complimentary upgrade to a suite because our room wasn't ready and we had been waiting a while (our fault for arriving early) and they everything in there power to accommodate us!   We will be back!!!!!!

title: The Legend Returns
review: Joe & Jake on the beach were unbelievable. The resort is amazing from the tennis courts to the beach enjoyed my stay so much thanks again for outstanding service. We will be back for sure to see the white sands and crystal clear water.

title: Great Vacation
review: Great service on the beach. Couldn't ask for anything else. David helped us out with everything we could think of. The beach was beautiful and the weather held up nicely. Thank you Longboat for the great experience, we can't wait to visit again!

title: Great rooms, great beach
review: This hotel isn't fancy like a Ritz-Carlton but it's really, really nice. Super clean everywhere and the employees were all very nice and attentive.  While other reviewers might complain about being nickel and dimed, I only found that to be partially true. Yes, you are charged a resort fee, a fee for beach umbrellas and a tip is automatically included in everything. But most other resorts charge these fees plus requiring valet parking (at Longboat Key there is free parking) and charging for internet (also free at Longboat).   We managed to get a sweet summer deal on the hotel website with a free beach umbrella plus $75 of food credit every day and it was the best thing ever! Our Junior suite was incredibly roomy and was very nice.   The beach at Longboat Key is a great one with…

title: Family trip
review: Very beautiful resort with outstanding service, yo can have food a drink anywhere on the resort at the beach , pool , golf course ! My favorite thing was the queen size bed at the beach! The beach attendants are very friendly and professional especially Ozzy.

title: 4th Visit
review: Dear Jose A: Thank you for your kind review. I’m glad you enjoyed the pool, beach and golf as well as your food and beverage everywhere.  Thanks for your kind mention of Ozzy. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort

title: Old but ok
review: This fourth visit to RLBKC was very nice. Amenities have basically stayed the same with the exception of now charging for beach umbrellas. Fortunately, the conference I was there to attend had been given coupons for free beach umbrellas so that was nice. One annoying thing that I don't believe I have covered before is the fact that the luggage carts are locked and inaccessible unless you ask for them. With four kids, I put them to work with the luggage anytime we travel. Having those readily available would be nice. Pool, beach and service staff are all very friendly and well-trained. We try to tip but sometimes it seems the staff is embarrassed to take a tip. Not sure why?Look forward to returning in June 2018.

title: Joe and zach
review: Dear Walterc549:  Thank you for your kind review.  Very pleased you enjoyed your 4th visit with us and you found the staff to be friendly and well-trained.   Luggage carts are kept locked so that they are available when guests need them.  There is a house phone directly beside them and if you dial 0 we come running to open them for you and also assist if you like.  Unfortunately, if we don’t do that, people leave them in their rooms, etc. and they are not available. Again, we look forward to seeing you soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Conference Stay at Longboat Key
review: It's definitely not in the best condition especially for the prices they charge.  But the beach is great and small and quiet.  The decor in the rooms is good but the kitchens are so old and out dated.  Along with the front entrance.  It feels like the 70's in there.  It's actually so old looking it's almost back in style.  😜.  The pool is good but again old style.  Which would be fine if they didn't charge prices like new nicer hotels charge.  I'm confused why they're so expensive.

title: Always a Great Experience
review: Live in Tampa and enjoy catching up with visitors from Europe.  Overall the experience is good; however Direct TV service is spotty at best.  What is also confusing is billing for the restaurant and room services; there is a line item which states "extra gratuity" - don't know whether the gratuity has already been added in or whether to tip the standard 20%.   Added 20% to the bills; but think that I might have given a 35% tip overall.  It would be helpful if that was clarified.  Thanks

title: The wildlife was enjoying the water too
review: Dear Larry_034678 Thanks for being our guest and for your “5” review.  Yes, there is a service charge already included.  Any additional tip is at your discretion.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Our go to place
review: The resort was outstanding.  We were greeted by Susan, (I think that's correct) at check in.  It was quick but through then offered champagne and macroons.  Nice start to a weekend vacation.  Everyone was nice and very helpful.  The room was very spacious and had a real beachy feel.  Our room had a large sliding glass door and patio with a golf course view.  I enjoyed a cup of coffee on the patio each morning watching all the birds.  I've included a picture of all the birds around the lake.  It was incredible to see that much wildlife activity.  I met George, the greens keeper of the course, as I was walking around and looking at the wildlife.  I didn't get to play the course but George had it looking perfect.  Next time I'm there I have to play.

title: The northeasterners
review: Dear Sutiegirl: Glad you had a wonderful time with us.  Thank you for your kind words concerning Susan and George.  We will continue to keep the golf course ready for you on your next trip.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Stormy stay at the beach
review: We've stayed at Long Key several times. We enjoy the room selection, from tiny to a spacious suite. Best part is  that it is right on the beach! An older motel but rooms are clean and well maintained.  Very short drive to a good variety of restaurants, grocery store near by to stock up refrigerator.

title: Our view of the beach and ocean was amazing.
review: We got to the hotel a few hours later than planned (airplane lost A/C, so delayed) and I was concerned about a few things that turned out to be just fine. First - we were greeted by the friendly "Slim Jim" who had already placed the groceries I ordered online from Publix into our room.  He even put certain bags in the refrigerator! So, that was a relief.  He showed us to our room, and offered to help us unload. This was our first trip with 2 kids, so it wasn't just 2 carry on size suitcases, either.  He was very gracious, kind and helpful.  When we got to our room in the second building, I was also happy to see that the portable crib/pack and play and high chair were also already there.   It was dark when we got in, so what a wonderful surprise the next morning to wake up to the…

title: Concerns during our stay
review: Dear OhioPrincipessa: Thank you for your kind review.  I am very pleased that your check-in was successful and that our bellman Jim took great care of you.   To come in after delayed flights is always frustrating, so I am pleased that he and the rest of our team anticipated your needs and made the check-in effortless.  I’m glad you were also able to enjoy the pool and beach area as well.  Chairs are included with the resort fee, but an umbrella is a $25 additional fee.   Yes, there is a low limit set on the A/C which is important in keeping our suites moisture free.  The limit is now 68 degrees.  Thank you again for being our guest and we look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: 3 RD year member
review: First I would like to praise Lory and Paula (restaurant and pool staff) who were excellent and a credit to your team. Both ladies were genuinely warm, delightful, welcoming and at all times professional.   Check in was brief and business like nor what you would expect from a holiday resort of this calibre.   The Junior suite was comfortable and clean but let down by the bathroom which was tired and dated.   Very disappointed in the lack of staff during the fire evacuation of block 5 on Friday night especially so as there were families with young children and babies. There was no communication throughout the incident and no apology as this was an equipment malfunction. It was very worrying that there was only one member of staff who turned up just before the fire engines arrived…

title: A great place to go to relax
review: Dear IaninAshford:  Thank you for your praise of Lory and Paula.  We appreciate this comment.  Thanks also for your comments on the fire alarm in your building.   The alarm itself is the indicator to evacuate the building and the auto annunciation tells you to exit.   This should always be followed and it should be assumed it is a true emergency when alarms sound in any building.  From your note, staff member and fire department showed up within 5 minutes. Once it was determined it was a false alarm, the staff member informed you of this and also walked the building to speak to anyone else who remained outside.  Furthermore, we did have management call every room the next morning to further follow up.    Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Longboat...paradise!
review: We are happy to be members of the longboat key club. This visit we were able to enjoy golfing and the greens were spectacular and a few yoga classes in the gym. We love the restaurants especially the breakfast buffet !  The staff is always so welcoming when we return. We look forward to our next visit in a few more weeks!

title: Conference turned gorgeous vacation
review: I was there for a conference and decided to stay a litle longer. Beautiful views, examplary staff, great rooms, and the Ocean a breath away. And Sarasota has a lot to offer with great restaurants and surprisingly strong Arts scene.   Really, the views are splendorous. I had a 6th floor West facing unit and was treated to amazing Sunset views everynight. The view more than justifies the cost.  The service was fantastic, and I have never had such a pleasant experience with resort staff, and while they don't have ice machines in the buildings they will deliver a bucket gratis in a snap and a smile.   The double room was generous and modern, with a kitchenette and fully stocked fridge.

title: Blissfull view
review: Dear ToddBoston: Thank you for the very kind review concerning your stay.   We are fortunate that many people who come here for meetings are able to extend their time and relax with us as well.  Your point of view concerning the views and the service and appreciated.  We hope to see you again very soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Mother's Day Weekend Getaway
review: We stayed at longboat key with our 2 children aged 7 & 9 and we all had a great stay, our accommodation was perfect for our Family, spacious and luxurious with the most blissfull view! Our Girls enjoyed the kids club on a few mornings, I practiced yoga on the beach with a lovely class from the Club's fitness centre and we all enjoyed some real downtime. The staff were most helpful and considerate and made our stay very special as we were celebrating both my Husbands 50th and our 25th Wedding Anniversary. Already longing to return.

title: Spectacular Beach and Great Staff
review: Dear Saab08 Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to review your stay.   I am very pleased that your children enjoyed our Camp Loggerhead and that you found us a perfect Family location.    I agree that Yoga on the beach is spectacular and am happy to see that our team made your stay special.    Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Another great stay at LBK Club
review: The resort is beautiful. My husband enjoyed the golf course.  I visited the spa for a pedicure.  All resort staff were kind and helpful. The food is good but not worth the price. I'd be giving a five star review if this place wasn't so overpriced and haughty.

title: A Family Treat
review: My wife and I are around seventy years of age and we thought a holiday in Florida would be a great place to celebrate our age and celebrate the event with our family. Our plan was to stay at the Longboat Key Club for a week followed by a week at Orlando. We arrived to hear that the resort Club had upgraded us to a suite with an ocean view.This was a two bedroomed suite with catering facilities and sleeping for 6. Overall our stay was wonderful with truly excellent customer service.Every request we made of the staff was met with help and support. This included the restaurants, the pool service and the shuttle service to other associated club restaurants. We had a fabulous time and my daughter and her family will remember the experience for a very long time as will we ..

title: Great staff!
review: Dear Max055: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay.  We are so very happy to hear that your experience with us was a very positive one thank you for mentioning our staff offered truly excellent customer service.  We hope to see you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great Location and Beach
review: We stayed here for a long weekend recently (our third visit) and had a relaxing, enjoyable time. All of the staff (including front desk, bellmen, restaurant staff, maids, and bar staff) were without exception very friendly and welcoming at all times.  Kudos to them, their supervisors, and whoever does the hiring and training. Well done!    Everything was clean and generally well very maintained.  The pool area is very nice with large towels and chair covers available and included in the resort fee.  The free Wi-Fi signal was very strong everywhere we went and bandwidth was great. The 9:00 a.m. beach walk was cancelled the day I tried to book it, so the nice lady on the phone apologized and gave me a resort credit, which was appreciated.  Don't bother to use the Opal website to…

title: Spectacular beach & hotel
review: Dear maclabdoug: Thank you for your review and for being our guest.  I am pleased you had an enjoyable time.   We appreciate the kind mention of the staff being friendly and welcoming including front desk, bellman, restaurant staff, housekeeping and bar staff.   I apologize that you had an issue with your request on the OPAL website.  I assure you this typically goes smoothly and I am glad our golf course was able to accommodate you.    Yes, we do charge an umbrella fee, but it is a bit less that you mention.  The $25 includes the tax and the gratuity.  We have substantially upgraded our equipment and services on the beach and this is part of that change.   Again, thank you very much and we hope to see you again very soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Outstanding service
review: This is a resort that offers golf, tennis and beach going activities. It's close to Sarasota and other communities for additional restaurant selections, groceries, etc... The service and food was great.  The facilities themselves are in need of upgrading....the only negative to the resort. Worth the stay. Enjoy!

title: Time of my life!
review: Here on a week vacay before it's back to school! This beach is so big! Ozzy put in our umbrellas and set up our chairs! Jake brought by fresh towel for us too! The sun was out all day not one cloud came by can't believe it!

title: Great beach day !
review: Dear rose1216:  Glad to hear it was the time of your life and that Ozzy and Jake were able to take such great care of you.   We hope to see you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Not one cloud!
review: The resort is all around an amazing place ! The pool bar , and barefoot restaurant is great ! Very accommodating staff everywhere on the resort, big shout out to Ozzy and jake that took care of our family , I highly recommend the queen size bed to everybody out there.

title: BeachService
review: Me and my friends just finished school for the summer! Ozzy and Jake cued for no clouds in the sky cause we need a tan! The resort is beautiful from golfing to the beach you can't get bored!  The food is amazing and comes out so fast!

title: Improved Beach
review: Cheryl provides fantastic customer service on the beach. Here she is out in the beautiful Gulf of Mexico taking an order. She works hard all day providing guests with an enjoyable experience. Cheryl is Awesome!

title: Longboatkey Resort
review: I returned to Longboatkey Resort in April so happy that we did, once again we had a wonderful experience. From beginning to end, best time ever. I can't wait to go back again, hopefully before Year end. As we are big tennis fan's we played at the tennis centre every other day, as usual a great time, we played with coaches John, Sammy, great guys. Also a wonderful Pro Shop and Restaurant. At the hotel everyone is so nice, l can name a few, Ed at the beach bar,  also Paula and Kathy . At the Beach which we both love, we had Nevin, Jake, David who were the best. Can't wait to return 😍😍😍

title: Sunny days
review: Very beautiful resort with outstanding views. One of the most beautiful sunsets that I have ever seen. The service at the beach is great, Ozzy will help you with chairs and bed rentals. The pool is also great and the bar is a lot of fun with friendly people having fun.

title: Day at the beach
review: The resort at LBKC is a beautiful place. It has the most amazing beach and service. At the beach you can do water sports and take a nap on the beds! Big shout out to Ozzy for his outstanding service. At the pool you can find and outdoor restaurant with great food.

title: One night stay while in Sarasota
review: Booked a one night stay on the end of a house hunting trip to finish the trip with a little relaxation.   We really enjoyed this hotel. Property is well maintained and the beach in front of the property is amazing.  Room was very nice, comfortable bed, view of the beach and pool were fantastic. Bed pillows were a little odd, seemed like they were filled with chunks of form ... guess it is what you are used to, not uncomfortable just different.   Close to St Armand circle however with a one night stay we saw no need to venture off property until we left the next morning.   Very enjoyable stay and certainly worth the price.  Highly recommended for a splurge get a away.   On note, everything has a 20% tip included .... drinks, food, beach umbrella set up. Takes away the need to…

title: Summer comes early
review: I came down here as a reward for my exams. It was everything I needed. I got in my exercise on the paddle boards on the water treading against the waves then got in my relaxation with an umbrellas covered lounge. Freddy and jake set up the towels and shade. When I went up to get away from the salt water into the pool near the bar Allie set me up closest to the bar. The resort accommodated me with all I needed for my Summer before summer.

title: Day to soak up the sun!
review: Today was a beautiful day out at the lbkc! Me and my friends make a special trip each summer it's amazing here. Freddy and jake down at the beach got us in the perfect amount of shade where we could still tan! The beach was so pretty with out big king size bed! Allie kept bringing us fresh towel everytime we had wet ones!

title: Weekend getaway
review: Quick weekend trip. Everything was fabulous. Upgraded us to a two bedroom suite, with a great view of the ocean and our own deck area. We were on the first floor, which although it wasn't "higher" for a better view the private deck was worth it.   Rooms: king-size in master, 2 full size in the other.  Each room had its own bathroom which was not really extravagant, but very functional.   Both bedrooms had large flatscreen TV's with DVD players (I hooked up my Apple TV).  There was a great living room with large seating area and large flat screen TV.  The area  was very spacious with dining area and kitchen also. All three rooms had access to the balcony Beach: was beautiful.  Great sand.  Very few people on it while we were there.  The resort provided free chairs and towels.  …

title: Lido beach
review: The beach is really awesome here. The sand is the softest sand I've ever felt in my life. Oozy and Kerrington helped me out a lot. To anyone that gets a chance to come here highly recommended asking kerrington or oozy for their help!

title: LBKC
review: The sand is very soft. My favorite part is the spa and beach. The service at the beach is amazing. kerrington and ozzy helped us out by getting us fresh towels, waters, and great front row spots on the beach. Anyone who wants to have an amazing vacation come to the resort at longboat key club!

title: Excellent!
review: Ozzy and Kerrington made our beach stay well worth it and helped to make us feel right at home. Would definitely stay here again going forward and recommend it to anyone in the area. So good! 10 out of 10. Also beautiful sand and great food and drinks. Made our stay worthwhile.

title: Mixed Reviews
review: At first glance the resort was GORGEOUS.  The front desk staff and Jim, the bellman, made us feel very welcome and went out of their way to orient us to the hotel and surrounding area.  Same can be said for everyone we spoke with at the concierge desk. Unfortunately that was probably the highlight.  The beach chairs at the pool (which was beautiful) and Gulf were too hard to sit in for more than a few minutes which was very disappointing for a 4 star hotel. Though the pool side restaurant was very good (including Kathy the waitress who was great) we were so disappointed with the restaurant in the main building that we went to St Armond's Circle or Downtown Sarasota every night thereafter.  They only had one waiter working and he was serving the only other diners in the…

title: Great Location, relaxing views
review: I really enjoyed our families stay, with 2 teenage girls and my spouse.  The best part of the hotel is the beach and the views of the boats going out and in of the inlet.    The staff on the beach were great and they were quite helpful, even though the heat was a killer, they still smiled!  I liked being able to walk to the steakhouse off property and watching the sunset on the beach.  A great place to stay for a few days...

title: So relaxing
review: Longboat key club is built on the very best part of the beach on longboat key.  Only 5 minutes from armond circle and with the best views and service on the key. Everything is impeccable and the Sunday brunch is incredible. We have been going every year for 8 years and it's as great now as ever.

title: 30th Wedding Anniversary!
review: Wonderful Resort! First class all the way, without feeling stuffy. Great Gulf of Mexico views and just steps from the beach. You never have to leave Longboat Key!! Everything you need on one pristine island!

title: great time with the family
review: we just stayed for 1 day love the food and the people, the staff was really nice. The hotel is a bit old but clean and so convenient with her own private beach and two pools. One of them so nice and warm ! we will definitely go back

title: Excellent staff and accomodations
review: The level of service was amazing and welcoming.  We lucked out with Nevan as our major support person on the beach.  He made sure all our needs were considered. We will be back and look forward to recommending LBKC to other friends wishing to engage in a great resort and staff!

title: Great time
review: The key to a good vacation is food. There is food everywhere here. At the golf course the restaurants are right behind where we drive at the tennis courts the restaurants are right next to the courts and even on the beach we get her own food service. The beach is what has that extra mile for the five star feel along with the food service I also have overall beach service and it is spectacular. Freddy and Ozzy were the ones that we were lucky enough to have and they set up a luxury bed that came with complimentary paddle boards.

title: Great resort
review: The resort at LBKC its great ! There is a lot to do for all families, great beach , pool and outstanding golf courses. At the beach you are going to find beds and launchers for a rental fee. The service at the beach is second to none! Ossie , Nevan and Jake will take care of you !!  Highly recommend this resort !

title: Beach day!
review: The waves here are amazing remind me of the east coast! As soon as we walked down to the beach Jake and ozzy took our towels and set us up in a beautiful king size beds with plenary of space and shade. The food at the pool was so filling for lunch really hit the spot

title: Always a fun and memorable time!! Our family's paradise!!
review: We are so excited to come back to such a wonderful place.  We can always count on incredible service from everyone.  The boys at the beach (ozzie, jake, and his crew) always have our chairs and cabana set up perfectly and ready for the fun sun day ahead.  Cheryl is so accommodating with lunch and drinks.  Allie and the other was amazing with our three toddlers making sure they were safe in the pool.  We are so excited to come back and enjoy this paradise.  We have been coming for years and will continue to come as our family expands.  Looking forward to it!!

title: Beautiful but mediocre service
review: So this place is in a beautiful spot and I have really enjoyed being here. The ocean view , stunning sand and ambience are all excellent .  Customer service though is a little patchy . It doesn't feel as if the ethos is one of putting customers first. Checkout is at the early time of 11am. As I was at a conference this meant checking out before the morning sessions. When I asked if 1pm was possible I was told there was no movement on 11am. Really? Were they cleaning my room at 11? Isn't check in not till 4pm? Zero flexibility . I then asked if they could arrange a taxi for the airport . Sorry sir, that needs to be booked 24 hours in advance ...but you can ask the concierge when they get here - when I'm already in my conference.  And finally lunch before heading to the airport.…

title: Longboat key
review: I love the resort at longboat key club. The spa and pool is amazing however my favorite part is the beach. We went paddleboarding and the view is amazing. Kerrington and zack helped me out a lot. They even asked if we needed more shade and drinks. Would definitely go again

title: zach and jakes amazing accomodations!
review: I am very pleased you had a great experience with us.   Thanks for your kind mention of Kerrington and Zach.     Great to hear that you were able to experience the Spa, Pool and Beach!  We hope to see you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beach rentals
review: me and my mom took a trip to the resort for some rest and relaxation. when we stepped foot on the beach we had Jake and Zach there and ready to help us. They offered to get a waiter for drinks and whatever else we need. they both set us up with cabanas and umbrellas and towels and any other accommodations we needed. they informed us about all the shopping and fun in the area and local splendid restaurants we wanted to attend. everyday we spent at the beach we really got to know Zach and Jake and they are the main reason our trip was so enjoyable and a stress free getaway. great employees!!

title: LBK Club
review: Dear averierobinson: Thank you for your review and your kind mention of Jake and Zach.  We hope to see you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Longboat
review: The calmness is finally setting in. We had a quiet day at the beach with an awesome luxury set up. We got a bad and took advantage of the water sports. The drinks kept coming from our server Cheryl. And the service kept coming from Ozzy and Freddy. The five star feeling really reverberates here .

title: 3 nights in a Jr Suite
review: Overall this resort was beautiful. Pool and beach were well maintained. The grounds were impeccable. Food was good. We had a dinner party by the pool one evening and one at the golf club the next evening, the only complaints were the bug bites at the pool and when the sprinkler system turned on at the golf course and sprayed water on the patio where we were eating. Our room was adequate but seemed to be damp all the time. The lights in the bathroom were slow to illuminate and the bulbs were mis-matched colors. Turn down service at night was really a nice touch. Beach service was wonderful, we really enjoyed talking to Nevin. He provided us with excellent service! Beach amenities were a bit pricey (umbrellas and extra chairs), but the food and drink service was fast and…

title: LBKC Revisited
review: Updating prior review. Still no question about the amenities--great offering: beach, pools, marina, golf, tennis, fitness center, restaurants on site, gated community, spa, views, shuttle, wifi, concierge, close to St. Armand's, etc.  This is a resort with 4,400 members, some of whom rent out their units for guests. I am writing as a guest.  What struck me during my April 2017 visit was the poor condition of the junior suite we stayed in for a week. Single best word: RUNDOWN! This type of unit is on the market for nearly $500,000 for a small, 1 king bed junior suite (several listed in local real estate offerings).  Rental prices are HIGH (close to $1000/night after spring break but before Easter break). Then the add ons: resort fees plus the extra 20% added to all onsite resort…

title: Vacation
review: The hotel itself is very accommodating. The spa and pool is a very relaxing and enjoyable part of the resort. My favorite part of this resort is the beach and the services they offer. Ozzy and kerrington helped me out greatly.. Would visit again for sure.

title: Nice resort - room temp a big issue
review: We've stayed here for years. Nice resort, nice rooms. We love the suites with kitchen and laundry facilities. This year however, we had one big problem. In the name of "green", they've installed new thermostats that will not let you set the temperature lower than 70 degrees. I have 2 problems with that: 1) in larger suites, the thermostat doesn't reflect warmer bedroom temperatures, so it's just too warm 2) As a paying guest at a high end resort, it should be my choice, not theirs, what the room temp is.  At the very least, it should be possible to ask for engineering to override the limit - at least at night.   As the result of this, we were not able to sleep well. I would have serious hesitation about staying at the resort again as the result. And let's not get on any…

title: longboat key club resort
review: Today i went with my friend to the resort at longboat key club. I am a member at the resort and every time i visit the experience only gets better. The service is unbeatable. My favorite part is the beach. Kerrington, Freddy, and jake helped me out greatly. Each of them either brought me towels or fixed my umbrellas for us when we asked. 10/10. Would highly recommend visiting this resort.

title: Very disappointing
review: Using the Fine Hotels from American Express, got room upgrade to 2 bedroom....It was directly over pool.  It was very noisy. The pool was overcrowded and full of kids. For this kind of money you would expect an adult pool option.  The hot tub was constantly full of kids. Hotel needs upgrading.  Grounds are beautiful  and well maintained.

title: Wonderful stay.
review: Great location. The weather was perfect. Ozzy was quick to get what we asked for! Allie went above and beyond to make sure our experience was the best possible trip. We LOVED IT here and you will too!

title: Family
review: When Allie asked us what we needed she came with a sweet disposition and sweet voice.  Loved having her helping us. Ozzie and Leo have everthimg under control. They know how to work under pressure and give of themselves. It's hard to find these kind of people

title: SO AWESOME
review: I've been coming here since i was little and i absolutely love it!! The service is so great, especially jake and ozzi. The setup is so nice and so much fun for all ages! The beach is so beautiful and not crowded with chairs! One of my favorite places!!

title: Awesome place for vacation
review: The resort at LBKC great ! In here you can find a beautiful beach, great restaurant, spa and fitness center. Big shout out to the beach team for taking care of my family. I would highly recommend the paddle boards and the queen beds. Big shout out to Ozzy the beach attendant.

title: Great stay at the LBKC!
review: I had a great time with my family at the resort! The rooms were so clean and the house keeping were so accommodating. The re-nourished beach was beautiful and the beach crew were so nice. Ozzy, Kerrington, and Morgan got my towels and set up the perfect beach paradise for me. I will definitely be visiting again!

title: Nice resort - yet, time to update the hotel rooms!
review: We were celebrating our 30th wedding anniversary.  Beautiful club, delicious food, wonderful beach, friendly & outgoing staff;  HOWEVER, our room did not match the 5 star rating with the rest of the facility.   Our balcony view of the sunset each night was lovely; however, the furniture on the balcony was in very poor shape!   The bathroom was very small and the tub was old and warn-out - I would think a resort of this level would have an updated bathroom.  Sugar ants (as I was told) were on our counter top in the small kitchen area and two bugs (don't want to mention what kind) were seen in the bathroom at night.  Yes, the exterminator came right away but again, no guest should see any bugs at a resort of this caliber!   In general, I was also disappointed by the general small…

title: Beach. Longboat.
review: If you want to have the best vacation that you can go on.... go to the resort at longboat key club. Not only do they offer multiple services to their guests and members but the workers at the beach take the best possible care of you that they can. My personal favorite worker was Kerrington because he was very nice and made sure that all of my friends and myself were seated properly. He even brought us waters and towels!

title: Longboat key club resort
review: After finding out and Meeting the associates that work for Boucher brothers, i would highly recommend other visitors to both take part in becoming a member or visit the resort for vacations. My favorite part about the resort is the beach. The two individuals that helped me, kerrington and Morgan, were very professional and took care of us very well. Next time I visit I'll ask for them personally!

title: Beach resort
review: Amazing all around resort with the most beautiful beach, at the resort you will enjoy the drinks made at the pool bar and great meals in all the beatiful restaurants, big shout out to the beach staff, ask for Ozzy at the beach , he will give you a great deal on the day beds

title: Best resort
review: I have been coming to florida for a few years and this is the first time at the LBKR, the service at the resort is oustanding and the staff is really well trained, big shout out to the brach staff and specially Ozzy !!

title: great visit!
review: My friend brenna and i had such a great time at longboat key club. The sand is spectacular and i would definitely recommend this resort to others. Overall, the services are outstanding and the trip would have not been as fun if we went somewhere else. Kerrington and morgan made the beach ten times better.

title: Longboat key
review: The beach is amazing. It's a very big beach that offers a lot of different services. The water is the perfect temperature and the weather is perfect. We wouldn't have had such a great experience without Kerrington's and Morgan's help. Would definitely go again.

title: Longboat Key Club
review: We have a great experience as a family for our Easter weekend! The beach and water are beautiful, the staff is attentive and the rooms are comfortable and spacious! Kessington was a big help out on the beach!

title: Great employees
review: I'm a member at the club and usually visit once a week. I usually avoid visiting on holidays due to the mass amount of people. This particular day I went with my fiancée and he left his phone on the beach. Thank so much to Ozzy Kerringston for calling to let me know he found the phone and returned it to me. So happy with the honesty and integrity of the staff here.

title: Nothing short of amazing! This is the REAL review.
review: I've stayed at this resort before at least 3 times as well as several of the other Opal hotel/resorts, but I'm now a regular "member" at LBK Club.   I must say that the service there is unmatched anywhere else in Sarasota/Longboat and the surrounding area.  The beach crew and staff at the bar and restaurants are nothing short of amazing.   Everyone is genuine, respectful, and hard working.   I have not seen a single slacker, and trust me, I would call it out if I did!  I want to give a kind thank you to the beach staff that assisted me on Thursday:   Ozzy in particular is a great guy and a hard worker!   I had a massive amount of documents, bags, 2 laptops, a heavy briefcase, etc.,. He was kind enough to help me carry all my stuff to the furthest area of the beach where I was…

title: longboat
review: pretty much the whole time i just chilled at the beach. for four days straight. the sunset every day was breathtaking along with treats from the hotel at a frequent rate topped off with excellent service. down at the beach they have a team that nobody compares to. the beach staff is one of a kind. shoutout to ozzy and freddy working hard down there but also to the rest of the team they're always hustling.

title: LBKC
review: The beach was wonderful. The sand and water are both to die for. The water sports are a fun activity for any family to use, especially the peddle board. My favorite experience from the resort was the services they offered. Kerrington and zack helped me out greatly and made the day even better

title: Passover like never before
review: Passover was a great excuse to take this vacation. Coming down south is always the move and time after time I come to this resort and I'm never disappointed. The sunsets is priceless and the beach service is always so accomadating to what we want. We had a bed water front with drinks coming and got to nap during sunset. Jake and Freddy were the guys who set us up and they even put a cool design in the sand for us.

title: Great Friday
review: the newly added volleyball net is a great addition to the beach. it's super hot though so we needed to grab some umbrellas and the nice beach boys, freddy and jake, brought us some fresh towels and even some water they were super nice.

title: Peaceful way to Celebrate with Friends
review: This girl's birthday has to begin somewhere! 🎉☀ Such a peaceful, serene, way to begin our new Birthday year! We share birthdays by a couple days and we walked the beach and just took it all in! Longboat Key Resort knows how to treat you, even if it's not your birthday!!!  If you choose, you could be kayaking, SUP, arrange for parasailing or just lounging and listening to the lapping of the waves!! They will bring chairs, towels, umbrella, beverages, and lunch! Just ask!! Just delightful!!!! ☀😎🎉🥂

title: Great job!
review: The Pool staff is outstanding.  Very welcoming, friendly and helpful, especially Stacy.  Beach is beautiful, clear water and gentle sand.  Near St. Armand's Circle, Sarasota and airport.  Food could be better.  Big salt water pool.

title: LBKC
review: I loved the beach. The service was wonderful and the umbrellas provided us with a great amount of shade. The water is amazing and the sand feels so soft. Letting Tom helped us out greatly with a bed and helped us setup everything. Really appreciated it all.

title: Beautiful beach
review: I've have been coming to this resort with my family since I was little and we always spend most of our time at the beach. The beach staff always is very friendly al welcoming specially ozzi. I would highly recommend this resort to everybody in the USA and abroad !!

title: Family vacation
review: Lovely family vacation, very relaxing! The beach staff, including Ozzy, Jake and Leo, were very service oriented and made our stay even better. Highly recommend the Resort for a family beach vacation.

title: Great beach and staff!
review: The beach was absolutely beautiful! We had a great day and the staff was very friendly. Nevan helped us out, and he was very professional and outgoing! The family will be back again next year, and plan to spend more time at this great resort.

title: Look elsewhere!
review: While Longboat Key Club offers the amenities of a full scale resort, it feels dowdy and tired for an island locale, especially considering the vibrant growth taking place in Sarasota.    Also, service was disappointing. A member of our party tried to set up a singles tennis match with the on-site coach and was informed (by the coach) that he was not working (on the weekend). The garbage disposal was not working either and after scheduling a repair the night before, found that it still had not been repaired by noon of the following day. And after leaving our suite at 7:00 a.m. housekeeping had not been in the room when we returned that afternoon.   We were not offered a complimentary glass of wine or  ..... it seemed that guests were just not that important.

title: Our favourite resort
review: This was the 5th time we've stayed here, and we'll be back again next year. Spacious rooms, beautifully furnished. Attentive staff keen to look after you. The best location imaginable. Great food with plenty of options. A long stretch of white sandy beach visited daily by wild dolphins and manatees.  This place has it all.  I've stayed in a few resorts and hotels in the Sarasota area and this is head and shoulders above anywhere else I've stayed.  Love it and can't wait to go back.

title: Florida's best
review: The resort at LBKC is all around a beautiful place with great restaurants, spa and gym. Spending the day at the beach is a must do. The beach attendants are really nice and well trained especially Ozzy ! At the beach you can find beds on the front row including paddle boards and kayaks to make the most of your day.

title: Amazing Vacation
review: Me and my family had an absolutely amazing time at this resort.  Nevan was so professional and extremely helpful.  He helped us several days on our trip and even knew us by name the end of the trip.  The whole experience was 5 stars!!! We will definitely be back.

title: Awesome week
review: The beach is beautiful! Great service! Shoutout to Ozzy! Can't wait to come back!  One of the most amazing resort in Florida with pristine beach, great gym and spa. My family and friend we had the most amazing time we for sure will come back to this place !

title: Family vacation
review: This is the second time we visit the resort and the resort is even more beautiful that last year. The service at the beach has improved a lot and the beach attendants are super polite and friendly, especially Ozzy that took care of us. I would highly recommend the queen bed to every body out there

title: Great but ...
review: We had a wonderful stay at the Resort at Longboat Key. The location and the surroundings are fantastic. We had a junior suite with a view of the lagoon. Wonderful balcony and we enjoyed the privacy.   I must say I had expected more of this place!! The housekeeping could have been better and some of the staff members seemed very arrogant! Most staff members were really friendly as they should be! The beds and pillows were horrible. We had a king bed and it was way too soft. We both had back pain after four nights! Our kids slept in the sofa bed and that wasn't any good either!   That said I will absolutely come back and enjoy the resort.

title: Buyer Beware - Beach Umbrellas NOT included
review: Imagine this. A bed without pillows, a dining table without chairs, a beach chair without an umbrella. Fortunately, the resort still gives you pillows and chairs, but if you want an umbrella, you NOW have to pay an ADDITIONAL $25.00, over and above the resort fee. They made this change in the last few months and are hiding behind “that’s what other hotels do in Florida”. But here’s the interesting part. The Hyatt in Siesta Key DOES give you chairs and an umbrella as does the Ritz Carlton in Sarasota. I have been to hotels in Miami Beach that don’t include chairs or umbrellas because the beach is public and it’s not a service they provide (or charge for). But at the Longboat Key Resort, there are all kinds of rules because it is their beach (ie. no alcohol from any source other…

title: Hotel Quality Inn
review: We drove down to Sarasota for a family emergency.  The room was good but toilet way to low for us 6 foot people.  :).  It was clean and cleaned everyday.  One day guess too many of us were showing at the same time.  Maintenance was there about 5 min after my husband made the inquiry.  Was fixed in a matter of minutes and also fixed the window curtain.  Later on when returned to the hotel there was a twix with a thank you note for reporting the problems.  First time every that management responded in all the hotels I've stayed inside and outside the USA.

title: An amazing place with a few recommended changes
review: My family has been vacationing here for more than 10 years. It is an amazing place if you like a beautiful beach, spectacular sunsets, nearby access to terrific restaurants, and a wonderfully friendly wait staff (we love ania).  Each room has access to a little kitchen that you can stock at nearby supermarket.  Now for the recommendations.  First, stop nickel and diming your guests on the beach for umbrellas and extra chairs.  This is a major turnoff and the new beach staff do not have the same friendliness as the rest of the employees.  In fact, one removed a chair that we were not entitled to, so we would not accidentally use.  Second, bring back the old time favorite dishes at barefoots for lunch, like the Mediterranean salad.  The current options are not up to the same…

title: Needs refreshing
review: Had a 1 bedroom overlooking the beach. I thought it was supposed to be 400 sq. feet+; smaller than a typical hotel room. Looks like it's been 30 years or more since they renovated the room. Pillows were foam; cheap cabinets; not enough outlets, and way over priced for the "value". This is no Ritz (or even Hyatt). On a good note, ideal location, lots to do in the area (pool, beach, tennis, golf, small health club), etc.

title: Great Family Vacation
review: We were able to get a last minute reservation at the Resort at LKC.  We were suppose to travel to the east coast, but it looked like the weather was going to be rainy and chilly.  So glad we changed our plans to Longboat because the weather was perfect and the beach was amazing.  We stayed in a junior suite with a premium beach view.  The room was nice,  and it is always a bonus to have a kitchenette when the kids are traveling with you.  My only complaint--the pillows--not the most comfortable.  I am glad I brought my own pillow from home.  My favorite part of our stay was spending time on the beach.  I know some guests complained that you had to pay to use additional lounge chairs (use of 2 came with our room), umbrella, etc. on the beach.  It really didn't bother me because…

title: Beach Chair Bonanza
review: Dear Jan T: Thank you for being our guest and for taking to time to review your stay.  I am very happy that you found our employees to be nice and friendly and you had a great experience.  I apologize that you did not find the pillows comfortable.  There are varying likes of pillows, so we do have other options available upon request.   Glad you enjoyed the beach and understand the program and some of the reasons for it. Our main goal is to take great care of you.  We will be introducing optional packages this summer that include the umbrella for our guests that prefer to have it automatic.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Cheesy charges on beach now
review: Great place in general but you pay a lot for it which is fine.  Then they charge you a resort fee for the extras.  Okay I get that.  But now they charge you $25 a day for beach umbrellas too.   Sat there for hours and waitress never came by.  For these prices I'd expect more.   Think they are riding their laurels which will catch up eventually.   Probably a future management will take the hit.

title: Resort at Longboat Key DONT GO
review: Dear MichaelG2: Thanks for taking the time to review your beach experience. We do now charge for an umbrella usage at the beach as do many of the beachfront resorts in Florida. Our goal is to provide an ultimate experience which you will note is mentioned by other reviewers.   I deeply apologize that you did not receive the attention you deserve.  I would be happy to speak with you at any time to gain more details as I generally hear very positive remarks in this area.  If we missed an opportunity to take care of you, there’s no excuse and I can only say we work to provide excellent service on every occasion.  We review all guest reviews with our team in order to continue to improve.   I hope we will have the opportunity to see you again in the future.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Wonderful trip
review: visited for 4 days. Arrived and temperature outside was 50 degrees. In room it was 65degrees. Hotel sent engineer to fix thermostat but temperature remained at 65 degrees. At MIDNIGHT they changed room to one with two windows that could not be locked providing access to room.  We did get credit for 1 night but were exhausted from not getting to bed until 1am due to move.   Room was cleaned at 5 pm next day.   Understaffed, unhelpful. WOULD NEVER RETURN.   For big bucks there are much nicer places to stay on Longboat.

title: Really Great Hotel - will Stay there Again
review: Dear Qwertopwwty:  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay.  Our manager did meet with you while you were here and worked to resolve any concerns you had including issuing a credit as you mention.  If a guest has a concern, we take it personally and work to ensure better results going forward.  I hope you will give us a future chance to show you our dedication to service.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Poor service
review: Last month my wife and I stayed at the longboat key club.  Being from up north the break from the cold was very much needed.  We found the facility to be spectacular and will be returning next winter if not earlier.  The staff was very polite and helpful.  We took walks on the beach and dined at the club as well as local establishment and local favorites.  We found the pool bar to be very relaxing and had lunch a couple days.  Our server was Ed (a fellow Yankees fan) We enjoyed his hospitality and service.  I would recommend the longboat key club to anyone looking to get away.

title: Poolside Restaurant - sad sad sad attempt at lunch
review: Hard to know how you can make food this disappointing. Started the ball rolling with a watered-down tasteless Mojito. No dressing on the Cobb Salad. Had to ask for it twice. Blackened salmon had no flavor at all.  Dialogue at the end of the meal Staff: "How was everything?" Me:    "Well, thank you for asking but truthfully everything was awful." Staff:  "Oh" and she walked away.   The room and the beach were very nice. Way to wreck an otherwise lovely day.

title: Disappointing
review: Stayed with my family over spring break. The property is worn, not too clean and desperately understaffed. The jacuzzi was filthy with debris floating. The pool toilets hadn't been flushed in hours. You couldn't get an uber or a taxi in under a 1/2 hour. The restaurant staff was grouchy and slow slow slow. All I can say is fix it or forget it!

title: Way to go David!
review: We spent the day at the Longboat Key Club yesterday and had an absolutely fabulous time! Our pool boy David went above and beyond to make our stay was one to remember!  David is very polite and attentive and made sure our every need was taken care off.

title: Fantastic Resort Supported by Fantastic Staff!
review: Beautiful resort ... But what really makes this place are the people who work here. I'd like to point one out in particular who made my family's stay extremely delightful.  While you are at LBR ... Ask for David P. when you are hanging out by the pool or on the beach. He is a rare example of genuine courtesy and excellent work ethic from a young person.  David went above and beyond to make sure that me and my family were having a good time without being invasive or displaying an ulterior "sales" motive.   David had some great tips on how to enjoy what LBR has to offer ... We settled on the budget-friendly paddle boarding that my 5 year old (and myself) had a BLAST on!  We also got to go bike riding ... A complimentary service by LBR!  Wonderful young man ... We'll be actively…

title: A Total Find on the Gulf Coast
review: We’re back in New England waiting for the next blizzard, but just returned from a surprisingly delightful week at the Resort at Longboat Key Club outside of Sarasota. Recently we decided to explore the Gulf coast and picked the Resort at Longboat Key because it would be an easy trip from Boston and there was ample beach, tennis, and golf.   All I can tell you is that the place is incredibly well run and has an extraordinary service ethic that is genuine and seems to run straight from the top through every corner of the resort. I’m a high maintenance traveler and read all the room tips before calling reservations. They were incredibly accommodating, and as requested we got one of the top floors facing the gulf. Beautiful view, perfect location. The one bedroom suite was…

title: Staff  of Longboat Key Club
review: The staff of Longboat Key were very friendly and helpful.  For example, Nevin on the beach went out of his way to take care of my husband and me making our stay very pleasant.  Also, our room was immaculate daily…loved our cleaning woman!

title: 1yr wedding anniversary
review: We live locally and decided to stay in the area for our anniversary. Our greeting was excellent. We were also upgraded for free to a larger suite. We were  little disappointed when we realized the resort had separate buildings and it wasn't all connect, as we would have to drive or walk or get shuttled to places we chose to eat or to the spa. Our room was beautiful on the beach, it would of been nice to have the air turned down so we didn't want into the smell of stale air. The concierge sent us up a bottle of champagne and chocolate covered strawberries for our anniversary, was a nice surprise. Beautiful view of the. Each and easy walk. We later ate at the sands pointe restaurant which aka room service menu. Ambience was ok, food wasn't bad, salmon delicious. Mac n cheese don't…

title: Great location for R&R
review: Spent two nights at Longboat Key Club for a business meeting - this place puts first class in class.  First, the staff are incredibly helpful and friendly, from valet to beach wait staff, always a smile and "how can I help you."  This is the difference between a chain resort and a private club, members expect top notch service.  Room was spacious, we had a beach front room with kitchen, sitting area, large balcony, king bed and large bathroom/dressing area. Incredible views of the Gulf. Very clean and spacious.  The beach is exceptional. White sand and full service to you lounge chair or cabana.  Drinks, meals, towels, you name it, they are there to help you enjoy your visit.  Several exceptional restaurants and even the poolside serves great Florida southwest seafood.  Can't…

title: Fabulous!
review: Stunning resort, beautiful pool and grounds, great dining, live music and the most pristine beach. Our room was perfect. Great for people of all ages. Staff was attentive and friendly. We will return.

title: Amazing suite.
review: This is a lovely beach with calm water and well maintained sand.  The beach loungers are not cheap to hire but by the pool they are free.  The suite we were allocated was the best ever with a wrap around balcony overlooking an inlet - paradise.  The staff were amazing.

title: Great Family Vacation
review: My family just stayed at this resort and had a wonderful experience! We live in Florida and went on a little excursion up the road from our home. This is a great place for families with lots to do for both kids and adults. I highly recommend the beach and its crystal clear waters. Rent a cabana and your kids and have unlimited beach access to all the ocean toys, our favorite was the peddle board for our small son! Special thanks to Zac, Ozzy, Cheryl, and Nevan for their superior service. This is a wonderful resort with golf, spa, kids camp, pool, fire pits and a spectacular view! They have wonderful food and service and are only a short distance to the great shopping and eateries on St. Armands Circle. We will be returning, a great place by the Preferred Hotels Group!

title: Just The Right Touch
review: My wife and I celebrated our wedding anniversary at the Resort at Longboat Key this March. Rick Benninghove, Director of Resort Operations, put me in touch with Jennie Paul Gardner, the Pre-Arrival Concierge, to plan everything.  Jennie was perfect.  She knew just what I wanted - flowers for my wife, romantic dinners at first class restaurants, romantic boat cruise, sunsets - topped off with Jennie's surprise for us - champagne and chocolate covered strawberries as a welcome treat!  The Resort is awesome - both golf courses are terrific - greens and conditions are fabulous.  It is such an easy place to enjoy the beach, pool setting, fine dining and sunsets.  It has just the right touch and it's first class.  When you ask for Jennie, as an added bonus, get her to tell you about…

title: Imagine
review: Dear twinkie4104:  Thank you very much for the “5” review.  I appreciate your mention of me and especially your mention of Jennie.  She does a wonderful job of taking care of all the details so that you can concentrate on having fun and celebrating.  I am very pleased you had a great stay and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great service
review: Imagine going to a 4 star beach resort where you pay several hundred dollars plus a mandatory resort fee per night only to find that when you go to their beach you must pay an additional $20  for an umbrella, $10 for each chair. per day. plus a 7% sales tax and a 18% gratuity fee.  You then share the beach with the local beach club members.  Oh, the sign posting the rates also states that there are no refunds!  That is the Resort at Longboat Key!  As an alternative you can sit by the crowded,  smallish pool, elbow to elbow and hope you can fine shade under an umbrella for no charge.

title: Best paddle boarding ever !!!
review: Dear skm2010: Thank you for being our guest. I would like to respond to your comments so you have a better understanding of the services.  When you rent a suite from us, 2 chairs are included in the daily resort fee or a two bedroom suite includes 4 chairs.   Therefore, you do not need to pay the $10 per chair rate for those.  The umbrellas are $25 per day including tax and tip.  We do have all brand new furnishings and equipment throughout the beach and just fully nourished the beach in 2016.   Our goal is to give you excellent service while you are our guest.  Hope to see you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beautiful day for a round of 18
review: Started the DAy early this morning and went to play some golf, you could hear the birds chirping. After my round of golf was over I made it down to the beach to enjoy the afternoon sun. Plenty of front row seating available and Jake was there to take us too them. So peaceful here

title: Spa day!
review: Dear JasonM: Thank you for your “5” review.   Glad you enjoyed your golf and your afternoon at the beach.  Thanks for your kind mention of Jake.   We hope to see you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Resort Living
review: My time at this resort has been amazing. I spent all of one day in the spa it was wonderful and nu ch needed! Jake down at the beach really helped us out always there when we needed him! Drinks and food service here is quick.

title: The Beach is Back
review: Dear Pilgrim P: Thank you for your “5” review.  We are pleased you loved your time at the spa as well as the beach.   Thanks for your mention of Jake as well as the fast food and beverage service.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beach Help
review: Fantastic location on a beautiful beach.  Close to shops and restaurants as well as walking distance to the Chart House (excellent restaurant).  The Junior Suite was fairly large with a complete kitchen.  Our suite overlooked the Gulf with breathtaking views of the sunset. Excellent food. Very friendly and accommodating staff.  Unfortunately, didn't get a chance to play the golf courses or use the tennis courts.

title: Awesome time
review: Had the pleasure of visiting my mum recently. She is a member of Long Boat Key Club and suggested to spend a couple of days on the beach it was one of the best and memorable weekends of my life. The staff and amenities were fabulous and we were especially taking care of by David whom set us up with every thing we needed for the perfect day including the weather. Can't wait to come back!

title: Wow
review: Dear Victoria: I’m glad you enjoyed your time at the beach.  Happy to hear it was one of the most memorable weekends of your life!    Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Amazing beach experience again
review: I've been to the beach here before but this was by far the best experience I've had.  We had the beach bed right up front near the water. The service was great zach set everything up for us and Sherman came by and made sure we had everything we needed all day.

title: Gone are the clouds!
review: Dear ayyeeeitslyss: I am pleased you had such a great experience and Zach and Sherman took great care of you. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great sunny day!
review: I'm still amazed about how great the beach looks.  I came here not to long ago and the beach still looks great and Zach and Sherman were both still there providing great service as always.  Keep up the good work guys and we will keep coming back.

title: Amazing Experience
review: I had an amazing time with my partner, and I visited during the off-season to get away from the New York cold weather. The resort is fantastic and the beach is exceptionally clean. I had great service from the bar, David helped me get situated on the beach and took care of everything I needed while juggling other guests flawlessly. I loved it and I will definitely be visiting again. Stay classy Longboat Key.

title: Relaxing beachfront resort
review: Dear LucasCrews: Thanks for being our guest and we appreciate your kind mention of David as well as the food and beverage service.  We will see you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Perfect vacation
review: Third time staying here.  Lovely laid back resort with a lot of conveniences and excellent customer service.  Pool and beach service is the best anywhere.  Very polite, friendly and attentive especially Stacey who made our long days at the pool a real pleasure. Always checking that we were either in the sun or shade, whatever she could do to help us enjoy the day. Thanks, Stacey!

title: Great place to spend a few days
review: Dear cjf0901: Thank you for your review. Thanks for coming back for the third time and we hope to see you again soon. Thanks for your kind mention of Stacy and her commitment to service.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great Time
review: We stayed at the Longboat Key Club as a guest of one of the private Condo owners, and really liked the location. The weather was almost perfect for the time of year, with little rain and low humidity. There are advantages to renting directly from the Longboat Key Club, in that you get access to a lot more of the amenities. The restaurants don't take cash, so if you aren't staying on site, you can't eat at the establishments. It is little concern to the management, and I don't know how it plays into many of the restrictions associated with Longboat Key ordinances. there seem to be many dealing with real estate and rental properties. Of course, Siesta Key and Sarasota aren't far, and they will take all comers.

title: Jake
review: jack was really helpful today when my friends and i were on the beach. Every time we walked back out from the pool area or something he would always say "welcome back" and just something nice. he was really professional and was good with serving drinks and water sports

title: Perfect for Milestone Birthday Celebration
review: Dear Charlie W: Glad to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and Jake at the beach took great care of you. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Presidents Day!!
review: What a marvelous location to celebrate a milestone birthday! My wife surprised me with a long weekend trip to Florida and this special venue. The weather cooperated (except for one afternoon thunderstorm), so we were able to enjoy the pool and beach, plus play tennis a couple of times.  We enjoyed the daily breakfast buffet at the venue, and other meals in nearby locations in Longboat Key and Sarasota.

title: Beautiful location on the Gulf Coast
review: Dear Jerry L: IT is wonderful to hear that your wife chose us to stay with to celebrate your birthday. What a wonderful surprise.  Thanks for taking the time to share your experience and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Finally out of the cold!!
review: The weather couldn't have been better for this holiday. It was pretty windy the past few days but finally for this Monday at the beach the water was like a giant pool. The warm weather didn't even bother the sand as it stayed cooled in between my toes. Service from Freddy with the cherry on top for my Monday at the beach.

title: Wedding on the Beach
review: We traveled here for an invite to a beautifully displayed beach wedding of family.  It was breathtakingly beautiful as the sun was lowering for the day with the horizon tide in the background. The resort displayed a driftwood archway laced with sheer scarfing which softly swayed in the wind.  There was light music and ice water refreshed with fruit in it for guests as we waiting for the bridal party to arrive.  Tastefully done, but be advised to wear open toed shoes for the beach side wedding because the sand gets everywhere. After the ceremony, the pre-reception was poolside with appetizers hand delivered by servers and complimentary champagne.  By sunset we went inside for a smooth reception that was cozy for our party size and the perfect lighting set the scene.  The table…

title: Spendy- super nice rooms
review: Dear CafeLati: Sounds like you had a fabulous time here at the wedding.  We should hire you to write for our publicity team as you paint a wonderful picture in your description of the wedding ceremony on the beach as well as after events.  I agree it was breathtaking. Thank you very much for taking the time to share ! Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Jake was so helpful!
review: We stayed in the 6th building so not on the beach but a lovely view of the lagoon. Check in was quick and efficient, we took our vehicle over to the building - there was ample parking and the bell man met us at the building and took us and the luggage to the room. Gave us some ideas on what was where and we were on our own. The room is similar to an efficiency apartment with a full refrigerator, oven, stovetop, couch and chair and even a washer and dryer. The balcony overlooks the lagoon which has a beautiful view and very large with a chaise lounge and 4 chairs and a table.  We received a lovely note and a bottle of champagne to celebrate our anniversary! So thoughtful of them  Good place to celebrate an anniversary!

title: Jake was great!
review: Dear Kathy B: We greatly appreciate you being our guest and choosing to spend your anniversary with us.   The view from the lagoon view building is spectacular. I hope you were able to see one of the resident manatees coming through the lagoon while here. Thank you for your kind mention of the bellman and I’m pleased you loved your junior suite.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: weekend out of town
review: Jake was very helpful and friendly - he helped us set up our beach chairs and umbrellas! His charisma and positive attitude (despite the overcast weather) made my stay more enjoyable! Thanks again Jake

title: Perfect!
review: This location is perfect in every way!  Beautiful beach, outstanding food and wonderful staff.  Even on the crowded Christmas vacation week this resort runs like a well oiled machine.  They know what they are doing!  The rooms are large and comfortable, the beach is calm and relaxing.  The only thing that could be improved is that the pool is too small when the resort is full.  It was impossible to get a chair at the pool if you didn't arrive a breakfast time.  That being said, just a few steps away is a lovely beach with plenty of chairs and umbrellas.  (note that they try to charge for the chairs and umbrellas but if you just say you are all set, you can walk down the beach and find your own chairs and umbrellas without having them set up especially for you.

title: Beach Experience
review: Dear momdadplus: Thank you for being our guest. Glad you enjoyed your time with us and found the location perfect and the food outstanding and staff wonderful.  Christmas week is one of the busiest weeks of the year, so like any Florida resort, the pool becomes prime real estate. As mentioned, we have a great amount of beach furnishings so as to always be able to accommodate our guests.  The beach does require check-in upon arrival.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Tropical paradise in Florida
review: The beach set up was wonderful. The staff was welcoming and wonderful especially Zak Robinson who was our beach attendant. Zak couldn't have been more attentive and helpful. The staff repeatedly stop by to see if we were ok or if we needed anything.

title: Perfect weekend
review: Dear maryannocco: Thank you for the “5” review. I am very pleased you enjoyed your time with us. I will be sure to thank Zak for being helpful and attentive.  Hope to see you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: the beech makes up for the concrete towers of Lonboat Key
review: Beautiful rooms, beaches,pools,  restaurants, golf courses, tennis courts and spa. We enjoy our stay at the resort - as we have been going here for 27 years - we love the area - the resort offers all the above plus you are a few minutes away from St. Armand's circle, Lido Key - plus great restaurants and shopping.

title: A great time off
review: We are staying at the Longboat Key Club and are enjoying the fantastic scenery at this amazing location. We get the best service anyone can imagine and extraordinary special attention from Nevan and the rest of the beach gang. We will sure be back.

title: Great beach resort
review: Dear Guest:  Thanks for your review and for mentioning the fantastic scenery and amazing location.  I’ll pass along your kind comment concerning Nevan.  We look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Terrific resort
review: Been coming here many years and love the place but the recent improvements on the beach make it even better New daybeds, loungers, deck chairs etc have made a big difference to the look and overall comfort of the resort The beach staff , particularly Nevan do a great job too No.1 in Sarasota by a long way

title: Best beach - Best service
review: Dear Martin T: Thanks for continuing to be our guest over these many years. I am pleased that you enjoyed all of our recent additions to the beach and that Nevan took great care of you.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Worth a serious look
review: The resort at LBKC is by far one of the best resorts in Florida. My family and I were really impressed by the high standard of service provided by the whole staffing. The pool bar and barefoot restaurants are great and the food outstanding. At the beach the attendants are constantly coming to check if we are making the most of our day. Ossie at the beach was really friendly and welcoming.

title: Top notch resort
review: This is my third time staying the the resort and I love it so much ! The front desk staff was courteous and welcoming. We spent most of our time at the beach. There was a member at the beach team called Ozzy the went out his way to make our stay great ! He gave us a lot of information about local restaurants and he even printed the restaurants menus for us! That is what I call great service !!

title: Beachplace Short Term Rental
review: Dear SusanW: Thank you for the “5” review and or being our guest.  I am pleased you had an excellent 3rd stay with us and you found the hotel front desk team to be very welcoming and courteous.  Thanks for your kind mention of Ozzy. Great to hear he was so resourceful for you.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Special weekend
review: We rented a beachfront condo for the month of January. The location on the long white sand beach is perfect.   We rented a two bedroom two bath condo. The views were spectacular. The balcony was very large. The kitchen had been nicely updated and the beds were comfortable. The place was very clean.   There is a large heated pool and a large hot tub that can comfortably hold 8 adults.  There is a gate with a 24 hour attendant and covered parking.   The location is close to golf course, shopping, restaurants, drug sore and grocery.   Management was very quick to respond and helpful. We had trouble with the Internet service and a broken blender. Both problems were addressed immediately.  Those being the worst problems we had in a month I have to say it was a great experience and we…

title: Nice property - nice staff
