review: Dear Wendy B: Thank you for taking the time to review our Vacation Villas longer term rentals are and Beachplace.  It is wonderful to see that you loved your unit and location and I’m very pleased you will return next year. I am pleased that Gordon and his team were able to solve the Internet and blender challenge right away and you enjoyed your time with us.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Best Place For Vacation!
review: I stayed at the resort for the weekend and we had a great time. The drinks at the pool bar are great and the food at barefoot is outstanding. The service at the beach is second to none. Look for Ozzy and he will give you a great deal on the beds !

title: Lovely accommodations and attentive staff
review: This is our second visit to the Resort at Longboat Key.  We love the location!  Our suite had a nice size kitchen, a living-dining area, and a large bedroom with balconies overlooking the pool and the beach on the Gulf. The staff, from the front desk to the pool to the beach to maintenance and housekeeping were all very good and very pleasant. Stacy at the pool was amazing, setting up chairs and umbrellas when she saw people arrive (rarely did we have to find her) and providing bicycles upon request.  The resort is close to St. Armand's Circle which is super for shopping and restaurants. Go the other way and there is a Publix supermarket and restaurants not too far up the road. I highly recommend this hotel!

title: Nice place to relax...
review: Dear Antietam788: Thank you for your “5” review and for being our guests.  I am very pleased that you loved your spacious suite and the location.  Thank you for your kind mention of the front desk, pool and beach staff, housekeeping and engineering.  I will also thank Stacie for you.  Thanks for recommending us and we will see you soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Jewel on the Gulf Coast!
review: Straightforward and nice all around! Great place to relax with your significant other - more so than if with kids. The pool attendants were very nice and helpful - especially Stephaney. Lot's of nice views and places to relax. Leave the kids home and enjoy the ocean views!

title: Great Service, Great Location
review: Dear TonyB: Thanks for the “5” review.  Glad you found our resort nice and relaxing.  We are great for couples as well as families and with our property and beach being so spacious there’s a relaxing spot for everyone.  We hope to see you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Home Away From Home
review: What makes a great vacation for us?  Beautiful views, pristine private beach, great location, beautiful pool, super golf course.  What makes it special is that the staff is so accommodating and friendly.  All you have to do is ask and they try and make it happen.  Thank you, Tina, for helping me make our reservation and choosing Building 1 for us.  Perfect!  Linda, at the front desk, is always super friendly (as is everyone at the desk)  Stacey at the pool will set you up and make sure the sun is always where you want it to be:)  Vincent couldn't be any nicer -- keep those cocktails coming!   Ken and staff at the pro shop are welcoming and eager to help you in any way they can.  And finally, if you want a beautiful respite from the elements, see Shelly.at the spa.  She is as…

title: Winter getaway
review: Stayed at the resort for 5 days and everything was wonderful. The service in the restaurant, bar, pool and beach was excellent. Jake, on the beach, was extremely helpful. I highly recommend staying here.

title: Awesome trip
review: Thank you for the "5" review!  Glad to hear service at the restaurant, bar and pool and beach were all excellent.   We hope to see you again soon.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Weekend get away
review: Top notch resort, very clean and friendly staff, the pool bar makes great drinks that won't let you stay away from the pool, big thanks to the beach team for the great deals on the day beds. At the beach you'll find Ozzy the will make sure you make the most of your day! Thank you guys !!

title: Needs some refurbishment
review: Dear Brittany:  Thank you for the "5" review!  Glad you found the resort to be top notch and the staff friendly.  We hope to see you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: We love it here!
review: The resort at LBKC it is a 5 star resort the staff is super well trained and the facilities are spectacular. The beach attendants are constantly making sure you are having the best experience at the beach. Big shout out to Ozzie for taking care of us. Highly recommended the fish tacos at barefoot !!

title: Resort experience
review: First time visitor at the LBKC and I had the most amazing time. The rooms are beautiful and spacious, the pool bar and the restaurant called barefoot is outstanding. Best drinks I had in a long time you will find it at the pool bar and the most amazing service by Ossie at the beach. I will definitely will come back !!

title: Wonderful weekend
review: Dear NatalyB:  Thank you for the kind review. Glad you found the rooms spacious and the bar and restaurant outstanding and you had the best drinks you've had in a long time. We hope to see you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: All around amazing club!
review: I visited the resort for the first one this week running away fron the cold weather of Utah, I had a great time at the beach and I would highly recommend the drinks made at the pool bar and having lunch at the beach, awesome work by the beach team especially Izzy for taking care of me.

title: Day at the beach
review: Dear Ambiem5: Thank you for your "5" review.   I am pleased you had a wonderful 1st experience with us and you loved the drinks at the bar as well as the beach.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Sad to be going home
review: There's so much to do here from the tennis courts to golf to the beaches never can get bored! Always something good too eat great restaurants on resort. Jake down at the beach set us up and a nice spot and was so helpful! Can't wait to come back!

title: Great beach & golf
review: This is a resort in the true sense of the word. It has a beautiful golf course & a great beach.  Offers a variety of room selections, restaurants on premises, etc...points of interest might be Cortez Fishing Vill, The Ringling (museum of art) Museum of Whimsey, Siesta Key, Casey Key, Ringling School of Art and Design...FYI: Traffic can be terrible during season!

title: New Years Eve Miss
review: Dear 144gmdlbk Thank you for being our guest. Great to hear you loved the resort including the golf course and beach.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Stacie
review: Do not recommend for visits.  Likely nice for member but if it's your first stay you get to figure it out on your own.  Clean but dated.  Expensive but average.  Golf is ok but not worth the price.  24 hour tee time rule for resort guests is ridiculous, what if you cannot play when you want within a 2 hour window after traveling from out of town.  What if you cannot get a tee time?  Nice but no where near the expected level for the price paid.  Service was adequate at best.  Information about where to drop clubs, how to get to event locations, etc very difficult.  Beware of the Web presentation of the facilities, it is far from reality.  Disappointed but not unhappy.  Had a great time regardless but it could have been much better for the price.

title: Pool and beach accommodations were terrific!
review: Dear Chris K: Thank you for taking the time to review your time with us. I am truly sorry you did not enjoy your time.  It is very important that our team reviews the entire property during the checkin process and  it sounds from your explanation that did not happen.  We want our guests to be very aware of the entire property and all that we offer.   I do have a very different opinion of the facilities than you as I am aware of millions of dollars spent to continually upgrade the facilities including all new golf courses, new spa, new fitness equipment, all new beach furnishings, etc.  Glad you enjoyed your stay in spite of your concerns and I hope you will consider returning in the future.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Family vacation
review: Stacey has given the best hotel hospitality and definitely kept a smile on my face. She was extremely sweet and kind at the towel bar and can definitely hold a great conversation. Super beautiful and had a great time at yalls facility.

title: Wedding Weekend
review: Checked into Resort at Long Boat Key for a close friends wedding  and immediately felt like we were in paradise. We were promptly greeted by Susan at the front desk who was efficient and beyond friendly giving us great recommendations for spots to eat, shop, etc. Our room was absolutely perfect from the layout to the private ocean (gulf) view balcony. We enjoyed our first day on the beach with excellent service. Jake & Ozzi greeted us as we walked down the boardwalk to the resorts beach and set us up with our towels, chairs, etc and anything else we may have needed for the day. They were both extremely professional and courteous tending to any request by us or other patrons. This resort is even more wonderful than I had expected and I believe it has to do with the excellent…

title: Overall experience over the years
review: Dear Marissa B:  Thank you for being our guest and for the kind review.   I appreciate your recognition of Susan at the front desk as well as Jake & Ozzie at the beach.  We greatly appreciate that you are willing to recommend our resort to others as well.  We look forward to seeing you again.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great stay, but stay away from the spa
review: We have been going to the resort for 30 years and sadly over the last 3/4 years we have seen it decline in overall standards. It certainly no longer should have the star rating that it has always had. The pool is small and very dated and from Thursday to Sunday it is often crowded with drinkers and in some cases smokers sitting around it and in it. If this is what you want then it is fine but we know it as a very different experience. Equally, they are now charging high prices for the sun beds and umbrellas on the beach which were previously free. The beach is still beautiful after having been re nourished but having to now pay for the sunbeds reduces the enjoyment. We have always looked for peace and tranquillity and now the culture has changed completely with much larger…

title: 2017 here we come
review: Dear maryjane2017: Thank you for sharing your observations. We greatly appreciate you having been our guests over these 30 years.   I'm sorry you found the pool crowded while here. Over the Christmas week, there are more families here than other times of the year.  Dues to this we have greatly expanded our beach operation so you can always find a quite space there to enjoy.  I hope you will return and we will have an opportunity to show you that the service and facilities continue to be updated and expanded .  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: New Year's Eve!
review: Came for NYE weekend.  Susan at the front desk was particularly wonderful, but each of the employees we encountered (at the beach, at the pool side restaurant, room service attendants) were  friendly, positive, and helpful.  Our room in Tower 2 had an amazing view, especially for sunsets.  The furnishings were in great shape; the room was very clean.  Only odd thing room-wise was when we asked for decaf coffee, we got K-cups.  Problem was the room had a traditional coffee maker.  We twice asked for either a Keuring pot or proper decaf for the coffee maker we had - it was promised twice and never delivered.  That is a small thing, of course.  The larger dissatisfaction was with the spa.  My wife and I had massages booked.  Her 50 minute massage was, I guess, very efficiently…

title: Great Tennis Resort!
review: Susan at the tennis gardens makes it easy to sign up and play every day if you want.  While we stayed, they offered daily strokes and strategy classes every morning and every afternoon they offered classes which focused on a specific part of the game. So for example, one day may be a beginner clinic, the next day a doubles clinic, then an advanced drill class the following day.  You can also fill out a card with your play level and preference for singles/doubles/mixed and they will find you similar players to hit with. I’m a 4.0 player and played doubles with two local members and another resort guest and we had a fun competitive match. The resort has a free shuttle to the tennis gardens so you’re able to catch a ride over whenever you need. They also have tennis courts within…

title: New Year Vacation
review: Got a chance to stay at the Resort at Longboat Key Club for this winter holiday season and was treated to absolutely fantastic service by Nevin from the beach staff. He was always the first to offer his assistance in helping us set up on the beach and finding anything that the club had to offer. Definitely will come back looking for more treatment like Nevin's!!!

title: Best beach & service
review: The beach is beautiful, the food is tasty and the staff is friendly. The beach boys, Nevin, Jake, and Ozzi are always polite and eager to help. We love it here, and highly recommend it to anyone wanting an unforgettable experience.

title: Great service!
review: Big shoutout to Jake at longboat key resort! Quick to help me set up my things and was right there every time I needed him! Definitely will be back again. The beach is clean and well maintained and the chairs umbrellas and towels were in great condition

title: Happy new year!
review: We started our trip right on the beach! Jake and oozy set us up right with two umbrellas made sure we were shaded Nikki at the pool is so sweet and kind always is smiling. Love the food and the service can't wait for the new year

title: Beautiful Resort with Fantastic Service
review: I have been coming to LBK for close to 30 years. Four years ago my family joined the Longboat Key Club & Resort.  The level of hospitality and service is absolutely unparalleled.  Besides the golf (which is amazing) the beach club is my favorite aspect.  I want to specifically mention a member of the beach staff named Jake.  As someone who frequently travels for work and pleasure, I can confidentially say Jake is a consummate professional who goes out his way to accommodate guests.    It's a pleasure and very reassuring to know LBK Club has staff members like Jake.  10/10!

title: Vacationer
review: LOVED IT!!!! my favorite place ever. jake and ozzy were so helpful. The service is great. Coming back every year!!!! The beach is beautiful and the water is so nice. can't wait to come again! the food is also so good too!!

title: Vacation at the beach!
review: Every year me my family come down for Christmas! None of the years compared to this one. The beach is huge! Jake and ozzy gave us a beautiful setup on our own section of the beach! The rooms have the best views of the gulf! I beat my family in tennis eeryday

title: Long boat key club beach
review: The beach has improved a ton in the last year or so. It went from being a very small sliver to a large and beautiful beach. The service was very good, a young man named Jake was very helpful. Overall, I would definitely recommend it to a friend.

title: A few days in Paradise
review: The beaches in this part of the gulf are all amazing, but the paradise that arises from the activities that are present at this resort surpass any other key on the gulf. We got assistance with all out of needs on the beach including food and beverage along with water sports. The guys that we were lucky to have were Ozzy and Freddy to help us out with everything we needed in the best place on Earth.

title: Soak up the sun
review: The brand new beach is just amazing. Freddy and oozy set up some chairs for us that we're comfy fell asleep for 2 hours! Jake make sure we always had some clean towels in hand. Always something to do here from golf too tennis courts just the best!

title: Life on Longboat
review: Dear Wittlinger G: Thank you for being our guest. I am very pleased you enjoyed the beach as well as the golf and tennis.   The beach renovation with all new sand was completed this summer and I agree it is just amazing!  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: christmas paradise!
review: Visiting my grandparents is awesome seeing how they live. For breakfast we went down to Barefoot Grille and headed straight to the beach. Ozzie set us up near the water and my grandpa got us some awesome paddle boards for an hour that Freddy and Jake set up for us. Once it got to sunset we went up to our balcony and it was the prettiest sunset I've ever seen.

title: New Years Week at the best beach on the Gulf!!
review: Dear abbygalew:  Thank you for your kind review. I am pleased you had such a great experience and Ozzie, Freddy and Jake were able to make a positive impression on you.  Sounds like a great day, Barfeoots for breakfast, Beach, Paddleboards and sunset from the balcony.  We hope to see you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: My little slice of heaven
review: huge thanks to jake and izzy for making our beach experience. they set us up right on the waters edge with our own private section of the beach. the food here is amazing i got the wings and needles to say i had them all week! freddy sent us out on paddle boards and we even saw some really big fish was awesome.

title: Beach is great!
review: It'd been a while since I had been to the longboat key resort Beach they have done great things here.  The servers were friendly and the beach attendant was very courteous and helpful.  Thank you so much Zach and Cheryl!!!!   Well if you made our afternoon very memorable and fun experience we will come back

title: Day at the beach
review: I have been a member for over 5 years and we love coming to the beach. Every weekend my friend and I spend the day at the beach we have the most amazing time. The server keep coming with awesome drinks and the service at the beach is impeccable. Thank you to the beach team for taking care of us especially Ozzie

title: I'm dreaming of a sandy christmass!!
review: We spent a good amount of time at the marina I love the scenery there. After trying out the bar and the grille at the pool I headed down to the beach to tryout the paddle boards. The water was calm but I left myself drift too far and ozzy and Leo came to the rescue. I didn't give up on the water sports though. Jake and Freddy later set me up with the pedal board that's pretty interesting to take out. Once the day was over we had dinner near by at the Chart House then came back to the hotel for the a great atmosphere. The rooms are outstanding and the service is five star quality.

title: Great weather, even better service
review: My favorite part of my stay was easily the beach. The tennis and golf is great throughout the day but not nearly as relaxing as the beach. We got the bed package so once we had enough sleep on the beach we got an hour of paddleboarding. Since the water is so calm in the gulf I just let the board flow during sunset and it was pure tranquility. Freddy was the one who let me know about the deal of the bed package and Ozzy and Jake's service made the five star feeling last through out the day.

title: Family weekend
review: Every time I come to spend my day at the resort I have a great time, the people are really friendly and the atmosphere is truly great. The inside restaurant is outstanding with great food and service. The beach team always makes-sure my set up is in time before I arrive to the beach. Big shout out to OZZY that always makes sure you get everything you need . I love this resort.

title: Family vacatio
review: Every time we visit the resort at LBKC it's great. The beach is beautiful with brand new chair, umbrellas and beds. The poolside restaurant called barefoot it's spectacular. Big thanks to Ozzy at the beach that made our day special. I would highly recommend the resort to all my friends and family !

title: christmas vacation
review: the rooms were just recently refurbished. along with that refurbishment came a new beach. i had a great time on their new pedal board it's like a bike on the water. shout out to jake and freddy for making our time at the beach great.

title: Christmas on LBK
review: Loved our time here!! Jake and Freddy (chair crew) were so friendly to our family my children loved them and playing in the sand :) The new chairs are so nice and the new beach is terrific as well! We spent the day find sand dollars and sitting at the bar! Definitely coming back next year!

title: Christmas at the beach
review: This beach is just none the less amazing! Ozzy set us up with a beautiful spot on the beach we even saw some manatee. Jake and Freddy sent us out on some paddle boards and we just had a blast. The rooms are huge you feel at home!

title: Christmas at the beach
review: being from the north, having sun during winter is great. with the great whether there comes several things to do. there's tennis with a restaurant. the barefoot grille that is outdoors and the BEACH!! the came with great service from Freddy and Jake.

title: Christmas vacation at LBKC!
review: My family and I have been members for years we love coming to the club. Never a dull moment here always something to do from tennis to the pool even golf! The food is amazing and service is great ally really knows the menu! Big thanks to Jake and Freddy for awesome set up.

title: CAN'T WAIT TO GO BACK TO THE RESORT AT LONGBOAT KEY!
review: Everything about this resort is top notch.  We couldn't have asked for a more perfect way to spend our vacation.  Played tennis almost every day at the Tennis Gardens a short drive away (you can play on site as well) which had har-tru courts that were very well maintained and a pro shop with awesome ladies able to match you up with other players or clinics.  The pool attendants at the resort are always available to set you up with chairs, umbrellas and anything you need.  A big shout out to Stacey and Allie at the pool who were so friendly and helpful every day of our stay!  The rooms are impeccably clean and the beach is beautiful. Memorable vacation for sure!

title: Enjoyable, but plan ahead
review: My wife and I stayed here in a 1 bedroom suite with a golf course view.  Nice accommodations overall.  Here are some tips:  1.  Make your tennis clinic or lesson reservations early.  Don't wait until you arrive.  If you want to play with other members or guests give them your name at the pro shop.  2.  Know that the resort is also really a country club.  The staff is very helpful and nice, but understand it isn't all about the resort guests.  The club members must stay happy too.  3.  I found the golf courses to be very nice.  You pay for the convenience.....about $150 for 18 holes.  You can't walk the course until 3pm.   Even at the High price I found it a reasonable value as the course conditions were excellent.  Also, plan ahead.... They seem to cater to members first.  4. …

title: Short winter holiday
review: This was our first time in the longboat key area and we were very impressed. We checked in Thursday December 15th and checked out Sunday December 18th. The beach beautiful and the room was just what we needed. We were in a junior beach suite. The service throughout the resort whether it was Steve or Diane at the pool or the manager at the front desk was spectacular. We had one frustrating moment with the fact that we had two separate reservations for our stay but the manager worked it out to our satisfaction very easily. I would highly recommend this resort to anyone.

title: Longboat Key Club Sarasota
review: It was my first time at this resort in Sarasota, l absolutely loved the place. Great facilities, we are big tennis fans and they have a wonderful club there. Also a beautiful golf course. The rooms are very well equipped and very comfortable. The pool , beach, restaurant, bar are all really good. I would definitely recommend this place. And we will definitely return. Also the staff are very knowledgeable and friendly.

title: Still amazed!
review: Me and my family have been members at the club for years. We love all the restaurant that the resort offers, not to mention the great service. Cheryl always makes sure we have a cold beverage in our hands. The rooms are so elegant and the view are breathtaking. Jake and Freddy set up a beautiful queen size bed for us. We were even able to get some water sports we saw dolphins out in the water that Ozzy was able to point out. So many great memories!

title: The best resort
review: Dear Jlgrosbach:  Thank you for the “5” review.  I am pleased you found our service to be great as well as the suites. Thanks for your kind mention of Cheryl, Jake Freddy and Ozzy.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Destination Wedding
review: My girlfriend and I decided to come back after our graduation. We stayed in a suite the service for cleaning the rooms was great they left the room looking spotless. We're both tennis fanatics so we headed to the courts with the restaurant which is something new. To end the weekend we went to the beach where ozzy hooked us up with a great beach bed package. Shoutout Freddy and Jake for their top notch service. Also the BLT was great.

title: Family vacation
review: Dear Matt G: Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest.   Thanks for mentioning that housekeeping did an excellent job with your suite and I’m pleased you enjoyed tennis as well.  Glad you also got some beach time in with Ozzy, Freddy and Jake as well.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Friends night out
review: We stayed at the Longboat Key Club Resort for a friends wedding. Beautiful setup, spacious rooms. Dining at the resort makes me feel very pampered. Our room overlooks the pool and ocean.   Was able to schedule time at the spa for a mani/pedi and was treated to a very relaxing afternoon. My husband and I will definitely come back.

title: Awesome resort
review: Great place to come with your family and friends. The staff is really friendly and helpful. Drinks are the bar are amazing. Big thanks to the pool and beach staff especially Ozzy. We will be back for sure

title: Top notch service
review: Dear Chase V:  Thanks for your review. Happy to hear you enjoyed the drinks from the bar and service at the beach.   We hope to see you again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY !!!!!!!
review: The resort at LBKC it is an all around great place. The bar and spa are awesome and the staff really friendly. At the beach they have beds for rents and they are extremely comfortable. Big thanks to Ozzy that took care of us at the beach.

title: A holiday to remember
review: Dear Sarah K: Thank you for being our guest and for the thoughtful review. I am pleased you enjoyed the spa, bar and beach which here.  Thanks for your kind mention of Ozzy.  Look forward to seeing you here again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great Views, Great Staff and Lots to Do If You Dare to Leave the Beach
review: A. The room is no better than a new/upgraded Holiday Inn Express at best  B. Ocean front Jr Suite - $329 faces the "POOL" with the ocean in the background  C. Children SCREAMING at the pool, 8:45 in the morning  D. 8:45 AM, Called the front desk, asked to have someone go out and get the children to stop screaming   E. 9:30, called the front desk, got a manager who first asked me where the noise was coming from, then debated with me, as I mentioned "8:45" three times.  Then the idiot said;  Well it is 9:30..... all for $329 dollars!  F. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY. It's a re-painted old condominium with cheap towels and POOR MANAGEMENT

title: Very nice low-key place
review: Nice property with a beautiful beach!  Make use you do the all inclusive through the hotel directly so you can get drinks at the pool charged to your room. Same goes for the beach.  You have to pay for chairs on the beach and drinks, but you must be staying there with a room key. Not through a 3rd party.

title: Relaxing vacation
review: Dear NebrMiller: Thank you for being our guest.   Yes, you have to be a guest of the resort to utilize our facilities as we are a private resort.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Another wonderful stay
review: We stayed at the marina.  They have a lovely restaurant on site and offer transportation to the main resort for more options.  Great pool at the marina that is often quiet and not being used.  Staff is very friendly and helpful.

title: The pool towel girl
review: Dear Maria M: Thank you for your review of our marina. Glad you had a relaxing time and found everyone friendly and helpful. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Thanksgiving retreat
review: Lush grounds, impeccable service, beautiful beachfront suite, and conveniently located. Perfect spot to watch the sun set and fine, white sand beach for relaxing. Near St. Armand's for shopping and short car ride to other attractions (Mote Aquarium, Ringling Museum, Ca D'Zan, Downtown, Siesta Key Beach) for sightseeing. The restaurants on-sight are also great. A little piece of paradise.

title: Vacation
review: November is the 2nd best month to be in FL after April. The Resort at Longboat Key a terrific venue. Little bit dated but the beach and the entire resort amenities, restaurants and poolside services are easily make up for it. The staff is excellent and the service is 'top notch'. I've been around 'the block' a long time.The Pina Colada's are outstanding at the pool. Played golf at the Links at Longboat Key and the greens are nothing short of perfect(the blueberry muffins at the Snack Bar are phenomenal too). The on campus restaurants are excellent and the service is exceptional. Being in a gated community close to St Armand's Circle is just perfect for all shoppers. Great beaches and a great spot to enjoy life.

title: Disappointing!
review: Dear Geoffrey: Thank you for your excellent review. I am pleased that you enjoyed everything about our property from the amenities to the restaurants and that service was “top notch”. I do agree the greens are perfect.  We just completed a multi-million dollar renovation to the golf courses and they look amazing and play wonderfully.  We look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: LBKC Review
review: We spent 5 nights at the Resort. Uppon arrival with own car: friendly reception by porters. Akward lady at the front desk, however. First impression did not meet the high expectations raised by travel agent and comments from magazines. Place looks rather run down and is not classy by far. The resort consists of various buildings. Our room (Junior Suite) was okay. Kitchen with Friede and washing machine (both old). Bathroom old with tub only, which needs replacement. Has seen better days...... Very small pool and pool area with no view on the beach and the sea. Surrounded by the various buildings. Beach is nice: wide with white and powdery sand. Restaurant facilities are poor. The Sands Points is nothing special. Neither is the so called best restaurant Portofino at the…

title: Expensive but great.
review: Dear Peter B: Thank you for sharing your opinions of the resort.  I am truly sorry you did not enjoy various aspects of the resort.  This is certainly an exception to our primarily extremely positive reviews received by our guests.  I hope we will have another opportunity to have you as a guest. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Romantic Getaway
review: Bacchus event superb, our first one, will repeat. All property restaurants excellent. Facilities generally very good, but rooms need updating - especially bathroom, kitchen. Service people friendly and professional - especially Stacey at poolside who we found to be consistently courteous, cheerful, and exhibited a terrific work ethic.

title: Stacey
review: Stacey provided outstanding service, I've always loved staying at the hotel, my dad is a member, but never have I had an employee that provides such excellent service.  She's very nice and was always making sure me and my friends were enjoying our stay.

title: Goood hotel
review: Dear KenJL:  Thank you for the “5” review. I am pleased you have always enjoyed your stays at the hotel and thank you for your kind mention of Stacey and her excellent service.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: New Beach Looks Great
review: I loved the hotel. The room service food was good. The beach was nice, but the pool might have been better because of the pool tenant Stacey. She was very helpful with towels. She was there to lend a helping hand with any questions or concerns I had.

title: Luxury queen size bed!
review: Dear MattiasR: Thank you for your “5” review. I am very pleased you loved your stay with us from the food, to the beach to the wonderful service from Stacey at the pool.  We look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beach day at longboat
review: They have finally fixed the beach and it looks amazing.  Not only does the new beach look great so does all their new beach equipment... along with all the new things on the beach the one thing that has stayed the same is their amazing service. Thank you Zach, Ozzy, and Sherman for making my day amazing.

title: Beach day
review: I'm from the cold and not used to the beautiful beaches in Florida. I had heard that siesta had the best but honestly longboat topped it. Longboat comes with service from guys like Freddy and Ozzy who make everything way better.

title: Lovely day at beach
review: Dear Stephanie P: Thank you for your very kind comments.  I agree that our new sand is beautiful as well as soft and powdery.  Thanks for saying that it tops Siesta Key.  Freddy and Ozzy thank you for your comments as well.  See you next time.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: New beach!!
review: The new beach that was added comes with great new equipment the best part are the new queen size beds. This time when I stayed here I got a queen size bed that came with an extraordinary amount of amenities. Huge shout out to Ozzy and Freddy for making my day at the beach lovely.

title: best beach ever
review: Dear Khysa D:  Thank you for your review and for being our guest.  Glad you enjoyed the beautiful new beach and all the new equipment that comes along with it.  Thanks for the kind mention of Ozzy and Freddy for their efforts.  See you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Best family vacation!
review: The new beach that they added stretches out to the horizon creating a white field of softness. At sunset the orange sky kisses the ocean and causes a vacation aroma of soft colors. Last time I came I didn't think it could get better but the arrival of the new sand proved me wrong. The new beach is outstanding along with the service of Ozzy and Freddy who make purchasing the equipment worth it.

title: Bliss
review: On a recent trip to Florida stayed at the Longboat Key. Beautiful Hotel and complex right on the beach.   The rooms are very well appointed, with a small kitchen, inclusive of all the necessary hardware. Very useful if you shop down in the local Publix 2 miles down the road. It's nice one night, to get a good big roast chicken and trimmings from the Store and with a lovely bottle of wine, sit out on the balcony and enjoy the most relaxing sounds of the sea and beautiful serene views. Truly relaxing. And then all dishes into the dishwasher.   On the practical side, the bathroom is excellent, separate changing area with wardrobes between the bathroom and bedroom area. And a full size clothes washer dryer complete with washing powder available in the room.   The balcony area is…

title: Always enjoyable, showing its age, needs local competition.
review: Dear bemoBelfast: Thank you for your very kind review.  We appreciate you being our guest.  I am glad you enjoyed your suite and were able to enjoy the balcony as well.    Thanks for mentioning the staff being excellent as well as the positive experiences you enjoyed at the restaurants and the beach.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Old and Overpriced. 1 star hotel.
review: We have stayed here several times before and I could write the same review again, nothing much has changed.  We enjoy our stay because we love Sarasota.  The choices for a quality beach hotel in the area are limited.  Competition is coming but it will be from the same owner so we will have to wait and see.  The rooms here still need upgrading and extra charges continue to creep in (do you want to bake in the sun or pay extra to get an umbrella?) even though there is already a resort fee on the bill.  I wish I could be more enthusiastic!  My rating would be lower if there were other choices around.

title: not a golf resort.... be forewarned
review: Dear David S: Thank you for being our guest and for your review.  We do appreciate you returning each year as our guest and respect your observations.   We do include beach chairs (2 for all guests and 4 for two-bedroom suites) on the beach included in the resort fee.  We do charge for the umbrellas on the beach as is customary and many beach resorts in Florida.   I know our General Manager communicated with you while you were our guest and we do hope you will decide to return.    The town just completed a Beach Sand re-nourishment with the most soft powder sand I have ever seen. It’s amazing.  We just finished an entire complete beach upgrade with all new padded lounge chairs, larger umbrellas, cabana covers, beach beds, watersports equipment, children’s play area, volleyball net, fire pits, and other beach play equipment. We feel the modest umbrella charge will aid us in constantly maintaining this equipment in pristine condition and offering top notch service as well.  Take a look on our website “Beach Cam” to view this area.  Our owner also spent millions of dollars doing a complete renovation to our 45 holes of golf and we now have the best looking courses in the state.  Ownership also fully remodeled the spa when they took over our property and expanded the fitness facilities and programs.  We have re-carpeted the suites and added many other upgraded amenities in the suites and are in the planning stages of a suite remodel.   Thank you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great service!
review: Haha. Guys! I found a place to play my VHS tapes😂😂😂 in the room, imagine they have vhs players. As for the hotel umm in 1960 i would give this resort 4 stars, now its soooo dated only 2 stars. Pool tiny filled with oldies, beach not like on the pictures at all. They do charge extra for everything including beach umbrellas n chairs (100$)  we paid 500$ + for beachfront and got some stinking room overlooking crowded pool. The furniture must be from 1940 also. Very dissapointed. Better go to Marco island Marriot or stay in Naples. Longboat resort just waste of money.

title: GREED
review: This resort is getting greedy The rates of accommodation are not cheap , just paid over $ 500 per night plus taxes for a suite. There has always been a resort charge of $ 24 plus taxes per night for resort facilities. Starting this year they have now introduced a fee of $ 25 including taxes per beach umbrella and $ 12 per beach chair, meaning if a couple want to sit on the beach  for a day there is an additional charge of up to $ 75 per day, also beach beds have been down graded and luxury mattresses that we had last year have been done away with. What apart from free wi-fi is the resort fee to cover if not to cover the cost of sitting on the each. I will not be returning.

title: Pool experience
review: Dear David B: Thank you for being our guest.  The resort fee still covers 2 chairs (4 for two bedroom suites), so it is only the optional umbrella that is $25 including tax.  The rental beach beds still have a wonderful mattress to utilize and we are adding 15 more next week.  Everything on our beach is brand new as well as all new sand through nourishment.   As far as your question of resort fee it covers the following: Bicycles Local and Toll free calls On Property Individual Transportation  Scheduled transportation to St Armand’s Circle Use of Two Beach Chair Loungers (Four Beach Chair Loungers for Two Bedroom units) Towels and Chair Covers at Pool Key Card Charging Privileges Access to Concierge and Bellman Services  Notary Services Daily Newspaper Access to Business Center Library usage of Books and Media Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: they should build a statue of ozzy
review: Stacy at the pool was so attentive and friendly that it made our stay that much more enjoyable. She brought our towels and always greeted us with a smile! She stands out as an exceptional asset to the club.

title: Beach wedding
review: Dear Wendy2117: Thank you for your review.  I agree Stacy is an asset and does a wonderful job with our guests.  We are pleased to have her here.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Fantastic
review: I could tell you that the beach is back to its former glory after 2 years, as lbk club have transported 1400 trucks of beautiful white sand onto the beach.I could tell you that the club have replenished every blade of grass on their 18 hole course at the beach and the 3 , 9 hole courses by the marina. I could tell you that the lbk club have 20 state of the art clay tennis courts, where they hold the sarasota open. .I could tell you about the 6 restaurants or the marina.I could mention the wonderful spa.But hey forget all that because i'm going to say how great ozzy and stacey and jake are - just like all the other people that have only ever written 1 review.Its almost like staff are writting their own reviews.

title: Very lovely location
review: Stayed here for six nights and had a lovely time. The location is lovely, room was a suite that was big, clean an diver looked the bay where from our balcony we could see Manatee's in the water. Down side, the blocks are not the most attractive from the outside. Beach is lovely although they were doing work on it. Italian restaurant was excellent and service by the pool was great. I would recommend staying here in you're in Sarasota.

title: Beach service
review: Beautiful beach, dolphin viewing, wonderful sand and great service, specially by Ozzy and Kathia!! The beach set up looks great in the morning. Also the sunset are amazing and the beach attendants make you have an amazing time

title: Amazing resort!
review: Amazing views and the BEST Bloody Mary! So many dolphin sightings too. Jake and Ozzy have been so helpful and accommodating - thank you for ensuring that we're having a great time. We will definitely be back!!

title: Best vacation I've been on!
review: longboat key is needless to say just beautiful and all around amazing, sort of like the beach team at lbkc! jake and ozzy sent us out on some paddle boards that were brand new! they even showed us some spots where the dolphins hangout and eat! the water here is so calm ridding was a breeze

title: Best vacation I've ever been on
review: The team at the beach made my vacation!ozzy and Jake set us up in a huge queen size bed right near the water! It was a bit windy so they put us in a cabana to keep us shaded and out of the wind they're so helpful. The food here is amazing and service is really fast always a blast at he beach!

title: Best beach in Florida
review: Without any doubts the service at this resort is second to none. The beach attendants are constantly coming back to make sure you are having a great time. Ozzy took care of us and helped us with chair and umbrellas. I will come back to the resort in 2 weeks.

title: The queen size bed
review: I visited the resort at LBKC for 3 days with my friend and we have an amazing tine, There have been some changes in the beach and now they are charging and the beach, I would highly recommend the queen size beds they are extremely comfortable and totally worth the price, big shout out to Ozzy that took care of us

title: Jersey Girls Weekend Away
review: Our visit to Longboat Key was absolutely one of my all-time favorite destinations.  The rooms beautifully updated and comfortable!  Everyone we encountered from the restaurants to poolside made this a wonderful trip! I would especially like to shout out to Leo and Stacy for their exceptional service around the pool and on the beach!!!!  The beach at Longboat Key was most definitely one of the most beautiful beach settings I've ever seen. Definitely check out Mar Vista Restaurant while you are visiting the area.  Also would highly recommend the Italian restaurant owned by the resort.  Actually, every resort restaurant was delicious!  On our last day, we had a late flight and we were able to shower and change at the resort Spa.  The staff there was friendly and courteous and the…

title: Friendly and good service.
review: Quite big hotel with several buildings. We stayed in a nice size Junior Suite. Staff was friendly and the room was clan and very nice, every day. Outdoor facilities were fresh with several choices for lunch and dinner. Barefoot Bar was great with really tasty lobster salad.

title: Great Long Weekend
review: We had a great Thursday through Sunday visit at the LBKC.  We had been here about 25 years ago and were wondering how we would find things.  Everything exceeded our expectations!  They have done a great job in keeping this property up-to-date.  We had a superior junior suite in Building 4, level 3 which had a great Gulf view.  Nicely updated carpet and furniture.  The kitchenette was perfect for breakfast preparation and for snacks.  Bathroom was nice with two sinks.  Would have preferred a walk-in shower but the existing bathtub has a nice shower head and it is a very high quality tub.  Plenty of closet space.  Everyone was so eager to please.  Great service for the poolside bar and restaurant.  The beach attendants were great as well, always checking to see what we needed. …

title: Worth the extravagance
review: Most beautiful setting on gorgeous white sand beach. Very comfortable and elegant and spacious one bedroom apartment. Excellent service in poolside restaurant and on the beach. Great location near St.Armonds for dining and shopping.  Planning to return soon. Expensive yes but worth the splurge.

title: Excellent Vacation Spot
review: Our first visit to Longboat Key.  Very enjoyable, the refurbished beach was absolutely perfect.  Staff members make this resort extra special.  Special shout out for Stacey at the pool - a real dynamo who is always smiling and running around to make each guest feel special. Also noted other exceptional staff of Paula at pool and Katiana at beach and pool.

title: Relaxing get away
review: Dear MandC436: Glad you enjoyed the beautiful refurbished beach.  It does look wonderful.  Thanks for your special mention of Stacey, Paula and Katiana.  Look forward to seeing you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Stacey
review: The resort at longboat key was so relaxing  the new beach set up was amazing. Everything looked so classy and upscale. The queen beds were so relaxing . The beach staff went out of their way to make sure I was enjoying my stay, especially ozzie and Jake who checked in on a regularly  basis. I like how they are charging for bed and umbrella rentals now because it fits in with this much high end resort. Allie M at the pool made sure we found the perfect chair to relax in while being able to see our children. Love this place will definitely  be back.

title: Quiet and stuffy
review: Dear DanM: I’m glad you enjoyed your time with us and found the new beach to be amazing.  Thanks for your mention of those who went above and beyond.  We look forward to seeing you and your family again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Another visit here
review: Back for the third time. Love this place!  Everyone so friendly, very clean, great drinks and food. It was so good to see our favorite pool gal Stacey. She has the best personality, hard working, always there for guests she truly is an asset to her company and such a pleasure to be around!

title: Longboat Key club is the best!!
review: Dear SbeckMK: Thank you for being our guest again.  I am very pleased that you had a great stay and found everyone friendly, the place clean and drinks and food to be great. Thanks for your nice mention of Stacey.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Summer golf
review: My wife and I started coming to the Resort at Longboat Key Club last October and returned again this year. It is one of our favorite places and have no complaints.  Food is excellent, beach is beautiful. Rooms are clean and spacious. The people are very friendly and will treat you like a king or queen. The young lady at the pool named Stacy took extremely good care of us!!!!! Love the place Peter

title: Honeymoon
review: Dear donzi222: Thank you for returning to our resort after a previous stay.  Thanks for mentioning the food being excellent and the beach beautiful.  Thanks for your mention of the friendly service by everyone and mention of Stacey.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Lovely vacation
review: Where to start We could not fault the food or location both great, but there was something just not right. We booked the resort because of location & golf courses,only to find out 1 course closed  another 9 holes being completely redesigned only after we tried book a tee time The front of house staff just did not seem as sharp as other resorts we have stayed at over the years.  Beware of the "no see um's" wear repellent all the time.  Rooms very nice along with the pool & beach   Stacey was gem around the pool  Just the lack of information about the golf let the resort down for us.

title: Loved this hotel as well as the staff!!
review: Went for my girlfriend's wedding. They really accommodated all of the bride's needs as well as the guests. Stacey at the pool was a gem, always had a smile on her face as well as knowledge of the resort & towels for our chairs. Very nice spot and I'd go back!

title: Great first impression, until...
review: Dear Monica T: Thank you for the “5” review.  I am so pleased you had a successful stay with us for your girlfriends wedding.  I cannot think of a better place for a beach wedding, especially now with our beach re-nourishment complete and the white powder sand so beautiful.  We look forward to seeing you again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great times
review: Great hotel in a great spot.  Great first impression, that is until we walked down to the beach.  We got closer only to hear beeping sounds from bull dozers moving sand around.  It would have been helpful to know this before arriving for our stay.  It was also red tide, so dead fish and stinky smell.  There isn't anything they could do about that, but not informing us of the construction zone we came to relax by was disappointing.  Regardless, I'd stay here again since the beach would most likely be fixed.

title: what a change!
review: Dear Benandcidy:  Thank you for taking the time to review us.  I am sorry you were not aware of the recent beach nourishment. It was our goal for all guests to be informed.  We placed it on our website, updated our confirmations to include the information, sent an email to all guests who listed their email address and notified all 3rd party booking agencies. Our goal was transparency. We also kept a portion of our beach open through the nourishment.  The nourishment is 100% completed and the short lived red-tide is no longer in our area.   The beach looks beautiful and we have all new furnishings on the beach as well.  We hope to see you again.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Weekend at Longboat
review: I loved the beach and pool area. When I first approached the pool concierge desk I asked for some towels for my friend and I, we met this employee named Stacey and she was nothing less than fantastic to me. As she showed us where we wanted to go I saw others at the hotel waving and hi fiving her like she was the boss. Thanks for the good times!

title: Fabulous Girls Weekend Away
review: Four full fabulous days at Long Boat Key with two girlfriends.  Stayed in a Junior Suite Ocean View (building 4) which was perfect.  Cannot say enough about the staff who were all wonderful from initial check in to check out.  They truly do their best to make you feel welcome and taken care of and always with a smile.   Leo Chang was our favorite new friend and always stopped to say hello and see if we needed anything.  Stacy by the pool was amazing and again, always checking on us to see if we needed anything.   The food and service at every location was top notch and very reasonable priced.  The beach was beyond beautiful and the staff at the beach also very accommodating and most important, always with a smile.  Whatever you needed, they took care of it.   Chairs, loungers,…

title: Lovely Stay - Slight Sting in the Tail!
review: Dear linda_landis4: Glad you had a fabulous girl’s getaway weekend.  I am very pleased that you found all of the staff to the wonderful from check-in to check-out.  Thanks for your mention of team members who went above and beyond.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Fantastic stay at Resort at Longboat Key Club!
review: We stayed at the Resort for 7 days, needing a bit of relaxation following a full on week in Orlando.  First - the good points - and there are plenty of them..  The Resort is in a beautiful location, outside the main area of Sarasota, perfect for a relaxing stay. We were allocated a junior suite overlooking the lagoon (if you are lucky you may see some Dolphins - we did!). The accommodation included a fully equipped kitchen, so we were able to cook some of our own meals, which will save you a lot of money (there is a large supermarket just down the road). The staff are very friendly and efficient (special mention to Stacy by the pool, and Robert who drove us to the Portofino Restaurant). The pool is terrific, as other reviewers have mentioned, there have been some issues with the…

title: Fun in the sun
review: Dear SteveandPamA: Thank you for staying with us.  I am very pleased you loved the resort location as well as your suite location.  It is wonderful to see the dolphin as they play in the lagoon. Thanks for your mention of team members who made your stay extra special.   The beach nourishment is now complete so our beach is larger and softer than ever!! I am truly sorry for the billing mistake.  This is a very unusual error and should not have occurred. Thanks for mentioning that the resort quickly rectified.   We look forward to seeing you again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Vacationer
review: Six ladies had a 3-day retreat at the Resort at Longboat Key Club where we had an oceanfront deluxe suite that was very large and easily accommodated our group!  All aspects of this resort are first class!  The food was delicious, great pool and hot tub, and suite was beautifully decorated and huge!  We even had a kitchen with a full-size refrigerator and there was a washer and dryer in the laundry room of our suite!  Any requests were attended to immediately, and all personnel were first class!  One of the ladies left jewelry (which she had just purchased) in the room.  The jewelry is being mailed to her.  As I said,  a first-class resort!

title: TOTALLY RELAXING VACATION
review: We had a junior suite overlooking the pool and gulf. Who could ask for more? .  If you are looking for activities, the resort has golf, tennis, walking, exercise classes, and workout equipment. If you are looking for a totally relaxing vacation,  the beach a, pool, and spa are the places to be.  Everyone there was awesome but Stacy  , a pool attendant, and Jennie , concierge were absolutely TERRIFIC.  The restaurants were all great!

title: RELAXING 7 NIGHTS
review: Dear jacway1:  Thank you for your “5” review!  I’m pleased you had a successful stay with us.  Glad you were able to take advantage of all of the resort amenities.  Thanks for your kind mention of Stacy and Jennie.  We look forward to seeing you again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Facilities split over two locations 3 miles apart
review: Room 6202 Lovely junior suite overlooking lagoon with view of Manatees. Fully equipped kitchen with washer/dryer. Nice touches in room ( toiletries, soap powder, dishwasher powder, tea towels. ) The only disappointment was the shower head in the bath, not much pressure. Lovely well kept grounds. Friendly staff especially Stacey who allocates sunbeds, towels and umbrellas around pool area. Small pool which gets crowded at weekends.  We did notice that someone had a small dog on a float in the pool, when it clearly states no dogs in pool area. Free self-parking close to room. Food in restaurant Sands Pointe was good but they automatically added 20% service to bill. It should be at the discretion of the customer.

title: Beach view is amazing
review: Genuinely suprised and disappointed to find out on arrival that the Resort facilities were spread over two locations some 3 miles apart. Whilst transport between the two locations is available it is easiest to drive yourself. In reality, unless you have something specific booked at the second location, as a holiday maker you will most likely simply not use the second location.   Because of the location split I think that you have to look at the primary beach hotel location as a single resort, which is a shame.  The beach front location is fantastic,although some very much needed work is being carried out to repair recent erosion. There was some noise pollution but even more annoying was coming down one morning to find the main beach in front of the pool area closed without any…

title: Best Vacation Ever
review: The view here is just amazing! Jake set us up on the beach with a beautiful spot in the shade! Ali martin came by with fresh towels to make sure we stayed dry. Ozzie and Morgan came by to adjust our umbrella and brought us cold water to keep us high drafted! This place just blew me out the water!

title: LBK Club
review: The beach team is amazing! Jake set me up on the most beautiful spot on the beach! I couldn't believe how large it was! The new furniture looks amazing. Ozzy came by with fresh dry towels when we got out of the water! When we made our way to the pool Ali put us in the shade  and we just had the best time had a few drinks. Can't wait for the up coming wedding this weekend!

title: Beach services
review: These guys are great. Loved my stay.  Recommend Jake and ozzy ad they are the best. They are at the beach every morning. Making sure everyone is comfortable and having a good time. At the pool Ali Martin does a great job with towels and the lounge chairs!

title: Great Customer Service!
review: We had 4 people sharing a room, which we thought was a suite, but it turned out to be one room with 2 beds.  When we told Kimberly Radford (she was checking us in) about the mix up, she could have just said too bad.  But she didn't.  She looked up suites immediately and provided the best price possible, since there was going to be a significant price difference.  The room turned out to be amazing and I couldn't believe Kimberly was able to work that out for us on such short notice.  She really saved the weekend for us!  She was very patient and kind and I can't thank her enough!

title: Great poolside service!
review: We'd like to compliment Stacey for the most attentive poolside service. She is friendly and greets you and talks to you. She is always busy helping the guests out. She loves her job and it shows! She is a pleasure to deal with!

title: Birthday weekend
review: Dear Chris B:  Glad to hear that Stacey took great care of you.  I agree she is a pleasure to deal with. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great family resort
review: I'm really impressed with the quality of service this resort provide. The beach attendant are really well trained and are extremely efficient. Big shout to Ozzy , Jake and Freddy they are a really friendly bunch of guys. The service at the pool is second to none, Allie Martin is a super star she remembered our names from the last time we were here and helped us with our all needs at the pool

title: Cabana Boys
review: Dear Ramon Enrique B: Glad your enjoyed your time with us.  Thanks for your mention of Ozzy, Jake, Freddy and Allie.   We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: 5 diamonds and 5 star resort
review: The beach attendant at LBKC are extremely polite and helpful. Ozzy, Jake and Freddy where constantly checking on us to make sure we were making the most of our vacation. At the pool the best pool attendant was Allie Martin, she remembered our names and stopped by our chairs to talk and ask if we were doing ok her service was definitely the highlight of our vacation.

title: Great beach resort
review: Dear Oscar Luis R: Thank you for the 5 review. Glad you enjoyed your time and thank you for mentioning staff who provided exceptional service.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: 5 star beach services
review: I love the LBKC the staff is well trained and polite Allie Martin at the pool is awesome she went out her way to make sure we were comfortable at the pool. Ozzie and Freddy at the beach were amazing, the helped us out with paddle boards and umbrellas. Thank you gays for making our day perfect.

title: Fantastic view from balcony and staff who were also fantastic!
review: We stayed for two weeks and found it very relaxing. Our 'junior suite' was very well appointed with fridge,hob,microwave,washing machine and dryer.  The hotel is quite dated and would benefit from some refurbishment.  The staff were all very cheerful and two in particular, Stacey (pool attendant) and Allie (pool waitress) were excellent, always being 'there' before you realised you needed them, would come back just to see them again! The location was good with St. Armands Circle providing good shopping and good food. The beach is to be re-nourished shortly and this will add even more to the hotel. The food in the hotel was very good but quite pricey as are the drinks in the hotel bar. We had our first meal at the Portafino restaurant, on site, and we were very disappointed. The…

title: Five star five diamond service!
review: Ally started our stay with giving us fresh clean towels! Zack and freddy set us up with beautiful new equipment that just the beach that five star feeling! Ozzy came by when the sun moved to keep us shaded! Late in the day jake brought us more fresh towels!

title: Jaw breaking
review: I've heard that long boat lost some beach but you can't even tell! Jake and Freddy set me up in the most beautiful spot on the beach. Zach always made sure that my chairs were in the shade. Me and my girls had a great time at the beach to say the least. I almost forgot the pool! Ozzy came by and brought the kids some toys to use and Ally was just so sweet. The staff is great and so is the view. Can't wait for many more trips!

title: Holiday to remember
review: Visited longboat key resort for two weeks.   My happiest place in the world.   Resort fantastic , staff even better, especially Sherman and Rob at the front desk and the hardest working girls at the pool Allie and Stacey.  Thanks for going the extra mile. Hopefully see you next year.

title: View and staff were fabulous
review: An older resort on the beach with plenty to offer.  The clean quiet room had a gorgeous view overlooking the pool and the beach.  Decor was a bit dated.  Our room had a king bed, sofa bed, chair, tv, table with four chairs, and a decently equipped kitchen with dishwasher, microwave, refrigerator, cook top, and even a small washer and dryer.  Laundry and dishwasher detergents were provided.  Wifi was adequate and free.  The bathroom was clean with decent toiletries and linens.  Bed was comfy.  Overall feel was clean and comfortable.  Fitness center was nice and offered a wide variety of classes.  I did not play golf, tennis, kayak, paddle board, or ride the free bikes.  The spa showers were great!  Beach and pool towels were provided as well as umbrellas and chairs. Good shopping…

title: Awesome place with a great staff
review: Just spent 3 days at this wonderful resort. We got a room upgrade. Fantastic view overlooking the gulf.  Business reception was well done, staff very attentive. Late night dinner at the bar was very good. Beach under restoration due to storms but the resort staff did a good job making guests comfortable on the smaller beach available.  Sounds like beach will be back to normal in a week or so. Special shout out to staff person "Liz" working poolside - she was super friendly and helpful.  And our poolside waitperson "Allie" did a great job keeping everyone hydrated. Overall a great trip!

title: great place
review: had a lovely days at this hotel. Nice beach even they were working there...  And the pool and the service there was great., specially Stacey. the food and the room were good also. Nice place to relax   Thanks

title: Another Great Stay at Longboat Key Club
review: This was our second Labor Day weekend stay at Longboat key Club, and we cannot wait to go back again.   One thing that really sets this place above the rest is the service, first class all around. We were fortunate enough to get one of the recently remodeled two bedroom deluxe suites, and it was perfect.   A lot of the reports speak to the beach erosion. While there is not as much beach as there was on our previous trip, there is still plenty of beach to do the beach things. In fact, while we were there that had actually started a beach reclamation project, (pumping in more sand from offshore) I am sure that will make a difference.   We are looking forward to our next stay!

title: Just Beautiful
review: The resort, the location, and the wonderful staff all combined to make our recent stay at The Resort at Longboat Key Club memorable.  You're greeted with a warm smile and impeccable service at every turn. From our beach attendant Morgan, the golf course, staff, and everyone in between, the service is superb, the food fantastic, and the entire experience unforgettable! Can't wait to get back!

title: Top notch of all the Opal resorts we did on this trip!
review: We started at the Sandpearl in Clearwater , moved on to the Opal Sands in Clearwater before heading to Longboat Key Club.  All were great but Longboat Key was our favorite.  We received the best service an upgraded room with a massive private balcony overlooking the water.  Played golf at the harborside course and it was fantastic.   Relaxing time with the best service from the course to the front desk and pool and beach attendants.  Don't miss this wonderful resort for a 5 star experience.  Thanks LBKC for a great time.  We WILL be back!

title: Superb beach front property
review: This place is the ideal place to come for a very relaxing beach break. We had an ocean view suite which was spotlessly clean and very spacious with a well provisioned kitchen area and plenty of storage space. The view of the beach and the ocean really was fabulous. The place itself was pretty quiet and the on site restaurant and bar were almost empty most nights. In fact one night the restaurant was closed because the place was so quiet and anyone wanting to eat had to use the bar area instead.   The beach is beautiful and a real oasis of coastal bird life with herons, egrets, oyster catchers, plovers and all manner of other bird life sharing the beach with holiday makers. We spotted wild dolphin barely 10 metres from the shore and collected some great shells at the edge of the…

title: Best in class
review: The Resort is amazing. Come and enjoy the pampering which is included with the amazing views. Ed and Steve at the pool bar provided us with great service.  Stacey at the poolside towel service was bubbly and attentive. She hunted down a pair of lounge chairs in a superd location. Right at the edge of the pool and near Steve and Ed. Come and enjoy the views from the beach and the lagoon side room. We  love it here.

title: Labor Day weekend
review: Loved our weekend at The Longboat Key Club. Weather was great after Tropical Storm Hermine and even though there wasn't much beach to work with, Jake and Freddy made sure we got our lounge chairs and umbrellas to enjoy our time.

title: Labor Day Weekend
review: Dear KateH:  Thank you for being our guest.  Glad you enjoyed your weekend with us and thanks for your kind mention of Jake and Freddy.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Jaw dropping beach
review: Labor Day weekend check in wasn't too bad. Our room took a little to be ready so we headed down to the beach. It was pretty crowded in a small space but the cabana boys really made it work. They were running out of stuff like umbrellas but Freddy Ozzy Jake and Zach all did what they needed to do to make our day at the beach.

title: Labor Day
review: Labor Day weekend called for a rather large crowd to be attending the beach. In addition the beach was smaller than I recall but Jake Zach Freddy and Ozzy really made it work well. They got us exactly what we asked for even though the lack of resources. Shout out to them for keeping it up.

title: Vacation
review: Dear Shannon D:  Thanks for your review. It was a very busy but successful weekend with guests enjoying their experience. We look forward to seeing you again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Weekend getaway!
review: Beautiful facilities, excellent service.  Lots of families. Food was very good. Very close to St. Armand's Circle and shopping/restaurants. Poolside bar is very convenient and staff is friendly. Overall, an excellent stay.

title: The calm after the storm
review: Dear Joshua G: Thank you for your review.  I appreciate that you found the facilities beautiful and the service Excellent.  Thanks also for your food and staff comments.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: surprise lava cake for Anniversary!
review: Fantastic place to stay ! We had a wonderful time! Food is great and the beach was nice no need to go anywhere you have everything you need right at resort. Nice place to stay with family or with out !

title: Paradise
review: Our first choice was to stay in Siesta Key. However, we decided to stay at the Resort at Longboat Key based on the reviews. When we entered the suite and opened the balcony drapes, we were taken away by the view.  We were above the pool on the 6th floor but all I can remember is the gulf coast view of the turquoise waters that surrounded us. The staff by the pool area was such a pleasure especially Ozzy. The staff was very attentive and made sure that we had fresh sets of towels as we transitioned from the pool side over to the beach area. The room was perfect for my family of 4. The accommodations were all you that you look for when considering a suite. In fact we were pleased to find a washer and dryer inside the suite. My family and I will be visiting this resort again next…

title: Birthday/Retirement Celebration
review: Dear Benslola: I am pleased you had such a wonderful experience with us and you enjoyed the view of the turquoise waters.  Happy to hear Ozzy provided memorable service and you found your suite perfect.  We look forward to seeing you again next year. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Nice room with balcony
review: The hotel was lovely and clean and the staff was very friendly and helpful.  The food was good; room service was very fast and the food was still hot.  We had breakfast each morning and the potatoes were really good, except on the last morning they appeared to have used frozen crispy crowns and they were so overdone that when you put your fork into them, they just crumbled; that was the only unpleasant meal experience.  The drinks were kind of expensive, but they were good and the service was excellent.  Also on the first night of our stay I received a nice birthday card and a bottle of champagne.  I would definitely recommend this resort and hope to have an opportunity to stay there again.

title: Beachfront Paradise
review: Dear Kimmiepie61: Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest.  Glad to hear you found the hotel lovely, clean and the staff friendly and helpful.  I apologize you had a challenge on your last morning for breakfast after having great experiences up until then.  We will review with the team.  Happy birthday and thank you again for being our guest.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Longboat key- Living in the past
review: Arrived a little before check in to find front loaders carrying long pipe line for the dredge that was going on just on the beach outside the hotel. The front loaders were dodging you as you tried to go on the beach. The room was clean and nicely appointed with a small wet bar area, kurig, microwave, small refrigerator. NO Ice machines available and the need to request it from room service. Food good but very expensive.   Way to much money spent on a room to see dredging.

title: Just amazed
review: The beach is just amazing our view that Jake and Freddy set up was right on the water we were in paradise. Ozzy came by to adjust the umbrellas for us. Stacy at the pool was really nice and was always keeping a smile on our face. The staff works really well with the space they have the beach is beautiful.

title: Great Getaway on Florida's West Coast
review: The resort is located on Longboat Key near Sarasota. The property is beautiful, There are many different types of accommodations. They have golf, a great USTA tennis facility, They have a great spa and gym. They are on the beach. The pool area is great. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. The front desk staff are outstanding. Worthy of mention is the Concierge (Amanda) and the Guest Manager (Kimberly) who always went above and beyond our requests and needs.

title: Very nice family vacation
review: We had a very nice recent stay at The Resort at Longboat Key. Very easy to get to from the airport ($25 cab ride) and a beautiful white sand beach. Although the beach had some recent damage, it is still pristine with clear blue water.
