The resort has a nice (heated) pool, a beautiful golf course, great tennis facilities and an active health club with many classes throughout the day.  Although there are quite a few dining options on property, the food was not great overall. The staff was great - especially Stacy who worked at the pool and was very helpful throughout our stay. Would be great if they had a few more things for the kids to do - maybe a slide at the pool, a volleyball net on the beach or even an arcade/outdoor ping pong table in the shade.  Our room was more like an…

title: Amazing visit!
review: I first thought the resort was a bit expensive but upon arrival, it's entirely worth the money.  We were upgraded for free to a 2 BR suite, had an amazing dinner at the Italian restaurant on property, and the staff has been incredibly nice and helpful!  Turn down service came to our room after arrival and even though we didn't need service, she left chocolates for us.  The beach is private, not crowded, and Ozzy & Jake were both helpful and polite!  The water is beautiful, resort is GORGEOUS, rooms perfect...couldn't ask for a better vacation for my birthday!

title: Amazing visit!
review: Ozzy and Jake gave great service on the beach! It's my friends birthday and they were so kind and quick to serve and make this a special and unforgettable trip! Great staff!!! We will definitely be back for my birthday!

title: Batch Party
review: Oozy and Jake are awesome! They got us the best spots On The beach and were super cute. It's beautiful here! We love it!! We were here for 4 nights and everything was wonderful. Rooms are great and big! Very clean. Check in was smooth.  The service has been fantastic - always willing to help with new towels, moving chairs or umbrellas and making sure we had all the info we needed on the best local spots!

title: Paradise!
review: The Resort at Longboat Key was absolutely amazing! It was the perfect relaxing vacation for us. Our suite was beautiful and spacious with a large deck overlooking the pool and ocean. The staff was so friendly which made this vacation even more enjoyable. Stacey was the sweetest, friendliest, most attentive by the pool - we loved her!! We can't wait to visit against n!

title: This place is just amazing.
review: This place is awesome! All of the staff was friendly. Stacey at the pool was just the BEST. She is a very hard worker and so nice.  The room was large and comfortable. Very clean. Beach is right there with chairs. Large balcony with table and chairs for sitting outside. washer and dryer in room. Very close to St. Armanes Circle, for dinning and shopping. Love this place.

title: Amazing and relaxing holiday at Longboat Key.
review: We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite with ocean view on the 8th floor .. Room 2802 .. Stayed last week of July ... Couldn't ask for more!  Suite was beautifully furnished and the view was just awesome. Beach staff were brilliant and nothing was ever too much trouble.   The beach was right outside which was convenient as it was a hop, skip and a jump to the pool if you wanted a change!  Never had a problem with getting loungers even in the afternoon. Reading comments on here about the beach erosion ... Yes this is true but it didn't affect our stay at all ... There is still plenty of beach and we didn't feel cramped at all. Don't let other reviews put you off booking.  We've holidayed around this area and LK comes out top. We used BareFoot's grill for lunch which was brilliant.  We…

title: The beach and the water were wonderful!
review: Our room was large and comfortable, especially important since my husband needed to do some work on both days.  We had a view of the pool and the beach.  Our room also had a small fully equipped kitchen.  The washer and dryer was very helpful to rinse and dry our swim suits.  The resort is also very convenient for shopping and dinning at St. Armands Circle.

title: 5 stars service !
review: I'm a long time member at the LBKC mainly visiting the club on the weekend, spending most of the time and the beach. My beach set up it is always ready before I arrive in a consistent basis. I want to thanks the beach attendants that always go out of their way to make sure everything is awaiting my arrival, big thanks to Ozzy, Jake,Zach and Leo. And a special thank you to Sheryl that always takes care of my drinks and food needs.

title: Weekend at the beach
review: We had an amazing getaway at this resort towards the end of June. The beach was pretty eroded so most of our time was spent at the pool. Allie Martin was our pool girl and she was great. She helped us always have shade and towels. When we did head down to the beach freddy Nevin and ozzy helped us with paddle boards and shade as well. I would highly recommend a stay at this resort.

title: Beach vacation
review: I'm coming from the east coast so the change in water is awesome. I'm used to such choppy waves but the water here is like a giant pool. On top of the awesome scenery the service on the beach makes it even better. Freddy and Nevin set me up with the bed and I just slept all day and was lazy it was awesome.

title: beach
review: the beach was awesome. we went paddle boarding and since its the golf there arent really any waves so it was easy. also the drinks are great as well. the beach guys really top it all off. Freddy was the guy who attended us so we know first hand that great. jake and nevin were on duty as well and we saw them working hard too.

title: A lovely day at the beach
review: We are from around town so we come here when we know nobody's which I would recommend because then it's even more private. but we got here at an excellent time and the service was still great even though they were in the middle closing. Nevin Freddy and Jake were the beach guys on duty and they were so nice.

title: Awesome family vacation on Longboat Key!
review: We arrived at the resort around lunchtime on Sunday. We booked a Junior Suite with Lagoon View ( Building Six) .The room wasn't ready so the friendly check in clerk recommended that we  have lunch at the Sands Point lounge. She told us she would contact housekeeping to ensure that our room would be ready for us before we finished lunch. Sure enough, halfway through lunch, she called us to let us know that the room was ready!.  I highly recommend the Junior Suite for a  family of 4. There was a King sized bed & a pull out sofa bed for the kids. The room was very spacious. There was a good sized kitchen, with regular sized fridge, dishwasher, microwave, stove & washer - dryer. The bathroom is separated in two parts with the sink & toilet & bathtub in one room & another sink with…

title: Family Reunion
review: Dear Oakville6910: Thank you for your very comprehensive review.  We greatly appreciate it. I am pleased you enjoyed every aspect of your stay and am so pleased you plan on returning. I have shared your comments with each of our departments so they can review your 1st hand experiences with their team. We look forward to seeing you again very soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Best pool attendant
review: Please,please keep all valuables in safe!!! My family checked out on Sunday August 14th,2016.  In my rush to get out of the room I left my Diamond Earrings on the coffee table and realized that they were not in my ears approximately 3 hours later. Much to my surprise my conversation with assistant security director on Sunday afternoon she informed me that they are NOT responsible for items lost in the room. So, there you have it. No responsiblility!! I called LBK police and the hotel is not really cooperating. I have forwarded a picture of the earrings as well as a homeowners policy describing these diamond earrings. Sorry that I stayed here!!!!

title: pool service
review: Dear Mary Ann P: I am very sorry that you lost your diamond ear-rings.  Our safety officer did take the information and followed our procedures to ensure your valuables were looked for in the event they were left.  I have also followed up with you, and spoken to you on the phone concerning the matter. I have seen our team return to guests some very valuable items left behind in countless situations and I stand behind our staffs honesty and integrity.  Nonetheless, we follow our investigation procedures in any situation such as this and I assure you we are responsive.  I am willing to speak to you again at any time.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Just wow!
review: The service at the resort is amazing, we have been staying here for over a week now. We really enjoyed all the restaurants and the pool bar but the highlight of our trip was the service at the pool, Ozzy and Paula were on point, they were always a step ahead helping us with all our needs. We cant wait to come back.

title: Beach Service
review: The beach experience is always great. It's hard to go wrong with a weekday at the beach. We got our own cabana thanks to the beach boys, Zachary Neven and Freddy. They also have activities. We decided to go paddle boarding and ozzy was the one that helped us with that. The beach crew really tried to make our time here better. We were able to be lazy the whole time.

title: Weekend at longboat
review: I love the fact that this resort has its own beach. It gives us a nice amount of privacy. The beach service comes just as great as the stay. Neven Zach and Freddy all were super nice and gave us the five star feel. We took some paddle boards out which was fun. Ozzy treated us to some cold waters every once in a while. They all actually seemed to care.

title: Fun day with the Fam at the beach
review: The beach was pretty small but fun. It's nice to have a private beach to go to. We were able to listen to our music and just relax. The beach guys who sat us were super nice. The names of the three guys were Freddy Zach and Neven. Their manager would keep checking in on us which was so nice of him. His name was Ozzy.

title: Recommend going
review: Beautiful scenery and amazing service. Freddie and Auzzy were helpful and a great representation of the quality of staff there. Plus the beach itself is gorgeous & even secluded if you walk a bit further down the coast. 10/10 recommend giving this beach a try

title: Outstanding
review: We recently stayed at the resort and it was superb from start to finish. The staff were brilliant and so helpful. The room was excellent with balcony overlooking the pool and sea. The food was lovely. We ate in the Portofino Italian restaurant overlooking the marina one night. As the resort includes a golf course, tennis courts and much more, we were picked up by courtesy resort transport from reception and taken to the door. After our meal the same applied. Great service. The pool attendants were impressive. They did so much to help ie taking your towels to your lounger, fitting them over correctly, moving the umbrella as the sun moved around and keeping up a regular check to see if you needed drinks and food. Jake who had only been at the resort for 9 days was a shining light,…

title: A great family vacation on LBK!
review: My only complaint about the resort - the restaurants are nothing to write home about. That said, there are plenty of amazing restaurants nearby on LBK, AMI and in Sarasota!   We stayed in a building closer to the golf courses and farther from the beach. We had a HUGE 2 bedroom/2 bathroom suite with balconies off every room and a huge kitchen! This was by far worth every penny. The rooms and bathrooms were great sizes and the overall living space was great for our family of 4.   The pool is nice - although we spent all of our time parked on the beach. Having a beach chair and umbrellas every day was wonderful! We will definitely be returning to this resort!

title: GREAT BEACH SERVICE
review: I stayed at the resort with my friends for 5 days and we had a blast, I really enjoyed swimming on the gulf, the water was really clear and clam. The beach attendant were really professional and courteous specially Ozzy, Freddie and Jake they were checking on us constantly,  the service at the pool is as good as the beach, Allie Martin helped us with umbrellas and chair, we would definitely recommend this place to our friends.

title: Great Stay!
review: Just returned from a great stay at the LBK Club. From check in to check out, we had a positive experience. The concierge and front desk staff were wonderful. We were offered a free room upgrade to a suite, and we were really happy with our building (4), which was beach front and did not have a pool view. We also were gifted a bottle of chilled white wine as the staff knew we were visiting for our anniversary. The beach was nice, comfortable lounge chairs, warm clear water, & white sand (although all of LBK seems to be suffering from erosion problems). Pool was also really nice. We ate at the pool bar, and loved our meals! Food was excellent. Staff around the pool were likewise helpful and attentive. Had a dead car battery upon checkout, and the front desk staff sent out a bell…

title: A favorite vacation spot on LBK
review: We were undecided about a beach vacation this summer then saw an opportunity to return to the LBK Club. It always feels like home when we return. The accommodations are first rate, the pool is large and clean, and the beach is like an island somewhere else. That said, the only issue this time was the erosion on the beach which took place earlier this year. It narrowed the beach considerably but sand restoration will soon be underway. Even thought the beach was narrower it was still a great place to relax and unwind. The property also has golf, tennis, restaurant, and pool bar, if those are important. It is also a gated property so once you pass through the gate you feel miles away from civilization. Another plus this time was the pool attendant, Stacey. She was energetic,…

title: Beach day
review: The beach today was awesome and so beautiful! The water is so clear, the sand is soft, the sun was hot and the service on the beach was excellent! Ossie, one of the beach staff, was very kind too! My friend and I really enjoyed our trip and hope to come back soon!

title: Beach day
review: The beach today was awesome and so beautiful! The water is so clear, the sand is soft, the sun was hot and the service on the beach was excellent! Ossie, one of the beach staff, was very kind too! My friend and I really enjoyed our trip and hope to come back soon!

title: Beach services
review: I was in vacation with my family and some friends and we were taken care off by Ozzy in the beach and he was more that attentive and well mannered, excellent service he is highly recommended look for him at the beach. Don't miss him he will find all accommodations for your party.

title: Day at the beach
review: I've been a member for 10 years at the resort and we decided to spend the day at the beach with my family and friends. As soon as we arrived at the beach the attendants took care of us. Ozzy helped us out with lounge chairs and umbrellas and made sure we were well taken care of. We would definitely recommend the Longboat Key Club!

title: Fantastic Every Time!
review: Just finished a family vacation to the Longboat Key Club. We went for our fifth visit, and it's wonderful every time. The staff was able to accommodate any and all requests. The view of the Gulf of Mexico is always stunning. Mr. Benninghove runs a first rate program. Hoping that OPAL Corporate recognizes his commitment to excellence at every turn.

title: Wonderful time at The Resort at Longboat Key
review: Just returned from a wonderful experience at The Resorts at Longboat Key. Went with my daughters (20 and 33 years old). We all had a great time. The staff and service was wonderful with only one kink (could not get an extra pillow which I did the next day). Room was on the 6th floor with an awesome view of the beach and pool. Loved sitting on the deck with my daughters and unwinding after a long day of swimming and shell collecting. The beach has decreased from the website pictures but there is still room for chairs. The beach staff is very accomodating in setting you up on the beach each morning. There is a beach replenishment program starting up mid-Aug. near the hotel.   The water was extremely warm so, by mid-day, we headed over to the pool which was quite refreshing. Stacey…

title: If you're at the beach, then you're lucky enough..
review: But if this is your home then you truly have found paradise!! This private resort situated in Long Boat Key is the ultimate in relaxation & luxury.  The sweeping driveway hints at the lush green golf courses, even in the heat of summer, a spa and state of the art fitness facilities.  On arrival the valets ensure that check in is smooth and the wonderful Sherman, offers such a welcome!   The suites are located around the main reception area & either have beach, pool or golf course views.  We opted for a beach view & the white powder sand & turquoise blue water are simply stunning.  There's everything you could need in the suites, kitchen facilities, well appointed bathrooms & giant comfy beds!  The pool is serviced with a great cocktail & dining menu, have the burger, it might be…

title: Stunning location. Overcrowded pool.
review: Me and my family stayed at the Resort at Longboat Key Club in a one bedroom suite and, a junior suite for a week. The rooms were extremely spacious, clean, with a beautiful clear view of the beach.  The only reason I didn't give this hotel a 5 star review was due to the pool. We found it very overcrowded and too small for the amount of people staying at the resort.  We did go onto the beach a lot which was lovely but, in peak summer time it was too hot for the children.

title: Well managed. A bit pricey
review: Recently stayed at the resort.  Overall is very efficient & well managed.  The rooms are well appointed, with modern remodeling upgrades & clean.  The staff very courteous & accommodating.  Room service was efficient & the food good.  The hotel offers a lot of amenities, but, weather prohibited using many of the outdoor ones. It appears there may be some beach restoration beginning over the next week on this end of longboat key which may affect people's beach experience.  Not clear the duration of the project, but, suggest that be researched.  There has been enough beach erosion the county is restoring many sections of longboat key.  Currently the space between the water & sand berm is relatively short compared to other gulf beaches.  The boardwalks go out into the edge of the…

title: Beach Day
review: I'm visiting my cousin here and it was fun. She recommended this place because of how easy and relaxing it is. The pool girl Allie M got us towels. Freddy and Zach got us all the stuff at the beach that we needed and Ozzy kept us laughing. Overall it was an easy way to have fun.

title: Great Day at the Beach
review: We're visiting the resort again from not too far and it was great. The service was great. Allie Martin was on duty at the pool and she was great. The beach guys were Zach and Freddy. They were great and we had an awesome talk. Ozzy was also pretty good. He was funny.

title: 14 Years of staying at LBKC
review: My family visits every summer coming just from Pinellas County in FLA.  We have been visiting since my boys were 5 years old.  The changes made have been great since the first visit.  Now, as an OPAL Resort, I would expect them to continue and to raise the bar.  The pool and beach are very important to us and we were pleased to see the better service at the pool and the availability of activity items at the beach.  I want to especially acknowledge Stacy at the pool.  You need more like her!  She was so attentive to us and to others - it was extraordinary.   She would start by addressing us by name and then continually made sure our stay at the pool was a pleasant one.  In contrast, our last day at the pool we had to put our own towels down as I watched another pool attendant…

title: "A fantastic resort with a great staff."
review: Dear Rhonda P: Thank you for your “5” review and for being our guest once again.  I am pleased that your stay was a success overall and Stacy and Kim made a positive impression on you.  I do apologize that the other attendant on the one day appeared less enthusiastic. We will work on that as we strive to be consistent with excellent service.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Outstanding beach services
review: This is my third time at this great resort.  The staff is wonderful and very accomedating . The Resort is very clean.   I loved the location which is close to St. Armand Circle which you can walk from the Resort or bike.  The overall experience  is great! Cannot wait to return!

title: Nice facility and great tennis
review: Dear Camtozzi: Thank you for your very kind review.  I appreciate that your overall experience was great and that you found the resort clean.  We look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Always a pleasure
review: I stayed at the resort for a week with my best friend and we were amazed by the beach guys they work really hard and they are super friendly especially Zach , Ozzy and Alex. They treated us super well. At the  pool the girls are really good to Allie Martin Liz and Stacey are great ! I would highly recommend this place and we will definitely will come back.

title: Excellent Resort with Great Staff!
review: Overall a beautiful resort with excellent staff especially Freddy and Jake. Both guys took care of our every need at the beach. Stayed in an awesome junior suite with limited beach view being on the first floor. If you book a beach view room, make sure it's on the second floor or higher. Tennis courts are fabulous and well maintained. Six great restaurents, so you never have to leave the resort.  Resort offers a very efficient shuttle service. Really can't say enough good things about this resort. My husband loves it, so it's a winner for sure.

title: What a day!
review: Dear kid76: Thank you very much for being our guest and your kind review. Glad you were able to enjoy the beach, the tennis and the resort restaurants.  We look forward to seeing you again soon! Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great beach guys and pool girl
review: Our time here has been wonderful, we got to the beach early and Freddy and Jake set us up with a beautiful spot. Ozzy was very informative about the Dolphins swimming by. Ally Martin at the pool was so nice and helped us with our towels. The crew here is amazing and we love it here always coming back

title: Wonderful beach!
review: The beach service was great as usual. The pool girls were super nice. The pool girl that attended me was Allie Martin. The beach guys were Freddy and Jake. Also Ozzy came to check up on us after we were already seated. Every time I come here the beach and pool service is great!!

title: Great Stay!!
review: Dear Kristen S: I am pleased you had a great experience with us.  Thanks for your mention of Allie, Freddy, Jake and Ozzie.  We look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beach service was the best
review: One of the guests was being rude to me and Allie Martin the pool girl helped me out she was awesome. Also the beach guys are the best. They're so helpful and nice and they are very consistent with that service. Jake Freddy and Ozzy were the beach guys that helped me. Also Liz at the pool was very nice.

title: Fantastic
review: A very relaxing place for my family and I to stay. The view is beautiful, there are many family activities like bike riding, paddle boarding, and a nice fitness center. The staff was always around to help if needed, and the poolside assistant (Stacey) was very friendly and helpful. Definitely a 5 star club!

title: 5 diamonds and 5 stars service
review: I visited the resort with my family and we had an amazing time. We enjoyed all the restaurants and most of the amenities that they provided for us. But the most amazing thing was the service that the beach team gave us when we arrived at the beach. Ozzy is a super star he treated us like royalty all day long. Also at the pool Allie Martin the pool attendant was great she made sure we had plenty of towels and we were always shaded.

title: Beach Services
review: I have visited the resort with my family and we have a  very nice time, relaxing and enjoying the beach the service at the beach was awesome big shout out to Ozzy that was great taking care of my family. Also Allie Martin provided a great service to my family and friends.

title: Beautiful Beach
review: I visited this hotel with my grown daughter and her two children and we had a great time. The beach is spectacular and we even saw a couple of manatees while out swimming in the gulf one day. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. My reason for the less than stellar review is due to the sleeping accommodations. We had a king size bed for two adults and the kids were to share the sofa bed. The sofa bed was awful!  Even closed, the seats slopped downward. Opened for sleeping, there was no way to sleep on it. It was like laying directly on the bars. We were able to squeeze a rollaway in the room for one kid but there was not room for two. When I complained at the front desk, they told me they often get complaints about the sofa beds. The children are 8 and 12 and not ones…

title: Lovely place
review: Been to many 5 star hotels on the gulf but this takes some beating. We stayed in a junior suite with a lagoon view as this was all that was left when we booked only a few days in advance - but the view exceeded our expectations. The beach was lovely and the service was great all round. We will be back.

title: Great condo
review: We came for a birthday celebration with family and this condo held us all comfortably. The staff went above and beyond by greeting us with champagne and sending another bottle up for the birthday girl. Awesome location. Family friendly. Secluded beach. Expensive but nice.

title: Aging Resort, Losing Beach, Appeal and Interest
review: For starters this is an old not quaint resort.  And they have made attempts to update the room interiors. But, the old style condo designs and parking areas leave a lot to be desired for someplace charging and presenting as a 5 star resort.  Secondly, and admittedly, "Yes in its day it was a 5 star resort"  and many who remember that still favor it for that era, but if you don't go because of that you'll see an aging resort and wonder what the star rating and talk is all about.  And it is relaxing... because there is absolutely nothing to do there. Unless your golfing, and the courses are also either full or run down.  I went there recently for a much anticipated  "beach wedding".  Which wedding was moved into a wooded clearing, because the bride was informed 2 days before the…

title: Real nice but dont expect the Ritz
review: Longboat Key itself is a wonderful place, lovely homes, landscaping, water ways, aquarium, shops etc.  But lets talk about the resort. The staff is by far the best thing about Longboat Key Club.  All incredibly welcoming, knowledgeable and willing to help. I arrived on a Friday afternoon, the grounds are lovely and well manicured.  Very tropical south florida feeling to the property.  Check in was wonderful because the young lady that helped gave me a lesser room rate for the two nights I was there. I had the one bedroom suite with ocean view.  Parking was easy and lots of it.  Here are a couple things that may not fit people needs and are by no means a negative on the resort.  Just may not be for couples looking for romantic getaway or someone that's used to powder sand beaches…

title: The most relaxing vacation!
review: We love this Resort for many reasons. The proximity to shopping, and dining is excellent, you have to drive but it's only about 5 minutes. The rooms are spacious, clean, and are kept up to date. The beach and pool area are great and just a few steps away from each other. The service is outstanding! Whatever we needed, the staff made sure we had it, the pool staff was incredible one of the many people that helped us was Stacey, this pool crew was so caring and made sure we were taking care of. I would not trade this resort for anything else. We will always have our summer vacations here.

title: Relaxing Get-A-Way Weekend
review: The Resort at Longboat Key Club was delightful. We stayed in a platinum junior suite which overlooked the beach and pool. Although the pool was directly below us it was not too noisy. The check in process is wonderful as we were greeted right away, as well as our bags were taken off our hands and our car was parked for us. The bell man brought everything up to our room and explained everything, he was extremely helpful. Our room was ready when we arrived. The beach is extremely clean and Kim the waitress on the beach is a wonderful, happy, and accommodating woman. The men on the beach take your towels from you and bring you right to a cabana or beach chairs. They place the umbrella where you request and tell you where the fruit infused water is. Zach was our wonderful beach…

title: Beautiful Beach Vacation
review: We had a great experience and enjoyed the beach. It was very relaxing and everyone at the resort was super friendly and wanted our stay to be enjoyable. Room sizes are nice, and view of beach was awesome. Will for sure be coming back for another stay.

title: Weekend at the beach
review: Our weekend at the beach was wonderful. Someone in our family told Freddy about how many people we had and he took care of it the whole weekend always having everything ready. Allie Martin helped us out as well. She's the pool and she was great with a great attitude.

title: Beautiful resort
review: Nice and comfy rooms, enough space for a couple. There was also a washing machine and a tumble dryer. Hotel is on a good location and the parking lot is right in front of the reception. We enjoyed out stay there, everything was simply perfect...

title: Zach and Ozzy
review: Great workers. Very helpful and knowledgable about the area! Both Zach and Ozzy were always willing to help. Thanks to Zach and Ozzy, my stay at the longboat key club was not only relaxing but very enjoyable for everyone! I will definitely be recommending this resort to all of my friends and family in the coming years.

title: Zach is excellent!!
review: we had an amazing stay at the longboat key club resort at longboat key. Zach knew all the attractions in the area and was very knowledgable about any questions I had. He was very officiant down at the beach and was always checking in on me and my family! We will totally be back

title: Beautiful area but hotel had a very flat atmosphere
review: We were booked for a week but cut it short. This wasn't due to the quality of the room or the area. But due to the lack of atmosphere at the hotel. This was the first time in all my years of travel that I had felt so disappointed. I can not explain it, but it was so flat.  The beach was perfect with warm sea full of shells and tiny fish. The staff were helpful and the whole hotel clean. It was a shame the beach wasn't accessible for wheelchairs.  Our room had a kitchenette and washing machine ideal for families.

title: Vacation by the water
review: We came here for five days.  Although the rooms are a little old, they are comfortable, well laid out and you feel like you are truly on vacation.  My favorite part was having attendants set up our chairs and umbrellas and the beach and pool towels are provided!  There are washers and dryers in the rooms, so you can wash up your beach attire daily.  We will be back!

title: Beach Vacation
review: Dear Jacqueline G Thank you for being our guest and the review.  Glad you enjoyed your time with us and you are looking forward to returning.  Sorry you felt the rooms were a bit older but glad they were comfortable and well laid out.  Washers/Dryers are very useful at a beachside resort.   Look forward to seeing you next time. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: beach vaca
review: We spent to the day at the beach and had the nicest young man named Hunter help us. He was so kind and thoughtful and had wonderful manners, too. So refreshing!!! We were served by a sweet girl named Allie at the pool bar and she was so sweet and had such a wonderful welcoming smile. Such a nice thing to see.  Thanks for the accommodations and wonderful staff to help us enjoy our stay even more.  Kim Valentine

title: Definitely Need to Repeat
review: We had a two bedroom deluxe looking over the ocean.    It was amazing.   Huge bslcony, nice chairs.  Room had all the amenities, fully furnished kitchen, pre-scheduled with a few cold drinks (for $ if you take),  We'll designed bathtooms. At the pool and beach Umbrellas and chairs are included. The staff run circles around you to get you clean chair tieels, beach towels, druinks, food etc.   It was an all around stellar experience.

title: Great Service, Great Location
review: Dear Zinnamon: Thank you for reviewing your stay with us.  I am pleased you enjoyed your two bedroom suite and found the balcony and suite amazing. Thanks you for mentioning the great job the staff did.  We look forwards to providing a stellar experience again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Stacey @ the pool area
review: Great people working here, shoutout to Stacey who was working the pool area and towel area. Super friendly, and great service! Alwyas love spending a week here every summer. Great golfing, great beach, excellent on site dining, the rooms are very nice and spacious. (ours even had private pool/beach access) Highly recommend this Resort!

title: casual beach hotel
review: Dear Chris: Thank you very much for the “5” review and for being our guest each year.  I am very pleased you enjoyed many areas of the property including golf, beach, dining and the suites.  Thank you for your kind mention of Stacey who provided great service.  We look forward to seeing you again soon and thank you for recommending us.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beach Experience
review: Stacey is absolutely wonderful! She greeted us warmly this morning and went out of her way to ensure our comfort as we lounged poolside. As the sun journeyed across the sky, Stacey quickly anticipated our need and ran over to make the necessary adjustments to our umbrella before the rays could even illuminate our skin. While we lounged, we observed her interactions with other guests as well and her level of care never wavered.  Kudos to Stacey for providing such excellent care for the guests of the Longboat Key Club and to the resort for having found such a gem in Stacey.

title: When can I go back??
review: What a treat to spend 2 days/1 night at this resort! I wish we had planned to stay longer. Everyone we came in contact with was extremely friendly and helpful, from the front desk, bell hops, concierge, and beach assistants. We will definitely plan to return and stay for a longer time!

title: The true American Caribbean experience
review: Dear Jennifer: Thank you for the review and for being our guest. I’m glad you had a wonderful experience for your short stay.  Thanks for your special mention of the Front Desk, Bell hops, concierge and beach team.  Look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: LBKC  Experience
review: My wife and I stayed for two weeks at this resort for our wedding anniversary. It was a wonderful experience from the first day until the last day. I had called to Sherman Young, the Concierge, for advice in selecting the right bldg. and room for our special trip. He not only helped get the right bldg. and perfect room (4306) but had chocolate covered strawberries and a bottle of champagne in our refrigerator when we arrived ! I had also asked Sherman to have a dozen red roses delivered on our anniversary between 10:00 & 11:00 am. He was right on time and they were the largest most beautiful that I had seen. They lasted for our entire stay ! My wife and I both have food allergies and Rick Benninghove (Operations Mgr) personally took care of us by bringing Bob Weil, the Food &…

title: Long Weekend Getaway
review: Dear BigBill: Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay.  I personally appreciate your acknowledgement of not only my small part in your stay, but that of Sherman, Bob, Gordon, Leo and Nevan. I apologize again for the housekeeping mis-que.  We are so happy you spent your wedding anniversary with us and we very much look forward to seeing you again. I personally, enjoyed meeting you and your wife and getting to know you a bit during your stay. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Day at the beach
review: This is our second time at the LBKC and each visit continues to exceed our expectations. Being in business and understanding how customer service sets you apart in this highly competitive environment this resort truly "Gets It" Stacey our pool attendant was the best example of treating people special and making every guest feel like they were the most important person that day.   Well done Stacey and the staff at LBKC hope to see you on our next visit.

title: pool day hell yeah
review: my experience at this resort was absolutely phenomenal. great service throughout. Freddy and Jake made my time at the pool even better by always trying to make my time here enjoyable. as soon as I needed something, they would run over as fast as possible to assist me; I would never have to wait. love you guys. Stacey adjusted my shade to perfection and would put others first before herself. Allie (the food Allie) was also another fabulous worker. not only because of her service but she would always remember our names, our room number and what we like to eat and drink. amazing service throughout especially for these 4!!!

title: My experience
review: Dear jpond3: Thank you for the “5” review.  I am pleased you had a “phenomenal” experience.  Thanks for your kind mention of Freddy, Jake, Stacey and Alley.  We appreciate it.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beach 😍
review: I came to the resort last Monday and ever since I've had an excellent experience. One thing that stood out to me was the outstanding service this resort has. People like Freddy, Jake, Ali, and Stacey are what make this place great. Always running around and working restless trying to make the guests happy. It's absolutely perfect, my hats go off to everyone at the resort and especially those four workers.

title: Awesome hotel!
review: Dear JaredJorden1: Thank you for the “5” review.  I am so pleased the service here was top notch in your view and we were able to make your time special.   Thanks for the special mention of Freddy, Jake, Alli and Stacey.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great beachside service
review: Me and my family and I enjoyed an amazing time at the beach. Jake and Freddy helped us with everything that we needed. They were there to accommodate us for everything. Ozzy always kept me and the family laughing. The beach is beautiful can't wait to come back!

title: Summer Fun
review: Freddy, Jake, Ozzy, and Ally were very good at keeping my friends and I satisfied while we enjoyed the gorgeous view here at the beach. They were ready to work and very enthusiastic during service! I definitely will be coming back and it was an amazing day at the beach!

title: We love Freddy and Jake
review: Dear Samantha:  I am pleased you had a wonderful stay with us and the beach team took great care of you.  We look forward to seeing you again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: WE LOVE FREDDY-GOOD DAY AT RHE BEACH
review: Freddy and Jake were dope. They had great service before we even asked for help. Although it was hot and had to keep arranging chairs they did it with a smile on their face. Very grateful for their kindness and service. I recommend this club for a stay with the family.

title: Continued Excellence
review: Dear Taylor: Glad you found us to be a great family place for a stay.  Thanks for your kind mention of Freddy and Jake.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: The beach team
review: As I walked into the resort at Longboat Key Club I immediately felt relaxed and without a care in the world as I was welcomed into the gate with a smiling face. Jake and Freddy were absolutely amazing and so so helpful with whatever my friends and I needed and did it with a smile on their faces. Ozzie and Ally were also great and so helpful. Love this place!

title: Great service
review: Stayed for week at the resort with my family and friends at we had a great time. We went to the beach every single day and the service out there is amazing !! The beach boys are great ! Especially Ozzy and Hunter the keep coming to make sure we were having the best time. At the pool Allie Martin took care of us giving us towels and chairs. She is truly an awesome girl !!

title: Great Service
review: Dear Ana N: Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest. I am pleased you enjoyed your time and the pool and beach team did a wonderful job taking care of you.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Family weekend Trip
review: Ozzy and Kim provided exceptional service by the ocean. I would highly recommend relaxing on the beach! They helped us with umbrellas, beverages and paddle boards. At the pool, Allie assisted us. I love when staff members know when to ask if you need something and when to let you relax.

title: Great time at LBKC!!
review: Dear camtampa: Thank you for your kind review. It’s great to hear that Ozzy, Kim and Allie took such great care of you. We look forward to seeing you again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Wonderful Anniversay Weekend!
review: Terrific visit to this lovely resort right on the beach.  Accommodations in the rooms are nice typical rooms for a place on the beach.  What sets this place apart is the service.  Staff is very attentive and happy.  Special call outs to Allie, Freddie, and Ollie for their terrific service!

title: Best beach in florida
review: We hosted 75 of our closest friends at LBKC beach and had the best time! Big shot out to Hunter & Zach for setting up our beach party and keeping our group wow'd! We rented paddle boards, kayaks, chairs, and the hobie cat! We always had a drink in our hands and the breeze just right! Thank you guys!

title: Best pool staff! Especially Stacey!
review: Dear Catherine C: Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest.  Thank you for having your group stay with us and I am pleased you enjoyed your time here.  Thanks for the special mention of Hunter and Zach.  We look forward to seeing you again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: We love Freddy
review: If you loved being pampered by the pool then Stacey is your girl! She's constantly on the go making sure you're as comfy as you can be by the pool. Without you even having to flag her down, she knows when your umbrellas need turning to keep you shaded or to keep the shade off of you. You can tell she loves her job and working in the summer heat of Florida doesn't phase her! If you want a drink see Kim she's great at knowing what you'll like and providing recommendations on new drinks she thinks you will like. If you love the beach too go see Eric. We're having a blast this 4th of July week thanks to all the hospitality provided by the Resort at Longboat Key Club! Oh and Stacey's mom has got it going on!

title: We love Freddy
review: We had another great beach trip it's second time. The room and service was great. The people were fun especially the beach crew. Freddy was awesome he was funny and fun to talk to also ozzy was funny. Allie was the sweetest pool girl ever. Everything was what I wanted it to be.

title: My Favorite Florida Resort
review: Freddy attended us, and brought us waters. He offered to bring them, and the service was there so quickly. Ozzy was very humorous, and was always smiling. Ally was a fun pool girl! The room and service is amazing. I'm having a great trip with friends and family.

title: Awesome vacation
review: I stayed at the resort over the weekend with my family and we had an amazing time ! The service at the beach is outstanding, the beach attendants are great specially Ozzy, Hunter and Freddy they were always making sure we were ok. At the pool the service is great too Allie Martin took care of my family and treated us like royalty. We will be coming back for sure !!

title: Been coming here for years
review: I've spent alot of time at LBKC and the staff is fantastic. But this week Zack is the man! We had come to the beach late with hopes of getting chairs up front by the gulf (we knew it would be tough mid day on a weekend) and as expected it was busy. But within minutes Zack worked his magic and we were on the beach. Huge hi-five for saving the day!

title: Amazing resort and staff (especially Stacey!)
review: Staying here with family/friends for the 4th of July week. Stacey at the pool deck was absolutely amazing! She was always happy to help and provided such great service. Will definitely be coming back to see her!! Beautiful resort, great rooms, and such a nice beach. 5 stars!

title: The beach team
review: We arrived during a pretty slow day which was awesome. The device was great at the beach. Freddy set us up some chairs and he pretty cool and funny guy he talked to us for a while. Ozzie also helped us out along with Zach and Eric at the beach. Allie was the cute pool girl who attended us. Everything was great and five star feeling.

title: The beach team
review: The beach team was great as I've heard. Freddy and Zach took care of us pretty well. They're pretty hard workers they were here the whole day when I went. Ozzy was a funny guy as well. Allie was such a nice pool girl as well. I'll definitely be back and I would suggest a stay here as well.

title: Freddy the man
review: I came to the club again with some friends and it was great as always. I would recommend going here for a relaxing easy day at the beach. When we were there it wasn't busy at all which was great the attention that we received was awesome. Freddy hooked us up with exactly what we wanted. Zach kept checking up on us. I also saw Ozzy who was pretty great at managing the team.

title: Review of the resort
review: Great location with great service, Front desk with Rob was excellent. Service at the pool was outstanding with Stacey doing a lot of work to make all guests.comfortable with pool services. Been there several times this year and noticed Stacey going out of her way to make things nice at the pool. Excellent room service, great views and nice bar staff at Barefoots.  Bruce and Kathy

title: Beach service!
review: Beach service was phenomenal by both Joseph and Nevan! Great guys that accommodated everything you asked for. Pleasant expertises for sure!! Umbrella placement was spot on to ensure our comfort while relaxing our day away on the beach! Would have no issues asking for their assistance with any beach needs.

title: JUST RETURNED FROM LONGBOAT JULY 2016
review: Disappointed - have been going for a few years - staff are still the best - however we rented a 2 bedroom deluxe - overlooking the beach - mother nature has really did a number on the size of the beach there - 1/2 of the beach is gone - if your looking for quiet and some personal space this is not the beach for you!

title: Beach Changes!
review: This is our 3rd visit to this resort!  The rooms are still decent and service is pretty good.  Could use some updating when it comes to plastic flowers as you enter and pool area.  The biggest change was the change in the beach - which due to erosion and shifting currents is pretty much gone.  I really wish the resort would update pictures or at least on their FB page.  Love Longboat Key, but will try a different place to stay next time!

title: Misleading, inattentive, overpriced, outdated
review: Where do I begin. I have to first say that this is my first review ever - hotel or restaurant or whatever. My family and I are lucky enough to be able to travel about 7 times a year around Florida since we live in Miami and so we have been to many hotels in the keys, Naples, Orlando, and Palm Beach many times, (not to mention the many hotels we have visited around the world of all classes /categories). We have stayed at anywhere from a Hilton to a four seasons as recent as 2 weeks ago and so we just like to know what to expect wherever we are going to stay and have those expectations met. Clearly the level of service or quality of room or property is not going to be the same everywhere, but for what we paid in this resort ($500 a night for a junior "beachfront" suite with all of…

title: Vacation and wedding
review: We where invited to a wedding. At the long boat key resort. This place is amazing get away. You can walk to the beach plenty of activities to do. The staff is helpful. The up keep of the resort is outstanding. The wedding was beautiful. The drinks and food are top notch. We will be coming back.

title: beach services
review: Hunter and Ozzy helped us at the beach! great trip. great service today over 4th of July weekend. we love the longboat key club beach resort and have visited many times over the years. highly recommended for families of all ages! also Jennifer and Alex have helped me out.

title: Back for a second time !!
review: I stayed at the resort for the weekend for a second time family trip and we had a terrific time, the service keeps getting better and better , at the pool the attendant Allie Martin remembered our names and help us to set up our chairs. The beach was great too the attendants are very helpful and they are always making sure you are having a great time. Big shout out to Ozzy , Freddy and Hunter the made my vacation special !!

title: Pampered Fun
review: My daughter and I took her two little ones for five day get away at this resort. The accommodations were perfect! We had a one bedroom suite with full kitchen. The balcony off the living room was huge and even included a more private one off the large master suite. We were in the fourth building on the top floor. The sunset view was spectacular!! No noise or view to our balcony at all except from the beach. Room # 4603 is fantastic. The location was a short walk away from the pretty pool, bar, and restaurants. There were several areas for dining. Food was terrific as were the drinks!! What really made this resort so special were the employees. Ozzie and Matt actually carried my grand babies' stroller to the cabana for us on the sand. They keep the beach pristine too.  Flavia…

title: Beach services
review: I stayed at the resort with my family for a second time and we loved it. The service at the beach is amazing specially Ozzy the beach attendant was really nice to us, he keep coming to make sure we were having a great time. Also the service at the pool was great. Allie Martin took care of all our needs and treated us like royalty.

title: Best Kept Secret Paradise on the Gulf
review: Been traveling to the Longboat Key Club for many years and even though we'll venture to other tropical destinations, nothing compares to Longboat Key!  Incredible vistas, pristine waters and amazing staff always willing to help you with anything!  Best beach guys on the beach, Nevan, Ozzie, and Leo will set you up with cushioned lounges and umbrellas steps away from the Gulf or will help you with a kayak or paddleboard to view the amazing dolphins, manatees and rays that swim by!  Waitresses Cheryl and Kathy will deliver tropical drinks in a timely manner either at the beach or by the pool.  Looking for dinner reservations?  Talk to Sherman the concierge, will steer you in right direction to one of the many delicious restaurants nearby.  Winter, Spring, Summer or Fall, we travel…

title: Relaxing weekend away with the family :-)
review: We stayed at this resort last weekend because I was in town for a conference.  This was not the official conference hotel, but I wanted to stay somewhere directly on the beach.  We stayed in a Jr. Suite, overlooking the ocean. The room itself was clean, relatively updated, and suited our needs well.  Having a kitchen was priceless, as I have 2 boys and a husband who eat almost constantly.  The pool was clean, but pretty standard- the one thing that could really use some updating in order to keep up with the competition.   The beach was beautiful, and it really meant a lot that we were able to have umbrellas and chairs included so we didn't have to bring them with us (or pay $$$ extra).  However, what definitely stood out was the outstanding service we received.  Everyone from…

title: Visiting the Club
review: Today my husband and I just decided to go visit the club because one of the cabana boys recommended it to us. Freddy was there to help us this morning and he was great. The whole team really was great they all seem to have a great work ethic. Ozzy was great too with a funny attitude.

title: Relaxing long weekend
review: We spent 4 nights and three full days in this very relaxing and exclusive beach resort. The beach is clean and beautiful, water temperature is perfect; service is excellent, rooms are clean and comfortable. We didn't use sports facilities, but tennis courts and golf course look great. The swimming pool is great, mainly for adults or children who know how to swim. We enjoyed visiting the boutiques and restaurants at Saint Armand's Circle, ten minutes driving distance from the hotel. Great place!!

title: Staff are excellent
review: A relaxed, laid back resort, situated on the beautiful Longboat Key, with the boutique shops and restaurants in the buzzy St Armands Circle 10 minutes away. The hotel is on a beautiful, if a little depleted, beach. The pool area and hotel areas are nicely done, the rooms spacious and fully equipped However, it is the staff make this hotel. Rob at reception, Cathy at the Pool Bar, Jennifer at the pool desk is super friendly and fun and Joseph at the beach could not do enough for us. The beach waitress Cheryl is just amazing - she is like a little dynamo, running around the beach, bringing refreshing cocktails whenever needed! A perfect place for a family getaway.

title: Beach furniture lets the resort down
review: We have been coming to the resort for 8 years, it is our favorite place. The pool area has been treated to lovely new (matching) furniture and looks great. However, despite repeated promises by  the resort, the beach furniture still looks like an afterthought of thrown together items, picked up from some garage sale. Various items of mismatched, multicolored items ruin the look of the beach. It is such a shame. The resort has an issue with the beach erosion at the moment, and that can't be helped, but the furniture should be sorted out. Also, the pool restrooms are awful and should be updated. They are kept clean, but are smelly and not very nice to visit. They have not been updated in the years that we have been coming, and attention to them is past due.

title: Nice vacation by the pool and beach
review: We had our annual family vacation at the hotel. I moved to FL last year but all of relatives came down from PA and we stayed at the resort for a week. The resort was very nice, rooms were clean, property was well maintained, restaurant food was always good. We had a few young children in our group so we spent a lot of time at the pool. Jennifer was very helpful at the pool. She helped us set up chairs, umbrellas, recommended toys for the kids, extra swim diapers and even an ice cream shop on St. Armand's for an after dinner treat. Thanks again and we'll see you next year.  Joan W.

title: Vacation
review: Good beach, good hotel, staff was very polite and helpful, in particular staff member Hunter on beach was very helpful, went out of way to accommodate us and others. Definitely a very family oriented location, wouldn't recommend if you are with college age children however.

title: Stacey
review: Had the opportunity to use the pool at LBK club and was greeted by Stacey.  She was friendly, informative and gracious with her interaction.  She was definitely focused on making everyone's stay the best possible . Must say she is a true asset to the property .

title: Excellent thanks to Kimberley.
review: Arrived here for three nights on the 3rd leg of our holiday. We'd booked and paid for a junior suite and as we approached the resort it was clear one of the hotels 6 accommodation blocks was inward facing looking onto a golf course and main road. The wife said 'bet we end up in there' and sure enough the girl who checked us in put us in that block. We went over to see the room but the key wouldn't work and the wife was nearly crying, saying we havent come across the world to look at a main road. So we went back and Kimberley saw to us this time. The wife said we would like to move, and we were willing to pay extra, and Kimberley worked her magic and got us the most wonderful room on the fourth floor of block two, overlooking the beach. It was a premium junior suite and she let…

title: Great Weekend Vacation and Wonderful Hotel Staff
review: My wife and I recently stayed the weekend at the Resort.  We had a beautiful ocean view and were favorably impressed with all of the Hotel staff, from the valet greeter, front desk to housekeeping, they always greeted us with a friendly smile and receptive to any of our requests.  The beach and were in great condition and excellent places to view the Florida West Coast sunsets.  Evening turndown service and chocolates were a nice treat.  Lunch at the pool was delicious.  Stacey the with the pool staff was very attentive, always helping shade the sun and just a great person to talk with and answer any questions we had.  Don't miss the restaurants and shopping at the nearby St. Armands Circle.    This was our third week end stay during the past two years and we have reserved a 4th…

title: Birthday get away
review: We enjoyed our stay immensely! Beautiful view, resort, beach area and water. Stacie by the pool area especially was a a superstar! So friendly & helpful. No need for you to move a chair or umbrella. She is all over it!  Incredible! Can't wait to return.

title: Sarasota vacation
review: Longboat beach club is where it is at to relax and regroup. The service is incredible loved Stacy she had me perfectly set up at the pool where I could enjoy the sun but not burn my keltic self. Allie dropped off the perfect Mojito and I am set for the day!!

title: MY FIRST ESPERIENCE IN THE RESORT OF LONGBOAT KEY CLUB
review: My experience at The Resort of Longboat Key Club was excellent.  The staff at the front desk were very professional.  The room was accommodating.  At the pool there was a very nice employee by the name of Stacy.  She was very helpful, cordial and  friendly.  I will definitely visit the Resort in the future.

title: Excellent
review: Stacey at the pool treated me like a king from the moment I arrived yesterday. She gave me key points of interest, and made me feel welcome. This place is beautiful and recommend it to everyone. Stacey is very knowledgeable, dedicated, and was the highlight of my vacation.

title: Day with Sara at the Beach
review: Today is my birthday!! So I decided to come to the resort with my bestfriend Sara. She had already been here and said it was great so I asked her to take me. It was pretty awesome that some of the same crew was there to attend us. Freddy hooked us up with a cabana he was so nice and cute. Ozzy was the manager and he made sure everything kept being great. Allie Martin was so nice as well, we talked to her for a bit at the towel desk place. Nevan finished it off with wishing us a great day with a great attitude. It's a great birthday so far!!

title: Vacation
review: We had a great time! Hunter on the beach was great! Appreciated all of his help setting us up on the beach! Awesome job! Beautiful view and loved the special attention we received from him and Kim on the beach. Also John in the restaurant was amazing to us this morning!

title: Joseph the beach attendant
review: Joseph's service made our trip! He accommodated all of our requests and even went above and beyond to make our trip as nice as possible! He not only arranged our chairs and umbrellas by the beach but he also positioned the cushions and towels so that we were as comfortable as possible. He was amazing!

title: Freddy and his crew
review: This trip was the best our family has had in a long time very nice people on the beach Freddy was very nice and so was jake thanks long boat for this trip we will be coming back next year and hope to have a good trip as well.As well as the trip was very nice the beach was very white

title: Luxurious resort just outside of Sarasota.
review: We loved the large property, which never felt crowded. Our spacious room was the lowest level accommodation, but it was fabulous. Our outdoor balcony had a spectacular lagoon view with amazing sunrises and wildlife.  The Sunday brunch was terrific, loved the pool and beach. We were there for a wedding, which was also beautiful -- ceremony on the beach, with reception and dinner overlooking the golf course.  Banquet food was quite good as well.

title: Amazing Place, will be back!
review: Dear 799KateA1: Thank you for the 5 review and for being our guest.  I am very pleased you had a wonderful stay and that you found your accommodations spacious and fabulous.  Great to hear the Brunch was wonderful and you enjoyed the beach.   Glad you came in for a wedding.  Our beach weddings are truly spectacular.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: It was excellent!!
review: Resort at Longboat Key was great. The rooms were super clean and comfortable. We stayed in a Jr. suite that had conveniences such as an eat in kitchen and laundry unit. The staff was very attentive and helpful. Ally and Stacey were very accomodating and came right over to help us with our umbrellas and towels and to redeem our free drinks☺.I also made a few calls to the concierge and they brought up what I needed very promptly. Resort grounds are beautiful, tennis courts, lagoon, golf course, gym, and spa all on the premises. I also appreciated that it's not too crowded and easy to get a spot by the pool/ beach.

title: Great service! Lovely place!
review: Dear Beachbabe32990: Thank you for being our guest and your “5” review!  Happy to hear you enjoyed your junior suite and found it clean and comfortable.  Great to hear also that our staff was very attentive and helpful. Thanks for your special mention of Stacey and Ally as well as the promptness of service with the concierge. We look forward to seeing you again very soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Pretty solid my dude
review: My family and I went to the resort for Father's Day to hangout at the beach for a little bit. The service was great. There were two very friendly and helpful gentlemen; Freddy and Ozzy. Overall, a great place and great service from the employees.

title: Attention to detail
review: I am extremely critical , but could not find anything to complain about as everything was just about perfect. The room was spotless and quiet, housekeeping was difficult as the staff speaks no English, beach is lovely and the pool is very nice, it is expensive but with a travelzoo deal we got  nice junior suite for $300 total a night.

title: Fantastic hotel, beautiful views
review: Stayed here for 3 nights having driven past it on a number of occasions when staying on Longboat Key. From minute arrived treated extremely well by all staff. The room allocated on arrival was very nice but disappointing as the two beds were quite small. Contacted reception and they offered an alternative room which incurred an upgrade fee. It was well worth it, the difference was unbelievable, the biggest bed ever and views of the beach and sea that took your breath away!!  Had a fab stay, spent many hours walking on the beach and sitting watching the dolphins in the nearby inlet. Dolphins swam past in the sea everyday so could watch them from the balcony. Utilised the free bikes provided by the hotel to explore Longboat Key and be amazed by the lavish properties. Didn't eat or…

title: A day in paradise at the club
review: Today I arrived at the longboat key club with my girlfriend and we walked up to the beach and I was greeted very sincerely by the sweetest people named Freddy, Ally, Ozzie, and Nevan. They checked up on us very frequently and made sure that we were in good hands. Amazing food service by the staff and just an all around great day at the beach.

title: A great experience!
review: I had a great time at Longboat key club! Freddy, Ozzy, and Allie were all very helpful! Their service was great! They periodically checked up on us to make sure we were doing okay. Nevan and Freddy greeted us and made us feel welcome! It was very nice!

title: Not what we expected
review: We have mixed feelings about this hotel.  We were hoping our stay here would be a real treat at the end of our holiday as it had been recommended to us but it really wasn't as nice as we'd hoped.  The resort is pleasant, not luxury, the rooms are a nice size but there were enough small issues to add up to an overall disappointing stay.  Having come from an amazing hotel in Naples where the service is second to none, we felt a bit let down by this hotel. Whilst some of the staff are friendly and the reception manager was exceptional there are quite a few that are not so welcoming and we felt there is an underlying tenseness to the atmosphere.  A good example was the poor kids pool meal of Mac & cheese only there was no cheese and he only ate half of it as it was that bad! When I…

title: Great resort and beautiful location
review: This is my 3rd time here and service is consistently top notch. Staff is quite attentive to details. On-site food is excellent and plentiful. Junior suites contain just about all you need to cook for yourself and wash clothes in your room as well. Balconies are great with table, chairs and lounger. Lagoon and beach views. The gulf is usually calm and shallow very far out. Pool and beach staff are nice, helpful, and accommodating. We rode bikes around the property, the use of which is included in the required resort fee of $20/day.

title: Resort Showing Its Age
review: I have been coming to this resort for over 25 years. It is now part of the Opal Collection - "luxury hotel" - but the resort is not so luxurious.  This visit was a disappointment from the guest services at the beach to the property itself, e.g., torn beach umbrellas, dirty beach chair cushions, torn bed sheets, rusted light on terrace. Attention to details and guest services were lacking, which I didn't expect at this caliber of a property. We had problems with our shower, but the engineers were prompt and courteous in resolving the problems (yes, multiple). Also, upon check-in we were given a ground floor room facing the pool, even though I had requested a beach view. It's a challenge to "view" the beach from this level and it's a stretch to call it a "beach view" room. After I…

title: Family Week
review: My  wife and I spent a week at this hotel. It had wonderful beach service and the staff was friendly. Shout out to Ozzy and Hunter whom took care of my family on the beach, they keep coming to check on us to make sure we were having an awesome time, Also I want to mention the pool attendant Allie Martin that took care of all our needs on the pool, I highly recomendamos this resort

title: Talk About Service
review: Have you ever been sitting on the beach with one of you very bestest friends, when, one of you wants to sit in the sun while the other prefers shade???? What to do? What to do? Well, Zach and Hunter solved that problem! They set up our umbrella perfectly and did it with a smile! Awesome people, beautiful resort!!

title: Longboat
review: I just went to the beach. It was a nice day and pretty slow but the attitude was still great. The cabana boys on duty were Joseph and Freddy. Joseph showed me to to our chairs and made sure everything was taken care of everything. Then for the five star experience Freddy came and checked up on us frequently. It was the true five star experience.

title: I love this place and their staff!
review: What a great beautiful day to spend doing what I love most, which is laying on the beach and reading a book! Today, I went down to the beach by myself (which is rare) to enjoy a great book while I listen to the waves. It was extra special as I was greeted by Jake on the way to the beach. He asked me what side of the beach I would like to be on and I looked around and decided to the right. I did see the luxury bed with nice clean towels spread out, but since I was by myself I thought they only reserved those for couples there's no way I'll get that. Just as I thought that Jake said "how about this?" Of course I was like "really?" So he set me up with an umbrella perfectly that allowed me to tan on one side and have shade on the other! About 10 mins or so later he came by and…

title: Stacey is the best!
review: Dear JenniferS: Thank you for being our guest and for your “5” review.  I am very pleased that you had a wonderful time on the beach and were able to enjoy a beach bed while there to enjoy your book on.   Thank you for your kind mention of Jake (as Beach setup concierge), Cheryl (as Food and beverage server) and Ed (as bartender).  We look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beautiful location and service!!
review: We had the best pool experience with Stacey. She made sure we were extremely satisfied and had the best chairs poolside. Even helpful and patient with my elderly and very slow father who can be a huge pain. Extremely professional and sweet!!

title: Another 5 star rating for Ocean Properties!
review: Dear Guest:  Thank you for being our guest and the “5” review.  We appreciate your recognition of Stacey and her service spirit.   I am pleased you and your father had a wonderful experience with us.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Awesome weekend !
review: The Resort at Longboat Key Club is beautiful and the employees are so helpful and have excellent customer service attitudes, especially Stacey.  I visited the Longboat Key Marina and had dinner at Portofino's as well.

title: Great beach services
review: I visited the resort with my family and we had the most amazing time. The highlight of my day was the service we received at the beach. The beach attendants are awesome specially Ozzy and Hunter that keep coming to our chair to make sure we were having a great time. I also want to mention their manager Leo that was super nice to my family. At the pool we where super impressed by Allie Martin the pool attendant, she was really courteous and professional, we will come back for sure!

title: Awesome day !
review: Dear Maria R: Thank you for being our guest and your “5” review!  I am very pleased that you and your family had a wonderful stay at the resort.  Thanks for your mention of Ozzy, Hunter, Leo and Allie.  I am pleased that they had a positive impact on your experience with us.  We look forward to seeing you again next time. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Excelent service!!!!!!
review: I went to the beach and had the most amazing day. They where so sweet and the people who help me where so wonderful especially Ozzy, Hunter, Allie and Leo they continue to make sure we where serviced during are day. They where always there to help and answer all are questions they where amazing!!!!!!

title: Beach services
review: Dear Sarahann R Thank you for being our guest and the “5” review!   I am happy to hear you had a great time at the beach and that you enjoyed Ozzy, Hunter, Allie and Leo.  Thanks for mentioning that they made your day amazing. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beach services
review: The pool and beach staff were AMAZING! Especially Ozzy and jake they went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable. Couldn't be more happy with longboat key club! It was a great place for the family! Allie at the pool was great, she recommend some fun places to go in the area!

title: 4 Perfect Days
review: The highlight of this trip was the service we received pool & beach side. Ozzy & Hunter were perfect. The right amount of attention & laughter that make the time feel like a moment with friends rather a chore. The drinks, towels, and service kept coming! The right amount of check ins, not too much or too little. They made a really special moment in what could have been a regular day. Perfect, perfect, perfect.

title: Ozzy - beach seevices
review: Dear Christa L Thank you for being our guest and the “5” review! Thank you for your kind mention of your time at the Pool and Beach and especially Hunter and Ozzy.  Glad they made your time special. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Ozzy
review: First visit to Longboat Key Club and have thoroughly enjoyed it. Ozzy was GREAT!!  He was very attentive and continuously checked in on our group to refill ice water, adjust the umbrella, etc. Great customer service. I misplaced my cellphone and both Ozzy and Hunter searched for it until we found it. Great time at the resort!!

title: Beach boys (and girls)!
review: Dear mercyrodriguez:  Thank you for being our guest and the “5” review! Thank you for your kind mention of Ozzy and Hunter.  I am very pleased you had a wonderful time at the resort.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Extreme over-charge mistake took 6 months to resolve!!!!
review: Our time at this resort was amazing. The staff was extremely attentive. I especially want to send a shout out to Ozzy, he catered to us at the beach and pool area. He was absolutely amazing and went out of his way to make sure we were comfortable and had everything we need it. He also had an amazing partner, so shout out to Hunter! You guys rock!!!

title: Disappointing Visit: Website misrepresents beach and room!
review: We have stayed here several times during the past years, but we were very disappointed in the resort this year. We were particuarly annoyed that the website pictures and descriptions did not accurately represent the current conditions of the beaches or the room. Unfortunately, they have suffered very heavy beach erosion; subsequently, there is only a small patch of powder beach and the loungers and cabanas are all crowded next to each other. Absolutely no comparison to the pictures from the past, still on their website, of vast stretches of powder beach. We had booked a Junior Suite Beach View and were looking forward to sitting on the balcony with a view of the ocean. Instead, we got a pool view which was loud, offered little privacy and allowed only a glimpse of the ocean.…

title: A long weekend in paradise
review: Beginning with Tina in the reservations department who couldn't have been nicer , more efficient , and personable  . . . we made our reservation to spend 5 days at The Resort at Longboat Key - our favorite getaway , where we've been coming for over 20 years . Upon arrival , we were greeted by Rick Benninghove at the front desk - Resort Operations Director - and were treated in a most warm and welcoming manner . We were given the suite in the building that we requested and had stayed before , and because it was a special occasion , were treated to champagne and chocolates - what a delight . The accommodations were clean and the room ready , maid service was regular and punctual , room service was as well , and we were made to feel like we were enjoying a home away from home . …

title: Amazing In Everyway !
review: Exceptional consistent service ! Beautiful resort, amazing beach, extremely attentive staff. You can not get any better than the Longboat Key Club ! Hunter, Ozzy and Nevan were terrific the best beach assistants, Sherman never steers you wrong with a recommendation or assistance. Classy yet comfortable, everything you want in a vacation ! Can't wait to return !

title: Spacious and Beautiful
review: Longboat Key is the best place to stay in the Sarasota area - not crowded, excellent beach, and near St. Armand's Circle shops, restaurants, and nightlife without the hustle and bustle of other beaches. The Resort is beautiful and spacious. Our Junior Suite (Golf View) had a large sitting area, full kitchen with washer and dryer, and a large dressing area. The pool area has plenty of space and excellent staff and outstanding service, (especially Stacey in pool service), with a warm and beautiful Gulf Coast beach.
