The fitness club is huge, and the evenings were fun with a small band playing Wednesday - Sunday. Much nicer than other overcrowded resorts!

title: Great vacation spot for beach and tennis lovers
review: Stayed for five days in suite (full apartment) facing the gulf. Very good value. Loved the tennis. Zoe at the tennis garden did a great job finding doubles matches for us on short notice. No extra charge for tennis or beach chairs and umbrella. Great service at pool and beach. Lots of great restaurants in the area. Food and drinks at resort restaurants was good too. Will definitely be back.

title: Carribbean without the passport!!!!
review: This is within the top 3 of all vacation resorts I have ever had the pleasure of visiting.  The resort was top notch from start to finish.  We stayed in building 4, with amazing views of the water and sunset.  We felt as if we were renting a condo on the beach.  Never felt like we were at a resort unless we walked over to the lobby.    The water is just as beautiful as the Caribbean waters.  Many have complained about the beach erosion - I did not see any issue.  Even over a holiday weekend we had space apart from our neighboring beach chair dwellers and never felt cramped.    This is truly a place to relax and unwind.  Lots of great restaurants only a short distance from the resort.  Great job Resort at Longboat Key.  All as advertised, but better!!!!

title: Beach getaway
review: My stay at the resort this past week was amazing! The resort had a lot to offer from the golf course to the restaurants to the beach and pool. The food service around the pool was great, I would highly recommend eating lunch at the pool. Hunter out on the beach was highly accommodating making sure we had enough shade throughout the day. I would recommend the resort to anyone looking for a beach getaway!

title: Old pictures of beach
review: I returned to the Longboat Key Club hoping that that the Opal Colection had made some positive changes since my last visit..  Big change?   NO BEACH.  The pictures of the beach are false advertising.  They were taken several years ago, long before Opal took over the property.  Erosion has reduced the beach to a sliver.  The only section that is large enough  is cordoned off for a private functions.    Back to the very crowded   pool that is shared with beach club members. Very disappointed that one of the biggest draws to the resort is gone.

title: Spectacular Weekend
review: We visited this resort for the first time as we traveled for a destination wedding on site. Our experience throughout the entire weekend was first class. We appreciated staff members Freddy and Nevan for their great service getting us set up comfortably at the beach. Allie and Liz were attentive, friendly and helpful for our days spent at the pool. Thanks to Jennifer at the front desk for her great attitude and welcoming spirit that really set the tone for the start of a great vacation. Our room had a view that featured dolphins swimming through the lagoon! Overall, we were able to relax and enjoy the amazingly beautiful scenery and take advantage of the awesome amenities at the resort.

title: Great vacation
review: My husband and I just returned from a long weekend here. We just loved it. The resort was awesome. It's location on the beach was perfect. The beach was amazing! Very clean with beautiful turquoise water. The resort offered lounge chairs, umbrellas, towels and food/drink service. Plus the beach staff was extremely helpful and friendly. All of the staff we dealt with were extremely professional, friendly and helpful. Lynda at the front desk was especially helpful with suggestions and directions! This was our first visit here and we will definitely be back. Anyone looking for a great beach getaway with no hassles and lots of relaxation - this is the place for you!   We had a room with a golf course view. It was extremely quiet. We had a great room with a king size bed, a sitting…

title: An amazing holiday
review: We have been coming to the Resort for about 20 years but have to say that this was one of our best stays ever. Sadly the beach erosion has significantly reduced the size of the beach but there is still plenty of room to have your own space and the beach staff, especially Joseph and Matt were happy to walk that bit further up the beach and set us up away from the crowds!  Stacey at the pool was excellent and friendly and went the extra mile. The management too went out of their way before our stay to reassure us about the beach and we were very grateful. The accommodation was superb and we will definitely be returning to one of our favourite holiday destinations!

title: Zach
review: Zach was very knowledgable about all the attractions in the area and was always there to check on us when we needed. Overall, the food was also very good and the drinks tasted great! I loved the longboat key club and would definitely stay again!

title: Beach review
review: The beach service is wonderful. Everything you need is provided, except a good book. A special thanks to Ozzy and Cheryl for making our beach day the best ! The weather was perfect and the water was Caribbean clear 😎. If you are looking for a great beach experience, this is the place to be.

title: Superb service at the beach
review: It's Memorial Day and we spent it at the beach.   We were greeted by Nevan who helped us with our chairs and stopped by numerous times to check and see if we needed anything.   We ordered drinks and food with  Cheryl who is always very attentive and continually stops by to see when we our ready for another drink.   The service us wonderful and if you would like a wonderful afternoon visit the beach while staying at longboat key

title: Beach services review
review: I went to The Resort on Longboat Key and it was beautiful! Ozzy Martin went out of his way to make us have a comfortable stay on the beach and he was so personal able! Thank you! Will visits again. Also I wanted to mention Allie Martin the pool attendant that took care of us on the pool, she is awesome.

title: Beach services
review: My friends and I visited longboat key club and resort for memorial weekend. The beach services were wonderful and were always very helpful and accommodating; going out of their way to make us comfortable. We would like to give special thanks to ozzy for being very friendly and personable. He complemented my umbrella!

title: Vacation
review: This place has everything! Pool, Golf, Gym, Spa.... And the beach is amazing !  This is my favorite place in Sarasota ! Food is great and the staff is very helpful. Tiffany went out of her way to get my daughter her favorite chocolate and the front desk is always helpful! Love this place !

title: Outstanding service
review: I visited the Resort with my family over the weekend and I was really impressed with the service at the beach. The beach attendants and their managers are doing a phenomenal job. Especially Leo and Ozzy treated my family like royalty and they kept coming to make sure we were having a great time. I also want to mention the girl that work at the pool Allie Martin that was by far the most friendly and professional pool attendant at the resort.

title: Longboat Club was fun
review: The service was great. The one who greeted us was jake. He made a great set up and was a great guy. Freddy was the one that fetched us our extra stuff he was pretty funny and cute. Alex was the one who led us out and he was just as great as the others. All in all the beach staff really put the cherry on top of the five star feel.

title: Day at the beach
review: I had a great day it was awesome weather. Freddy helped us out with everything we needed. Jake helped us get set up with all of the chairs and seat cushions. Jake was great too. Alex fetched us all that we needed with towels and even cracked some jokes with us.

title: Awesome service
review: Jake and Freddy were great, i love the resort. The hotel is very clean and the beach is very relaxing. The food I had for lunch was delicious and we were all happy with our drinks. It's a nice location for family time and the holidays. Very happy.

title: Overall Amazing
review: Fabulous weekend here! The hotel is a world of its own. The staff are friendly and do whatever it takes to go above and beyond. The rooms have amazing views of the Gulf of Mexico. The brunch in the hotel lobby restaurant on Sundays is one of the best ever! Plan to go back every year!

title: Amazing!
review: Had a great time! Hunter helped us with our chairs & picked the perfect spot to relax! The water and sky were clear, and the sun was shining! Perfect vacation spot. i also really loves the food and drinks! the chairs were super comfy. Hunter was amazing!!! definitely request hunter !!!!!!

title: Beautiful Hotel and Resort.
review: Stayed here when my grandson graduated from Dave Leadbetter school of golf and high school.  I saw my first flamingo coming in the driveway.  Beautiful pool with drinks and food available right beside the chairs or you can sit under umbrellas on the beach and look out into the gulf waters. Noticed little lizards hoping around.  The rooms were absolutely gorgeous.  All the conveniences of home plus you can shop and cook in.. Beautiful views at night while you sat out in on the terrace. Even saw dolphins swimming by.  Wonderful golf course, tennis courts, and a spa.  Daughter and grand daughter would search for shells every morning on the beach.  Lovely place to stay..

title: Mr. Reliable
review: Dear LindaE  Thank you for your “5” review and for being our guest.  I’m glad you enjoyed your stay and found the rooms gorgeous.  It is always a pleasure when the dolphin come to visit.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Birthday Weekend
review: Had a great time with the help of Hunter and Ozzy. They had all the chairs and towels ready for a party of 12! Very well worth it! Love being a member here. The good is great, and the beach is so beautiful. The pool is always nice, and everyone on the beach is so helpful. In particular Ozzy and Hunter!

title: Hunter
review: Dear Madisyn O:  Thank you for the “5” review!  We are pleased you had such a wonderful Birthday weekend and Ozzy and Hunter took great care of you.  Thanks for mentioning the pool and beach are wonderful and the team being helpful.   See you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Oh no! What happened to the beach???
review: Hunter was amazing, love being a part of this club! He helped us find chairs and he kept a food conversation going for a while. He makes this place more fun to visit and we look forward to seeing him everytime he works! Xoxo rose

title: Terrific Weekend Destination
review: Dear Roseamato: Thank you for the “5” review and for your kind mention of Hunter.  Glad you had fun at the beach and we look forward to seeing you again next time.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Fine front desk staff.  Nice rooms.  Great view of the Gulf.
review: Okay, hate to start off with the negative, because I really do like this resort, but the beach is no where near what it used to be. We have been to this resort 3 times in the last 15 or so years, with the last visit coming nearly 10 years ago, and all I remembered was that this place had one of the most remarkable stretches of silky white sand you would ever lay your derriere upon. The beach was wide, deep, soft - it really held its own against some of the best in the caribbean. Well, that beach is almost entirely gone. What is left is still pretty nice, especially if you get away from the sardine can between the piers, but it is simply too hard to forget what once was if you were there a few years ago. If you're a beach lover, don't despair. Just remove yourself from the crowds…

title: Good way to start our Florida swing!
review: We recently stayed at the resort for the first time and were pleasantly surprised. Our small suite was really nice and the layout made it very roomy. The service is very good at the beach, bar and restaurant. I would recommend this place for anyone looking for a quiet getaway.

title: Didn't get what we paid for - ask for the trash/service tunnel view
review: Yes, it's well groomed and a high end resort. I paid for a ocean view nice room $325. We checked in and got the key. Told to drive around and park the building / room was right there. That's where it got very odd and went from a 4 start to a 1 star. Where the room was located was right above and in front of the trash / maid service tunnel. and the only entrance to that side of the building was a "stair well" - we go up the steps to the dingy stair well and it's not nice - then open a side door and we go to our room (a couple doors down). First the room is unlocked when we arrive (the lock bar is holding it open. Is someone in there? knock - know - no one is there. We turn around and we are staring at the trash/service tunnel. What the heck. We go in the room - and it's a nice…

title: Pre Christmas holiday
review: Love this resort. Stayed in newly refurbished bay side suite and the rooms and views were perfect. Staff is warm and attentive. Lots to do on the gulf beach - views are spectacular. Reataurants are as good as any in the area. We will be back!!

title: Best resort on the Florida Gulf Coast
review: We stayed in a beautiful 2 bedroom suite overlooking the Gulf of Mexico. The pool was an elevator ride away from our suite and the beach is just beyond the pool. they have Tennis, a 45 hole Golf course and several restaurants, all on the property. It's a great place for families, the location and amenities cannot be beat.

title: Weekend gateway
review: We have been coming to this place for 6 years and it's wonderful.  Nice rooms, the beach it's beautiful, Pool and bar the best. Cant wait to go back and enjoy the good food and the warm water of Long Boat key

title: My preferred vacation spot
review: This place is amazing ... it combines the comforts of home and spacious apartment style with the hotel rooms services.  It's a bit expensive for an upper middle class family, but is worth every dollar when it comes to service, good relaxing time, food, clean accommodation, private and clean beach and ease to move around the facilities.    This year will be my 7th year in a row since we discovered this place.  I'm vacationing in Europe a month earlier before we go to Longboat this year, but I'm still looking forward to my real vacation time at longboat in July, God willing.   Have a great and safe summer.

title: Summer break vacation
review: Excellent service! Our favorite place to visit. Hunter was very helpful on the beach. We relaxed on the beach for hours and we're constantly kept comfortable regardless of the heavy heat. My favorite was the service! We had our food brought right out to us on the beach!

title: So nice!
review: I love it here! The beach is so gorgeous and I love being able to order food from my seat on the beach. The weather was sunny the entire time. The sand and water were nice the entire stay. Also, Hunter was very kind in helping us around!! There is also a great pool area to hang and relax.

title: Ideal Resort for totall relaxation
review: This is an ideally located Resort, directly on the beach. A large swimming pool and hot tub, with plenty of comfortable sun lounges, both around the pool and on the each. The pool service is excellent with plenty of clean towels and umbrellas for shade if needed. Of particular mention is Stacey, who works tirelessly to ensure all the quests are looked after. Likewise Alli does similarly. The hotel offers beach facing suites and Lagoon view suites.

title: Great Service-
review: The service at the beach is remarkable, especially Ozzy. Every time we come to the beach we ask for Ozzy. He is beyond friendly and makes every trip an absolute pleasure. Also I want to thank the pool girls Allie and Jennifer for the great service they provided to my family.

title: Experience
review: We had an amazing experience here at the Longboat Key Resort Club! The rooms were very clean, the service on the beach was extremely helpful, and the outside area was very clean and beautiful. Highly recommend! Hunter in particular was amazing and was great helping us get some seats on the beach.

title: Beach services
review: This is paradise!  The beach is beautiful and the water is pristine.  When you get to the beach ask for Ozzy.  He will go above and beyond to make your beach experience excellent.  If you decide to hang out in the pool instead ask for Stacy or Ally.  They're very sweet girls and will also make your vacation or stay and play even better!  The hospitality of Ozzy, Stacy and Ally made my friends and I feel very very special!

title: Great Service
review: Our stay here has been amazing! The staff by the pool are very accommodating Stacey is very helpful and friendly. Allie was friendly while providing wonderful service all day with a smile and cheerfulness.. Kim also a great server. Ozzy was helpful with phone and wifi issues.. If I had one suggestion it would be for the pool bar to open at 10am for a Bloody Mary..

title: Not as advertised
review: I went to the Longboat Key Club this past weekend with my sister and a friend after having stayed at another Opal Collection Resort last year.  Upon check in the resort was already disappointing as it just wasn't very nice looking and it was very spread out (we would all be staying in different buildings).  The front desk staff was not overly friendly or welcoming and it was recommended we go to a lunch spot off property by the front desk staff (red flag), which we were given incorrect directions to and that restaurant was terrible.  We were even more disappointed to see the beach which was TINY (they said it was due to storms which caused the beach to be in the shape it was in), we couldn't find a spot to sit even if it was nice and we wanted to stay there.  The pool was also a…

title: Wonderful resort and staff
review: I came to celebrate a bridal weekend for my oldest daughter who is getting married in July along with my youngest daughter and wanted to compliment some of the employees who make the resort so great. With the exception of one person, everyone we came in contact with was helpful, kind and polite. Stacey and AJ down by the beach and pools, the 3 girls who gave us our massages but especially the front desk staff. Everyone at the front desk was fantastic but Kimberly went out of her way  to help resolve an issue we had. She is an excellent example of putting the guest first. She deserves kudos for her professionalism and kindness. Thank you Kimberly! We will be back to this resort in the near future without a doubt.

title: Mothers Day Stay
review: The resort staff was very welcoming upon arrival. The pool side staff was amazing, Allie was quick to take our orders. The beach was very scenic and the Gulf of Mexico was the perfect shade of blue. Hunter and Ozzy were very helpful in making us comfortable on the beach.

title: " The beach team "
review: I want to thank the team at the beach especially Ozzy and Hunter for taking care of all my needs at the beach during this trying time with the massive beach erosion which they have suffered with. They still managed to make my seating beautiful and comfortable even bringing me a power outlet to my seat so I was able to charge my cell phone. Talk about above and beyond duty , this is service second to none ! Thank you gentlemen.

title: Very good
review: We stayed in a golf view suite for 3 nights and overall this made for a great start to our Florida vacation.    Although the resort buildings are not perhaps the most attractive from the outside and some aspects of the accommodation are a little dated we appreciated the freshly painted, spacious and well maintained suite and the great job done by housekeeping to keep everything in good order during our stay.  Linens were changed daily, and we were offered turndown service too.  We enjoyed the furnished balcony looking out across the golf course and this made for a peaceful and attractive setting.  We liked the Suite's kitchen area which we used to make breakfast and we appreciated the quality coffee machine too.  The property is very well located on a beautiful beach which you…

title: Babymoon and Anniversary Trip
review: My husband and I recently stayed at the resort for a babymoon and anniversary leaving our toddler son at home. I would say that the thing we were struck by overall was that this is a great family friendly resort. It is clearly a great place to bring kids from rooms with kitchens, babysitters, assistance with crib rentals, camps and fun pool activities. As a couple with kids this atmosphere was very comfortable for us even though we were traveling solo. But definitely be aware if booking a romantic getaway that there is a clear family atmosphere.  In terms of rooms, they are very nice, beds comfortable, packed with amenities and beautiful ocean views. We stayed in building one a little removed from action and it was nice and quiet. The pool and beach are great and never had an…

title: Longboat Key Club
review: Dear Abby B: Thank you for being our guest and taking the time to share your experience.   I’m glad you enjoyed your time overall and you found building 1 to be nice and quiet.  Thanks for mentioning the fitness being great and pool and beach being great as well. We also appreciate your kind mention of Stacy and Allie and will share it with them.   I’m sorry that you did not get the experience at check-in that you deserved.  We should always be going over everything on property and introducing you to our concierge. The off premise areas we review upon request. I will review the importance of this with our team.   Thank you again and we hope to see you again soon, Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Wonderful Place to Stay
review: My husband and I stayed here for the second time and again had the most wonderful vacation.  We checked in on a Friday night and from the minute we came through the gate until we sadly left a week later we could not have had a better care.  Allie, Kim and Cheryl always made sure we had food and drinks at the pool or beach.  Stacey was the most friendly towel/pool assistant and would go above and beyond the call of duty to make us comfortable.  She was friendly, out going and very engaging.  We really enjoyed her bubbly personality and getting to know her better.  We absolutely love this resort and cannot wait to return.

title: Paradise on the Gulf Coast
review: Inspiring sunsets, dolphins, manatees, shelling, scrumptious food and an awesome staff made for a visit that I won't soon forget.  A special thanks to Mitch, my shuttle driver to the grocery, for all of the area info.  If pressed to offer a suggestion for improvement, I would remind the housekeeping staff to be sure to replenish the coffee/tea and dishtowels daily.  This was skipped on the last 2 days of my stay but I was having such a relaxing time that it was no biggie.

title: Beautiful Resort
review: We recently returned from three wonderful days at the Longboat Key Club Resort. We had a suite which included a kitchen, laundry facilities, dining area, and a living room, in addition to a comfortable king-sized bed. Our room also had a wrap-around balcony that overlooked the lagoon, and we were able to watch a pair of manatees that were lolling about there. The room was beautiful, as were the grounds at the resort. It was just a short walk across the driveway to get to the pool area and beach. The pool area was well-kept, with workers cleaning and sweeping the area early each morning and restocking the towels for the guests. The beach area was also cleaned each morning. There are several restaurants on the premises. We were there for a business function, so we had a catered…

title: Fabulous Stay
review: A beautiful resort that is only surpassed by the world-class service provided by ALL resort employees.  My wife and I were truly delighted with every facet of the resort property, but the staff here are clearly in a class way above your normal expectations for a resort of this caliber.  You never feel as if you're stuck in an overly crowded environment whether enjoying the pool, beach, or any of the other great amenities.  Tennis and golf of a level to satisfy the most demanding tastes.  Special "thank you" to the staff at the pool and beach.

title: Horrible Beds
review: We just visited for the first time to this resort.  The staff is excellent especially the beach and pool people. They are genuinely happy, friendly and helpful.   The resort is in a great location, close to St Armand's and a great spot on the beach.  Per my title my only complaint is the pillow and beds.  The pull out couch and cot were barely usable with metal springs projecting out.  The king size bed was awful and the billows left me with a stiff neck.  We wound up using the couch pills to sleep.   Urge the resort to update there sleeping beds !

title: Nice resort just needed more info!
review: We recently stayed here for a few nights in April. The resort and hotel were lovely and the rooms though not huge were nicely done and clean. My only complaint was when we checked in we were given no information on what the resort fee included or the bus schedule to St Armunds? This would have helped our stay.

title: Wonderful Stay for a Wedding
review: We stayed at the Resort for a wedding.  We had a "Premium Junior Beach View" room with a wonderful view of the Gulf of Mexico and a great veranda.  While the room furnishings were a little dated, it was very roomy and well equipped (kitchenette, washer/dryer).  While the beach was a little crowded, the staff at the beach and throughout the resort were very helpful.  While we did not eat at the restaurants, we had the rehearsal dinner and wedding reception at the Resort.  Both were very good, and the rehearsal dinner on the beach at sunset was especially memorable.

title: Solid Option For Short Term Stays.
review: We love the Sarasota area, and Longboat key is a good option for a short stay. The staff are accommodating and our room (a junior suite) was large and comfortable.  The food was well prepared and presented.  The beach was a bit small.  We were told it was due to weather conditions, but the beach paled in comparison to great nearby beaches like Siesta Key. The location is close to shops and activity. The resort is a solid choice -- not quite luxury status, but a very reasonable value.

title: You never have to leave the The Longboat Key Club!!!
review: Dear Tonyrnyc: Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay.   I am pleased you found the staff accommodating, your suite large and comfortable and the food well prepared.  The beach is pure snow sand and comfortable. There is an upcoming re-nourishment which will make it large again while maintaining its current powder snow like consistency. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: The beach team
review: This place has everything a vacationer could desire. Splendid rooms, golf, tennis, health club and spa, pool, beach, and an amazing assortment of outstanding restaurants - some of the best anywhere. Th staff is one of the finest I have experienced. All pros they make every effort to remember your name and preferences. The tennis pros are exceptional. This place is so big you can take a shuttle to some of the facilities on the beautiful property. And if you do want to leave Publix is only a short distance. But why would you ever want to leave.

title: Beautiful weather:)
review: The weather was perfect these past couple days. Erik helped us out on the beach and he made sure everything was perfect! He can tell you local places to eat along with where to spot the dolphins in the morning:) he made our stay even better and just wanted to give some thanks. Also thanks to Cheryl for being a great server and getting our food fast:)

title: Paddle boarding:)
review: Dear Anna K: Thank you for the “5” review!   Glad the weather was wonderful and I appreciate you mentioning Erik and Cheryl and the great job they did.  We look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Thanks Erik:)
review: Erik helped us out with paddle boards along with chairs, umbrellas, and towels:) he was super nice and always made sure we had just what we needed:) definitely ask for him when you hit the beach:) our rooms were also very clean and the sand was super white and soft:) thanks again Erik:)

title: Perfect :)
review: Dear betsyJ: Thanks for the “5” review and for being our guest!  Thanks for your mention of Erik and the great job he did on the beach.  Glad you also found your suite to be very clean and the beach super white and soft!!  Look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great resort, even better service
review: We have been staying this resort for several days now and Erik has been awesome:) he made sure we always had towels and umbrellas along with chairs. We saw plenty of dolphins along with manatees:) we don't want to go home to the cold but will be returning soon :)

title: Very relaxing stay
review: Stayed 5 nights in order to wind down after a week at Disney. We loved it. Yes the beach has had quite a lot of erosion this year and is currently pretty small (I think there are plans to regenerate it later this year) but when we stayed the hotel wasn't too busy and the beach was fino for us, no problem getting beds and we actually quite liked having the water only a few feet away with nothing between us and it! Hotel in general was great, stayed in  standard room which was nice and big enough for a few days. Having a fridge and coffee maker was great for kids snacks and meant we could have breakfast on the balcony some mornings. All the staff were great and remember your name. Gym was very well equipped. Only thing we would have liked would have been a few more dining options…

title: Great staff
review: Dear Jim R: Thank for your review and for being our guest.  Glad you enjoyed the beach and found it comfortable. Yes, the beach will be re-nourished this year. I am pleased you enjoyed your room and its amenities. Thanks for mentioning that the staff was great and you found the gym was well equipped.  As far as dining options, on property we offer, Barefoots Poolside, Sands Pointe Restaurant, Room Service, The Tavern and Whiskey Bar and Portofino Italian Restaurant in addition to bar service.   We look forward to having you visit us again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great stay!
review: Some rooms are just average, but the cost is not. The suites are fantastic, however. The beach service is wonderful, albeit a bit slow.  I hear the beach used to be much better before the significant erosion. Still nice to lounge out in the Florida sun though.  We had a great time.

title: Awesome Service!!!
review: Dear Anthony K: Thank you for your review. We do offer a variety of room/suite sizes from 415 square feet to 1,750 square feet.  Glad you found your suite fantastic.  The beach is constantly changing and has even grown significantly over the last week.  We have more than enough space on the beach and powder sand all around.  Hope to see you again soon. Pleased you had a great time.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Complacent
review: I had a wonderful stay here at longboat and  just wanted to say thank you to a few people who really took care of me. Erik was the beach attendant in which really took care of my friends and I, he always made sure we were in the shade along with having fresh towels. Cheryl was our sever and she always got our food very quickly. My friends and I will definitely be returning. Thanks again!

title: Just Amazed!
review: I was fortunate enough to have a beautiful get away for the weekend just the wife and I. I don't think we could have had better service. Cherly was very nice and easy to talk to thd cuban I had for lunch was great! Jake took care of our chairs and umbrellas also told us of some local shops and restaurants. All and all the wife and I really enjoyed our stay and can't wait to come back!

title: We had such a great stay!
review: Dear jasonm: Very happy you had an amazing stay.  I am so pleased Cheryl, the beach waitress and Jake the beach attendant took such great care of you.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beautiful stay
review: Our time spent at the resort was wonderful! Jake and Erik set us up with nine chairs right on the beach front! Our service was great food was amazing. This is a resort for all ages definitely will be coming back. We saw some sting rays early in the morning.  Mike and Viv

title: Beach service
review: Dear Mike and Viv:  Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest.  We are pleased your time with us was wonderful. Thanks for the special mention of Jake and Erik.  I’m pleased your service was great and the food was amazing.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Where's the Beach?
review: I just wanted to say thanks to Erik and jake for taking care of my family and I. Everything was perfect and they made our stay even better than it already was. The gulf was so blue and there were plenty of Dolphins in the morning ! Thanks again and we will be returning:) also thanks to delane for help as well!

title: Wonderful!
review: What a hidden gem this is!  So much better in every way than the big crowded beaches throughout Florida.  Superb quiet beach.  Relaxing pool.  Functional suites.  Clean well run resort.  Wonderful service everywhere.  Friendly staff.  Great free tennis.  Reasonable prices and they don't nickel and dime you.

title: Great spring break vacation
review: Dear mule65: Thanks for the “5” review and for being our guest.  I am pleased you found the beach to be quiet and superb.  We appreciate the fact that you also found the suites to be clean and the resort well run along with friendly staff.  We look forwards to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Disappointed for all
review: This was our first stay at The resort and we will definitely return. The suite was awesome and the facilities are excellent. We enjoyed the beach - most comfortable lounge chairs on the gulf!  The pool is also beautiful, refreshing, and picturesque. The staff is great including Hunter, Nevan, and Kristyn. They went that extra mile, being friendly and courteous, as well as providing exemplary service.

title: Nevan gave awesome beachside service!
review: Dear Danieljkeller: Thank you for the “5” review!   I am so very pleased you found the facilities excellent and the suite awesome.  Wonderful that you loved the pool and beach areas and noted the “most comfortable lounge chairs” Thanks for your special mention of Hunter, Nevan and Kristyn and their exemplary service! Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Fantastic Getaway
review: We are here in spring break. We were excited on the drive from Orlando but once we entered the "resort" smiles turned to frowns. The overall crowd was over 60, the pool was small outdated and old and the outdoor restaurant was worse then a stay at hotel 6. I couldn't hide my sadness from my family which they noticed.  The beach is why we came.. Feet in warm sand. To my surprise there was NO beach. We were sat in a dune squeezed in with all quests on outdated chairs. It was sad for my kids and us. The dune area we sat was not soft sand but spikes of dune grass which speared my daughters feet.   There was no concierge feel and we just felt trapped in this vacation that we were hoping would provide needed relaxation and de stress. It sadly created more stress for us all.   I will…

title: Great customer service!
review: Nevan and Hunter were great! They took such great care of us by setting us up by the beach with lots of towels. Awesome customer service. Will def. recommend and be back. The waiters and waitresses were on the beach and bring you snacks or drinks. Comfortable lounge chairs!

title: Best resort around!
review: Dear Kristin F: Thank you for the “5” review!   We are pleased you found the customer service to be awesome and appreciate you recommending us to others.  Thanks, also, for your kind mention of Nevan and Hunter and well as the beach waitstaff.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Greatest Vacation of All time!
review: I visited the resort with my best friend. Our room in building 1 was amazing with breath taking views of the gulf. Nevin and Hunter were extremely polite and helpful out on the beach. My recommendation would be to try out the paddle boards and kayaks. Both Nevin and Hunter were very knowledgeable on the local water and marine life.

title: PLACE TO STAY ON LONGBOAT!
review: Kate F Thank you for the “5” review and for mentioning we are the best resort around!  Happy your views were breathtaking and you enjoyed your time.  Thanks for your mention of Nevin and Hunter.  We look forward to seeing you again next time.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Love this place
review: I popped into this sweet resort just before the break of spring, around the second week of March.  The Resort was right on the beach, so I was able to stare at Mother Ocean all day long.  The Resort also had an a fly restaurant that was, yes, on the beach.  Oh and if I wanted to pop my shirt off eat a hamburger while sitting in the ocean, they can facilitate that as well!  We made friends with Hunter while we were there.  He was awesome because he made sure that my girlfriend and I had the best vacation possible!

title: Spring break get away
review: The resort lived up to every expectation that I had! The room and restaurants were great, the highlight of my trip however was the amazing beach experience. Hunter was very accommodating on the beach and was even able to teach me how to paddle board.

title: spring break vacation
review: Dear Sam S: Thank you for the “5” review!  It is wonderful that you had such a great experience. Thanks for your kind mention of Hunter and the service provided.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Good place to stay
review: I came down to the resort for over 15 years and I have to say I have never been disappointed. The staff has always been very nice and helpful. Hunter was the man to see out on the beach, he got us set up and comfortable on the beach. I look forward to your help again next year Hunter!

title: Staff: Nevan
review: Dear Andrea A: Thank you for the “5” review!  We appreciate that you have been our guest over these many years and happy that you find our team to be nice and helpful.  Thank for your kind mention of Hunter.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Fabulous All Around
review: Nice beach and lots of activities.  Staff is very pleasant and helpful.  Definitely get to the beach early to grab a cabana or umbrella.  Water is clear and swimming is great.  Also, good golf course and tennis courts onsite.

title: So far GREAT!  Had an issue at the pool with someone taking my chair
review: Had an issue at the pool with someone taking my chair and Immediately Stacey took care of me.  I think she was terrific.  I was really upset, but she was so professional always with a calm smile.  Got us two other chairs and calmed me down.  I like the fact that they don't let people hold chairs when not there, however i was gone for 15 minutes.  The manager also came over to make sure we were ok.  The Tennis is AMAZING!!!!!!!!!!! Best Drills and Pros!! They make sure you get to play and even put you with someone that is looking to play.  My husband enjoyed playing golf as well.  Only one thing i might suggest for a guest, you might want to rent a car, as things are not close by.  So far our vacation is really great!!  The food in the main building for dinner was very good and…

title: Lovely and affordable
review: This was our second stay in as many years for a week. We enjoyed the resort - this Time in a jr suite in building 2. This bldg seems newer and very nice. We had a great lagoon view- complete with visits by manatees and Dolphins, which thrilled our boys. The daily housekeeping was good and always had plenty of all that we'd need (towels, cleaning supplies for kitchen). The beach has suffered from erosion but we still enjoyed the water and view. The pool is nice- though we visited at peak times so it was definitely crowded. The staff- as always- was great. We never felt like just another guest- they tended to us swiftly and nicely. We also used the complimentary bikes and enjoyed that very much. We ate poolside and bfast one morning, good!   The only issue we felt was a bit off-…

title: Lovely and fun
review: We really enjoyed our week! The beach does have erosion but still so beautiful. Our unit was in building 6. We loved the pool and staff was super friendly. We used the complimentary bikes one day and liked them a lot. Loads of food options.   Only drawback was that they've implemented some sort of room temperature control so you can't set anything lower than 70 degrees. For most of our stay it was fine but the a/c in our unit wasn't great so the room felt humid and warm by our last night. Come summer with higher daytime temps, I could see a lot of feedback to the hotel that limiting the a/c isn't ideal though I'm sure it saves them $. They did offer us a box fan for our room which seems out of place at such a nice resort. I would think that $400+ a night, they can do better.…

title: Amazing Beach Vacation!
review: This was a last minute trip to Longboat Key and the Resort at Longboat Key was the only place that had any availability for the week of spring break.  The resort was amazing!  The room was not ready until 5pm, but we checked in our room there was a bottle of wine with an apology for the delay. The staff and service were outstanding.  It is a very unpretentious resort which we loved. The resort was pretty and well kept. We stayed in a junior suite which was very roomy - the kitchenette was perfect, the room had a ton of storage and the washer and dryer was a huge bonus!  I just can't say enough positive things about this resort!  We hope to return!

title: Great stay!
review: Beautiful grounds... beautiful golf course...great breakfast at restaurant by the golf couse... great workout facility... beach very pretty just a bit shallow from erosion... pool very nice ... room was wonderful... friendly staff

title: Great location, getting a little old. Slow elevators. Nice rooms. Good food. Busy during spring break.
review: We visited in late March during spring break, so it was busy. I felt like I was in a mass market Spanish resort for Europeans i.e. get to the pool & beach early so you can reserve a  beach chair. Forget it if you're late. The pool was crowded with kids. Lots of fun if you have kids. The elevators in the apartment buildings are dinosaurs. Slow. Take forever. If you're on a higher floor then this can be a real pain. The rooms are nice and large. Breakfast in the lobby restaurant is great. The breakfast buffet is very good. The gym is associated with the golf course and is a 300yd walk from the hotel. Very good and large gym ~$5 charge.  The golf course is good. Lots of water and the greens are some of the best I have played on. Very fast. Overall this resort is good but not great.…

title: Not worth the price
review: We decided to visit the Resort at Longboat Key during end of March which was school break for our two boys. After a one and half hour car ride from Tampa airport we arrived to the resorts main building. There is not much of a lobby ( very small and felt crowded) and it had a very musty odor upon entering. There were a few tables of older women playing bridge in the common area which led us to believe that this place is more of a condo facility with individual unit owners that rent out under the opal resort company. Our room was not ready at our arrival at 3:30 but we were hungry so we went to pool area for a bite to eat. Surprisingly the food was very good and fairly priced. The tuna salad and fruit was fresh and good. Kids ordered burgers and fries which were also very good.…

title: The Take chargeGuest services manager
review: I spent my first week in a wonderful gulf front one bedroom and when my daughter arrived moved to a two bedroom gulf front unit! The hotel was completely booked and the persons in the two bedroom were moving to a smaller unit which was opposite of my situation. There was an unforeseen delay in the  guest vacating timely so the  Guest manager (Rob) on duty made a double switch (as in baseball) and was able to satisfy us both without delay---All of his front desk staff were attentive and professional

title: Lovely hotel and room with some annoying features
review: This is a very up-market hotel with a price tag to go with it. Some of the restaurants are 4 miles away so a car is useful although a courtesy shuttle is provide if wanted. There is also an hourly bus service at the Resort gates that went into Sarasota if you didn't want to drive. Whilst the food at all the restaurants was good, it was quite expensive, not helped by having a compulsory 20% + tax gratuity tagged on at the end.   We had a Junior Suite (Room 5303) which nominally overlooked one of the golf courses. However despite being the 2nd to top floor, it was not possible to watch the golfers due to the high trees and hedges. The rooms in this block all face north so never get the sun leaving sitting on the balcony unattractive despite temperatures in the mid 70s.  The main…

title: Luxury and Friendliness
review: We traveled to the Resort at Longboat Key Club for spring break with our three kids and enjoyed spacious 2 bedroom accommodations. The staff everywhere we went was extremely helpful and friendly.  The private beach with easy access from pool and resort was phenomenal! Thank you for a relaxing family break!

title: Not 4 star for in my opinion
review: Reserved a junior suite for family.  Sleeper sofa bent in middle so kids fell towards each other.  Requested new mattress and seemed like it was a common request.  No life guards at pool or beach.   Beach is shelley.  Kids cut their feet several times on shells.   Bring water shoes.   Pool and beach wait service is horrible.  Each day waited hours to get served.  It took an hour after being served to get drinks/food.  Ice melted in drinks by the time they got there.   I would not recommend this as 4 star.  Only two bartenders for entire pool/beach area.   For the cost of the resort they sure seem to cut corners a lot.

title: Cabana boys/girl
review: I just wanted to thank Erik, Delane, and Jake for really taking care of us. The whole weekend the were on the ball with everything! We also enjoyed seeing the Dolphins almost every morning from the gulf, at first I thought they were sharks but then Erik told me that they were just dolphins having fun:)

title: Beautiful
review: Everything this past trip was abs outlet perfect. The beach boy Erik really helped my friends and I out with everything that we needed. He made sure I had umbrellas and towels throughout the day:) The pool was also very clean and service was outstanding. Thanks again Erik:)

title: How could you get better
review: We were in building 2, two bedroom , huge great room...overlooking ocean, with soothing waves all night long.   Great beach, chairs etc, provided.  Very nice resort golf course....not hacked up by inconsiderate guests.

title: Don't wanna leave :(
review: My friends and I do not want to leave this resort because everything was so much fun! Erik and Hunter took care of us, whether it was paddle boards or umbrellas they were on point the whole time! Thank you guys for being the best ever and we can't wait to come back :)

title: Best beach attendants on longboat
review: Hunter, Erik, Jake and Delane were more than accommodating this trip! They catered to our every need and were more than nice:) Everything from the Dolphins in the gulf to the pristine pool, we couldn't be happier and will definitely be returning! Thanks again :)

title: LBK
review: Nice hotel. Nothing special. Kinda old, like 95% of the folks down here. Staff was ambivalent. No one ever said good morning, hello or hi the entire time we where here. However Stacey at the pool was perky & professional. Pool is nice, but dated. Service at the pool is quick & fast. The hotel is nice, but I wouldn't come back unless grandma & grandpa, God forbid, moved down here.

title: Stay during spring break
review: Great support from the beach team especially Joseph. Great suite overlooking the Gulf.  Check in was a problem but the Resort made it right for us.   Good food options. Great location with easy access to St. Armand's

title: Sun, beach, pool, food, tennis & golf = great vacation
review: Very spacious, clean room overlooking the gulf and pool.  Comfortable king bed. Two sliding doors opened to a deck with lounge chair and a table with chairs.  Beautiful sunsets from there. Sitting area with a roll out sofa bed was available, but not needed on our trip. Very nice kitchenette with your own washer/dryer. They actually provide detergent and fabric softener.  The frig was moderate in size despite being occupied by $36 wine and $3.50 cokes.  Easy resort parking and a good location just 5 driving minutes down from St Armands Circle. Mote Marine Lab & Aquarium is even closer. We travelled without kids, but plenty of families and grandparents were present, so it appears family friendly also.

title: Kimberly was phenomenal!
review: When we checked in, we received a room that was nice but not what we were expecting. Given that it was spring break, the hotel was at full capacity, and Kimberly continued to see if she could work out a room change for us. In the end, she came up with a beautiful 2-bedroom ocean view room that simply made our experience great. Her extra effort was greatly appreciated.

title: Joseph :)
review: Never in my life experienced service like Joseph's. Not only was he eloquent in his speech and demeanor, but also in his professionalism. Assisting our group with whatever we needed, Joseph was readily available to fulfill the most taboo of requests. I would highly recommend his services at this resort and if you have the pleasure to speak with him take a moment to know you are in the presence of a living legend.

title: JOSEPH IS THE MAN!!!
review: I had a fantastic time at the Longboat Key Club and I recommend it to all of my friends, including former president Bill Clinton.   Many people contribute to the amazing experience at the LBKC, but one stands above the rest. Joseph is an outstanding young man with impeccable photography skills and a great smile.   Can't wait to come back and again a huge thank you to Joseph!

title: Day at the beach
review: I visited the resort with my daughter on last Sunday and we had a great time. The services at the beach have improved a lot and I wanted to give a shout out to Ozzy for taking care of us and making our stay fabulous. Also I wanted to mention the beach manager Leo for making sure we were having a great time without any disturbance.

title: Assistant Manager Ozzy made our day!
review: Arriving at the resort during Spring break vacation, we were lucky to find Ozzy, an Assistant Manager, who was charming and professional and helped us find space for our beach chairs on a very full beach!  It makes all the difference to the guests' enjoyment when someone like Ozzy is one of the friendly "faces" of the Longboat Key Club.  Ozzy is a huge asset to the organization and we just want to say "Thanks"!

title: Golf Reservations and online booking
review: I requested through the online reservation system golf tee times over two weeks ago.  Got multiple emails back that they had my request and would confirm a  day in advance.    Ultimately they just lost the request and I had nothing.  They blamed it on member play but if true, no one even tried to call me to explain the situation and reschedule.    Staff is disjointed, uninterested and ineffective.

title: Erik was great!
review: Thank you Erik for taking care of my friends and I! You made sure everything was taken care of the whole day and even gave us a few places to visit while we're here! The pool was super clean along with the rooms and we have so much fun so far:) we will definitely be returning :) thanks again Erik!

title: Thanks Erik and jake
review: Erik and Jake took care of our every need as they set us up and showed us how to paddle board. They also made sure we had shade the entire time and never let our expectations down! We look forward to returning and just wanted to give a huge thanks again:)

title: So much fun!
review: Everything was perfect this trip! Erik and Nevan took care of us setting us up with chairs and an umbrella! Everything was also so beautiful, from the pool to the gulf, to the Dolphins jumping :) We will be back soon for sure ! The weather also seemed to be nice the whole trip.

title: Spring Break
review: Great suite overlooking gulf! Two bedroom that fit 7 people! Staff was all very friendly and Alex / Hunter were so accommodating. Would set up our beach chairs and even face them toward the sun with fresh towels.

title: Great ,relaxing place
review: We were guests of a resident ,staying close to the marina.It was our first time at the resort and we loved it.All the staff is very friendly and helpful.We spent a lot of time at the beach,Alex has made our experience at the beach fun and easy,always there helping with setting us up and assisting us during our stay.

title: Best Resort in Florida
review: Third year staying at this fabulous resort!  We have stayed in the one bedroom and two bedroom suites and were so happy with the rooms with beautiful balconies and views of the gulf.  The amenities are amazing.  Great fitness center, fabulous spa and tennis courts.  Staff is so friendly and accommodating.  A special shout out to Kimberley at the front desk who was especially sweet and attentive.  Also Kim and Kathy at poolside...thanks for your happy faces daily!

title: Could be so nice-but better for families
review: A very hard review to write because so much was right. Excellent staff, beautiful room... However, most of their rooms (and the outside bar, and outside restaurant) very closely overlook the one pool.  We were there the week after Christmas, and from 10am-9pm it was like trying to vacation on a school playground. Nice balcony, but only if you love doing it with all the noise of a community pool. The worst part is that they have 2 buildings that do not overlook the pool. When I asked about reserving one of them I was told they couldn't guarantee I would get one!  I would never go again if I could not be sure I wasn't over the pool.  Looking out over the ocean at sunset listening to the ocean would have been nice...

title: Fantastic Vacation
review: Dear Larry B: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay.  I’m glad you found the room beautiful and the staff excellent.  I’m sorry you did not like the positioning of your suite.   We have 4 Gulf view buildings.  If you book the gulf view buildings, you may request the building of your choice.  We are unable to guarantee a particular building in this category as it depends on the rooms departing on your day of arrival if we are full.  Generally speaking we are successful in meeting building requests.   Also, our Deluxe Two Bedroom suites are all at the ends of the hallways with a beach/gulf view so none of that room-type face the pool at all.   You can also book Lagoon View or Golf Course view as alternatives.    We hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Just the best resort in Florida.
review: This was a long waited for vacation. The resort is beautiful and completely delivered on my expectations. Upon checking in, Service Manager Kimberly Radford managed to get our suite on the beach side with a walkout deck. The suite had a king bed, pullout couch, kitchen, dining table and washer/dryer. A studio would have suited us fine, but everything came in very handy. The accommodations were excellent! Immaculately clean, no odors from solvents or bad air. Although we didn't take advantage of most amenities, within the gated grounds there is everything for everyone. The food was great. Lunch poolside was super fresh food, not frozen, prepared exactly as expected and delicious. The staff was extremely friendly. I wished I could have stayed longer, and hope to be back.

title: The Best Place to Stay in Longboat Key
review: Dear jetter138: Thank you for your “5” review!  I am very pleased that the resort completely delivered on your expectations.  Thank for mentioning that you loved your suite and that it was immaculately clean.  Happy to hear the food was great as well.  Thank you for your kind mention of Kimberly.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great Stay
review: We had a suite overlooking the Gulf. Very luxurious. Room was clean and well appointed. The staff at the front desk was accommodating and cordial. We had a very relaxing time, utilizing both pool and beach. Food and beverage service at the pool was very good as well.

title: Great Beach Service!
review: Dear Thomas B: Thank you for the “5” review!  I am pleased that you found your suite very luxurious, clean and well appointed.  Thanks for your kind mention of the front desk staff as well as food and beverage service at the pool.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Hunter is the man
review: Hunter was very attentive and welcoming on our first day! He helped us set up our chairs and made sure we were comfortable. Very polite staff and gorgeous resort, Looking forward to the rest of our stay.

title: Excellent Employees
review: Dear Caitlin F: Thank you for the “5” review!  Glad you are enjoying your time with us and you find the staff polite and the resort gorgeous.  Thanks for your kind mention of Hunter and the service he provides.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Heaven
review: A man on the staff named hunter helped us with all our needs. If we needed a chair or directions to anything he would help and he would bring us our drinks quickly. Our stay was very comfortable and we were very pleased with the help the staff gave us. I highly recommend coming here for vacation.

title: Spring Break Stay
review: I came to the Resort with a group of girls on a spring break trip. Everything at the resort was great, the food was amazing along with the room, however the beach staff was the best. Hunter, Delane, and Erik were the best, they made sure we had everything we needed and came back to check on us multiple times. We will be back again next year for sure.

title: Thank you!
review: Dear emilyhoffy:  Thank you for the “5” review!  I am pleased you had a great stay with us and you enjoyed the food and loved your suite.  Thanks for your kind mention of Hunter, Delane and Erik. We look forward to seeing you again next year. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Overpriced
review: Erik, hunter and delane helped us get set up on the beach these past couple days. I just wanted to say thanks for the great service and friendliness:) Everything has been perfect and the water was a bit cold. The pool was also very clean and service was great!

title: Family Vacation
review: Dear Sydney H:  Thank you for the “5” review.   Thank you for mentioning that service was great and I’m glad you enjoyed your time with us.  Thanks for your kind mention of Erik, Hunter and Delane.  We look forward to seeing you again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Not What It Could Be
review: Rooms are spacious but tired.  Beware of service. I asked for a taxi at breakfast to leave at 11:30 am for the Sarasota airport but they forgot to call so I had to wait for 30+ minutes (and Uber wasn't available by the time U found out that they didn't reserve a cab).

title: Great Resort and Staff
review: It was our first time at the resort and we had a wonderful stay last week.  The hotel and beach are beautiful and has many amenities to choose from.  We have three boys under ten and they all stayed happy and entertained. Upon our arrival we were greeted by a very friendly front desk staff.  Kimberly went above and beyond getting us settled and assisting us throughout our stay with advice on dining, transportation and activities for the kids. We've never had a front desk professional help so much in between our check in and check out times. She is exceptional.  We will definitely be back!

title: Awesome dat
review: Dear denise617:  Thank you for the “5” review!  I am very pleased that you had a wonderful stay and your 3 boys stayed happy and entertained. Happy that the stay started with a happy greeting by the desk and that Kimberly made a great impression on you.  We look forward to seeing you next time. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beautiful beach day
review: I had a fun day at the beach. The breeze was really nice and the resort is gorgeous!! I met someone named Eric who works at the resort and he helped us out by setting up chairs. He was really nice. I have really enjoyed my time here so far and I can not wait to see what's in store for the rest of my trip!

title: Great staff and service!
review: Dear StellaW:  Glad you are enjoying your time with us and had a fun day at the beach.  Thanks for your kind mention of Eric.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: My experience at Longboat Key Club
review: I had a really fun day at the beach today tanning! I met a really nice guy named Eric and he helped me out and did very good work at the beach today. He helps set up chairs and we got very good food brought to us right away! The beach is set up very nicely and the water is very close so I could cool off anytime I want.

title: Longboat Key Stay
review: Had a great stay at the Longboat Key Resort. Wonderful service and staff all around, especially down at the beach. Alex, Hunter and Joseph were all extremely accommodating and helpful during our stay. They made sure our party of 5 women were happy and comfortable (as did the rest of the staff). Would definitely come here again!

title: Great place to stay!
review: Dear gabrestivo:  Thank you for being our guest.  I’m pleased you felt the service and staff were wonderful all around.  Thanks for the kind mention of Alex, Hunter and Joseph.  We look forward to seeing you again next trip. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: A kid friendly hotel
review: We had a great time at the Longboat Key club on vacation this March. The staff were very friendly and the boys who worked on the beach, alex  and hunter, helped us out a lot! They always set up our chairs and towels and made sure we didn't need anything else. The view from the room was great especially at sunset. Definitely will be coming back!

title: Best stay ever!
review: Dear giannamf:  Thanks you for the “5” review!  I am very happy you had a great time on your vacation with us.  Thanks for your kind mention of Hunter and Alex.  Great that you found everyone friendly and you loved the view.  We look forward to seeing you next time.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beach day
review: We have been staying at this hotel many times and every time you leave satisfied! We have two little girls, 7 and 4, and they love the place! The staff are friendly and helpful and families are definitely feeling welcome!  Try the bayside junior suites, they easily accommodate 2 adults and two kids. The view is gorgeous.  This is a very good family resort! Anders Captiva

title: Best cabana boy ever!
review: Erik was a huge help with setting up chairs and an umbrella for my friends and I. Definitely ask for him when you get to the beach. The water was also beautiful and the girl Allie on the pool was very helpful as well. Dolphins were jumping in the gulf all morning and everything is prefect so far!

title: Lovely Base Stayed in Block 5
review: Dear Jill R Thanks for the “5” review!  I’m glad you enjoyed your day at the beach and the Dolphin put on a show for you.  Thanks for your kind mention of Erik and Allie!  See you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Ideal.
review: We recently stayed for a week at this resort. Wonderful lady on reception, surprised to see us arrive so early,however made us very welcome, and offered full use of the resort until our room was ready.  Wonderful long beach which is swept every morning. Plenty of comfortable sunbeds and parasols, Towels and sun lounger covers were taken by the lovely boys on the beach to your chosen spot. They kept checking to see if we wanted any further help.  The amazing Stacey around the pool...WOW !! she works so hard to ensure that all your needs are met. Lovely comfortable room with Laundry facilities Kitchen, Fridge / Freezer. No Salt & Pepper.. although bathroom could use an update,very rough bottom of bath to soak in.  Ice buckets were delivered to our room. Lots of cats around the…

title: Wonderful Experience
review: Dear NottinghamGlyn: Thank you for being our guest and your review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your week with us and thank you for mentioning that our reception person was wonderful.  Glad you also enjoyed the beach and the team took care of you.  Thanks for your kind mention of Stacey.  Glad you found the suite comfortable and well equipped.  Sorry the tub was not perfect. We are in process of resurfacing any tubs that need it. Happy you were able to utilize the spa and the Spike –n- Tees’s restaurant overlooking the golf.  We hope to see you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Luxurious Vacation
review: Amazing property, incredible service, friendly staff. We were greeted by several staff while on the beach who wanted us to be comfortable and helped us with anything we needed. (Especially staff members Jake and Hunter). Our room was perfect, with a great living room area and deck area.

title: Great place, great location, great service!
review: We stayed one week at this resort and had a fabulous time. The service was excellent and the Manager, Rob went out of his way to ensure we had the accommodation we needed and put our minds at ease. Each time we went to the front desk staff we were met with friendly and helpful people like Lynda and Jung. The view from our balcony was phenomenal and we felt like we had our own private view of the ocean. We were in building 3 which was close to the beach and pool.  At the beach the staff were always attentive and there was never a problem getting chairs, umbrellas or towels. We also loved the location on Longboat Key as it was not a far drive to St. Armand's Circle or other beaches. We highly recommend this hotel. Robin and Ed

title: A huge thank you to Ozzy and Justin at Longboat Key Club
review: Dear Robin and Ed: Thank you for the “5” review!  I am very pleased you had a fabulous time and found the service excellent.  Thank you for your kind mention of Rob, Jung and Lynda. I am proud to work with such a great team.  Great to hear that you loved your view and also enjoyed the beach service.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Stay for awhile
review: I am a longtime local member of Longboat Key Club. On Saturday, March 5 two beach lifeguards, Ozzy and Justin, earned my eternal thanks for helping my grandchildren avoid a disaster involving their kayak out in the Gulf.  The young athletic teenagers had rented a kayak from the Club in the late afternoon and set out from the beachfront for an hour or so of fun.  The wind was breezy and blowing in.  As a result the surf was up.  The guards cautioned them to paddle into the wind going out so that when they returned, the breeze and current would bring them back and ease their return.  They followed directions but they got far enough out that I feared they would be soon out of sight.  I asked the guards to monitor them (which they were already doing) and I panicked when the kids…

title: Beautiful day
review: Dear Thomas H: Thank you for the “5” review.  I am very pleased to hear that Ozzy and Justin acted quickly and appropriately to assist you grandchildren as they ventured a bit too far out on the kayaks.  Ozzy and Justin are not Lifeguards (as we do not have lifeguards), but they are beach attendants and are there to ensure your comfort on the beach.  I have shared your comments with the beach team and they greatly appreciate you taking to time to share your experience. We look forward to seeing you again soon on the beach.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Longboat key resort
review: The Longboat Key Club is a very well organized place to stay. You meet wonderful and kind loving human beings that really care for you! Thank you Longboat Key Club staff for your effort to make my stay wonderful!

title: Alex is the best!
review: I came to The Resort at Longboat Key with my 2 friends and had such a wonderful time. Alex made our time enjoyable and made sure we had everything we needed. He was friendly, eager to help, and always had a smile on his face. We will be coming back again!

title: Great beach!
review: Dear Kimberly W Thank you for the “5” review and for your kind mention of Alex.  We are very pleased you and your 2 friends enjoyed your time here.  We look forward to seeing you again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Awesome beach experience
review: My mother is a member of the key club and on my last visit Alex did a great job of setting my friends and I up on a cabana on the beach. He helped us get towels and even kept the waitress coming back when we needed something to eat or drink. Alex was friendly and very helpful he made our beach day enjoyable and very relaxing !

title: Great People Work Here
review: Dear Ashley D: Thank you for the “5” review and your kind mention of Alex.  I am very pleased his service spirit was positive with you and your friends and he made a positive impact on your day.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort

title: Average
review: I traveled with my two friends for a girls trip! We spent two days on the beach! The service was excellent (Kim was our beach waitress, and Alex was our beach attendant), the chairs were comfy, the view was amazing. Can't wait to come back next year!

title: Best cabana boy
review: Erik and Hunter were such friendly and helpful boys. They helped me set up and made me feel at home. Erik recommended a variety of 5 star restaurants for us to visit while we stay at the resort. The water was so beautiful along with the Dolphins and manatees. Ask for Erik or Hunter when you hit the beach! Thanks again!

title: Beautiful day
review: Dear carversarah: Thanks for the “5” review!  Glad you found Hunter and Erik to be helpful and friendly.  Glad you found the water beautiful and saw the dolphin and manatees.  We look forward to seeing you again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: It was paraidice
review: Erik and Hunter were very pleasant and helpful on the beach today they made our stay here very enjoyable. There service was fast with getting us a towel right away and setting up our beach chairs. Erik recommended a fantastic restaurant with delicious food. I would definitely recommend this resort and their wonderful service.

title: Golf in the wind
review: Dear Shannon M: Thank you for your “5” review and your kind mention of Erik and Hunter. Glad they were able to contribute to making your stay so enjoyable.   Happy to hear you will recommend us to others.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great location, great service!
review: the pool staff was exceedingly helpful, especially stacy.She would actually anticipate peoples needs. That is a fantastic employee. The pool resturant staffv are just as helpful. This is a model for other employees should follow

title: Nice but could be cleaner
review: My wife and I were traveling up the west coast of Florida looking for property and decided to make this resort our "base camp". The resort is beautiful and well manicured. We did not play any golf but the courses appeared very well maintained. We did have breakfast onsite one morning and it was very good but very expensive which you would expect at a resort of this type. My only real complaint was the bathroom had black mold in the shower. It wasn't to the point of being disgusting but at the price of these rooms, starting at $400+ per night, I expect them to be clean. Overall the resort is very nice and I would stay again.

title: 5 star cost with a 3+ star hotel in rooms, bathroom and service (with 2 nice surprises)
review: Dear jimmieo23: Thank you for being our guest. I’m +glad you found the resort beautiful and well manicured,  I am also happy you enjoyed your breakfasts with us.  I am sorry you had the issue with your shower, That is not our standard and I have spoken to our housekeeping inspectors to pay especially close attention to be sure this issue does not occur again. Thank you again for being our guest.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Extreme Relaxation
review: The good:   - great location for family trip: nice beach- pretty calm waters, lots of shells to find. Perfect for walk. - walking distance to a great casual fish place off property called the Drydock. Best fish tacos I ever had. - close to Armand circle, lots of shops, restaurants and ice cream shops.   - Food was pretty good, but the mandatory tip results in slow and ineffective service for a resort at the price point. Seemed they were very understaffed for the holiday weekend, so really is a management issue.   - we met one great waiter at breakfast: a gentleman named Robin. Even when he was in the weeds (see comment about lack of staffing) he did a nice job and was even better when it was slower.  - we met a great pool person...I believe her name was Stacey (or Tracey). She…

title: I remember it like it was yesterday!
review: Dear Peter O: Thank you for being our guest. I have shared your concerns with our Food and Beverage manager and Housekeeping manager to review your perspective.  I am very sorry you did not feel the service was quick enough in the restaurants and that housekeeping was not attentive enough in the suite.  As you mention, the holiday weekend is extremely busy, but the expectation is to still deliver impeccable service. I assure you we work very hard to do so and I hope you will consider us again.    Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Very nice resort but quality and price are not in alignment.
review: Very spacious 2 bdrm suite 5 steps from beach with daily maid service, felt like home. The suite is almost too big! If you need  a break, this is where to come. The pool is awesome, Stacey, who manages the pool area, is just incredible making sure everyone has exactly what they need. No need to lift a finger! The only negative I experienced was 2 young people smoking at the pool bar while we were eating lunch. So obnoxious.

title: Very nice 3-night stay
review: We stayed at the resort Feb 16-19; first visit ever to longboat key or to the resort. Traveled with my 2 teenage daughters and originally had booked a Junior suite for the three of us. Upon arrival we realized that the room was way too small, essentially a king bed and a sleeper sofa in the same space, so decided to upgrade to a 2- BR suite for a somewhat reasonable additional cost, and we were extremely happy that we did so.
