In addition to a very large living room between the bedrooms, it also had a full kitchen and dining area.  The pool area and beach at the resort are both very nice and have food/ drink / towel service. We also ate lunch twice at the outdoor restaurant near the pool, and give the food high marks. Service was very good all around. We didn't really take…

title: 5 Stars!!!
review: Dear Bradford S: Thank you for being our guest. I’m glad you found the 2 bedroom suite to be spacious and you were glad you upgraded.   Thanks for giving high marks on the food at Barefoots poolside. Happy to hear you found service very good all around.  We hope to see you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Friends weekend
review: My friends and I spent the weekend here and had an amazing time! The service is awesome!! food is really great. There were also dolphins in the ocean. great beach and great pool. Especially the beach service workers, Delane, Jake and Erik!! would recommend 10/10

title: 5 stars!!!!
review: Dear Elizabeth P:  Thank you for the “5” rating and I’m glad you and your friends had an amazing time.   Happy to hear you had excellent food as well as service while being with us.  Thanks for your special mention of Delane, Jake and Erik.   We hope to see you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: A deserved get away
review: My three friends and I had an amazing time at the beach and pool! Wait staff was amazing, they remembered us each day and had a group of four chairs and towels reserved for us. Jake, Erik, and Delane were extremely friendly and couldn't have been better employees! We were so pleased with our stay and definitely recommend it to those interested.

title: Full Service Hotel
review: Anything that you may need, they have and will bring it to you.We had a small suite overlooking the gulf and the room was perfect. The room was very clean and well appointed. We played golf one day and that was fun even though the weather didn't cooperate. The lobby bar was fun and the bartender very helpful. Please keep in mind that this area caters to an older crowd but that won't keep you from having fun.

title: Great Resort
review: Dear BDG6610: Thank you for the “5” review.  I am happy to hear you suite was perfect, clean and well appointed. Glad you were able to enjoy golf as well as had fun at Sands Pointe Bar.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort

title: Not what it was
review: The accommodations were outstanding!   We had a lagoon view site that was one of the nicest suites I have stayed in. The patio was big, so big it felt like a home and not a hotel. The staff's treatment was comparable to that of a Ritz Carlton. We would definitely go back again!

title: Dream vacation at the Resort at Lonboat Key Club
review: Dear Mary A: Thank you for the “5” review!  I am so pleased that you found the accommodations outstanding and your lagoon view suite was one of the nicest suites you have ever stayed in.  Glad you also enjoyed the service and we look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: overall very good quality. service excellent
review: Returned after a couple of years and were disappointed.   Still a gorgeous setting but the rooms (or ours at least) had become rather tired and the tennis arrangements and offerings (a main attraction for us) were nothing like as obliging, user-friendly or varied as when we had visited before.      Doubt if we'll be returning.  Pity, as we'd enjoyed it very much, the setting is fabulous and we'd looked forward to many more visits.

title: Still dreaming about Longboat Key!!
review: We stayed at The Resort at Longboat Key for 9 nights in October and absolutely loved it! We had a fabulous room with a huge balcony and ocean views - the perfect vantage point for spotting dolphins.  The facilities were great and the staff really helpful and friendly. We ate in all the restaurants and could not fault the excellent food. We will definitely return - hopefully very soon!

title: Excellent wedding experience
review: Dear Helen R Thank you for the “5” review.  I am so very pleased that you had an absolutely lovely 9 nights with us abd found your room fabulous with a wonderful “dolphin” view.  Thanks for mentioning that the staff was really helpful and the food was excellent.  We look forward to seeing you very soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Professional football Business trip
review: We stayed at this property last week for a wedding.  The resort is on the pricey side.  I think our 4 days cost about $2,000 for a standard room.  The resort is very good  and the room was very comfortable.  The food was really quite exceptional.  The staff really need to be commended on the quality of the food for the groomsmens dinner and the wedding dinner.  I found all the staff to be friendly, talkative and helpful.  As a destination the location was also very convenient.  The shopping/dining area nearby was called St. Armands Circle.  It was an excellent destination for an afternoon of shopping and dining.   Sadly, I didn't golf while I was there and I regretted not taking the clubs.  The course looked immaculate and the few holes we could see looked like my idea of golf…

title: Best resort in Sarasota
review: Dear reffz: Thank you for the “5” review.  Thank you for being here for the wedding. I’m glad you found the resort to be very good and the food exceptional.  We appreciate you taking the time to recognize that the staff was very friendly and helpful.  We look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beautiful resort, very unpleasant staff
review: Without any doubt this hotel and complex is far the best I have ever visited to date in the history of working around the world living out of suitcases as part of my job, I visit around 12 to 15 hotels a year, the views are second to non, the rooms are stunning, the food, the service, the complex, the beach and pools are unbelievable, it's a dream,Myou look out over the sea and see the Dolphins at arms reach swimming and jumping out the water,mit has a golf course on site, gym everything you could ever want, if this hotel ever got a bad review then I would never ever believe it as you would have to go far to exceed this or anything I have ever seen, please see photos that I have taken, strongly recommend,met hey have a chain of fantastic hotels and locations. Mark Anderson.

title: Very Relaxing, Stacey and rest of staff very friendly!
review: The Resort at Longboat Key Club is wonderful place. Though it is not meant for people who want to party, it is excellent for people who need to sit back, relax, oh, and enjoy an adult beverage. The facilities are kept in a very nice condition and the staff is friendly and helpful. Stacey who was down at the pool during my stay was incredibly nice and pleasant to talk with. She helped with bike rentals too which are a great option if you want to go down to St. Armand's Square. I really enjoy this place. If you want to relax, look no further!

title: Fun
review: Dear ZachT: Thank you for the “5” review!  I am pleased you enjoyed your time with us and were able to sit back, relax and enjoy your adult beverage.  Thanks for mentioning the facilities are in nice condition and the positive experiences you have had with our staff.  Your specific mention of Stacey was very nice and we will share your comments with her. We hope to see you again in the near future. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Overpriced and extremely outdated
review: The service was great at the whole facility,but what really stuck out to us was at the pool area.  Allie was one of the best servers we have ever had, very pleasant and a lot of fun to converse with, she was very professional and always in the the vicinity if we needed anything.  The BIGGEST little thing we saw was Stacey the pool area attendant who took charge of the entire pool area like a ships captain and with the care, confidence and authority. I have not seen anyone take as much pride in what they do as Stacey.  This girl is going places....😀👍👍

title: Perfect Spot - Beautiful Resort ~
review: Thanks for mentioning service was great throughout the club and resort.  I am pleased you especially enjoyed the service and the pool and Allie and Stacey were standouts that helped ensure you had a great time with us.   We will celebrate your review with them.   We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Longboat Key Hidden Treasure
review: First time we had stayed at this resort, we chose this report for its location and it was one of the more expensive hotels so presumed it would be good !!!! Room was in very poor condition and very worn out as a lot of the communal areas were, air condition couldn't be left on as the noise was horrendous and there was building work going on around the resort. My wife and I bloomed in bites all over our bodies that we reported to the desk and we were told they were "no see ems" ??? didn't get any more answers to our complaints so we emailed when we got home but a customer manager called us and just fobbed me off with some old nonsense and never got back to me about anything he said he would  Terrible and quite expensive stay !!!! my advice is to check other resorts

title: Wonderful beach vacation!
review: My family just spent a week at the Longboat Key Club, and again found the location perfect for relaxing by the water, and enjoying dinners and shows in Sarasota (which is a about 10 minutes away and has good restaurants). We also like going to St. Armand's Circle, which is nearby. My husband loves the golf courses (one of the reasons we stay here). We had a gulf-view, 1-bedroom unit, and I enjoyed being able to sit on the spacious balcony in the middle of the day when I wanted a break from the beach. The pool is very nice, as are the restaurants. We did have breakfast in our unit most days since there is a full kitchen. The staff is very helpful at the beach and pool and we never had trouble finding chairs! It can take a little while for food to arrive when it's ordered at the…

title: Fun
review: Dear Marie C: Thank you for the “5” review!   I am very pleased your family found the location perfect and relaxing.  Thanks for mentioning that the staff was all very helpful and that you enjoyed your 1 bedroom gulf view suite.  We look forward to you returning again soon so your husband can enjoy the golf courses and you can enjoy the pool and beach.  We look forward to seeing you for your 4th trip here ! Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Lovely stay
review: Lots of even w rainy cloudy weather. Plenty of swimming and sand time. Beach view well worth the extra cost over the other side. Coin laundry is very convenient. Super clean and comfortable. Well furnished and had plenty of towels!!!! Ive been here three times and plan to do it again!

title: Winter in FL. Longboat Key resort
review: Thanks for mentioning service was great throughout the club and resort.  I am pleased you especially enjoyed the service and the pool and Allie and Stacey were standouts that helped ensure you had a great time with us.   We will celebrate your review with them.   We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Paradise Found
review: Stayed here for 3 nights on our way to Marco Island having never been to Longboat Key before. So glad we chose this resort, all the staff were so helpful and friendly.  We had a gulf facing one bed roomed condo which was lovely. Very well equipped kitchen, even had washer and dryer which was helpful.  Ate at Portofino, Sands Pointe and The Whisky Bar for dinner and they were all excellent. Great shuttle service around the resort to all the restaurants due to the size of the place. They even took us to St Armands Circle and picked us up.  Will definitely return....

title: Nice resort, nice folks
review: Resort was very nice, good location, room had a great view of the gulf.  As others have stated previously all rooms seem to have a good view and even the golf course view look better than most.  Used the golf practice range, clubs and balls were free, didn't get to play the courses but they looked well maintained.  Room (Jr. Suite) had plenty of space, kitchen was good for breakfast and lunch.  The sleeper sofa was, well, a sleeper sofa.

title: Nice weekend stay but pricey
review: Dear gregb:  Thank you for being our guest.  Glad you found the resort nice and you enjoyed the golf practice range.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Wow!
review: This was our first visit to the Resort at Longboat Key Club.  It was lovely but the resort has been around a while.  The grounds were exquisite & the jr. suite on the lagoon was a large room, but you can tell it's dated.  Little things need replacing, but it was clean and comfortable.  It was complete with an efficiency kitchen, washer & dryer and dishwasher.  We didn't need this for the weekend, but if it was a longer stay, it would have been used frequently.  The jr. suite happened to be one of the less expensive rooms and it had a great view of the lagoon and boats from our personal balcony.  It was very private and I liked that.  I find $300 a night for a hotel room wasteful, but it was the best we could do in this location during high season.    The hotel amenities are…

title: Fantastic experience!
review: Dear ztlsgal: Thank you for staying with us.  Thanks for mentioning that the resort is lovely and the grounds exquisite. I am pleased you enjoyed your lagoon view location of the junior suite.  Sorry you perceived things a little dated.  I agree the kitchen is a great feature to have while staying here.   We hope to see you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Superb !!!!!!!
review: What a beautiful resort! Amenities are great, breakfast is yummy and service is superb! With a little confusion regarding our room type, Kimberly Radford at the front desk quickly jumped in and wow! We were not disappointed. She worked with me to make this a very memorable weekend. Thanks Kimberly and everyone at the LBKC.

title: Superb Dream Honeymoon
review: This is the first time id been back to LBK in 19 years, so could not wait to share my child hood experiences with my new wife. Amazing still!!! The best vacation experience I have ever had, to the point I did not want to come home. Every member of staff from the beach guys to the janitors reception to management could not do enough. Joe the bar man exceptional knowledge my friend! It has taken me a while to write this as our visit was way back in July. Restaurant is amazing, everyone needs to try the tomahawk chop, and the pineapple vodka, which is now a resident of my fridge. The whole setting at LBK is of dreams, only a couple of hours from Orlando. We did Disney, Universal and Busch Gardens setting off early and getting back late, all worth it when you wake up to the Gulf of…

title: Great day
review: Dear jamesnbekck: Thank you for the “5” rating! I am so pleased that your honeymoon was a great success with us and you were able to share your memories from childhood by sharing the resorts experience with your new wife.  I’m pleased that you found all members of our staff to be excellent in taking care of your needs.  Thanks for your mention of Joe the bartender as well as the tomahawk chop.  We look forward to seeing you on your next anniversary. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Pool and Bar
review: Erik and Jake were very nice. They helped us out with chairs and made our stay very wonderful. They are great people. The beach was also very nice and the sand was really white and soft. The water was really blue and the sunset was beautiful. Loved it!

title: Underwhelmed & Overpriced
review: Dear sidneymartin_: Thank you for the “5” review!  I’m pleased you enjoyed the beach, the really blue water and beautiful sunset. Thanks for your kind mention of Erik and Jake.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Resort Stay and Golfing Early Dec
review: Absolutely wonderful pool facility on the bay. While my husband golfed and worked, I found my "happy place" poolside! The staff (especially Stacey) were always helpful and attentive. I would highly recommend this resort for your stay in the Sarasots area.

title: Golf at Bayside Courses magnificent!
review: I play a few times a year during Christmas and New Year while visiting family on Longboat Key over the past 17 years.  A lot of money has been spent on getting the course into great shape, and the course did not disappoint this year.  The course is challenging but fair.  I played the Red and Blue out of the three 9 holes available.  There is a mixture of tight tree lined fairways and then wide open fairways with water guarding the fairways and greens.  A great challenge for any level of golfer.  Thank you for a great experience. The other 18 holes have just been completed and look superb.

title: 10th Anniversary Trip
review: Dear Stantheeman: Thank you for the “5” review!  I am glad you enjoyed the Harbourside golf course and found the Red and Blue to be challenging but fair.  Yes, we have also completely remodeled the Links golf course as well and hope you will be able to play it next time you are here.   All of our guests have been very pleased with the quality of the golf here at the Resort and Club.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great Escape for New Year
review: Six night stay for our 10th anniversary in a premium beachfront junior suite. Have been here twice before but not in a few years. We have always loved the beachfront location and the sunsets on the West coast of Florida can't be beat.  We love this hotel although it is starting to show a bit of age. Staff is excellent - friendly and accommodating. We had a slight issue and Rick the Operations Manager called me personally to discuss. Onsite restaurants nice but a bit pricey. Local area has many to choose from. Our room had both a kitchen area and washer/dryer which made it convenient for us to stock up with groceries for this weeklong trip and do laundry. Beach showing a bit of erosion but nice. Personally we feel at home here and will be back.

title: Amazing!
review: Dear J1Saylor: Thank you for the “5” review!  I am pleased you enjoyed your six night stay with us for your anniversary.  I agree it is a wonderful beachfront location and the sunsets are the best.   I did appreciate speaking to you while you were here and I’m glad you feel at home with us.  We look forward to seeing you next time you are with us.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Review
review: Great resort to escape the cold and soak in the sun from Gulf of Mexico, play golf and the spa is excellent as is the Fitness center.  Shopping at St Armands is 3 miles aways and great restaurants to choose from and not your usual chain stores.  Publix turn left out of resort and at the next light turn right.  Shopping center hidden intentionally.

title: great place and service
review: Stacey who was working at the pool area was superb and extremely helpful courteous, and should be a very valued  employee. She offered more good adv ice of the area than the concierge and was just fun to talk with. Very outgoing etc.

title: Day at the Beach
review: Perfect day at the Longboat Beach Club! Waves superb and breeze just right. Wonderful service from everyone here - Eric and Kristyn have been looking after us on the beach. Cool drinks and yummy fish tacos. They love to find your family just the right spot on the beach and deliver to your beach chair. Happy Holidays!!

title: Great room with great views
review: Stayed for my sister-in-law to-be's wedding weekend. We got a complimentary upgrade from the 1 bedroom suite we booked to a 2 bedroom. It's a shame had we known we would've had other relatives stay with us. We were in building 3 instead of 4 like everyone else and on the 7th floor. We were just above the hot tub and pool but with a great view of the ocean. The only time the pool was annoying was late at night when bar goers decided to get a little loud it echoed between the buildings. Otherwise great hotel. Will be back again!

title: Bad service, bad decor, bad management
review: We are visiting for Christmas/New Year's and have been really disappointed. There are not enough chairs on the beach which means people fight over them. At lunch, there is one waiter servicing over 100 people which means basically no food or drink service, the pool is extremely small and crowded. The restaurant at the pool has one person trying to seat and bus tables and there was a 45 minute wait for food that can only be described as disgusting. I can't believe this place is listed as a "fine hotel and resort" with American Express. It certainly doesn't deserve to be. The decor is like a Holiday Inn. The only decent thing has been the housekeeping service.

title: our favorite in the area
review: we love this place. the location can't be beat - close in but quiet - spectacular beaches, spacious rooms, gorgeous pool, great bar - food is very good. Service has been responsive and well above average. most of the rooms have a kitchenette, which we appreciate for breakfast. a number of good restaurants close by, as well as the |Mote aquarium and the Sarasota Sailing Squadron, It's our top choice in the area  YOu can't go wrong here - only knock are the rates, which are on the high side. But worth it!!

title: Winter holiday family vacation
review: We visited The Resort at Longboat Key Club for winter break. I would highly recommend this resort. All of the staff were very friendly and helpful. Stacey was especially friendly and assisted my family with our daily activities. There are many activities available on-site including fishing,playing at the beach, bike riding, paddle boarding, sailing, and tennis. The daily breakfast was convenient and delicious.

title: Longboat Key getaway
review: The rooms  are very spacious, modern and clean!! The beach and pool great The staff ...Very good!! Stacey at the pool helped me recover my phone under a pile of wet towels. It was a perfect little getaway !! We would definitely return as we all enjoyed our 3 nights here.

title: Great family vacation destination
review: Stacey seemingly gives everyone at the pool personal service. She's always moving and always smiling. Ozzy makes sure everyone on the beach has everything they need whether it be a cabana, chair, or refreshing drink. Leo's leadership and presence is the rudder that keeps the resort headed towards an enjoyable family experience.

title: Christmas vacation
review: Great service and choice of restaurants.   Stacey took good care of us at the pool.   One bedroom suite plenty of room for the 4 of us.   Very clean and bright   The mattresses on the hide a bed and cot were a little tired - springs in the wrong places.  Richard was very pleasant and shuttled us between golf courses and restaurants.  Will be returning.

title: Love these accommodations
review: Dear Sylvie746:  Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest!  I am pleased you enjoyed your 1 bedroom suite and you found it very clean and bright.  Let us know which suite you were in so we can be sure to address the mattress concern.  We do inspect and replace as needed.  Thanks for your kind mention of Stacey and Richard.  I’m pleased to hear they took great care of you while being our guest.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Good and bad
review: First of all servers: Javier 5 stars, Kathy 5 stars Good: staff for the most part very helpful, location is great, king bed very comfy. Beautiful view from building 4. Fixes occurred in a timely manner, willing to comp for all the mistakes. Bad: if they got it right the first time there wouldn't need to be so much catch up with offering comps... From the beginning, door not working, stood outside till engineer showed up to fix, catch up: comps for drinks and appetizer: much appreciated,  balcony with fabulous view but: extremely dirty, filled with dead flies and gnats, clearly not been cleaned in months. On beach , waited and waited for towels after asking, understood busy so waited and waited, after an hour, had to go get myself Breakfast: not waitresses fault but order…

title: Superior Service
review: Dear banga876: Thank you for taking to time to review your stay and for mentioning Javier and Kathy as “5” star service.  I do apologize that you had issues with balcony cleaning, beach service and food service.  It is certainly not our level of service and I am truly sorry you encountered any challenges. I’m glad our staff worked to make up for any issues, but I would have loved to have also spoken to you while you were our guest.  I assure you we follow-up with our team on any concerns and I will be reviewing your concerns with them. I hope we have the opportunity to host you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beach and pool
review: All of the staff here have been incredibly cheerful, friendly, knowledgeable, accommodating, and quick to respond. There is ample staff on site and all have been consistently (not in an overbearing way by any means) checking in with me to make sure my needs are met and to see if there is anything they can do for me. Staff like Stacy and Kathy are extremely genuine and have been very patient with me and my party. The resort is very family friendly, and access to the beach and pool are ideal. I definitely feel spoiled here.

title: Superb
review: Dear jkohler8:  Thank you for the “5” review!  I am pleased you found our staff to be cheerful, friendly knowledgeable, accommodating and quick to respond.   Thanks for your kind mention of Stacey and Kathy.   Please come see us again soon so we may spoil you again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Had high expectations that were not met
review: My family has been visiting the longboat key club for almost a decade. Over the past year or so and already beautiful vacation destination has been transmogrified into a real paradise. The staff has been replaced with a group that has obviously been trained and committed to service.  They are all dedicated to a successful and enjoyable holiday for the guests.

title: Perfection!
review: My husband and I spent 6 nights in a junior suite with an amazing view of the ocean. We were only on the second floor in building one but it was perfect.  The unit had a washer and dryer,  a  Keurig coffee maker and nice little kitchen area. The tap water was good. No need to go out and buy water. The rooms were very clean and well appointed.  Service at the resort was outstanding at every place we went. We will definitely be back!

title: Functional. Good location.
review: Dear professordonovan: Thank you for the “5” review!   I am pleased you enjoyed your Junior Suite and found the view of the Gulf to be amazing!  Thank you for mentioning the service was outstanding and we look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: What a Lovely Resort!
review: The rooms are well sized and the layout is good. Amenities are somewhat lackluster. Staff is helpful. And the beach is great....just goes on and on. the presentation rooms were comfortable and well serviced.

title: Beautiful!
review: Dear GeorgeFMarkhamON: Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to do a review.  I’m glad you found the rooms to be well sized and with a good layout. Sorry you found the in-room amenities a bit lackluster. Glad you enjoyed the beach and found the hotel staff to be helpful.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Wonderful location for a Christmas present for you spouse
review: The Resort at Longboat Key is a beautiful place with rooms that are spacious, gorgeous views, the beach within walking distance and restaurants easily available. The staff couldn't have been more helpful.  They even shuttled us in a cart to our room when it was raining.   In addition to a small kitchen, which was fully stocked with glasses and utensils, there was a washing machine/ dryer in our room.   We were able to spend a day at The RIngling Museum which was nearby, and spent a day browsing around St. Armand's Circle where there are lovely shops and many delicious restaurants.   The Resort at Longboat Key and Sarasota are terrific spots for a long weekend getaway.

title: Great resort for families
review: We stayed here with my toddler. It was super clean and quiet. The beach was very nice and my daughter really enjoyed playing outside. The kitchenette was great for our family. We got sandwiches at Publix and ate in the room. They had all the tableware and utensils for a family of four. We loved it.

title: Good and Bad!
review: The room and beach view were great and the staff was fantastic (especially pool and beach side).  Unfortunately, the food was very average.  I don't understand why it was so bland, but they might need to hire a new chef.  We had the Red Stripe Reuban, Grouper salad, Grouper sandwich, Lobster Roll (very fishy) and Fish Tacos (made my husband sick).  This was our lunch on our first day so we ate off resort for the rest of our meals.  Very disappointing so we will probably not go back.  Their pool is also very outdated.

title: Great apartments and views  but bad orgaanization
review: We loved out apartment after we found it (a 10 min drive around the resort to find the building). The pool and amenities were great and affordable.  The only issue we had was that the garbage chute was often left open buy the staff and the smell hit you as soon as you left the apt and it was awful.

title: My Stay with my Wife
review: My wife and I decided to try the resort at longboat key club for the first time, and we spent four nights there.  The resort was very nice, the people were awesome, the grounds are well-maintained, the service excellent, and the food was very good!    As for the beach, the service on the beach is excellent, but there is a part of the beach that slopes, and when I was sitting on my beach chair with a cushion, I would continuously slide down off, as the cushion did not tie to the chair.  I recommend that management consider either flattening the beach if possible, or getting cushions to tie down to the beach chairs. Also, when the wind was blowing on the beach (which is often), the flag on the flagpole continuously made a clanking noise, as it was metal banging against metal, and…

title: Beautiful
review: Eric and Danyle helped me a lot today. Very helpful. Saw Dolphins and had a peaceful time at Longboat Key Club! Well definitely come back soon. The pool is very nice also. Had great food and watched the sunset and sunrise. Enjoyed staying here!

title: The Marina and The beach staff
review: We stayed at the Marina at Longboat Key Club Moorings and the staff and Marina was fantastic. They parked us right up close to the pool and shower houses, both of which were excellent. The bird poop was however horrible. Only other complaint was that the hot tub was only about a degree warmer than the pool.  Another huge pro was the staff on the beach, especially Tori and Delane who helped us with our kayak and paddle board rental. The towel desk staff was also excellent.  The food and drinks were also great!

title: The Perfect Vacation Spot!!
review: I absolutely loved the Resort at Longboat Key Club and would go back in a heartbeat. Beautiful resort-we stayed in a mini-suite overlooking the golf course for a week...I still was not ready to leave.  Wonderful beach that goes for miles with sugar white sand!  Fantastic pool steps from the beach...great service on the beach & pool areas from the attendants. So close to fantastic restaurants and shopping with St. A's Circle close by.  I am looking forward to going back and would most certainly recommend the Resort at Longboat Key Club!!!

title: One night was not enough!
review: We stayed here one night over the Thanksgiving break with the family.  We booked a 2 bedroom suite and there was 6 of us and had plenty of room to move around without tripping over bags an each other.  The view was priceless from the enormous balcony, the sunsets was amazing.  The pool was great, and beach was even better.  The staff was there whenever you needed anything and the food was really good.  Sometimes they price you out of eating at the hotel but they were very reasonably priced for everything.  I know some people will complain that its to much but hey you are at a resort on one of the prettiest beaches in America so you pay a premium for that.  The pool is a bit noisy but again its a resort not a backyard pool so there will be lots of kids in it.  They shut it down…

title: Great family vacation!!
review: We had the privilege to stay at this resort this summer.  The two bedroom ocean front rooms were spacious and well appointed.  The beach staff/ beach bar staff go out of their way to accommodate you needs.... all you need to do is ask.  The in-house restaurant was fantastic, as well as the food poolside.  Pool was nice and even had a deep end at one side that our kids enjoyed diving down in.  I used the gym that was located a short walk from the hotel accommodations.  Great free weight gym... if you are into that sort of thing!

title: Relaxing and Amazing Vacation at the Resort at Longboat Key Club
review: I stayed at The Resort at Longboat Key Club from November 14 to November 21 with my husband and two young girls. We had a wonderful experience at the resort. It was our first time staying there. We had a one bedroom suite. The suite had ample space for the four of us. There was a full kitchen, dining table, spacious living room with a pull out sofa bed, a large master bedroom with a lot of closet space and drawers, a good sized bathroom, washer and dryer (very useful when you have kids who go through a lot of laundry) and a huge balcony. The beach at the resort was beautiful, clean and not busy. We had excellent service at the pool. Stacey who worked at the pool was very attentive and helpful. The pool servers also often stopped by to see if we needed any drinks or food. The…

title: Heaven on Earth
review: Just as beautiful as any Caribbean beach resort and you don't need to leave the country. I'v been there multiple times and have experienced the same great service every time. The food is delicious and there are so many choices. Our family will be going there for years to come.

title: Stacey was awesome!
review: We couldn't have asked for a nicer, more efficient attendant at the pool! She perfectly managed our visit and our shade! And, she gave us a great understanding of how things work at the resort. Thanks Stacey!

title: Best Service Ever
review: Not only is the beach gorgeous here but the service from beach attendants is phenomenal. If you want the best service and have any special requests, ask for Eric, Karl or Ozzie.  There are daybeds and fire pits on the beach. So you can be here from morning when you finish your espresso after a walk in the beach, through lunch delivered to the cabana, hopefully see some Dolphins while paddle boarding ( Jameson even gave me his   sunglasses strap to make sure my sunglasses didn't fall off while in the water) to drinks around the firepit at sunset. A perfect day and so far we have had three in a row!

title: Incredible Service
review: The resort at longboat key is a wonderful family resort. I've been coming to the hotel since I was little girl and now as an adult. The rooms are clean and no matter where you stay you have an incredible view. The restaurants all offer delicious food. The beach service in particular is fantastic. The beach attendants, Karl and Eric are very personable and willing to help with any requests from setting up beds to getting paddle boards ready.

title: First Class and Beautiful
review: Absolutely beautiful grounds and gorgeous beach with a first class staff to make sure guests are comfortable.  The kids enjoyed getting up early and finding shells and sand dollars.  We stayed in a junior suite which included a washer and dryer with free "Tide" available!  (Where else do you see that!?  Only a very few negatives.  The large pool in the back courtyard was not heated and in this 'connected' world the rooms could have used a few more electrical outlets.  We had a choice as to unplug either the radio or the lamp in order to recharge our smartphones by the bed.  To be fair the resort DOES offer free wi-fi to all its guests.  The food in the many restaurants was great (If you're a lobster fan, be sure to order the lobster roll (LOADED with lobster meat)   Overall we…

title: A day w my sweetheart
review: I loved my ice cream and the Dolphins were a nice touch. I love napping next to my beautiful girl. The sand is perfect and I love the sunset w pretty girls sitting next to me. The water was chilly but I was hugging my girl so it kept my heart warm. Erik catered to my every need and had a warm smile :) I also loved Delane when she set up more chairs to rest each of my legs on. Erik is hot mm

title: Good service
review: Erik was nice on the beach he helped us with our chairs. The ice cream was nice and tasted so good! I love the Longboat key club it has really soft sand! The ocean was the perfect temperature and the staff is so nice. My friends and I also got lunch here the Cesar deals with chicken is so yummy

title: Outgoing Beach Staff
review: Beach Staff remembered my name, brought me towels, went out of their way to make my family comfortable in a beautiful setting.  Golf staff polite and polished, starters were spot on in finding space on a busy day, courses were in beautiful condition.

title: Good as usual
review: We travel from the uk to this resort most years as it ticks all the boxes we want for a vacation in November. It is on miles of sandy beaches and 45 holes of golf on excellent courses owned by the resort. We are always made welcome by the staff, all of which give excellent service. Gloria and Sherman are always available to help with guidance and manage to get the restaurant reservations we request. Outside around the pool the service is impeccable with Stacy being outstanding. We will return but looking to see what Changes Opal make Only negative...we like room in building 3 overlooking ocean on a high level. Opal have introduced different rates for different levels...not a clever decison as it is causing unrest.

title: Excellent stay
review: My partner and I stayed at the Resort at Longboat Key as we were recently in Sarasota for a wedding. The Resort was perfect - we received a room upgrade which was very nice, and the room was well-appointed and comfortable. I would note that the housekeeping staff was superb.  The room was well made up every day and turned down every night. I would stay here again and recommend the Resort highly.

title: Beach
review: Hotel is beautiful along with the views. Beach staff very competent and Jameson from the water sport rentals was an absolute pleasure. He paddled out to give me 500 yds to give me a new or for paddle boarding. Thanks for the great experience will definitely be visiting again next year!

title: Great service
review: Karl and Stacey did exceptionally well in the aspect of service and gratuity toward my family and I. They went above and beyond to meet our needs and make sure we were happy with their services. Always brought a positive vibe with them and are great at what they do for the club.

title: Beach experience
review: I experienced a wonderful time on the beach with my friends a few days ago. We also went paddle boarding and saw a ton of dolphins. One of them even came within 10 feet of the board! Anyway, I wanted to give a shoutout to Erik and Jake for taking care of my friends and I. They set us up with chairs on the beach and also gave us advice on where to go out on St. Armand's circle. Thanks again!

title: Location, Beach and Catering staff very good
review: The room itself was nice (bed very comfy) and clean but bathroom was not properly cleaned when we arrived (hair left in multiple locations in and around the bath), made a staff member at check-out aware that we were not happy with the cleanliness of the room at check-in, but no queries from the staff member as to what we were unhappy with.  Good points, beach staff and catering staff very pleasant, the beach is very good with loads of activities. Breakfast was very nice.  TV has a lot of channels and we did manage to watch any sports game we wanted to watch.

title: fun visit!
review: Stacey is great!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! the pool was great and we went paddle boarding in the ocean and it was super fun! the music is great and Stacey is helpful and sweet. looking forward to coming back again. I always enjoy coming here and having no stress.

title: Wonderful service!!
review: The accommodations are great and service both at pool and on beach are amazing!! Karl and Ozzy took great care of us on the beach and Alli was extremely attentive at pool. All around wonderful trip! Also lucky enough to have lots of dolphin sightings!

title: Beautiful beachfront resort
review: Dear Amy C  Thank you for the “5” review.  I am very happy that you found the accommodations to be great as well as the service.  Thank you for mentioning the attentive service of Ozzy, Karle and Alli.     We look forward to seeing you again next trip and we will dolphin look forward to it also.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Relaxing Vacation!
review: Wehad a lovely stay here. It is a large property with agolf course, tennis courts, a fitness center, outdoor swimming pool and a pristine beach. There are several buildings which were recently renovated. All units are individually owned condos that can be rented through the management company. We had a junior suite that was quite large. Theree was a kitchen as well as a washer/dryer.  We had a nice balcony which had good ocean views. I would definitely recommend a partial or full ocean view. The pool is very nice. The staff at the pool and beach were friendly and helpful. The concierge helped with dinner reservations. The fitness centere is very well equipped but it is a short walk from the units. The food is good, not great. The kitchen makes it possible to eat some meals…

title: Great Experience
review: Dear JoanM  Thank you for being our guest.  I am pleased you had an enjoyable stay with us.   Thanks for mentioning the junior suites being large in size and you found the washer/dryer and kitchens to be helpful.   Thanks for mentioning the helpful staff including pool and concierge.   We look forward to seeing you again when you are ready to return and enjoy the dolphins and sunsets.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great Beach, Ok Hotel
review: My husband and I came down for 4 days to enjoy the beautiful beaches and sunshine.  The room was spacious with all the amenities and the decor was nice.  Delane was awesome at the beach and helped us find the perfect chair, shade and beverages.  I would definitely return again!

title: What a wonderful stay!!!
review: I am so happy that I stayed at the Longboat Key Club! Everything about the stay was awesome. The service was excellent and the room was very comfortable and quiet. Also, Delane was very helpful on the beach and made us feel very welcome. Vincent took care of food and beverage for us and always had a smile on his face. I will be back!!!

title: Great time had
review: Dear Sweet_Senses13: Thank you for the “5” review!  I am very pleased you found everything about your stay to be awesome.   I’m glad you found your suite to be comfortable and quite.  Thanks for your very nice mention of Delane with beach services and Vincent with food and beverage.   We look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Runaway stay
review: I visited this resort a few days ago and wanted to share my experience. Anwyay I just wanted to say how much fun we had, and we will totally be returning. One person that really had an impact on my family was Erik, one of the beach staff. He was so helpful with setting us up on the beach and he also has a lot of knowledge about the area including restaurants and what not. Ask for him if you need anything when your there! Thanks again

title: Best visit ever
review: Dear Luke C: Thank you for the “5” review!  Wonderful to hear that you had lots of fun while here and that you will be coming back.  Thanks for mentioning Erik at the beach and his service spirit.   Thank you for being our guest. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Excellent service from Kari and Eric
review: great stay!!! beach service was wonderful, Eric, Delane and Ozzy were excellent in setting everything up for us! We even saw dolphins while having drink right on the water, how can you beat that? Kudos to these guys. I will definitely come back anytime.

title: Great place to stay!!
review: We love this hotel and have been here twice in the past month for weddings. The rooms are very spacious which is nice as we live in Manhattan. The staff is also very accommodating. Karl at the beach really took care of us and made us feel welcome. He was very kind and it was truly a vacation experience being at the hotel!

title: A Very Nice Place
review: Dear Lisa H Thank you for the “5” review and for being with us for two weddings.  Thanks for mentioning the spaciousness of the suites as well as accommodating service.   I am pleased Karl was very helpful and made you feel welcome.    We look forward to seeing you again on your next vacation.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beautiful beach day
review: While I've stayed in fancier places, I've never stayed in a place where the staff are nicer.  They couldn't be more helpful and welcoming.  From the moment at check-in when Rob helped me get a lovely beach view in a standard room, I knew I was in a nice place.  The next day, he followed up, arranging my American Express upgrade to a junior suite with an even better view, which I found hard to imagine. The standard rooms are good, but the junior suites represent one of the best values I've come across in a long time.  You get a lot for your money at the Resort at Longboat Key Club: spacious room, full kitchen surprisingly well equipped, washer/dryer, large balcony with lovely view. There are tennis courts and more than one golf course. A pretty pool. A lovely beach.  OK so…

title: Relaxing day on the Beach
review: Dear psp7: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay.  I greatly appreciate you mentioning we have the nicest staff.   I appreciate you mentioning Rob and his excellent customer service.  I’m pleased as well that you enjoyed the Junior suites and found it to be of exceptional value and spacious.  Happy you were able to enjoy the tennis, golf and beach.  Thanks for your very kind mention of Eric, Karl, Alex, Courtney, Jennifer and Lynda.  I am proud to work with such a great team. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Although a bit dated, great stay
review: Beautiful location, gorgeous beach, convenient to shops and restaurants. Love this place! You never have to leave the resort if you do not want to. Restaurants onsite and within walking distance. Great workout facility, spa and full kitchen facilities in the room! A great place to spend a November weekend!!

title: Can't wait to go back!
review: I have been to the LBK Club Resort as a child, and now as an adult, and it hasn't missed a beat. Everything about our trip was amazing. From the most perfect room location and size (2 bedroom deluxe suite) to accommodate our large family, to the staff. We were an easy walk to both the pool and the beach with an amazing view of the gulf and the sunset. We spent the majority of our trip by the pool. Where we had impeccable service from both Stacey, who always had our chairs and towels reserved and ready to go, and Allie, who served us poolside morning, day and night. I would be remiss if I also did not mention Maria, our beach yoga instructor. Her spirit and positivity helped to start our days on the right foot. It was a great trip, and we are looking forward to going back!

title: Paradise on earth
review: Dear JessicaS: Thank you for the “5” review.  Wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your Deluxe Two bedroom suite and you had an amazing view of the gulf and the sunsets. Thanks for your kind mention of Stacey and Allie at the pool as well as Maria who lead the beach yoga each day.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great poolside service
review: Where to begin ?.....pristine beach, breathtaking gulf views, pool and beach food and beverage service, immaculate rooms and a short walk to all amenities. Five minute drive to a bevy of restaurants and shops.  Friendly and helpful staff.  Somewhat ''pricey'' but you get what you pay for.

title: LONGBOAT KEY CLUB >>> 5 STARS!
review: Dear 46582 Yankee07:  Thank you for the “5” review!  Your review was very nice and paints a wonderful picture of “Paradise on Earth” as you describe it.  See you again soon! Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Very Relaxing
review: What a great hotel!!  We had a beautiful 1 bedroom apt with a wonderful ocean view. The staff are terrific, especially Stacey who works at the pool. She went out of her way to accommodate us and make us feel comfortable. We will definitely be back next year!!

title: Munchel
review: We had a fabulous time on the beach and by the pool!! Thank you Karl and Ozzy for being so accommodating to all our needs.... Cold Beverages, kayak, shade, and friendly conversation!!! 🍻🍹🚣🏼☀This is our third visit and we will be back! Very impressed with cleanliness, and very friendly staff!

title: Beach service
review: Ask for Ozzy because he does a phenomenal job with his team on the beach , my set up is always ready before I arrive . Great job and the servers are quick and up to any task. I always look foward to seeing these friendly faces.

title: Peaceful and beautiful resort!!
review: Beautiful hotel room with amazing views. Food was okay, service was bad. The restaurants are understaffed. Other than that, Longboat Key Club Resort was great! The Gulf of Mexico is beautiful and the pool is fun. Stacey was our chair and umbrella attendant at the pool. She was so friendly and helpful and continued to check on us. She adjusted the umbrellas during the day so I wouldn't get a lot of sun. She set us up with the complimentary bikes and we took a beautiful bike ride. Also, the gym was nice! The staff were very helpful.

title: Break time
review: The great service is apparent from the time you arrive. The rooms are more spacious than expected. We spent most of our time at the beach. Drinks and food on the beach is easy to get used to. I almost touched a dolphin while paddle boarding. Thanks Karl and Eric for taking care of us.

title: Pool service
review: Stacey was our chair and umbrella attendant. She was so friendly so helpful and would come and check on us throughout the day and Adjust our umbrellas. She was a very very good representation on behalf of the hotel

title: Over the top service.
review: This hotel was beautiful. Clean and Gorgeous views.. Fabulous... But we all know that looking at the pics.. I am writing about the service. I told my boyfriend Day 1 that EVERY single person I ran into was So nice and helpful. Our Cleaning lady was wonderful, the valets, Karl and Cheryl at the beach could not be more accomodating and Sara in the spa. I told him I "felt like we were at the $1500 a night Ritz we stayed at last spring with the service we had" Kudos to the management here for training and staffing being important to you. It all stems from the top. This place was

title: Longboat
review: Great beach and place to stay! Stacey at the counter was such a great help. The food and drinks are very good and appetizing. The weather is great here as well as all of the workers. Great pool and there are many things. Breakfast is great. Overall good choice

title: Normally 5 Stars
review: My husband and I stay here every year. Our initial nights are for business but we purchase extra nights every year, arranged in advance, with the exception of last year. Despite contact being made 3 times prior to our arrival this year, our reservation was messed up. Every year we get a suite/ junior suite. The suites are lovely  and between the suites and the service I am always impressed. This year, we were shuffled to a small room, the kind I did not realize existed here, because of their mix up. There was construction during the day. (I sleep during the day due to working nights at a hospital.) I am awake all night. The light switch to the bathroom was on the outside of the bathroom, so I disrupted my husband with each trip. Sleeping during the day was lost, as work was…

title: Had a great time!
review: Had a great time at longboat key club resort. Elijah, Eric, and Carl were so friendly and helpful to set us up at the beach for the day. They always went out of their way to make us feel welcome. It was the perfect place to relax and enjoy our vacation. We would certainly come back in the future.

title: Great Golf and terrific service
review: Our group of 12 stayed and played for 3 nights. We were treated wonderfully. The staff anticipated our needs and wants without us having to voice them.  Golf courses were challenging and all but the White Course were immaculate.  The beach was great for families and friends alike

title: Beautiful resort with great staff
review: Quick get away for the hubby and I. The staff knew we were celebrating his Birthday. They went out of their way to make it a very special stay.Kurt also helped us out on the beach getting us a great spot to catch some rays.

title: My wife and I love this place!
review: This was a first trip here for my wife and I.  We really love the place!  The service was excellent!  Everybody was friendly and were always going out of their way to take care of us.  Usually when I'm on vacation by the end of the trip I'm ready to go home, but not in this case, I didn't want to leave.

title: Great beachfront resort
review: Dear hinesda:  Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest!   I am very pleased that our service was excellent to the point that you wished you could’ve stayed longer.  We look forward to seeing you next time. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Amazing beach with friendly staff
review: Spent Labor Day weekend here. Really lovely hotel with spacious rooms. Only negative was that the poolside restaurant was a bit slow during lunch. But, I was Labor Day weekend and the staff was slammed. Despite being slammed, staff was friendly, courteous and apologetic about the delays.  Staff serving at the beach was great. Super friendly and helpful with umbrellas, towels, etc. Wiuld definitely return.

title: Luxury on Long Boat Key
review: Dear garciatony60:  Thank you for being our guest and taking the time to review your stay.  Happy to hear you found the hotel lovely, with spacious rooms and that the staff was courteous.  I apologize that poolside service was slower than it should have been over the holiday weekend.   We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Lovely resort but...
review: This is a lovely resort. Our room was one of the nicest we have stayed in- spacious, comfortable, everything you could want including a washer/dryer. The property is well maintained, the pool area was very well served by super, attentive staff and we could always get beds (this was a quiet time of year). The beach chairs are complementary, not that we used them as the tide seemed to be in quite often. But- the resort is let down by the front desk staff, who create a first impression that can never be repeated and in our case it was a very poor one. We arrived at 2pm on a Friday and as we entered the lobby there were 5 members of staff chatting and laughing behind the desk. One stepped forward, asked our name and brusquely told us that check in wasn't until 4pm, did we want to…

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Dear JW: Thank you for being our guest. I am truly sorry you had issues at the front desk.   It does not sound like procedures were followed as far as your pre-check in process.  There are certainly times that the suites are not ready until check-in time as occurred in your case.  However, the resort map should be fully reviewed with you at the time of pre-check-in so that you are comfortable utilizing the resort while the suite is being prepared for you.  We are also to offer to take your bags and assist be sure you are able to park in the main lot.  The temporary passes you mentioned you received give you full access to the property so that you vacation may start the moment you arrive.   Again, I apologize that the pre-check-in process did not go as smoothly as it should have.   We have reviewed this with each of our associates as check-in is the most important element to a successful stay here at the resort.  I hope you will give us another opportunity in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Excellent
review: This is an excellent hotel with all of the facilities and attention to service of a five star hotel. Food Good, rooms large with comfy beds and good fittings. Beach area great with individual sun beds, cushions and umbrellas erected by friendly helpful, efficient staff. Good location southern end of longboat key for easy access to St. Armands circle and Sarasota.

title: Bachelorette Party
review: Dear David B  Thank you for the “5” review.  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to review the points of your stay.  Thanks for mentioning the service was that of a 5 star hotel.  We hope to see you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Loved our stay
review: Very Nice helpful friendly people. Encouraged me to ride a bike ! Placed chairs and towels where I wanted. Everything you needed for a relaxing vacation! Excellent! Stacey was the best!! She was always there for me! We had great conversation and she helped me to improve my English!

title: Family get together
review: Wonderful experience on the beach.   After passing the very crowded pool area and bar.  We opted for the beach.  Greeted by a nice young man,Elijah, he was able to find us four chairs together , and brought us over an umbrella.  We arrived around noon when it was very hot.   He was able to get us a server,Vincent, who new how to get beverages out to us in a timely manner! He brought us water too, without asking.  While it was our original intention to dine inside the resort, we were having such a great time we opted for "bar food" on our comfortable chaises. While we waited, Elijah had passed our way again with a second umbrella, for our group.  How thoughtful.   The food arrived, and we all were impressed.  Not your typical bar food at all.  The chicken fajitas were plum full…

title: Incredible!
review: Dear Buckeygirl19 I’m very please you had a wonderful time with us and enjoyed the beach.  Thanks for mentioning the wonderful attention you received from Elijah and Vincent with seating’s as well as food and beverage service.  We hope to see you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: A great location and a good hotel but needs a little modernization
review: Everything was beautiful and clean. The staff was extremely accommodating. The waterfront was gorgeous. Extra special shout out to Delane for being incredibly personable and making us feel extra special. And to Richard for topping off the whole trip by identifying my undying desire to be Janis Joplin and complimenting my sunnies. Good people.

title: Best to be a Member-Guest!
review: Dear KateB Thank you for the “5” review.  I am pleased you had an incredible experience here with us and the staff was extremely accommodating.   Thank you for your special mention of Delane and Richard. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Small things mean a lot
review: Stayed there for a couple of nights. Fantastic beach and room overlooking the sea. Just hang out at the beach for a whole day, with deck chairs and sun shade provided along with food and drink served on the beach. Only complaint was that the room was get a little tired and could use some renovation and modernization. Loved the K-Cups in the room but having a VHS player - what is that all about? Time to modernize I think.

title: Memory Maker as Well as THE Resort even Locals Pick to Stay
review: I visit here every year for the NAFF's Convention and every year I forget to leave a review.  Not this time!  And I am a local, I live on Anna Maria Island several miles north.  I wish you could hear the ocean waves crashing on the shore as I write.  It is my last night here after a week in a Deluxe Suite - because my entire family was also here for a wedding of a close friend and we fit family time in.  So seven adults and two grand children in two big suites.  The staff makes a beautiful resort just even more perfect.  I ran into many support staff and everyone of them was happy and friendly.  The Resort at Longboat Key Club screens their staff VERY well and they seem to have very little turn over.  They give you so much attention-sometimes it can be too much attention. …

title: Perfect
review: Checked in yesterday for a week of relaxation ... Lovely suite .. Great food.. Stacey at the pool can't do enough to make you relax.. Offering help all the time and nothing is too much trouble. Paula was very helpful too yesterday at the barefoot bar.. Looking forward to 6 more days of pampering.

title: Baclorette Party
review: We had a fantastic time celebrating a baclorette Party here. The rooms were clean, we had beautiful views with the best balcony glass railings. All the windows and doors were such a breath of fresh air. The food was so delicious, the waitstaff at the beach, Erik, Delane & Jake, were the best! Thanks so much for an unforgettable time!!!

title: Magnificent stay
review: Everything was outstanding. Just wanted to give a huge thanks to the beach attendants for taking great care of us. Thanks to Erik Delane Eli Ozzy Jake and Jameson everyone was so kind and helpful. Erik also gave us some great advice on where to eat on the circle! He really knows the area and will help you out. Thanks so much and keep up the great work!

title: Beautiful day
review: We had a wonderful stay! The room was very clean and the staff were all super helpful. You can't beat the beautiful view from our balcony in our room. The beach staff Erik, Delane, and Jake went above and beyond to help make the stay even better!

title: Beach visit
review: Came in for a bachelorette party and we had such a great time at the longboat key club! The view is beautiful and Everyone was so accommodating! Eric, Jake and Delane down at the beach were such a great help down at the beach! I will definitely  be back for future visits!

title: Beach attendants
review: The beach attendants were the best we've ever had. We've traveled all through the Caribbean and Florida and these were by far the best all around. Delane , Erik, eli, Dan and Jake were all very polite , responsive,  attentive and "wanting to please " and always making me smile.

title: Beautiful Resort
review: My family and I visited this resort for the first time a few weeks ago & are already planning our next visit! The room was beautiful and the staff checking in were very helpful. The beach was the high light of our stay thanks to Eric & Elijah. They remembered our family & got us great spots on the beach during our stay.

title: Vacation and stayed longer than planned
review: My wife and I took a trip down to Florida with out any specific reservations. We ended up at this resort. The place is very clean and and accommodating.  The pool staff were very friendly and made our stay very enjoyable. Stacey was awesome along with Tori!!! We are planning to come back in December.

title: Vacation and stayed longer than anticipated
review: Husband and I took trip with no plans and ended up there people were very accommodating. The pool staff was outstanding especially Stacey. She went above and beyond!  She was very cheerful, remembered our names, polite and was a hard worker.  Also when her and Tori worked together they kept pool area nice and tidy always picking up dirty towels and garbage. They were the best pool workers during our stay!

title: Superb Service
review: I recently stayed for four nights at Longboat Key Club. More impressive than the scenic gulf and numerous amenities the resort has to offer was the amazing service I received from the beach staff. Ozzie and his staff of Eric, Delaine, Elijah, and Sheryl took care of every need possible and waited on me hand and foot. Each morning the staff had already set up chairs and umbrellas for me before my arrival at the beach. I was checked upon periodically to make sure my stay was as enjoyable as possible and each staff member maintained a positive and friendly disposition, even during times of heightened occupancy. I can't commend this staff enough for their impeccable service and quality they added to my stay at the resort. Ask for any of the staff I mentioned above, they are truly…

title: Best beaches on the gulf!
review: Weather was perfect and the staff was so helpful! They made the trip perfect. Elijah and staff on the beach introduced themselves to us and treated us like family the whole time we were there. We always had a great spot on the beach! I would visit again!

title: Excellent, friendly service
review: Everyone was very helpful and friendly. I especially enjoyed the amenities by the beach! All the beach staff took great care of us with chairs and umbrellas. Elijah was a great help everyday! He was professional and I appreciated him remembering our family and assisting us!

title: Great service and very beautiful
review: The room is absolutely beautiful and the service outside at the beach is outstanding  Thanks to Eli, Ozzie, Erik, & Delane!!!! Everything is very well kept up and maintained... Also Cheryl the bar tender for serving our drinks nice and cold and for coming back often to check on us!! Thank you so much long boat key club for a great experience!

title: Boarding at longboat
review: Erik was great. Super helpful for me and my travel companion, Carlos. KNew all about the equipment. Michelle the server was really helpful and quick to respond. The beach was beautiful and the water was perfect. Can't wait to come back. Love this place.

title: Beach
review: Eric was very helpful with our set up on the beach and ozzie was also helpful they made sure all our needs were met and had a great time at the beach I had my wedding party here and we all had a great ti.e

title: Beautiful beach
review: Great beach and staff was very helpful.  Delane, Erik, Jameson, Ozzy, and Eli made sure that I had everything I needed - towels, drinks, and a great chair on the beach.    Also, the rooms are large and have full kitchens - great for a family but not used by us.  If I come back for a non-work trip, I will definitely bring my daughter.  She will love the shells that wash up on the beach!

title: longboat key triathlon
review: stacey by the pool was excellent.  she was so helpful and courteous.  she really made our stay there wonderful.  she went above and beyond her duties to make sure my family was comfortable and having a great time.

title: Relaxing getaway
review: This weekend was the perfect mix of relaxation and sunshine. The resort was nice and quiet this time of year, and the staff was so welcoming and helpful. The beach was calm and beautiful and the boys down there were so helpful! At the pool the lovely Tori did a remarkable job of setting me up in the perfect spot and she was so sweet to check up on me to make sure I was always comfortable. All in all I had an amazing getaway.

title: Great beach and friendly staff
review: We got great beach front room. Clean and huge! Great drinks by the pool. Weather was perfect and Eric and Delane were help with seats and boards on the beach. Yoga on the beach was very relaxing. Hot tube is nice to sit in and stare at some stars. Tennis and golf all on site. We did not need to leave.   Thanks to the full staff. We had a great time.

title: Great, attentive staff with great amenities.
review: The hotel is a little piece of paradise.   The staff is so kind and welcoming.   The resort has free rental bikes, a shuttle to key areas, and great views out of all rooms.  The beach staff (Eric, Delane, and Dan) were so accommodating had such fun personalities!! Such a great trip.

title: Florida vacation
review: Our experience has been wonderful. Very helpful and considerate staff. The best resort we have ever been to in the states and international. Great pool and beach area. Rooms were just as described on Internet. Erik and Delane were especially wonderful with beach activities. Very respectful young folks.

title: So beautiful and relaxing!
review: Room was huge with a full kitchen, amazing view right on the gulf and overlooking the pool!  Very large balcony with a table for 4 and a recliner!  Love the beach, free umbrellas and chairs.  Pool was very nice with a pool bar and restaurant and lots of chairs.  Multiple restaurants at the resort!  Love the restaurant on the marina as well.  Great gym overlooking the golf course and really nice lunch place looking at all of the tennis courts.  But even better than the resort itself is the service was amazing!  They were so helpful with restaurant reservations, even when we went off the resort.  We used Uber to get to St. Armands Circle which was only $6.50 from our hotel.   Erik and Ozzy was amazing at the beach taking care of our towels, chairs, umbrellas, paddleboards,…

title: Chill out
review: This was our forth visit to the resort at longboat key, it is the perfect place to relax.  The rooms are very well appointed, we had a junior suite, which has a fridge, washer/dryer and small kitchen, along with a separate dressing area, so very spacious. We had a lagoon view, great for spotting manatees and bird life. The pool area is great for people watching and the pool bar is excellent.  However, there is not much atmosphere in the hotel bar and the whole place is quiet after sunset, you can however go to St Armand circle where there are many restaurants and bars.

title: relaxing resort.
review: Dear LesSouthhampton”  Thank you for your review.  Thanks for returning to us for the fourth time to relax.   I’m happy you enjoyed the spacious junior suite and the view of the lagoon allowed the wonderful wildlife observations.   Sorry you found the lobby bar quite.  Many nights we do have entertainment there to liven things up.  we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Beautiful
review: I wanted to start off by saying how beautiful the beach is. Everything from the view of the gulf, to the Dolphins literally playing a few feet away from you, everything is just perfect. What made everything even better than it already was was the service. I wanted to give Erik and Ozzy a huge shoutout for taking care of my every need! They definitely took care of me and my family, returning frequently to make sure I was ok. Overall everything was perfect! Thanks again!

title: Perfect Weekend Getaway
review: Dear EmilyJ: Thank you for the “5” review and for your very kind mention of the “beautiful beach” including dolphins putting on a show for you.  I also appreciate you mentioning Erik and Ozzy for taking great care of you.    We look forward to seeing you and your family again very soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Possibly Overpriced.....
review: Excellent place to stay. The private beach rocks and the service staff (Ozzy, Jameson and Dan) took great care of us. They set up our cabanas and made sure we had a nice time. Using the bikes to ride to Armand Cir was a highlight too. Paddle boards, kayaks available too. Our room was perfect with a great view of the lagoon. Quiet, friendly resort.

title: Amazing!
review: Dear rachelb5050” Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest. Glad you found us to be an excellent place to stay and thanks for your kind mention of Ozzy, Jameson and Dan.    Happy to hear that your lagoon view suite was perfect with a great view!   We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Beach is great
review: This is a lovely resort...... no doubt. I stayed in the King Suite (Deluxe) This suite was very spacious and overlooked the pool and the ocean. To avoid hearing guests at the pool and the pool bar, ensure you are above the 4th floor. The pool is lovely but overcrowded (and I was there late September) The beach is stunning! Located at the end of the beach strip, this gives privacy. There are plenty of cushioned lounge chairs to enjoy the sun and crystal clear waters as well as a breathtaking sunset (the highlight of my trip)  The onsite staff was friendly.... front desk employees could be more attentive to guests needs, after all these rooms are not cheap.  I would definitely return if a got a decent price for the room.

title: Wonderful
review: Fantastic view on the room along with a great pool for swimming. Erik and Eli really took care of us down on the beach. Their assistant manager Ozzy also was exceptional in his service. Thank you for making the trip absolutely wonderful! Looking forward to coming back :)

title: the pool was awesome!
review: Dear MaryJ:  Thank you for the “5” review and for mentioning the fantastic view from your suite.   I’m pleased you enjoyed the swimming pool and well as the beach.  Thanks for your kind mention of Erik, Eli and Ozzy.  We look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Beach with friends
review: this resort was awesome! loved swimming and meeting new people! so much fun!! lovely staff! Erik and Eli were great! very helpful. great food and service. even saw dolphins while laying by the beach! ate grilled cheese and drank strawberry daiquiris!! recommend those!

title: Beach was perfect
review: Dear oliviacolemen11: Thank you for the “5” review and for mentioning the resort was awesome!   Thank you for mentioning the great food and service including the grilled cheese and daiquiris.  I appreciate your recognition of Eli and Erik.     We look forward to seeing you again very soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Beautiful day
review: The pool is amazing. Erik and Eli  were really nice. The beach was beautiful and really calm. People were really normal and the service was the best. I will totally come back here again to this amazing place. Lonbiat key is the best place ever and I will recommend it to all of my friends.

title: Excellent resort
review: The rooms are beautiful and big beautiful ocean front deck service was excellent the staff on the beach were very attentive especially Cheryl and jake will definitely come back the lunch menu was great and very large portions grilled salmon salad was delicious highly recommend  Patricia new york

title: The KEY To A Great Vacation!
review: Dear Patricia I:  Thank you for your “5” review and for calling us an excellent resort.  I’m pleased you found the suites beautiful and big.   Thanks for also mentioning the service and lunch menu inclusive of the grilled salmon salad.  Thank you for your kind mention of Cheryl and Jake as well.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Amazing Beach, Amazing Service,Amazing Golf!
