review: I recently stayed at the Resort at Long Boat Key Club for 5 days with my boyfriend and family.  Overall the experience was wonderful. The beach was great, the staff was friendly, and the food and drinks were pretty good.  Stacey, the pool attendant, was very knowledgeable, sweet, and made us feel at home!  She also provided some great suggestions for places to see in Sarasota. I would definitely return in the future.

title: Best Vacation Ever!!!!!
review: Dear KateG: Thank you for the “5” review and for your kind mention of the wonderful experience.  I’m please top see you enjoyed the beach, the friendly service and the food and drinks.   Thank you for your kind mention of Stacey.    We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Excellent
review: I started off my trip down on the amazing beach the key club offers, I was greeted by Jameson, he took care of everything for my family, food and drinks were amazing! Cheryl really hit the spot with the drinks on those hot days, Thank all of you so much we will be returning soon!!

title: enjoyable getaway
review: Had a very nice trip to Sarasota and stayed at Resort at Longboat Key. Beach is beautiful, great pool, good food, especially at the Pool Bar and the staff was fantastic-Stacey, Cheryl, Kim, Kayla-all took very good care of us!  Thank you!

title: The staff are amazing
review: Dear Mary N: Thank you for your review.   I'm pleased you enjoyed your stay including the beach, pool, food, pool bar as well as the service.  Thank you for your kind mention of Stacey, Cheryl, Kim and Kayla.  We look forward to seeing you again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Amazing place
review: Erik, Ozzy, Elijah, Elaine and Cheryl along with the concierge are the most accommodating, professionals who go beyond the call of duty every time we stay here. I could give numerous personal examples for each of them. We were disappointed the beach was so eroded but you can't stop mother nature. The service here more than earns the cost of the resort. I hope these particular folks never leave here as they are LBKCs greatest assets.

title: LONGBOAT KEY Is The Place To BE!!
review: Dear Camkelpsa: Thank you for the”5” review and for saying the staff are amazing!  Thanks for your specific mention of Erik, Ozzy, Elijah, Elaine, Cheryl and the concierge.   I’m so pleased they are a big reason for your continued support of the resort.  the northern section of the beach has begun to return and , as you saw the middle and south beach as a big or bigger than ever.   We look forward to seeing you next time.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Too big and too expensive
review: Long Boat Key Resort is an amazing place to vacation so beautiful great for both family's and couples. I have never been disappointed with my stay at this resort!  I've been coming here for 10 years! Great service by Erik and Delane on the beach!

title: Rough weather but nice stay
review: Overall everything was perfect! The beach was well cleaned along with the rooms and what not. I wanted to give Erik a special shoutout for hooking us up on the beach/pool with chairs umbrellas and towels. Make sure you ask for Erik when you hit the beach! Thanks again!!

title: Awesome
review: Dear Sarah S: Thanks for the “5” review and mentioning everything was perfect.    Glad you found the suites and the beach well cleaned and welcoming.  Thanks for your shout-out to Erik. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Wonderful stay
review: Erik was really helpful with everything, he always made sure me and the kids I was watching had everything we needed. He entertained the little boy I was babysitting because he was stuck with all girls (very sweet)... Absolutely love him! Hard worker and cares about his job!

title: Beautiful Resort!
review: Dear ChloeT: Thanks for the “5” review!  I’m pleased to hear Erik was helpful and attentive and you all loved him.   He will ready to welcome you back on your next visit with us. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Perfect blend of hotel and condo
review: Everything was perfect from the pool to the service on the beach. Even though the rough weather seemed to  linger, Erik made sure I was taken care of with chairs and an umbrella. Thanks again Erik for your awesome help! Definitely ask for him when you hit the beach.linger tlinger

title: Awesome Service
review: Elijah & Eric were amazing!! Took care of us by giving us a beautiful view on the beach. So sweet in making sure we had enough towels and umbrellas, and continually checked in on us. Such sweet boys! They make this resort as amazing as it is.

title: Great Getaway
review: Dear Rachael A:  Thank you for the 5 review and for mentioning the amazing service by Elijah and Eric.  Glad they were able to make your beach experience so wonderful.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Awesome - Best resort ever experienced - can't wait to go back!!!
review: My wife and I celebrated our anniversary with a long weekend in September. What an enjoy time we had. First, since it was a bit off-season, the hotel was not crowded. Further, the weather cooperated nicely. The sugary white beach was in prime condition with plenty of lounge chairs and umbrellas. The beach wait staff were attentive and friendly. In the mornings, we rode the hotel bicycles. Nice bikes, single speed and geared low for easy riding up and down the island. Very friendly pool attendant to help get us started. Our room was lovely overlooking the lagoon. The maids came for afternoon and evening room refreshing. Just a great weekend at the Long Boat Key Club.

title: High Expectations
review: Dear James W  Thank you for the 5 review!   Thank you for celebrating your anniversary with us on your long weekend.  Great to hear that you enjoyed the beach and all of its offerings as well as utilizing our bikes. Hope you were lucky enough to see a manatee swim from your Lagoon view.   All the best and we look forward to seeing you again soon.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: The resort at longboat key
review: Amazing!!  From the impeccable service at the front desk, at the pool, on the beach to the luxurious accommodations with breathtaking view, to the incredible fun had by all, including the kids - we couldn't be happier with the memorable weekend. From the first day we met him to the day of our wedding Jonathan Lester, event planner extraordinaire,  took care of every request we had - beyond expectation!!  The food at every venue was outstanding, our guests raved about every aspect of the weekend - "best wedding ever"! We were especially thrilled with beach and pool staff - who were attentive and accommodating on a busy holiday weekend. The chant shared by all "we must all come back soon!!

title: Wonderful Birthday Weekend
review: It has become a birthday tradition for my family every year. I absolutely love this resort for it's beautiful location and amazing service. All our wants and wishes are anticipated and happily provided.  A special thank you to Delane for making our days on the beach extra special. Her service and ever present smile was greatly appreciated.

title: Very comfortable stay
review: Dear Libbelule:  Thank you for the “5” review.   Glad you enjoyed your time in the Lagoon view suite and were able to see the manatees as they came through. Happy to see you found the room upscale and liked the mini-bar, the beach and the gym.   We look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Enjoyable  Beach Resort
review: We had a junior suite with a Lagoon view. It was a shame not to have a view of the sea but being able to spot manatees doing their thing in the lagoon was great!! The room itself was great, really upscale and well appointed and lovely and quiet. I must say, it's the best mini bar I've ever seen! The gym is great here, and the beautiful beach is stunning.

title: sophisticated, yet family friendly
review: Dear Libbelule:  Thank you for the “5” review.   Glad you enjoyed your time in the Lagoon view suite and were able to see the manatees as they came through. Happy to see you found the room upscale and liked the mini-bar, the beach and the gym.   We look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great resort and beach!
review: We had a spacious poolside gulf view room in a gated community that was beautiful and very relaxing. There is plenty to do in the area. Pool and beach areas are very clean. Hotel staff are very accommodating with all requests. Even being poolside it wasn't that noise. Sitting on the balcony at night was so enjoyable listen to the waves on the beach!

title: Relaxing vacation, super beach, helpful staff
review: Stayed for ten nights in August, our favourite time of year, very quiet. Beach view room a must, great for relaxing on your balcony watching the sun setting. Hotel pool area works well, poolside staff excellent ( especially Stacey, who was very attentive and made us feel very welcome).

title: Long weekend family getaway
review: Dear JohnG Thank you for being our guest and for being with us for a week and a half.  Glad you were able to enjoy the sunset from your suite and you enjoyed your time.  Thank you for recognizing Stacey for her hospitality. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Huge disappointment
review: Great last minute reservation, rented a waterfront one bedroom and a two bedroom. Two small kids, six adults, perfect location, boat parking, a great protected beach for sunning and beach fishing. Bars and restaurants everywhere. Five minutes to St. Armand's circle. Now on the schedule for next year.

title: Wedding weekend
review: Dear DavidO:  Thank you for being our guest.  I’m glad you found us for your last minute getaway and your two suites worked well for you.   Good to hear the boat parking worked well for you.  Keep in mind we also have slip rental available at our marina.  We look forward to seeing you back next year.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: A True Resort
review: Such a disappointing stay at Long Boat key resort. We arrived with our one year old daughter to a very run down and shabby room. The bath tub was stained and the whole suite in desperate need of renovation. The carpet was dirty and there was a half full coke can in one of the cupboards. The air conditioning was very noisy and would start every ten minutes with a big rumble from one of the cupboards. As a result I woke up in the night every time it went on! Completely unacceptable to have such an old fashioned system. One of the doors to the water tank had come off its runners and quite unsafe. The high chair that we asked for in our room was filthy around the bottom and I had to scrub it clean! The pool area was dirty and run down. On the website the hotel boasts 8…

title: Fun in the sun.
review: Really nice resort.  I thought it was going to be too big and hard to get around, but found it cozy and friendly.  Don't bring cash because everything you do gets booked to your room.  Kind of hard at the end of the stay to sort out who ate or drank what if you go with friends.  Don't book golf unless you are a golfer.  They push you thru, and if you are just doing it for the fun of it, no fun.  Plus it cost 253.00 for 3 people to golf.  Crazy!!    Pool, beach, restaurants really nice and you are 5 minutes from St Armand's Circle and 15 from Sarasota.  Room really nice and comfortable.    Great trip and I would stay there again for sure.

title: favorite hotel in longboat key
review: superb service and amenities.........staff wonderful. Room and view just beautiful. Ate lunch there each day by the pool. Food and service wonderful. Love the pool, beach is beautiful. Only drawback is they do allow smoking outside at the bar area. would prefer a non smoking hotel both inside and out.

title: Outstanding
review: When we planned our summer holiday to Florida this year we were looking for two extremes. An action packed, exhilarating time in Disney, Universal and all, followed by a complete rest and relax in sublime tranquility.  We chose Longboat Key Club after considering many others along the west cost of Florida as it was able to offer us a large suite with uninterrupted sea views, a good choice of restaurants and bars, a private beach.  When we arrived we were welcomed like long since seen family members and immediately felt that the decision was a good one.  We were shown to our suite without delay and were aghast at how spacious and well maintained it was. The amenities provided made us feel right at home with everything you could possibly need, notwithstanding the amazing balcony,…

title: Annual vacation
review: My fiance and myself love this long boat key resort and we go every year. Awesome tuna nacho item at the outside pool bar that we have tried to replicate with no luck. Erik on the beach was very polite and made us feel special.

title: Wonderful beach and pool just service the location ...everthing !!!!!
review: To start your day with Favia bring you breakfast and a smile. Service at Pool  Victoria was always on time. Reaching the beach the service doesn't stop with drinks and finding a spot.  Over all a great place for golf or get away.

title: My recent trip to the Resort at Longboat Key Club was amazing Can't wait to go again!
review: An amazing room, with a million dollar view.  I wish I had found about this place sooner!  Peaceful, great beach, great service, great food.  On the beach, Ozzy really has it down to a science.    At the pool, Irelvis took care of my family.  Fresh dry towels were always available.  Paola, she was a waitress who had the best personality.  She was always quick with getting us refills before we asked for them.  And made sure we always had extra napkins before we even had to ask (usually a pet peeve at other places).  Overall, a great experience and the resort is close to many attractions but at the same time its far enough to keep it very quiet and relaxing.

title: Beautiful location and amazing customer service
review: HI, we just had a week at Longboat Key, and could not have been happier with the whole experience.  The location is sublime, 50m from a soft sandy beach, warm seas (83F), drinks service and free use of cabanas. Kids did not want to get out of the sea. we could also cheaply hire paddle-boards, kayaks etc  We had a twin room suite with sea views in block 3, beautifully prepared, everything you could need, nice balcony overlooking the sea and in the mornings you could slide open bedroom doors and listen to lapping waves.  Hotel facilities were great, nice pool, hot tub, pool side bar, 5 or so restaurants, 2 golf courses for my son and I, spa for my wife and daughter whilst the boys were on the golf course!, and shuttled around by helpful staff between the locations.  Many other…

title: Wonderful time at the beach
review: This was our first time in the Sarasota area and I booked this hotel as it had direct access to a private beach. I was not disappointed. The facilities, service and food were all excellent. The view from the room was beautiful. We ate breakfast and lunch in the hotel and each time the service was great and the food was fresh and tasty. There was no problem getting beds on the beach and the fruit water that was constantly available was a nice touch. We really enjoyed watching the pelicans and other birds diving for fish but the current is pretty strong so we didn't venture too far from the shoreline. The sea was warm and clean. We actually extended our stay by and extra night because we enjoyed the resort so much. We will definitley return - probably to a 2 bed room next time.

title: Now this is more like it !!!!!
review: WOW!  The new ownership has made a big difference in service and quality.  Almost did not want to come back to the Key Club because of past issues and declining service  a few years ago.  So glad to see the dramatic change!  6 night stay went by too fast.  No problem with the specific room we requested-even was able to check in early; spotless and very comfortable.  Restaurants were all fantastic; Tony and his staff at Sands Point in the main building really put on a show...Ozzie and his staff at the beach were awesome every day at meeting our needs for chairs/lounges/umbrellas.  Wait staff at beach and pool really has improved.  Considered Stacey at the pool to be our "employee of our stay"...she never stopped in her attempt to serve.  She demonstrated a high level of…

title: The beach!
review: My family and I have been a member here for over seven years, and absolutely love it! From the great food and drinks to the great service, you are destined to have an amazing time. My favorite part of the club though is the beach. The peaceful 80 degree Gulf is truly relaxing. More importantly, the service at the beach really make the experience exquisite. I was assisted by Erik, Dan, and Jameison and all three were terrific! Thank yall for a great vacation! I highly recommend The Resort at Longboat Key Club and can't wait to come back!

title: Ups and downs
review: We recently visited as guests of the resort, and stayed in a junior suite, oceanview. We were located on the 5th floor, in building 2, which faces the west; great for sunsets, bad for pool noise as it also overlooks the pool. We should have changed rooms immediatley upon entering and seeing the pool, but we just did not want the hassle after traveling. Room decor and furnishings were non-descript, basic beach rattan. Room was large and included a small kitchen with all necessary appliances to prepare and eat meals. The fridge was stocked with sodas, waters, wine, champagne, and there was coffe and teas. There was a separate fully stocked bar in the TV cabinet as well. We did not cook in the room, nor did we eat or drink anything provided. We drank some of the coffee and tea. My…

title: Perfect relaxing spot.
review: Amazing location, great rooms and spectacular views of the beach and sunset. 2 Bedroom suit very spacious and air-con perfect. Bathroom needs modernising, apart from this room perfect.  Overall, highly recommended if a little pricey.

title: You should expect a lot more from a high-end resort than you get here.
review: This resort should be a 5 star resort.  It has the location and it has the accommodations.  It does not have the food, and the service was spotty.  I was here because I am lucky to be someone's arm candy.  It was a professional association weekend with continuing education forums and events, and the attendees could bring significant others, families etc.    We arrived Friday afternoon, and in the resort's defense, we were probably the last couple to check in.  That said, we also got the smallest room out of the attendees, which seems a bit rude.  Why wouldn't you maintain the same size rooms for everyone, or if you have larger rooms, give those to the couples and families and have the single people in the smaller rooms?  Don't know, but it seems the philosophy was "you snooze…

title: The beach
review: Ask for Erik!!  He was a huge help on the beach getting a the chairs set up. He was very attentive and provided several great dinner options throughout the week. The resort was very nice with several different activities. The pool is also a nice break if want to cool down for lunch.

title: Family Time
review: Quiet, restful, and peaceful time on the beach! This is a lovely place recommended by friends. We felt pampered with the wonderful housekeeping service, beach-front food service, bar and restaurant staff, desk staff, and beach staff. We will be back. Only drawback was not knowing ahead of time that golf course on-site was undergoing renovations and that not all restaurants were within waling distance [shuttle ride]. It was a lovely respite from the kid-crazy place we stayed at last summer in St. Pete.

title: Nice resort
review: We belong to the beach club, nice beach, great service!  We go about once a week during summer.  Javier at the pool restaurant is great as well as Erik at the beach!  Pool restaurant is excellent for food and drinks.  Service on the beach is good.  Portofino for dinner is a great setting and very nice.

title: Relaxing
review: Dear KimL: Thank you for the “5” review!   Glad you are enjoying coming to the club and beach.  Thanks for mentioning Javier and Erik and their exceptional service.   We appreciate that you enjoy the Barefoots poolside restaurant as well as our Italian Portofino located at our marina.    We look forward to seeing you at your next time to the beach.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great Service by the Pool
review: We arrived for 6 nights to a very overcast longboat key, the beautiful ocean and white sand we had seen 11 years ago was unrecognisable.  Our room as requested was quiet,  away from the pool area. It was nicely furnished with an ample kitchen. The best was our wardrobe space, I've never been to a hotel with as many clothes hangers or wardrobe space.  The bathroom was a little tired, it's getting ready for some improvement but nothing too bad. The guys on the beach work tirelessly bringing beds and umbrellas. The only thing was the sea weed that had washed up by the end of our sixth day it was very smelly, I don't know what their plans were for it. Walks along the beach were lovely, we found some big conch shells. Thank you for making our stay so enjoyable hope to see you again…

title: Great service
review: Dear pinklady45: Thank you for being our guest and the “5” review!  We are pleased you enjoyed your time with us and you found your suite quiet and nicely furnished.  The bathrooms will be addressed in our next remodel which is in the planning stages.  Glad you found plenty of closet space as well as a well-stocked kitchen.  Thank for mentioning the wonderful job the beach attendants did to take care of you.   The seaweed has now been removed and the small storms we had are only a memory.  Due to turtle season, we had to wait a bit over a week to remove the seaweed as our turtle friends relocated nests and any turtles lost in the seaweed.  We found several and notified Mote Marine who retrieved them.   We look forward to seeing you again in the near future. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Incredible service!
review: The service that we received this morning at the pool by Stacey was fantastic! She is on top of her game working at a fast pace to make sure that she attends to all guests; all while working with a smile and getting to know the resort guests. Great employee and the Resort at Longboat Key Club is lucky to have her.  On the other hand, the same cannot be said about Leo, the manager. A comment he had made to another employee about one of his employees was overheard by me and my father which was very disrespectful. As a manager, he should know better and needs to go through more training regarding proper etiquette and know that guests are around and can over hear things being said.

title: my review
review: Longboat Key Resort is a wonderful getaway from your everyday life. When I got here Erik helped set me up on the beach and did a fabulous job. He frequently would check on us and make sure we were comfortable and that just made my vacation all the more better. The beach is clean and relaxing and just the right amount of people; not too crowded but also not deserted. The waiters/waitresses did a wonderful job with keeping us hydrated as well as just making sure we were having a great time. I definitely recommend this place to anyone who is visiting Sarasota and when you get to the beach look out for Erik and have him help you out.

title: not our best trip
review: Dear madelinejmccann: Thank you for being our guest and the “5” review!    We are pleased that you found the resort to be a wonderful getaway from your everyday life.  Happy to hear that Erik as well as the wait staff did an excellent job in looking after you.  Very happy to hear that you will recommend us to others as well.  We look forward to seeing you on your next getaway.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Holiday of a lifetime
review: Although this has been a favorite destination and hotel of ours for quite some time, we were disappointed with our overall experience on this last trip.  Room was not ready until 5:30, an hour and a half past check in time.  Although this was inconvenient and made us rush to get ready for dinner, it was not the end of the world.  What I took issue with was the attitude I received when politely inquiring about an update on the room.  The response from the young female receptionist was something like "I'm not actually in the room, so how am I supposed to know when it will be ready".  In general, the poolside was often dirty. If we were lucky enough to grab an open chaise lounge, it would take an hour or more to get someone to clear the garbage left behind.  Most upsetting is that…

title: A Return to a Great Getaway
review: Dear anne078 Thank you very much for being our guest.  I am very sorry you were unable to get into your suite until after check-in time.  We can run very high occupancy during this time of the year and this may have impacted the check-in as well as a potential item that needed to be addressed. Our goal is always to get you in on time to a perfect suite. The comment by our team member you mention is certainly not our standard as we are here to do everything we can to help you relax and enjoy your time.  Also, I am sorry to hear you felt the poolside was not picked up as well as it should be.  I have reviewed your comments with our team and will make adjustments to assure this is not an issue.  As far as your missing items, I assure you theft has not been a challenge at our resort.  I have been very pleased to see members of our team turn in some very high dollar items left behind by guests who have been very appreciative of their return. I would be very pleased to speak to you further about your situation as our security manager monitors lost and found activity and investigates as well as follows up with guests.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Anniversary Trip
review: Spent 2 weeks in Orlando before heading to this resort in Sarasota for 6 days. Wish we'd spent the whole holiday in longboat resort instead. A first class resort in all respects. It has everything - great pool area, private first class beach, tennis, golf, spa, gym - great on site restaurants and bars. Only problem with this place is you won't want to go anywhere else. Service levels absolutely first class - maids brilliant, waiting staff brilliant, pool and beach attendants brilliant. Rooms are more like apartments and have great amenities - beds really comfy. I loved this place and hope I can go back again soon.

title: Resort at Longboat Key
review: I had a great day out on the beach I had great service by the employees. Erik was great help in the beach with the umbrellas as well as Trey was also a great help. On the way into the beach we were helped by Stacey with the towels. They added to a great day on the beach they were the best. If you are looking to have a great time on the beach ask for Erik or trey and if you want to lay by the pool ask for Stacey. A great day at the longboat key club.

title: Amazing 5 star resort
review: Dear Adriana0508: Thank you for being our guest and the “5” review!     Glad to hear you had a wonderful time at the resort while you were with us.  Thanks for mentioning Stacey, trey and Erik and the positive impact they made on your time with us.  We look forward to seeing you next time you are here with us.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: A Wedding Aniversary to Remember at the Resort at Longboat Key Club.
review: This place is amazing. The staff is amazing, kudos to Ryan and Stacey, they were so helpful. This resort has everything you can dream of. I've traveled the U.S and have to say this is the best resort I've seen. The staff goes out of their way to accommodate everything.

title: Great resort great beach
review: Dear ajronaleka: Thank you for being our guest and the “5” review!     What a wonderful comment to say that you have traveled the US and that our resort is the best you have seen.  Thank you also for your positive comments regarding Ryan and Stacey.  I will be sure to thank them for the impact they made on your time here.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Wonderful Family vacation
review: As avid tennis players and beach goers, my husband and I find the Longboat Key Club our oceanfront, home away from home. All of the comforts of home, but an ocean view. Kitchen, washer and dryer, dishwasher, refrigerator and ice maker, coffee machine, stove top and cooking and eating equipment.   We have not experienced a better way to celebrate our wedding anniversary than to start the day with a great game of tennis, cool shower and then off to the beach for an afternoon of fun and relaxing play! Lunch poolside or beachside is not a pipe dream, but a wave away from awesomeness. The rum drinks and frozen drinks are flowing..... We will return another year and possibly another... The gulf view, quality of tennis and the resort amenities and service keep bringing us back.

title: Needs attention to detail
review: Beautiful oceanfront resort but issues with housekeeping. Same room service glasses, plates stayed outside rooms for 3 days.  Rooms are nice size and well furnished. Had to call housekeeping at 4pm on Saturday to ask for service and was told by front desk I could "schedule housekeeping." Seriously? Guests' job to schedule bed making?  Seaweed at beach is in piles and full of trash .... Easily raked rather than piled at base of chaise lounges.  Bartenders at pool have attitude that's not appropriate.  And best of all, if you want an egg or single piece of toast for breakfast, you have to pay $20 for the buffet.  I could go on but won't. Gloria the concierge deserves kudos ... She did everything she promised.

title: Hmmm...
review: Dear ElizabethJean08: Thank you for being our guest and taking the time to review your stay.  I am very disappointed that you had challenges while you were with us and I hope we will have another opportunity to have you as a guest where we can show you our exemplary service.  Even one negative review is too many and I truly apologize.   There is no excuse for any items to be in the hallway for any period of time.  Housekeeping does do daily service between 9 am and 5 pm and we are happy for us to schedule the service for what is most convenient for you.  This scheduling is meant to help meet your needs and is not meant as any inconvenience.      I have reviewed all of your comments with our department heads so we may do a more consistent job delivering excellent service.  As far as the seaweed, we had several days after our odd summer storms where we were not allowed to remove the seaweed even by hand due to our fiends the sea turtles. The inspectors advised us that they were finding distressed turtles in the seaweed and asked we not touch it until they relocated all of their nests etc.   We have since been released and had both hand raked and mechanically raked the beach as is our normal practice.   Thank you for mentioning Gloria and giving her kudos for taking care of your needs while with us.   I hope we will have another opportunity to have you as a guest in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: What an awesome, relaxing place!
review: Undoubtedly a fantastic location and a very pleasant beach. The rooms are very nice (though I wouldn't describe them as 5 star). The thing that really lets this place down was the service. The staff seem very unmotivated and unnecessarily irritable. When we checked in the lady behind the counter couldn't have been less interested/helpful.  We found the chamber maid to be the same and the room service staff! We did think maybe it was us (!) but we have always been respectful and courteous to hotel staff so we found it quite shocking how this had no impact here. The guys on the beach were nice as was the valet guys - but everyone else- well we won't be going back....It's worth noting that check in time is 4pm (yikes) and check out is 11am. That's a very short stay day and…

title: Great Hotel Near Sarasota
review: Dear travelmonkey2006:  Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to review your stay.  I am pleased you enjoyed the location as well as found the beach to be pleasant.  I’m happy to hear that you found the beach personal as well as the valet/bell staff to be nice.  I am very disappointed to see that you had less than stellar service at the desk and housekeeping.  That is certainly not our standard or typical feedback. I assure you we are here to take great care of our guests.   4 pm check-in time is very typical at any resort location especially once with larger suites.  We want to be sure the suites are in perfect condition for your check-in.  However, our guests are welcome to arrive earlier in the day and pre-check-in with us.  We give you full access to the resort where you may begin your vacation the moment you arrive in advance of the formal check-in.  Thank you again and I hope you will consider giving us another chance.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Amazing, Relaxing Resort
review: This place is fantastic. I recommend it to anyone, especially in the summer time.  Ask for the top floor.  What a view!  It is expensive but worth it.  It in my favourite place in the world.  The pool is awesome, and the bay is spectacular.  The health club is free, and we used it every day.  I took my daughter deep sea fishing, and we caught a bunch.  We cooked the fish on the stove in the suite.

title: Great for a 3-4 days at the beach
review: We stayed for 3 nights and it is an awesome location. Service is great, rooms are good to luxury. The pool is big enough to service the number of people and its a 30 sec walk to the private beach. We were disappointed by longboat key itself, boring and only 1 nice place to eat/shop, which is The Circle.

title: Excellent beach experience
review: Dear ReneK:  Thank you for taking the time to review us.   Thanks for mentioning that the service was great and that you enjoyed the suites.  Also happy you enjoyed the beach.  Next time you come, please get with our resort concierge as they can direct you to some amazing eating establishments on Longboat Key.  It is a remarkable island once with a bit of guidance.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Disappointing second visit
review: I am a native Floridian and have always loved the beach but I had an especially nice stay at this resort. There are lovely lounges right next to the water and the staff is friendly and efficient in setting you up a nice spot on the beach shaded by an umbrella. I had a really pleasant time with Erik, who helped me and my family get an awesome spot right on the beach for the whole day. Staff also comes around and takes drink orders on the beach. It's really a beautiful and peaceful environment:)

title: Beautiful but too few open golf holes
review: Dear JoiaH: Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest!   It is wonderful that you had an excellent beach experience and especially nice stay at the resort.  Thanks for mentioning that the beach staff was friendly and efficient, especially Erik.  Happy to hear the food and beverage service was also enjoyable.  We look forward to seeing you next time. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: My beach experience
review: We were here for a week in May and had an amaing time. Staff was friendly, grounds were beautiful and clean. So we decided to stay here again over this past weekend while we looked at properties for sale in the area. What a different, disappointing experience this time. The first day we were here our room was cleaned at 345 pm, which is so late. The second day, we left at 8 am, and were shocked we when we came back to an unclean room. Called the front desk and were were told they clean until 5 pm. She came to our door at 4:55 pm. Totally ridiculous.  When you pay these kind of prices, service should be better. The cleaning lady was very nice, and did a good job, but she is clearly overworked.  Today, we asked for a late checkout. The lady on the phone was actually nice and…

title: Did not live up to expectations :-(
review: We've stayed in Longboat Key a number of times in the past and always drove past the Resort at Longboat Key looking in awe at the beautiful golf course and the properties lining it. This year we decided to take the plunge and stay. Imagine our horror when we drove up to the entrance to find the golf course turf piled up and renovations on the course. If this had been mentioned on the website, we would have looked elsewhere as the primary reason for staying was the golf. There is another course on the Marina which was nice however it wasn't the course we wanted to play. Sadly, it all went downhill from there. Although the room was clean and well serviced, there wasn't the luxury that I expected from a 4 diamond hotel. In fact there was an odd 1970s wooden unit in the middle of…

title: Looking forward to our next trip!!!!
review: An exceptional resort, with an outstanding staff!  The beach staff , Leo has a great team that goes above and beyond for each and every guest!   Stacy, Trey, Delane and Jameson were just a few of the team that made our stay fantastic !   The pool & dining area , Steve and Erica were two of the best mixoligest with great passion for the guests….and always smiling and very funny! John our waiter was very knowledgeable on the local fair to help as it rained a few days…..saved the days with his suggestions for things to see and places to go !  We are looking forward to returning and bringing a few friends to enjoy this outstanding resort.  Thank you!

title: Excellent!
review: Dear SantiA:  Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest!   Thank you for your personal mention of Leo, Stacy, Trey, Delane, Jameson, Steve, Erica and John.  Glad you had excellent results at the beach and at the pool, bar and dining area.   We look forward to seeing you again in the future when you bring your friends. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Paradise
review: Everything was great! Really nice beach, good golf club, nice and big rooms with a beautiful view, good food and service. The resort has a good location where downtown is not so far. Special thanks to Leo and Stacey for the great attention and treatment giving us an excellent service!

title: Wish we could have stayed longer.
review: Dear JaimeT: Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest!   Thanks for mentioning the wonderful beach, the suites and the golf club. Happy to hear you enjoyed the food and service as well.  Glad you truly enjoyed your time here and thank you for mentioning Leo and Stacy. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: the beach boy Erik!
review: Location was awesome, and the resort was beautiful. The weather sucked but we still had a great time. What stuck out to me the most was the awesome hospitality that Erik the beach worker guy showed us. He was super nice and helped us with our chairs and boards!

title: Outstanding!
review: Dear Annie T:  Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest!   Glad you found our location awesome and the resort beautiful.    The weather has been a bit unusual the last week for this time of year, so glad you still had a great time.  Thanks for mentioning Erik and his hospitality. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Vacation in Paradise
review: Place is outstanding!! The people here treat you like gold!! I was very happy with our entire experience here! Karl did an awesome job setting everything up for us every time we came to the beach! No matter what we needed, he was there. Very helpful and outstanding customer service. He also gave us a lot of input on places to check out around here which is always helpful. I will be here again soon for another trip/business and I plan on staying here again.

title: vacation
review: Dear Andrew E:  Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest!   It is wonderful to hear that your entire experience was wonderful and you felt our team treated you like gold.  Thanks for mentioning Karl and his awesome job.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Karl was great!
review: We were greated by Nick ( who was absolutely wonderful and so accommodating) and helped to our room by Alex (such a gentleman).  The room overlooked the bay and was the most relaxing and quiet stay in Fla we have ever had.  The room was comfortable and clean and updated.  We went to the beach every day and Karl, Delaine and Dan were so helpful with getting setup at the beach each day.  The restaurant servers were outstanding...Paula was our favorite.  The fish tacos were excellent.  The stay overall was five star.  We highly recommend and wanted to give credit to the 5 star employees who work there!!!  We can't wait to go back again.

title: Perfect time
review: What a great time I had at The Resort at Longboat Key Club.  Amazing place to stay, beautiful surroundings and great staff.  We were greeted upon arival for our day at the beach, by Karl.  He took great care getting us set up on the beach with chairs, umbrellas and towels.  He checked on us throughout the day to see if we needed anything.  Before we left for the day Karl even wrote down local places for us to have dinner and fun places to go.  Karl was wonderful and a true asset to the resort.  Would definitely go back to the resort asap.

title: Great stay culminating in us moving to Sarasota!!
review: Dear lisaandbeck: Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest!    It is wonderful to hear that you had a Perfect stay and I am pleased that Karl was so impactful on your stay.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Revival!
review: We stayed at the Longboat after looking adore the options in the city which were all very nice but this place has it all beat. Great staff, Tony Perez the General Manager of the Food and Beverage, I believe that was his title, was so helpful and informative. The front house staff and Pool Beach staff were amazing! We even had an issue with our A/C at 9:30 pm and they were up to the room and fixed it in 25 minutes. Just can not say enough about it!!...Great Great Team!!

title: Members
review: Dear dsmchef:  Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest!     I’m very happy to see that you had a “Great Great Time” and that you were able to truly enjoy your experience with us.  Thanks for your mention of Tony as well as the engineering and beach teams.   Glad you’re moving to our neighborhood! Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Dan was awesome!
review: Returned after 12 months away. The place has been refreshes and seems to be on more solid footing than last time. My room in building 2 was great with a superb view. Internet and a Kuerig!  Didn't venture to any other restaurants other than the one in the main building but the food was good!  Table service is ok. Bar service is great!  Will return. PS. Good room rate but additional $20 resort fee is a turn off especially for a business traveller not using anything.

title: Great place for a honeymoon....
review: Having a wonderful time on our honeymoon at The Resort at Longboat Key Club. The beach is beautiful and the water is crystal clear. Thank you Jameson and the rest of the staff for taking such good care of us!

title: Amazing!!!
review: Dear  bharkema: Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest!   Glad you enjoyed your honeymoon with us.  Keep in mind, it is also a great place to enjoy your anniversaries!  Thanks for mentioning Jameson and we look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Girls' Weekend
review: Stayed here for a week as my friend was getting married. It was amazing. Dan really looked after us on the beach, sorting out out beds on a morning and serving our drinks and food. Nothing was too much trouble and the cocktails I cannot recommend enough. Will definitely stay here again!

title: Service is excellent!
review: Dear NPM2283: Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest!    We have lats of girls getaways at the resort.  Glad you had a blast with your girlfriends with us.  Thanks for mentioning Javier, Kristen and Steve and their wonderful service at the restaurant and bar.  Glad we were able to get you into the room of your preference and you and your friend relaxed at the spa and resort.    Look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Beautiful resort, but a few kinks..
review: I went for a girls' weekend with two other girls.  When we arrived, our room was not ready which we expected.  So we went and had lunch.  Our server, Javier, was wonderful!  He took very good care of us and made sure we were having a good time.  Once the rain cleared up, we sat outside and had a drink at the tiki bar where Steve and Kristen took very good care of us.  We chatted with a few people before our room was ready.  We had requested a beach view but was given a pool view.  They were able to fix the problem immediately without any problems.  The spa was a wonderful experience.  Very relaxing! Everyone was very pleasant that we came in contact with and they really seem to enjoy their jobs. Definitely would go again!

title: Wonderful Family Vacation!
review: We had a spectacular time at the Resort at LBK Club.  Our family had 8 adults and 3 children.  Exceptional, friendly, professional and calming service.  The view from our rooms was breathtaking.  Special thanks to Nick (front desk), Cheryl (beach service all week!) and Sherman (concierge)

title: Frustrating check in, great service
review: Dear Paula T:  Thank you for the “5” review!   I am very pleased that your family enjoyed your suites and the service here at the resort. Thank you for mentioning Nick, Cheryl and Sherman for their part in making the time special.   We hope to see you again soon for your next family vacation.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Excellent beach resort
review: We've vacationed on Longboat Key for a few years now, and every time we'd drive by this hotel, we'd look longingly at it and think to ourselves, "Next time."  Next time finally came and we were very excited.  We arrived at 2:30, hoping to use the facilities, even if our room wasn't ready (check in is at 4).  We don't know what exactly was going on, but our room wasn't ready until after 5.  I found an unbeatable rate online and there may have been a limited number of rooms available at that price, which may have contributed to the delay at check in.  Because the room wasn't ready and were told housekeeping was being expedited to our assigned room, we left to go do some shopping and came back a little before 4 (normal check-in time).   We were told it would be another 30 minutes. …

title: The Best Vacation Ever!!!
review: Dear Jenny KS:  Thank you for being our guest and for your review.  I am sorry the suite you were scheduled to go into was not available by check-in time.  I assure you our goal is to have a room ready early and in pristine condition.  There are occasions where something may prevent that and we are to do whatever it takes to overcome it so that your experience is perfect.  I appreciate that you mentioned after the wait that Rob V was able to upgrade you into a ready suite and that you were able to enjoy the alternate accommodations.  Thank you for also mentioning Victoria as well.   We look forward to seeing you again in the future.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Great Place - especially for families
review: Our family stayed at this property for a few days in July.  Thought the rooms were to a high standard, food was decent and service was friendly and prompt.  Very nice pool area and right next to a super beach with great staff looking after the loungers and drinks.  Children enjoyed the kayaks, etc, especially when a manatee appeared close by!  Handy to St Armands for dinner at evening.  Would definitely return.

title: Absolute Heaven for a girlfriend get-a-way!
review: This resort sits on tranquil Longboat Key (near Downtown Sarasota) and while you are minutes away from the excitement of downtown Sarasota - you feel a million miles away.  The resort has everything from a variety of restaurants, golf, spa - and of course sits on the beach so you do not have to step off property if you do not want to...  But if you do - you can literally be at the shopping and dining mecca of St. Armands Circle within minutes which sits right in between Longboat Key and Lido Key. We felt right at home from the moment we checked in.  The suites are much bigger than a normal hotel room, so there is plenty of room for girlfriends to spread out and not feel on top of one another.  Our primary reason for this visit was a "girls trip" and was to sit on the beach and…

title: Wonderful time had!
review: Dear AXO1010  Thank you for the “5” review!   So happy you were able to enjoy your time with us and on St. Armands nearby for your girlfriend’s getaway.   Glad you found the over-sized suites to your liking and that you also made the most of the beach offerings. Great to hear that Justin and Karl were able to make your beach experience so positive and you were able to relax and enjoy the tranquility. Watching the dolphins play never gets old and it often looks like they are there to just put on a show for our guests.  We look forward to seeing you again very soon.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Beach was great thanks to Erik
review: The rooms were clean, the Sunday brunch delightful, the beach beautiful, and the employees friendly (shout out to Erik and Karl who were outgoing and helpful on the beach- great with an umbrella- my NY skin did not get burned!). This was my first time at a resort and I found it an enjoyable place to stay.

title: Summer vacation
review: Dear WZinkievich:  Thank you for the “5” review!   So happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay as your first time you have ever boon with us.  Thanks for mentioning the clean rooms as well as the friendly employees.  Appreciate your special mention of Erik and Karl as well.  We look forward to seeing you next time.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Wonderful stay at an extraordinary place!
review: I had an awesome experience at the beach/pool today and Erik really helped to make it better! The food was really good and the service was quick! Erik was very polite with accommodating me with a cushion and chair on the beach and made my experience that much better!

title: Beach Club
review: Everybody working the beach club was great. Karl even fixed a problem that they didn't cause. In the course of the day, the staff would keep coming by to change the position of the umbrellas. Privacy was respected and yet service was always given with a smile.

title: Erik was awesome!!
review: Dear Loneric: Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest!  So happy that you enjoyed your time with us and especially the beach.     I appreciate you mentioning Karl and the exceptional service. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Beautiful Resort
review: the hotel was great and Erik was a big help! he helped a lot and was very nice! the hotel is very peaceful and not too busy, it's a great family beach and the workers are very helpful! I recommend this hotel for sure!!! there is a lot of actives to do

title: Could have been a great time and should have been
review: Dear maddibennett27: Thank you for being our guest and the “5” review!      Glad to hear you found the hotel to be great and Erik very helpful.   We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Erik was great
review: We stayed in a suite which had been recently remodeled.  It was beautiful.  I loved the modern decor and the views from the balcony were amazing.  Everything about this resort was top notch!  We will definitely stay here again!!

title: Erik was great!!
review: Erik was really nice and so were the rest of the servers! They helped me get settled in and enjoy the beach. I would love to come back to this beach every year because of them. Erik made this beach an even more joy to be at! What wonderful service!!

title: LBKC
review: Dear triptaker86 Thank you for being our guest and the “5” review!  Glad you had wonderful service from the beach team and food and beverage team.   Thank you for your very nice mention of Erik and how he made it even more of a joy to be at the beach. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great location and perfect service!
review: The LBKC caters to every request. On the beach, CARL & JUSTIN will happily set up your cabana, chairs, & umbrellas, and tell you where to get the best local seafood! These days,  customer service is non existent & all that matters is $$ (see AT&T or Walmart). But not at the Resort at Longboat Key Club. These people understand what service really is. The Concierge will help you set up practically any activity you ask for (within reason).  Ask any employee at the LBKC anything, and they will bend over backwards to accommodate you. Ship my package, wash my clothes, take me to the store, they do it all. Yes, it's expensive, but we paid for a 5 star resort, and that's what we got.

title: Amazing as always! Thanks to Erik!
review: Dear JordanG:  Thank you for being our guest and the “5” review!  Thank you for mentioning that all of our employees will bend over backwards to take care of you while here. Thanks for your specific mention of the high service from the concierge as well as Carl and Justin on the beach.   It is our true desire for you to have a relaxing time while you are with us and be able to get any need met.   We look forward to seeing you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great experience!!!!
review: We travel a ton.  With our 4 kids, with family and as a couple.  The property is amazing with great accomodations-kitchenette, washer/dryer, amazing views, good food, large bathrooms, etc.  What always make the different at any property is the service.  Can't say enough 3 particular staff members. Karl who greeted us, made a friendly connection, found us an impossible umbrella on the 4th of July and then made sure our entire visit was perfect.  Brittney our beach server on the 4th.  She stuck with us all day/eve and always made sure we had the perfect beach cocktail/snack. Marissa who brought up our snack and then made sure she we would have the perfect spot to watch the fireworks! Absolutely no complaints and it was a BUSY time.  We will be visiting again soon with the rest of…

title: Excellent beach vacation
review: My husband and I come to Longboat Key Club every year and this was by far our best experience yet. The staff are friendly and they go above and beyond the call of duty. We were greeted by a complimentary bottle of wine and chocolates in our room. They set up beach chairs for you and will serve you beachside. It's a must visit resort!!

title: Dont plan on doing business at this hotel
review: Dear Alicia W: Thank you for being our guest and the “5” review!   We appreciate you returning year after year.   I’m glad you enjoyed the treats left for you as well as the food and beverage at the resort including the beach experience.   We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Longboat Key Club
review: I am currently staying at this hotel.  I have stayed there about 15 times over the years.  The property is still excellent.   The room is fine (although I wasn't granted access until after 4 on the day of arrival.    The facilities are jam packed with more than the people staying at the hotel.   This is apparent because you cannot get a parking spot during the day, but there are plenty of spaces available at night.  These guys need to get a handle on this problem.   It is horrible.   In addition, for two plus days, the wifi does not work.  I am writing this from Starbucks at St. Armands as I have to get work completed and can't do it without wifi.   The hotel says it is "working on it" but I really doubt that this is a priority.   By the way, the business center at this hotel…

title: Great Vacation
review: Dear sdsa: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay.  I appreciate that you still find the property excellent and that is why you continue to come to us 15+ times. Yes, members also use the beach area just as hotel guests get access to all of the club facilities that are not open to the public.   I understand the wifi challenge made a negative impact on your stay and is the main reason for your review.  It was the first time we have experienced this type of problem with our wifi (since installation 2 years ago).  We did work very hard to resolve it and even brought in a tech from the company that supports our system.  It did get resolved, but took a bit longer than any of us wanted.  As mentioned this is the only time we have experienced a problem and our guests love our current wifi and its robust access to the internet.   We will be sure you have an excellent stay next time. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Wonderful all around...
review: Our service on the beach was helpful and everyone was very nice. Alex Aguayo helped out my family during our whole vacation and he was friendly and always willing to do what we asked. He is great at his job and is good with people!

title: An experience like no other.
review: I have been to this resort ever since I was a little kid. The staff here are always helpful (Eric) and the food is always amazing. Weather on the beach or hanging out by the pool I am always having a good time with my family. I could never get tired of this place, especially with the chance to see dolphins in the gulf. I love coming here. It is definitely a 5-star resort and hotel.

title: Dolphins
review: Dear sarahbc5171: Thank you for being our guest and the “5” review!   I am so pleased that you always have a great time over the many years of being our guest.  Thanks for mentioning Erik and his special attention.  Glad you enjoyed the pool and the beach and were able to see the dolphin take center stage.  It is a wonderful site.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great Place
review: I just went paddle boarding and Erik, who is apart of the beach staff, helped me get started. While on the paddle board 2 dolphins came right up the board and were jumping out of the water! Amazing experience. Thanks Erik!

title: Beautiful Beach - Great Service - Close to Armands Circle
review: Dear Creynolds2:  Thank you for being our guest and the “5” review!   It is truly amazing when you see dolphins out in nature and that is a regular occurrence here on our island.  Happy that you enjoyed your Stand-Up-Paddleboard time and that Erik made the experience extra special.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great vacation @ Longboat Key Club
review: We stayed a week here in one of the beach front poolside towers in a junior suite, nice room.  We really enjoyed our time at this resort. The beach was perfect and the staff was also great. Very relaxing. The spa treatments we had were enjoyable. On the downside they hit you really hard on served drinks and food. $11.00 piña coladas add up over time. BYOB. We where not sold on the main restaurant so we never ate there. We always went off campus for dinner. They have two golf courses but only one is open. Didn't know that. Again the good out weighed the bad as we will most likely return!

title: Great location and spectacular service
review: Location is great, at head of longboat key. We had a smaller room but still spacious and housekeeping was excellent The service throughout the resort was some of the best I had ever experienced! ( and I travel to many 5 star resorts globally An example is that the 'beach girl' Delaine remembered our surname as did many others We had the AMEX plan which gave us complimentary breakfast and late checkout Definitely worth looking into Th room  furnishings, furnitures, and plumbing are getting old and should be renovated soon

title: very good
review: Our stay was pleasant; Stacey was very professional and courteous with providing a comfortable setting for us by the pool. There was a minor problem in our room but it was corrected promptly and completely.

title: Beach cookout
review: Everything at the hotel was awesome, especially the beach. Erik helped us out with chairs and an umbrella and made everything perfect so we could relax and enjoy the cookout on the beach. The food was delicious and I really couldn't complain. Definitely ask for Erik when you hit the beach he will take care of everything you need!

title: Amazing Service
review: Our family spends a lot of time at LBK and always get great service, but we had an exceptional day yesterday. We received excellent service from Karl!!! This young man went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed on the beach.

title: Awesome vacation!
review: My 3 year old and I had a wonderful long weekend at the Longboat Key Club! The staff was wonderful and the accommodations were luxorious. We especially enjoyed eating at Barefoots, the food was out of this world! A if thanks to Justin and Karl for getting us all set up for a great day on the beach! We can't wait to come back already!

title: Great start thx Justin Austin
review: Justin Austin made us feel completely at home.  Looking forward to the rest of our stay   Beach experience at longboat key is excellent  water is beautiful. Manatees were just off coast today.    Sunset not to be missed

title: this resort is first class all the way especially the cabana boys
review: The rooms are amazing we have a Jr. Sweet overlooking the Marian.  I thought I wanted a beach side room but after all day on the beach the wildlife in this cove is amazing from manatees too dolphins. A extra shout for one of the Employees Erik he works on the beach.  Making sure your needs are met while you relax on the beach. They make sure the water infused with fresh fruits is always ice cold.  These guys make sure you always have a fresh towel .  I nicknamed them the cute cabana boys.  We Will  be back as soon as possible

title: Great stay
review: Dear LinaySheltra:  Thank you for the “5” review!   I’m very pleased you enjoyed the Lagoon View Junior Suites and were able to view the manatees and dolphin that like to visit the lagoon and play.   Thanks for your kind mention of Erik and the others on the beach with their service.   We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: All new beach services
review: The Resort at LBK is amazing. I have traveled there twice for a conference and am excited that the conference will continue to meet there in the future. The staff was very kind, helpful and attentive. Specifically, I appreciate the help of Stacy (pool) and Eric (beach). They were especially helpful to my family (wife and 4 kids) while I was in meetings. Looking forward to return visits.

title: Amazing!
review: Dear walterc549:  Thank you for the “5” review!  We are also pleased that your group will continue to return to us for your future conference.  Thanks for mentioning the helpful and attentive staff.  I appreciate that Stacy and Erik were especially helpful for your family.    We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Really the ONLY place to stay in Longboat unless you rent a condo.
review: We were comfortable - fortunately we booked an oceanfront room and we were in a building not overlooking the pool.  The beach is beautiful -great walking beach.  The weather was off the four days we were there but still managed to enjoy beach time.  Great two person covered lounge/cabanas.  Pool was small, dated and not very welcoming - really a place to let the kids jump around.   We did not eat at any of the restaurants as the menus just did not appeal to us.  The Italian place is off premises and although "upscale" did not seem worth the ride when there were other great options on the key and in Sarasota to explore. Let's get back to the room.  It was very comfortable - having the refrigerator is great so you can pick up some fruit and yoghurt for a simple breakfast in the…

title: Fathers Day Weekend
review: Dear creeker5050:  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.   Glad you enjoyed your beach view and suite here with us.   I am sorry you found the pool and buildings a bit dated.  We are currently painting all the buildings and installing new signage, lobby furnishings, etc.   All of our restaurants including Portofino are on our property and we provide transportation complimentary to each of them. Our property stretches over several miles, so the shuttle is required for Portofino.  Also, our restaurants are all private, so tourists not staying with us may not frequent them. Hopefully next time you will experience them.   Glad you enjoyed the golf and the beach walks and we hope to see you again soon.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: It was fantastic
review: This place is incredible. It's like a slice of paradise! You feel like your on an island. It is very close to shopping and great restaurants, but at the resort it's incredibly peaceful. Alex Aguayo just set us up with cabana. There are stand-up boards and Kayaks to rent so you can cruise up and down the coast and explore the key.

title: Family Trip
review: Dear Mgklgg: Thank you for the “5” review!  Very happy you enjoyed Father’s Day weekend with us and that you found our Island to be paradise.   I agree it is incredible and seeing as though you live nearby, hopefully we will see you again through the summer. Thanks for your kind mention of Alex as well as the convenience of the stand-up paddle-boards and kayaks.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Best beach holiday ever!
review: Everything about my stay here was amazing. Everything to how comfortable the rooms were to how clean the pool was. The beach was the best. Erik helped me set up my chair and umbrella and made sure I had everything I needed. It was definitely 5 star service I haven't received anywhere else!

title: Best beach attendant goes to ERIK!!
review: We love Longboat Key Club and look forward to visiting every summer.  We wanted to give Erik, our beach attendant, a HUGE shoutout! He was kind, helpful, attentive and went above and beyond to make our daily beach time perfect. Thank you Erik for excellent service with a smile!!!  It means the world!

title: Beautiful!
review: Dear Tahoelove:  Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest each summer.   I appreciate you mentioning Erik and how he went above and beyond to make your beach time perfect.  We look forward to seeing you again next summer. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: You'll Want a Room with a View...
review: We are regulars at Longboat Resort...we keep going back because we love it so much--there is nothing in the area that compares if you're vacationing with kids.  The beach is stunning, the views from the rooms are perfect...although the rooms themselves could use a bit of updating, which they've already started doing. There are bikes, paddle boards, beach cabanas and comfy chairs, kayaks...and the sunsets are amazing. The staff is very helpful and friendly. We want to single out one person in particular--Sheryl--who works the beach. She has been there since we started going about 5 years ago and she is fantastic!!! Always friendly, smiling, fast with the drinks, even when it's 100 degrees out she works her butt off--we love her--she always helps us feel like we're coming home…

title: Vacation
review: Dear Drebaby1: Thank you for the “5” review!    I appreciate your mention that there is nothing in the area that can compare to the Resort as a family destination.   Glad you found the beach stunning and the views from the suite perfect.  As mentioned, we are doing some updating of the resort and recently completed new carpet in the suites, new signage and painting of the buildings.    Thank you for your kind mention of Cheryl and Stacey.  I agree, they are very friendly and do a wonderful job.   We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Enjoyable Stay
review: The good news...the location and views (the water is crystal-clear-blue) are beautiful; the junior, one and two-bedroom suites are exceptionally spacious with full kitchens; there are a ton of places to eat and drink (many taking full advantage of the outdoors and stellar scenery); and the nearby town is absolutely adorable.  The not-quite-so-good news...the rooms (all in very 70s buildings seemingly designed back when cement was big) are a little dated, particularly kitchens in the larger units. We stayed in a two-bedroom with stellar views overlooking the pool and  beach, which made our visit quite delightful. I'm not sure I would have been quite as enamored in this location in a standard room, or in one without a water view. And the beach and pool can feel quite crowded.  …

title: Rest and relaxation
review: Great place to stay. Your every need is catered to, beach set up, food, drinks, etc. Erik was the young man that took excellent care of us on the beach.  Moved our umbrella, brought us towels and constantly checked us to make sure we were ok and to see if we needed anything.  Ask for Erik when you hit the beach!

title: Great Yearly Vacation!
review: Dear MoeH:  Thank you for the “5” review!  Wonderful to hear that your every need was catered to while you were our guest.  Thanks for mentioning Erik and his excellent service.  We look forward to seeing you on your next stay. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beach
review: My family and I visit Longboat Key Club resort every summer and we always have a great time! The resort is clean,great beach vibe inside and out, wonderful view and great food! This year we decided to paddle board on the beach with assistance from one of the hotel employees Eric; who was kind courteous and helpful, even going above and beyond to make sure we enjoyed our paddle board experience. We have tried other resorts at nearby beaches but honestly Longboat wins every time! I highly recommend this resort! Good for family or couples.

title: Beach stay with friends
review: Dear JenniF:  Thank you for the “5” review!   We greatly appreciate you returning to us each summer.  I appreciate your mention of the resort being clean and that there is a great vibe.  It is wonderful to hear your paddle-board experience was exceptional and that Erik went above and beyond for you.   Look forward to seeing you on your next yearly trip.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Long boat key
review: Erik was a great help getting everything set up at the beach. He brought beach chairs, umbrellas, returned throughout our time at the beach to ask if we needed anything. Over all a great experience and I hope to be back sometime soon.

title: Great staff
review: Had so much fun with my friends! Food is good and staff is so friendly, especially Erik who helped us find the perfect spot on the beach and was incredibly attentive and efficient. Thanks for adding to our great time on longboat key. I will surely be returning!

title: Members of Longboat Key - day at the beach
review: Dear AnnieM:  Thank you for the “5” review!    It is wonderful that you had such a fun time with your friends at our resort.  It is wonderful that Erik was able to add to your pleasure as well.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beach experience
review: Had a great experience while having a day at the beach.  Alex Aguayo was very accommodating in setting up for our family of 5 and made sure we were well taken care of.  Alex was very pleasant and helpful during our outing.

title: Another wonderful visit with a few hiccups.
review: Dear CathyC:  Thank you very much for the “5” review!!    Very glad you enjoyed your time here with us and that Alex was a part of making it special for you.   We will see you again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great service on the beach
review: We frequent the beach at Longboat Key Club on a regular basis -- as we are members who live locally. We love this beach, not only for its beauty but because everything we need is provided and the service is excellent. We always receive an enthusiastic welcome from staff members new and old. However, for the best and most attentive service on the beach, Ozzy is the "go to" guy for your lounge chairs -- always with a warm smile and aim to please. The food and beverage choices on the beach are excellent -- lots of tasty options -- our favorite is the crab cakes. Make every effort to be placed in Cheryl's section -- this woman knows the menu inside and out, and will customize any item to your taste. And did I mention the impeccable service and warm personality?!!!

title: First trip to the Gulf
review: We chose this hotel as the place to spend our first trip to the Gulf of Mexico.  Everything was excellent, including the room, service, reception desk helpfulness etc. etc. etc.  The food and bar in the restaurant was superb and not expensive given the quality of the establishment, and we didn't even get to the Harborside location.  Next time.  After we left and more than half way home, my partner realized that she had left a necklace and other items in one of the drawers.  She called, was forwarded to security and the person she talked to went directly to our room, found the items and immediately called to say he had found them and that he would send them back to us.

title: anniversary vacation
review: Dear FallbrookCaRetired:  Thank you for the “5” review.   It is wonderful to hear that you had an excellent time with us on your first trip to the West coast of Florida.  Thanks for mentioning the wonderful service you received as well as the superb food.  I have shared your nice comment on the return of the lost items with our security department. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you again. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: The moorings at Longboat Key
review: My wife and I were at LBKC from May 24th to May 30.  Had done much research on tripadvisor, as i always do before selecting a location and resort.    The photos and descriptions are exactly as depicted.  VERY IMPRESSIVE!  We reserved a junior suite with a Gulf view.  Very nice with king bed, living quarters, full kitchen, and bath with shower and tub.  Room was very clean and, I feel, up to date with a Carribean design furniture look.  We were in building three which overlooked the Gulf and the pool, but away that you didn't hear pool noise.  We arrived on Memorial day Sunday and it was GANGBUSTERS  from a crowd standpoint.  We expected this and also anticipated that Monday would be more of the same.  (When I booked, I didn't realize that Memorial day arrived early until after I…

title: Great hotel, amazing location.
review: Dear traveloersHaddonfl:  Thank you for taking the time to review us.  I’m glad you enjoyed your time with us.  I’m glad you found the resort to be very impressive and thank you for mentioning the staff as being very accommodating.    I’m not sure who would have said that there was not much we could do as they were members as that is not the case.  All of our guests and members have the same standards of conduct and we certainly would intervene if another’s enjoyment is being compromised.
