review: Dear Linda Z  Thank you for being our guest and for the “5” review!   Glad to hear check-in was smooth and you were able to relax at the pool and beach.  I appreciate that you mentioned the staff being friendly and helpful.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Amazing - didn't want to leave
review: I just came from your resort with my 3 kids the 4 of  us really enjoy the premises . Although it is not too much for kids . Food I really did not tried since I was alone with my 3 kids and the environment was not for them.  The beach wonderful but they don't have too much activities for kids. Suites is outstanding specially if it is for couples. But I was

title: October 2014
review: We spent a week here. We had a junior suite which was very roomy and well-appointed.  The restaurants and entertainment in the lounge were good.  the staff was pleasant and helpful.  We would go back.  It would be nice if the resort was pet friendly but very few places in Florida are.  Texas and Arizona are much more pet friendly.

title: Out of this world!
review: Dear Hooksett:  Thank you for your recent stay and review. I’m glad your suite was roomy and well-appointed. Thanks for mentioning our pleasant staff as well as the positive experience you had at our restaurants.   I apologize that we are not pet friendly.  We do refer to a “pet hotel” in the area that can host your pet while you stay with us.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Fantastic Anniversary Vacation
review: My husband & I had been long time visitors of The Lido Beach Resort, which is very close to the Resort at Longboat Key. We decided to upgrade & stay at Longboat, which was the best decision we had made. Just knowing the beach is private made our stay thoroughly enjoyable. The moment we were greeted by Dante upon checkin, we knew we would be pampered. The staff members from the restaurants to the pool to the beach are welcoming & always willing to help. The rooms are spacious, clean, & very well-maintained. Having a Publix supermarket close by & a full kitchen available was great. And a washer and dryer in our suite? No change needed & Tide detergent was a welcome surprise! We will definitely be back.

title: Another Great Vacation
review: Dear Adrienne J Thank you for staying with us and for the “5” review!  I’m glad you feel that staying with us was the best vacation decision you ever made. Thanks for mentioning the way you were treated by Dante as well as the team members in the restaurants and pool and beach.    Happy to hear you found your suite to be spacious, clean and very well maintained.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Amazing Resort - Room 2507 Stay
review: Stayed in Bldg 3 in a 2 bedroom suite that had everything we needed. The staff was great in all of the locations I visited including the Golf Course, Spa, Front Desk,Concierge, Housekeeping, Restaurants, Poolside, Beachfront, you name it and they were all friendly and efficient and spoke to me first to say Hi or to see what I needed. The beach is private and really nice this time of year. Beach food &beverage service is available which came in handy. I also would like to recommend Captain Richard Nutter who took us on the BEST fishing charter I have ever experienced. We caught at least 10 different species of fish, including Tuna, Grouper, Triggerfish, Triple Tail, Spanish Mackeral. Sherman at the resort's concierge can hook you up with Captain Rich and he will pick you up at…

title: Wonderful time at the Resort at Longboat Key Club
review: My husband and I stayed at the Longboat Key Club for 4 days to celebrate or 25th Wedding Anniversary.  The service was wonderful from the handsome young man that greeted us and brought our luggage to the room, to the front desk personnel who upgraded our room and were so welcoming to the pool and beach staff who were just so pleasant and helpful.  There were so many things we just loved about the resort.  Our room was Gulf front and as a surprise my husband arranged for us to have dinner served on our balcony for our Anniversary instead of going to a restaurant.  It was so romantic, the service staff were great.  They came a little early and set up the table with table cloths and candles and flowers.  They went over and above for us, taking pictures and a video for us.  They…

title: We love it here!
review: Dear Nancy C Thank you for the “5” review and for being our guest.  I’m pleased you and your husband enjoyed your 25th wedding anniversary with us.  Great to hear that the bellman, front desk, concierge  and pool and beach team were welcoming and pleasant.  Glad your special dinner on the balcony was such a success and that the team was successful in preparing and delivering the “most romantic and relaxing Anniversary dinner ever” !! We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Good for both a visit and a staycation!
review: Great get away for staycation. Jr suite premium beach view perfect for couples. Fully equipped kitchen with full fridge, stove, microwave, toaster, dinnerware, awesome wine glasses, etc. Bathroom dressing area nice, toilet room and shower tight. But, spent most of time on balcony, listening to waves and feeling the wonderful breeze.  Room was so conftable, just no need to get dressed and go out!  Love that!  Full room service too, and mini bar with wine and liquor and not the mini bottles.  Both hubby and I love it here and will be back.  Staff has been great, spa good, really just a wonderful place!

title: Resort at Longboat Key
review: Thank you for your review. Glad you found us to be your stay-cation location!   Thanks for mentioning the wonderful features of the suite, kitchen and balcony.  Glad you loved your time at the resort and the spa and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Perfect vacation, views were amazing
review: The rooms were clean and easy to access with nearby parking. Kitchen within the room allowed one to have some meals in rather than always eating out.  Rooms were well equipped...not too dated, and were comfortable for anywhere from a weekend to a week.  Check in was a little long with certain steps being manual rather than as modern as a hotel chain.  Onsite food was "okay" albeit a little commercial.  Pool was clean with sufficient seating in close proximity. Can be a little crowded on the weekend with club "members" rather than hotel guests. Unfortunately lots of parents not supervising small children.  Beach facilities and staff were excellent. Most certainly the resort's draw.  The gold course seemed to be in reasonable shape although was undergoing some maintenance during…

title: Great beach and pool, but a lot of false advertising
review: The Resort at Longboat Key Club is ideally located on a beautiful, soft white sand beach. For those who like their pools, they have a great hot tub and a large pool. Next to the pool, they have a small bar with nice Pina Coladas and TVs. There are several restaurants associated with the club.  The negative occurs when they "give" you a $75 credit each day for food. However, to get some pancakes and oatmeal for breakfast costs $50. The prices on their menu are very expensive, so $75/day does not go nearly as far as you would think. Additionally, on their website they prominently display the sailboats you can rent. This was one of my main reasons for selecting this property for our Florida stay. But of course, as soon as we arrive, they say all the boats are broken.  If you just…

title: Paradise
review: Thank you for your review and for being our guest.  I’m very sorry the Hobie cat was not in service during your stay. All of the Stand Up Paddleboards and kayaks were available.   Safety is very important to us and the sailboat had an issue with a part connected to the main sail so we decided not to rent it.  It has since been fixed and is back in service.   The $75.00 credit offer that you are refering to is not limited to food.  The OPAL family package offers you a $75.00 credit to be used anywhere on the resort as well as free breakfast for your children.  I do not feel our pricing is out of line with normal resort pricing , but Our concierge are happy to send menus in advance if it helps you with meal planning.  We also have different packages depending on what you would like included.   Thank you agaion and we hope to see you in the future. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Lagoon Room was perfect
review: My fiance and I came to this resort for my birthday in hopes of having a peaceful,relaxing weekend without traveling to far from home. This resort exceeded our expectations. The room was incredible with breathtaking views. It was very spacious and clean. Waking up to the sounds of ocean every morning was definitely a plus as well. The service, from the spa down to beachside was nothing short of perfection.  Everyone was happy to assist you in anyway . The beachside beds really topped it of for us. To lay comfortably out by the water all day was priceless.  The bad weather just seemed to blow around us all wkend. This is definitely going to be a place we visit more often. #hiddenjem

title: Favorite place to go
review: Dear Manda L Thank you very much for the “5” rating and for being our guest.  I’m very pleased to hear that the resort exceeded your expectations in being peaceful, relaxing, clean and spacious.  Thanks for mentioning that the staff was happy to assist in any way possible and the positive experience at the Spa and the Beach. Glad you enjoyed our Longboat Key Club Bed.  Look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Wonderful Staycation!
review: We spent a weekend here as a gift for our wedding. We stayed in a lagoon room in the building directly across from the lobby. It was the perfect size room with a kitchen! We had a little living space, a comfy bed, two doors to the balcony and a nice bathroom.   We enjoyed the beach service the most! They brought you chairs, umbrellas, drinks and lunch! All you had to do was decide when you wanted to get back in the water :)   We ordered room service for breakfast and it was lovely. The man who delivered it was absolutely pleasant.   We were only there a short time but we enjoyed it. There were a lot of kids too. We dont have any children but it seemed like it was a fun place for families.

title: Way better than last year
review: We've been coming here for the last 4 years. Last year was, disappointing to say the least. Initially we weren't going to come back, but decided to give it one more try this year. We are glad we did. Not sure what happened last year, but Opal bought the resort a few months after our visit, and changed it for the better. The changes weren't dramatic, as the resort looks the same (thankfully). But the small changes, like added decor and furniture, helped. The more pleasant changes we observed, were the personnel changes. Some personnel were familiar, some different, but ALL were more than friendly and attentive.  Check in was painless; the room was clean with minor decor changes that were nice and the grounds were well kept. Last year the beach was awful but this year it was…

title: Awesome stay
review: Dear ess96: Thank you for the “5” rating and for choosing to stay with us again this year.  Glad your checkin went smoothly and you enjoyed the suite.  It is good to hear that you found the beach to be awesome and you enjoyed the beach attendants as well.  Thanks for mentioning the high caliber of the food your enjoyed while here.  We do add the 20% on all F&B orders as we are a club environment and not open to the public except through the hotel.    Our Links on Longboat golf course (formally Islandside) was just fully remodeled so I am pleased you were able to experience it this year.  We look forward to your next visit with us.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Beautiful Beach Hotel
review: We had a great stay here. The rooms are clean and modern. The beach is beautiful and the staff is nice. The pool is good and the tennis facility is phenomenal. I would definitely stay here when visiting Sarasota.

title: Fun in the Sun
review: Dear FamtimeFL: Thank you for the “5” rating and for being our guest.  Glad you enjoyed the clean rooms, tennis facility and the beach and beach staff.  Looks forward to your next visit.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Fantastic views and wildlife
review: I took my wife to this hotel for a summer vacation week. As soon as we got to the hotel we felt relaxed. We had a great lunch poolside and then decided to go to the beach. The view was spectacular. Soft white sand and not a huge beach crowd as it is on private property. We had a oceanview suite which was decorated very nicely. I really reccomend this hotel. It is very costly from November thru May but is affordable during summer months...

title: The Edwards LOVE LBKC so much we wanted to add our photos!!
review: We already posted a review of how much we LOVE the LONGBOAT KEY CLUB but I wanted to share pics also. This is a beautiful resort that makes you feel like your in paradise. Also like I posted for people with disabilities it's fabulous. I also forgot to mention John who works the beach and pool is a fabulous waiter in the restaurant at night. James the young server is also a doll. It speaks volume to me to have staff that is on their game like they are. I hope you enjoy the pictures. We can't wait until we get back!! This hotel has had our hearts for 18 years..

title: Great for families
review: Dear ally e: Thank you for the “5” rating and for sharing the wonderful pictures of your stay. Thanks for mentioning John and James and them being “on their game”.  Thanks for mentioning it is fabulous for people with disabilities. Among other things we offer a lift at the pool and wheelchair for the beach area.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: What a great escape.....
review: Just spent 10 days at the resort.  The staff were fantastic, especially Gloria the concierge. Location is truly beautiful and it is a really peaceful retreat after the Orlando theme parks.  Rooms were a little dated in places but very clean and service was great which more than made up for it.  Would definitely recommend.

title: Nice, Relaxing Weekend
review: Dear Charlotte S Thank you for the “5” review!  It pleases me to see that Gloria made such a positive impact on your stay along with our other team members. Great that the 10 days were enjoyed and you found the place clean and service excellent.  I apologize that you found the suites a bit dated and we are doing many improvements in that area.  I appreciate that you will recommend us to others and we hope to see you again soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Couples Weekend getaway
review: Need a one day or multiple day getaway?  This is the place. Quiet. Relaxing. Private.  The staff at check in made us feel incredibly welcomed. Lisa was the front desk staff and she greeted us by name before we even said who we were. (Probably announced by security at the entrance gate but still impressive never the less).  Our room was a gulf view with a large balcony - incredibly romantic and private.  This will be our go-to escape location.

title: Excellent resort on Florida's Gulf Coast
review: We have been holidaying on Florida's Gulf Coast for the last 20+ years.  Our favourite spot is Naples - Edgewater Beach Hotel, but this year we decided to return to the Longboat Key Resort (our last stay at this resort was a week in 2007).   This time we had a 10 day stay and It held up to expectations, the location is fantastic - we had a 2 bedroomed deluxe suite in building 4.  This was for a party of 4, my husband and I; our 21 year old daughter and 18 year old son (parents be warned, if you take your kids on holidays to these resorts when they are young, then be prepared for them to be still coming with you at this age)!  We were impressed with the overall cleanliness of this oversized suite that offered every amenity - plus it contained a washing machine and tumble dryer…

title: Great Beach
review: Dear JeanH186411: Thank you for your recent visit and the “5” rating that you gave us!   So glad you came back to stay with us again.  Glad you enjoyed the overall cleanliness of the suite and that you enjoyed the layout and amenities.  Thanks for your positive mention of our team members of the front desk and beach area.  They appreciate you taking the time to recognize them.  I have also shared your plate recommendation to the F&B team. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations

title: Relaxing Family Holiday
review: Room was excellent but the best feature of this resort is the beach. Staff on the beach are very helpful and the location is spot-on. Quality of the rooms is very good, although the cleaning staff could be better - slightly miserable and kitchen floor not cleaned. Overall though, the resort is very good - beware of the resort fee though - this is automatically added to your bill,

title: Very pleasant stay in a dream location
review: Dear Anthony F:  Thank you for you “5” review of the resort.  We appreciate you staying and your positive mention of the beach staff and location.  I will review your housekeeping comments with the team as well.  Yes, the Resort fee is quoted at the time of making the reservation and posted at the same time as the room rate.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: No customer service at Longboat Key Club
review: Returned last week from a 9 night stay at the longboat Key Club. We stayed in a ground floor suite, which was a good size, with pool view and access off the deck to the pool / beach, this was priceless (and highly recommended) given that our six year old daughter practically lived in the pool during our stay! The room was fantastic and was equipped with all we required from cocktail making set to dishwasher. The maid visited daily to restock with towels and toiletries and check if we needed anything further. All the staff, restaurant, reception, pool and beach were friendly and attentive and helped make our stay relaxing and enjoyable. I would have no hesitation in recommending LBKC and we are looking forward to planning our next visit! A special thank you goes to Sue in the…

title: Girl Trip!!
review: I just got home from spending 5 night here on an Adult Girl Trip.  Overall, we really enjoyed it and would return.  I want to hit on a couple of recommendation for improvement:  1. The elevator in Building 4 is SLOW. It took forever. 2.  The fridge door in our room didn't stay shut so nothing stayed cold. 3.  Carol at the Pool Bar was a walking nightmare.  Rude and inconsiderate. 4. Beware EVERYTHING at this resort (and I mean everything) has to be charged to your room.   5. If you order food from the beach.  Order before you get hungry.  We timed it and it took 45 minutes-an hour after we placed our order to get our food.  Things we loved: 1. Except for Carol at the Pool Bar all the other staff was amazing.  Helpful and nice. 2. The beach/pool towels are top quality and big. 3.…

title: Great facilities, poor management
review: Dear Christina W Thank you for your recent stay and review.  Glad you enjoyed your adult girl’s trip to the resort and we look forward to seeing you again in the future.   Sorry you found the elevator slow and the fridge was not closing properly.  I have attempted to reach you directly as well through this site to find out which suite so the fridge can be resolved. Otherwise, we will check the entire building to resolve. Also, apologize that the food service at the beach was slower than it should have been and your employee concern has been noted as well. Yes, we do require everything to be charged to the suite as a way to ensure that only guests or members are using our facility.   Glad you found our associates to be amazing and you enjoyed your experience.  Glad you also found the beach to me clean and beautiful and that the team working this area was very nice and helpful for you.  It is great that you and your friends were able to enjoy a nice sunset from your very clean suite.  Please come back and see us again soon. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: A new favorite on Longboat Key...
review: Do not stay here.  They do not listen to customers requests  We were visiting for a wedding.  When I made the reservation, I stressed that we would arrive around noon, and we needed early check in (I even offered to pay for an extra night if necessary).  While they did say they would not guarantee it, they thought it reasonable to get into our room by 1:30-2pm ish, if we got in the queue early to wait for a room.  And it would be no later than 4pm, when official check in started.  With the wedding cocktails at 6pm, this should be sufficient.  We arrived at noon, got in the queue, and waited.  And waited.  And waited.  Not until after 5pm did we finally get into our room.  Poor management of cleaning staff, poor room management, poor communication with customers, poor managing…

title: Excellent beach
review: Dear Mdnova: Thank you for your recent stay with us.  I am very sorry that you had a delayed check-in experience on your arrival. Based on your comments, we could have handled this matter differently and have shared your thoughts with the appropriate managers to better resolve in the future.  I can assure you the resort staff does their best to ensure the arriving guests are checked in a seamless matter with minimal waiting time. However there are times due to high occupancy levels this provide a challenge.   My understanding is that management did follow up with you on the night of arrival as well as after your stay with us to work to resolve your concern.  I hope that this has to some degree will encourage you to stay with us again in the future. Thank you again.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Excellent Condo-
review: My husband and I stayed here for a long child-free weekend.  We had a wonderful time. I had booked our stay through booking.com but when we were shown to our room it was clearly very different to the room shown on the website.  We returned to the front desk where we were informed that the room shown, and the one we had expected, was in actual fact a junior suite.  The guy at the front desk was able to find us a junior suite but it was at a slightly increased price, which we decided to pay.  The room was great, with plenty of space including a kitchenette and laundry facilities.  The pool was fine, probably a little small for the size of the resort, but we spent most of our time at the beach, which was wonderful from the cabanas to the bar service at the water's edge!    We…

title: Do not stay here.
review: I get one family vacation a year and booked it at this location. What a mistake! None of the staff takes ownership or pride in this resort, which explains why the rooms are in such terrible condition. The staff either notices the problems with the room and does not report it or management does not care or can afford to fix it. The first room we had to leave because the prior tenant must have spilled perfume or something. The second room, the bed frame was broken so our we slept with our feet being higher than our heads. The bathroom door got stuck when you could close it all the way. Cabinet doors were pretty shaby as well. I parked my car in the guest parking area apparently which was near a broken sprinkler head. Now I have to pay a couple of hundred dollars to have a…

title: Beautiful beach, but no late check-out
review: Dear Mark M: I am very disappointed to hear of your experience and apologize. Your experience is certainly not our typical or acceptable.  I will be reaching out to you through trip-advisor to follow-up with you and determine your suite # and do a thorough review of the items you mention here.  None of these issues are acceptable and all should be caught in our thorough inspection program  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great Stay at the Marina
review: I wanted to give the LBKC a 4-star, but our experience on the last day left a bad taste in our mouths. Check-out is at 11, and we asked for a late check-out for 12:30 pm as our flight back home was not until 5 pm. They said they couldn't accomodate this request even thought we spent several thousand dollars there during our 4-night stay. We paid for an expensive deluxe ocean-front 2 bedroom suite and spent lots of money there on food and drinks. We felt like we had earned that late check-out.   Now that that's out of the way here's my review of everything else:   Hotel design and grounds: just ok. It's not a stunning building and landscape like at the Ritz-Carlton. Basically cinder block buildings.   Hotel rooms: fabulous! Our 2 bedroom suite was gorgeous, spacious and very…

title: Solid, but not as nice as our last stay here
review: Dear D M Thank you for being our guest.  I apologize we were unable to accommodate a late checkout on your day of departure. Unfortunately there are many days in the summer, weekend and weekday, where our occupancy is at capacity and we have to also be responsible to our incoming guests. That being said, the resort is available to you after checkout for the entire day.  We also offer luggage and food storage as well as showers and changing areas at Islandside.  We very much appreciate your business, I’m glad your enjoyed your deluxe 2 Bedroom suite and that you found it spacious, gorgeous and very clean.  Thanks for also mentioning the turndown experience.  Our beach is certainly an inviting area of the property and I appreciate that you found it beautiful with our beach attendants very friendly and accommodating. The paddleboard rentals are enjoyed by many and it is wonderful when the dolphins stop by for a visit.   Glad you also found the servers and bartenders to be friendly and I apologize if we were bit to slow. We truly appreciate your staying with us and I hope we will see you again for a future visit with us. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: The Edwards family heaven on earth!! Love LBKC!!!
review: We stayed on our boat at Lonboat Key Club Marina from 718/14-7/20/14. We were impressed with every aspect of the stay. First, the dock hands are always around to assist in docking, refueling, and unloading. From our first step onto the property it was a great expirence. We were docked in row H which is a must stay slip location. We were right next to the pool and locker rooms which were clean and maintained.  The resort offers shuttle service free of charge to local restaurants and into shopping districts which we took advantage of multiple times. The golf course looked challenging and picturesque which I will have to take advantage of on our next visit. This is a must visit for boaters.

title: Nice but needs some upgrades
review: We stayed at the Resort at Longboat Key for 4th of July weekend.  We had made reservations early in the year as we have stayed several times in another resort of the Opal family, the Sandpearl.  Now, it is not like the Sandpearl but it is still nice.  The grounds are nice and well kept.  They are building a new 18 hole golf course.  We stayed in Building 1 in a 1 bedroom suite.  It was spacious and had all of the necessities with a full kitchen.  The view was spectacular!  The room does need upgrading in the cabinets, the bathtub and the air conditioner.  The air was sooo loud you could barely sleep.  After the 1st 2 nights I got used to the loud noise.  The staff is very attentive, from the front desk personnel, guys that set up at the beach, to the servers working hard in the…

title: Great getaway
review: Dear cars1: Thank you for your very nice review and for being our guest. I appeciate you mentioning the well kept grounds and the golf course reconstruction that is weeks away from completion. Glad you enjoyed your suite in building 1.  I apologize that you found the a/c noisey. We just recently had all of our a/c systems certified and are in the process of replacing any and all that are needed so rest assured that when you return you will not fine this an issue.  Thanks for your mention of the attentive staff including the front desk team, the beach attendants, to the beach servers. Glad you enjoyed your takeout from Sands Pointe.  Thank you again and we look forward to your return. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: key to stay
review: my husband and I just stayed for a weekend at one of the golf suites.  Ive stayed at the ocean view rooms before and I have to say the golf suite rooms were better, more modern and larger.  we live in florida but love making longboat a weekend stay.  If you walk a little past the longboat key club beach area its like your own private beach.  Bring a float and hang out in the water, make friends with the sand crabs and get a really private beach experience.

title: A SW Florida gem fades..........
review: Dear Gizmo1414 Thank you for your wonderful review.  We apreciate your continued support of the resort and can’t wait to see you again.  I’m glad you enjoyed the golf view suites and your time with our friendly crabs. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: A slice of Florida paradice.
review: Very good customer service. Mattress was literally a dream to sleep on. Customer service very good. Matt was great at the front desk - adored his accent. It would have been nice to be near the pool as we were in a distant building. Free drink was nice with a coupon at check-in.

title: Outstanding
review: The hotel, the service and the food was outstanding. The staff took great care of me and my family during my birthday weekend. Everything was total quality.  If your looking for a great place to get away to this is it. We had a suite with a great view.

title: Birthday getaway
review: Dear Mw5113: Thank you for the “5” review!  I appreciate you mentioning that you found the hotel, the service and the food outstanding.  Glad you had such a wonderful experience for your birthday weekend with us.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Always like 'coming home'
review: This hotel went above and beyond to make sure my boyfriend had the best birthday. The food manager worked with me for a week via email to set up room service for dinner the first night and breakfast the next morning. From the moment we arrived the staff was amazing. I had ordered a portable crib to be in our room for our daughter. When we got to the room it wasn't there. I called the front desk and they were extremely apologetic and then delivered one to our room 5 minutes later. The staff then waited until I sent my boyfriend for a massage and then they came to our room and set it up for his surprise dinner. They set the tables inside and out with candles and flowers.  They delivered the appetizers and salads 5 minutes before he returned from his massage and then returned 30…

title: great location
review: Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Fantastic experience
review: We've stayed at LBK each summer for over 15 years and when we arrive from the UK the friendly welcome always makes it feel like we're home.  The accommodations are spacious, clean and comfortable with everything you need.  The bar and food in the restaurants is pricey, however, the live entertainment from George and Sally make the bar visits well worthwhile and more so if Dawn is tending bar!  Sherman, Greg and the front desk team all add great value to the stay, with all sorts of helpful tips.  For us the LBK team have become friends and we love returning to enjoy time there.  One tip for 2014 travellers is that the main island side golf course is closed until October for remodelling and the alternative harbour side courses are not in good condition. Had we known this before…

title: Great Place to Stay
review: Loved the Junior Suite at this resort.  It was great to have a washer/dryer in the room as well as full kitchen.  Bathroom was huge and beds were comfortable.  The room was well kept and clean.  The beach had paddleboards, kayaks, cabanas etc.

title: Gorgeous views, ok service. Overall nice stay.
review: Dear CindyV: Thank you for the “5” rating!!  Glad that you loved the Junior suite and that you found the huge bed comfortable.  I agree that having the kitchen and washer/dryer make for a very pleasant experience. All of our suites (except guest rooms) offer these features.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: 10 year anniversary trip
review: Never been to Sarasota before this visit and stayed at this property for a babymoon. Was a beautiful property and room with a gorgeous view. One downside was that we expected more amenities at the hotel but maybe we just didn't see them. The lobby is small and leads to the pool/beach. Didn't see much else there other than a gift shop and a restaurant. Overall beautiful property and nice stay. The gentleman that checked us in was very nice and accommodating. The others seemed a bit snooty and weren't very friendly which we found odd given the pricy rates at this hotel. We had a great time regardless so again that didn't matter in our case. From a vacation point of views, more relaxed and upscale feel in Sarasota than ST Pete/Clearwater.

title: Excellent
review: Dear Susankaren: Thank you for writing a review on the Resort.  Glad you found the property beautiful and your suite view was gorgeous.    From your description, it does not sound like you explored our property beyond the resort center.  We have a tremendous amount more to offer including golf courses, tennis center, 4 more restaurants, Fitness, spa and fitness class room.  Hope you will come back to explore the rest of the property. I am glad your check-in went well and you found the receptionist very nice and accommodating. I’m sorry you did not feel that way about some others you encountered. I would be happy to speak to you further about the concern to gather more information.  Our genuine goal is to provide excellent friendly service throughout.  I am please you had a great time and we hope to see you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: 5th Visit & Still Love It
review: Longboat Key Resort met and exceeded all my expectations for a great anniversary.  I requested chocolates and a floral arrangement as a surprise and it was perfect.  The room was beautiful.  We decided to upgrade to a 2 bedroom deluxe room and all I can say is WOW! Absolutely awesome room with spectacular views.  We had a slight issue with Direct TV but they came right away to resolve the issue.  The staff was always courteous and professional.  We definitely will be back and will bring friends and family.

title: Don't stay in Bldg 1or a Jr. Suite, all else was great!
review: We stayed at RLKC for 2 nights to celebrate my wife's birthday.  At checkin, Dante made it clear that we would not like the view in the available Jr. Suites, which is what we had reserved.  He said he had already been authorized to upgrade our reservation to a 1 brdrm suite. When Dante said this would be in Bldg 1, I told him that I was aware of some issues in Bldg 1 based on reviews I had read.  He assured me the issues were only because of the other bldgs were so much newer, not Bldg 1.  He also said if we didn't like the room, once we saw it we could change back to the Jr. Suite.  Once we saw the 1 Bdrm Suite, we loved it.  It was equivalent to a nicely appointed 1 Brdrm Condo.  Naturally, we opted to stay there.    To make a long story short, the previous reviews were…

title: Did not want to leave...
review: Dear Ted-Claudia: Thank you for staying with us and your review.  I have spoken to Dante and I believe there may have been some confusion in what he said.  There is not a view challenge with our junior suites as many of them our similar views to the 1-bedrooms. Also, our buildings were all built at the same time and remodeled at the same time so there is no age difference in building one over any others. Building one is one of our most requested buildings and a great building to stay in.  I do apologize for any challenges you had specific to your unit.  I have asked our engineering to take a look at the specific rooms A/C as if it needs repaired/replaced we will do so.  Also, the remote sensors should have worked upon your arrival and I apologize that you had to deal with these nuisance issues. It is our sincere goal for everything to be perfect upon your arrival I’m glad you enjoyed the gym and spa facilities and that the staff made you feel welcomed and they were friendly. Glad you also enjoyed your time at the pool and beach area of the property.  Your comments on wait staffing have been discussed with F&B management.  We have made significant changes in this area recently including adding service flags at the beach to make it more convenient for our guests who wish to have drink or food service.  We hope you will consider staying with us again in the future. Thank you again for your comments. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Accommodations
review: My wife and I just got back from a little slice of Paradise. From check in to check out the experience was excellent. Staff was very friendly, without being fake. The location was perfect,the resort's private beach was wonderful. The beach was never crowded and many times felt like you had the beach to yourself. Quality of food was excellent, but a little pricey. We will be back.

title: A Perfect Paradise!
review: Dear DarkCloud1967: Thank you for the “5” rating and for your recent stay!  I’m very pleased to hear the check-in and checkout experience was genuine and friendly.  It’s great that you enjoyed the location and that the uncrowded beach was enjoyable.   Thank you for mentioning the excellent food quality even though you feel it was a bit pricey.  We look forward to seeing you next time. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: what a great place
review: Accommodations at this resort are not clean, the pool is in terrible condition and not children friendly.  Too many adults drinking and carrying on around the pool, which children should not be around.  If you rent from an owner, inside or outside of the main hotel, you cannot use their facilities (i.e., food and beverage, and/or beach rental).  The quality of service is not good, water leaking in rooms, bath tubs will not drain, bugs in every room.  This at one time was a great resort but going down hill fast.  I have stayed at the resort for over ten years and this year will be my last.

title: Nice resort; rooms were good
review: I stayed here on business in early June.  The resort is nice.  Beach was clean and pool seemed nice as well.  Hotel staff were very accommodating.  The room was nice as well.  The toilet made funny noises at night which was disturbing but other than that it was good.  My only complaint was someone before me had left false eyelashes (used) stuck to the counter.  A little gross....

title: Wonderful stay
review: Thank you for being our guest and for your review.   I’m glad that you felt the resort and your suite was nice and that the staff were very accommodating. I apologize for the 2 issues in the suite.  Those should have both been resolved prior to you occupying the unit and I have reviewed this with our inspection team.  Our continued goal is to present a perfect suite for you upon checkin.  If anything is ever not perfect, we want to hear about it while you are with us so we may correct as well.  Thank you again for being our guest. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: We have visited this resort every year for 20+ years.
review: We stayed at the this hotel on June 5 and 6, 2014 and had a wonderful time. When we checked in, they double upgraded us to a two bedroom suite. The room was simply spectacular. It had a 40 foot balcony and seemed to be directly over the beach on the 8th floor. The view was so good that we decided to have our meals in the room to enjoy the view. The service was excellent. This was one of the finer hotels that we stayed in the United States. I highly recommend it.

title: Amazing beach and beautiful resort to match!
review: Dear TravelingRomantics: Thank you very much for the “5” review and for your recent stay with us.  I am not able to improve upon your wonderful comment of “this is one of the finer hotels that we stayed in in the United States”, so I simply say thank you and we appreciate you recommending us.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: 5 night Stay Longboat Key Club
review: The views, tennis, bicycle riding, and beach have made this resort a pleasure for us to visit each year. The hotel staff were friendly and helpful.  We always choose the lagoon view because it is quiet and lovely with the beautiful water, palm trees, and small marina just below the balcony.  The lights across the bridge make a spectacular nighttime view.

title: 3.5 Star Resort that Needs Some Updating but Great Location
review: We travelled to Longboat Key over the Memorial Day weekend.  I went in with low expectations after reading quite a few reviews and also being used to staying at the Breakers in West Palm. I was actually presently surprised - we had a nice room with a great balcony overlooking the lagoon which we loved. It was tranquil and peaceful and my 5 year old enjoyed all the marine life he could view from the balcony as well as the crabs on the sidewalk down below.  The bathroom definitely needs an update there was mildew on the wall and water pressure was not great, carpets need to be cleaned and the dryer did not dry our clothes I ended up hanging them up inside the room.  Other than that it was nice.  The pool with close proximity to the beach was nice. The wooden walk way needs to be…

title: Still one of our favorite places
review: Dear backchick Thank you for your very nice review and feedback on you recent stay.  I’m glad you enjoyed your holiday weekend with us and we hope to see you again in the future. I agree that he lagoon view building is a beautiful building and the view is very peaceful. We are fortunate to very often have manatee and dolphin visiting the lagoon area.  I apologize that you found any issues in your suites . After a busy season, we are busy right now refreshing with preventative maintenance checklists and deep cleans of our suites. Our goal is to have everything perfect at all times. If anything is not 100% right, we want to hear about it while you are staying with us so we may immediately resolve. 	 I appreciate your comments on the pool area and its proximity to the beach area.  We are constantly updating our product and I appreciate your observations on the wooden walkways to the beach.  All of those walkways are being replaced this year.  We do have showers and changing areas at our Islandside tennis building as well as at our spa for guest use.  I’m sorry that was not clear, but the spa locker rooms are a wonderful relaxing place to freshen up on those late flight check-out days.   We have reviewed your comments on the kids meal and drink with our food and beverage team.  This should be seamless for you as our guest and I appreciate you mentioning. 		 I appreciate that you felt the waterfront staff was very helpful and accomodating and we look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Things ain't what they used to be!
review: My family has been coming to Longboat Key Club for the last 12 years- and my husband's family before then.  We now live in Europe and we still chose to come here when back in the states.  The resort is beautiful, the pool is always great for us and our daughter.  The beach is beautiful and the resort does a nice job with helping you get set up with the chairs etc.  The location cannot be beat.  The rooms always work great for us.  We are very comfortable at the resort.  What i will say is that we noticed a decline in the service.  Our check in was not smooth at all, even though we had an American Express reservation which should have had early check and a room upgrade- we got neither and in fact got into our late.  Not an great way to start.  The lunches and such seemed a bit…

title: Great stay. Amazing beach.
review: Dear RSDriscoll		 Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay and for your many stays over the last 12+ years.  Thank you for mentioning the beauty of the resort as well as the beach.  I’m happy the beach team took good care of you while enjoying your time on the beach as well as your comment that the staff was friendly.  Thanks also for mentioning that the rooms work well for you as well.   I apologize that check-in did not go as well for you as it should have.  I believe you were with us over the Easter weekend and therefore we were at capacity so the upgrade was not available. I apologize that we were unable to get you into this specific location as early as we hoped.  It does appear we were able to check you in approximately 1 hour before normal check-in time.  Non-the-less, there is no excuse for a check-in that was not “smooth” and I will review your concerns with our Guest Service team. I know each of their goals include providing a very welcoming experience and I apologize. Sorry you felt the lunch service was a bit unorganized.  In the past few weeks we have added service flags to the beach operation which has already proven to assist with expedited service. Thanks for your comments and we look forward to seeing you on your next visit.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Wonder Location
review: Having been coming to the resort for over 20 years I can safely say that things are rapidly going downhill at one of my favourite hotels. The location is superb but that is their only saving grace. The staff, apart from housekeeping, are detached and adopt a couldn't care less attitude. The suites are tired and in need of a total refurbishment. It is very sad to witness the decline of such a formerly delightful resort.

title: After 13 years we won't be back
review: We travel to beach resorts all over the country & Caribbean. I've always loved the resort but have seen a major decline in recent years. From everything being fabulous to average/poor now.  We normally stay in a two bedroom ocean front suite which are spacious. This time (being last minute) we were in a one bedroom suite. The views are spectacular from the oversized balcony. The furnishings are nice. The kitchens are not stocked with simple essentials. And the cleanliness is lacking. It was as if the maid service no longer cares or has time. Our room was also in need of repair.  Food on property is a big deal for us. We purchase several meals a day as well as drinks on property.  Out of five days not one order was done correctly. I have no idea of what is going on with their…

title: Super Convenient
review: Dear Tootlepops:  Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to review your stay.   I’m glad you enjoyed the spaciousness of the balcony and the view.   I apologize you did not find the kitchen stocked to your liking.  We stock the kitchen with the items we feel most people will use on vacation. However, we have many other items that we can deliver upon request. Next time, just let us know of any specialty items you would like and we will gladly include them in the suite.    I’m sorry you felt the housekeeping service was not up to par.  I have reviewed your thoughts with housekeeping and engineering.  I have also shared your restaurant observations with the Food and Beverage manager. Service and food quality have always been a positive mark for us and I am disappointed this was not the case with you.   I hope we will get another chance in the future to have you at our resort and you receive the experience you deserve.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great room and view
review: Easy to get to, facilities right there, restaurants minute's away, directly on the water.  After battling big city airports, Sarasota is a pleasure. On our last two visits, we were the only people in the TSA line. The rental car is just outside the door - no waiting for a shuttle to some offsite location and then a 20 minute ride to the resort.  You pass the golf course and fitness center as you drive to the resort. St. Armands  has a number of good restaurants and interesting shops and is only 10 minutes away. Our  room had  a fantastic view of the Gulf and all the staff is very friendly. There are places we stay on the east coast but you have to drive 30 minutes for golf or the restaurant parking at the location can be a hassle. Ideal for a short (or long) vacation.

title: Fantastic Experience!!
review: Dear c48gold Thank you for the “5” review.   I agree that SRQ (Sarasota) Airport is very simply and beautiful to come in and out of.  I enjoy going in and out of that airport as well.  Glad you enjoyed your suite with a “fantastic” view of the Gulf and I appreciate your mention of the friendly staff.  I am proud of the associates that work here and deliver exceptional service every day.  I agree that it is hard to find a beach resort with golf right on premise.  We are lucky to offer 45 holes right here.   We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great Mom's Weekend
review: We just returned from a weekend at Longboat Key Club. It is very relaxing. We stayed in building 4 on the first floor and had a nice view of the ocean. The walkway to the beach is very close and the beach is beautiful and full of shells. Beach chairs, umbrellas, and cabanas are available. We didn't get in the pool but it looked very nice and had lots of chairs and umbrellas available.  The resort has bicycles that you can use, spa services, a shuttle service, concierge, daily newspaper, and nightly turndown service. The resort has a great location with a short drive to St. Armand's Circle and it's also near a Publix and CVS. We had a refrigerator in our room and it was nice to run over to the CVS for some bottled water and wine to store in the fridge.  The resort does stock…

title: Beach fantastic - service and resort quality going downhill fast
review: We returned to this hotel after a year and feel it is slipping downhill or at least not implementing the improvements needed.  The beach location has been pictured and reported on in so many other reviews I'll leave it alone - but the hotel's amazing location on the beach is its saving grace and probably the reason for all the 5* revies.  The rooms are fine if you get a renovated one so I had no issue there.  The problems start with the staff - who are generally slow, poorly trained and seem not very interested in being there.  Be prepared for a good 30 minute + wait to get your lunch once you find a server to help you.  As an example - our last full day we sat at a table by the pool for lunch.  Had to go and find a server after waiting 10 minutes.  After we ordered two burgers…

title: Take a break and relax at this beautiful spot
review: Thank you for taking the time to review us.  You mention the rooms being fine if you get a renovated one.  All of our suites were renovated at the same time and I am glad you enjoyed everything about your suite.   I am very disappointed in your view of the employees of the resort.  I have reviewed your comments on your food and beverage experience with the Barefoots General Manger and I assure you this is not our standard whatsoever. Our associates are committed and any challenges will be corrected.   The picture you took is of one of our beach chairs.  We did replace 150 of those this year, but with the same type of chair as it has been successful for the beach and complement the cabanas.  We are in the process of doing a re-design to the beach, which will be introduced later this year.  We have also replaced all of the chairs and tables on the pool deck as well as Barefoots and they are all within 6 months of age and are the sling style chairs.   Thank you again and I’m sorry you did not find value on this trip.     Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great location - friendly staff
review: We needed to STOP and take a break from work . This is a beautiful spot right on the white sandy beach on the west coast of Florida. You really will feel like you are at a true resort. The king suite was perfect for the two of us and the view of the Gulf is spectacular.

title: What a Joke
review: Dear Erin A: Thank you for the “5” review.   We greatly appreciate you being our guest. I’m glad you found it to be a beautiful spot of beach and felt like you were at a true resort.  Great that the Junior Suite was perfect for your stay.    Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great Fun at the Beach
review: We stayed May 9-11 and really enjoyed the service and that view!  Originally we had some problems with our first room with the air-conditioner being frozen up - Building 1.  The hotel quickly upgraded us to a large 2 bedroom suite with the most beautiful view - Room 2703.  The hotel also sent their staff at 11:00 pm to help my husband transfer our things to the new room.  They were very courteous and professional.  Every employee, from the guys on the golf carts to housekeeping and front desk personnel were friendly and helpful.  My children spent most of their time on the beach and at the pool.  The rooms themselves were clean and the beds very comfortable. We did not use the golf course or tennis courts.  I will definitely go again for a relaxing vacation.

title: 2001 Great View
review: Our family has been visiting the Longboat Key Club annually for many years. The property is situated on a magnificent white sand beach on the beautiful waters of the Gulf Of Mexico. The resort has a relaxed feel which is perfect for family travel as well as adult getaways. There is also a range of excellent dinning options available to guests throughout the property. The concierge staff is most friendly and helpful. They go the extra mile to make guests feel welcome and to help them arrange activities and dinning opportunities both in and outside of the resort.  However, it is important to note that the entire staff does its best to meet all the needs of their guests.Golf is short walk down the road from the main entrance and there is a shuttle service to take guests to the…

title: April 2014 Stay
review: Dear ftroopmom7:  Thank you for the “5” rating. We greatly appreciate your being our guest over the years and your recent review.    Glad you find the resort relaxing and the views of the Gulf magnificent from unit 2001.   I will pass along your comments to the entire team as well as the concierge and thank them for being friendly and helpful in working with you on activities and dining.  I am glad you were able to enjoy Golf, tennis and Kids Club (now called Camp Loggerhead).   Looking forward to your next visit where we will most certainly find you on your balcony enjoying the magical Longboat Key Sunsets! Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: beautiful beaches
review: Stayed at the Resort at Longboat Key with my family during Easter week this past April.   Everyone from Rick, the Director of Operations to the attendents on the beach were very helpful and accommodating.  They made the weeks' vacation stellar.  We stayed in delux suite wIth a  Gulf view our accommodations were beautiful and well maintained and certainly deserving of their four star rating.  We are looking forward to our next vacation.   The Adochio family from New Jersey

title: Longboat Key and Anna Maria Island
review: Dear madochio:  Thank you for your rating of a “5”.  We are glad you and your family were able to enjoy the resort in April.   I appreciate your recognition for my part in making your stay a success and especially thank you for the mention of the beach attendants.  Glad you found the accommodations beautiful and well maintained.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: November stay
review: We stayed for three days overlooking the beautiful ocean. The room was fantastic. Very large great kitchen and big bathrooms with plenty of closet space. Eating on the balcony overlooking the ocean was a treat. I was not impressed with the hotel facilities at all. But the rooms and the beautiful beach made our stay memorable. I was very surprised to see how many snobs are in longboat key. Apparently it is a very snobby ritzy area. But forget about the snobs and enjoy the beautiful beach, I sure did.

title: Probably the best beach resort in Sarasota
review: We stayed for three nights last month; we got a double room with king size bed and, unfortunately, golf course instead of sea view; nevertheless the room was spacious enough and very clean, had balcony and, being at the first floor, had access to a small shared patio; breakfast was à la carte, with good dishes, and we also enjoyed great service by a Romanian waiter named Marius; beach service is also of high class with free chairs, umbrellas and even working wi-fi; gourmet food and fine drinks are also served here too; parking is also free. Overall - high quality services on a beautiful white sand beach; of course, this doesn't come cheap; another minus - the arhitecture of the resort and the surrounding buidings is very dull;

title: Beautiful beach, resort employees - so/so
review: Dear Bogdan D Thank you for being our guest and for the review.  Yes, we offer three different views for you to choose from when making your booking.   Thanks for mentioning Marius and the great service he offered.  I agree he is a shining star.    Glad you enjoyed the quality of the food as well as the chairs, umbrellas and wifi at the beach, Sorry you did not care for the architecture of the buildings.   Glad you enjoyed the high quality services and we look forward to welcoming you again in the future. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: great stay
review: We enjoyed our mornings sitting at the beach, our chairs were set up nicely by staff.  The water was nice enough for a swim with plenty of activities to choose from.  The restaurants at the resort were nothing special.  We walked into the restaurant and the host walked by us 3 times and stopped to talk to the bartender before we could get her attention.  We finally sat down and waited another 10 minutes for someone to take our order.  The food was okay.  Breakfast the next day (Sunday) was much better - we were sat right away and our server, Cheryl, was great.  The room was good.  My only complaint about the room... The tub didn't drain while I showered (I had no sand on me) and when cleaning ladies came to the room, our bed was made - but that was it.  They didn't touch the…

title: Long Boat Key Club (West Coast Florida) Resort Falls Short.
review: Dear andreaorobmac: Thank you for reviewing your stay. I am glad you enjoyed your mornings on the beach in the chairs and umbrellas we provide.  I apologize that you did not receive the quick welcome and service in the restaurant the first time as is our standard.  This has been reviewed with the team.     Thank you for your kind mention of Cheryl on the second trip to the restaurant.  I am pleased she provided excellent service for you and you enjoyed the experience.  I apologize the tub was slow to drain.  We should have recognized this as we prepared the suite for your stay. Also, any low items need to be replaced daily and we have reviewed with our team the expectation of finding and resolving any deficiencies.  Thank you again for reviewing us and we look forward to seeing you again next trip. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Ocean-view room was NOT - 5 stars in their dreams
review: we had an awesome stay - the room was amazing overlooking the ocean and dunes....spacious junior suite with plenty of amenities and stocked with stuff to do light cooking/toasting/microwaving - we sat on the balcony each morning and had bkfast and enjoyed the views - beach was great with drink service on the beach - folks were all pleasant and accommodating....grounds are amazing and great places to walk/ride/golf/etc...did not eat there or go to spa.. would def go back and had a great time there

title: Terrific Tennis and Pleasant Resort
review: My husband and I spent five nights at the resort early in April.  A hotel of this size is not our favorite, but we chose to stay here based on the excellent tennis reputation.  That was most certainly accurate!  Zo, the tennis concierge was wonderful in setting up doubles matches for my husband; the courts were great and there are many players either at the resort or wintering on Longboat Key to provide plenty of variety and excellent competition.    Our room was fine.  We were in the lagoon view suites and would actually request that room again.  These rooms are a bit more quiet and we enjoyed sitting on our balcony watching boaters and dolphins.  Room was quite clean with a nice kitchen area, very convenient for snacks, lunches and drinks.  There was a good sized flat screen…

title: Charging 5 star prices for an out of date resort with awful service
review: Dear Beachreader05: Thank you for taking the time to review us and for your time staying in April. I appreciate your kind words concerning Zo and the tennis program.  Glad you were able to take advantage of Zo matching you up with others.  I agree that the lagoon view suites are quiet and a wonderful view of dolphins or manatees. Sorry you had an issue with the shower and thanks for noting it was resolved quickly.  I understand the pool was busy when you were here. Keep in mind that was during family weeks when there is more activity.  Glad you enjoyed the Sunday brunch and your breakfasts at Sands Pointe.    We look forward to you visiting us again in the future.  We appreciate your feedback. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: fabulous!
review: Payed over $500 a night for our room and were extremely disappointed for what we had hoped to be a nice resort.  We walked into our room that smelled like smoke, the bathroom fan was broken, an active beehive was on our patio, and the dryer was broken.  After being shown a smaller room as an alternative at same price we stayed with option 1 hoping it would work out.  We were told that the hotel can't control if someone smokes in the room.  We headed to beach and walked up to the hotels beach attendants.  One had a can of tobacco in his hand and the other guy had a drink.  We asked if we could have chairs and they told us just to look for open ones.  We then asked for towels and had to get our own at the pool.  This is when we discovered how dated and small the pool is. …

title: This review is for their restaurant
review: I am truly sorry you had challenges during your stay. We do not in any way condone anyone smoking in a room. If we find evidence of it, we charge the guest a cleanout fee as all of our rooms are non-smoking. We can and do work hard to control it. In your case, I'm sorry the issue occurred. The beehive and fan should have also been addressed during pre-arrival inspections.  The second room you were offered was of the same category as the first but there can be slight size differences, but always as large or larger than the room description.  Also, It is absolute policy that our employees are not to use any tobacco at the beach and I have never seen them do so in my 8 years working there. The team works hard to satisfy our guests and the service needs to always be better than what you describe. I have met with our department heads and addressed your concerns to ensure procedure is always followed. I met and spoke to you at the beach when I was making rounds greeting guests. You reported to me that your dryer was not working and you needed to get your clothing dried before leaving. We checked, and the setting on the dryer was set to "fluff". We set to the proper control and the items dried quickly.  Again, I apologize for not meeting your expectations which is disappointing to me and the team.  .Thank you for the feedback.   Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great Family Stay and Wedding
review: My two girlfriends and I went for the weekend for some relaxation. This exclusive resort is small, quaint, a bit one the 80's side-decor wise, but super clean. The rooms are so comfy, the staff- amazing, the amenities are absolutely fantastic. Everything is charged to the room, so you needn't worry about taking your wallet anywhere. I still maintain that the beaches on Florida's west coast are among the best in the world, and the private beach at this resort is exceptional. Oooh, cabana boys! The food was so good that us gals just made this place our home for the weekend- we did not leave the resort. I won't say who, but there was a handsome actor also staying there- and he sure gave us something to look at every morning at breakfast! We will be going back, with the kids as we…

title: Wedding
review: Here a beach wedding, got here early.   Went to the bar and asked for a diet coke and a club soda.  Was told they could not accommodate us cause we weren't staying there, but could give us water.  Geeze!  Guess betters can't be choosers.

title: Great location oceanfront
review: Dear Valarie HD: Yes, you are required to be a hotel guest or a member to use the restaurants and amenities of the resort.  This is for the benefit of our guests to be sure the property is fully available to them.  Hopefully next time you are in the area, you will consider staying with us so you can enjoy the wonderful amenities.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Resort fee? But carry your own bags?
review: We stayed 4 nights at an oceanfront room. The room was very clean, bathroom also very clean. We had a balcony overlooking the beach. This is a very quiet part of the beach. Not too many people around. We will come back again. Loved watching the sunset everyday from our balcony.

title: golf
review: DinaColumbus_NC Thank you for the “5” review.  We greatly appreciate your staying with us and glad you loved your clean room with the great view of the sunset!  Hope to see you again in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Location, location
review: My husband and I checked into this resort today and so far are not impressed. There has already been much said about the resort fees so I won't elaborate except to say - the hotel should really provide ALL of what they claim those fees cover. To show up 7 months obviously pregnant and have no one offer to help us with our bags after waiting 1.5 hrs for the room - how can you justify including bellman services in this fee?? I called the front desk to point this out after my husband made 4 trips to our 3rd floor room and all the explanation I got was that the "fee includes lots of other things as well". "Make sure you call at check out and someone will help you". Right. And if I had brought my own towel could I then opt out of this fee? Unlikely.

title: 4 stars????
review: Id question the widely advertised 4 star rating on this hotel.  The abundance of concrete have it a bit of a soviet bloc feel.  Something solidified at the arrival of our room (see photo of dangling light).  Inside the room was pleasant enough.  However, being a family of four, we stayed in a junior suite which had a pullout couch. This 'bed' caused immense pain.  I've traveled to many 3rd world countries and have never slept on anything quite like it.  I arrived at the resort with a torn meniscus.  So on the plus side, the night on this pullout traumatized my back to the point that I forgot about my knee.  If I had been here to play tennis or golf I'm not sure if have been able to do so.  I'd encourage the manager to spend 15min on the couch in room 5304.  Anyhow the food was…

title: Peaceful and beautiful area
review: Dear Getmehome: Thank you for your review.   We have determined that 5304 is not the unit you stayed in so as to review the pullout. I have attempted to contact you through Tripadvisor to determine the proper room number so we may follow-up.  I welcome the opportunity to discuss your concern so we may take the proper steps to rectify it.  Our pullouts are all extra thick mattresses so comfort is not normally a concern. I apologize that there is an issue and we will immediately replace if we can determine the unit.   Due to the resort and club atmosphere, we do include the 20% service charge. If you ever feel service does not merit it, we will gladly adjust.   We have tennis on both sides of the resort. There are ample courts within walking distance of the resort center, but we do recommend and offer shuttles to our Harbourside courts which are at the Northern end of our property. The Tennis Gardens has achieved the “Top 25 Tennis Resorts, Worldwide in Tennis Resorts Online.  Thank you again for being our guest. Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Great view
review: My husband and I have stayed at the Longboat Key Club resort several times. We love the location, it is on the beach, and close to St. Armand's Circle in Sarasota. We like the Lagoon Suites which are not in the main building. When you stay in the Lagoon Suites you have a quiet and serene view to the lagoon and you may even see manatees. The beach service is good but it will take a while to get your drink and meal so be patient. Or you may just walk to Barefoot's for a drink and a quick meal. There is Wi-Fi in the rooms, a kitchenette, and laundry.  We really enjoy the resort and would recommend it.

title: Last minute reservation
review: Dear luvshoes0623 Thank you for the review and we appreciate you being our guest. I’m glad you loved the beach and location. The lagoon view building is a lovely spot and it is certainly fun when the Manatees come frolicking through.  We are constantly evaluating ways to make service on the beach even faster and we are currently adding additional staffing to this area.  We appreciate your willingness to recommend us and look forward to seeing you in the future.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Incredible place!!!
review: Spent a couple of nights here which were very enjoyable. Service was good and everything worked out to our satisfaction. Our room had spectacular view over the sea with wonderful sunsets. Liked the fact there was a microwave in room which I used for tea but would be really useful for families with young kids. The local Publix supermarket also had a incredible range of microwave meals for those wishing a break from eating out or economising. Nice pool and well managed beach area. I got to pick my spot on the beach and sun loungers and umbrella were brought to me. They also served drinks on the beautiful beach. We also had a round of golf which was great fun. We hired clubs from the clubhouse and thought it to be good value. Breakfast at the club set us up for the round. There…

title: Loved it.
review: Had intended to use this hotel as a base to explore the nearby towns during our 3 day stopover. In the end, we went no further than downtown Sarasota, We will have to come back again and stick to our original plan. Our allocated room was on the 6th floor of Building 3. Good balcony area overlooked the bay. It was a joy to sit out and gaze at the setting sun. No noise once the pool activity died away, very comfortable, fridge, tea/coffee making facilities....all reviewed in depth by others. Ashamed to admit the we barely made use of the ample facilities (golf, tennis, restaurants, etc), but kept life simple with poolside dining which was good with helpful, friendly service. It is not cheap, but I guess you expect that in order to maintain standards in an area like this. One thing…

title: Once again faboulous!!
review: Dear Happyretiree63:  Thank you for the “5” rating!  It is wonderful that you were able to enjoy the beautiful Gulf view from building 3.  The sunsets on Longboat Key are magical and truly a blessing.  Glad you were able to truly relax and enjoy the property.  I apologize the resort was not explained in whole upon check-in.  I will review that procedure with our team as it is vital in getting your stay off to the right start. Our Guest Service team including concierge are available to help plan any need or desire you have.    Looks like you may need to return a couple more times, once to explore the area as you mention and another to explore the resort offerings (golf, tennis, restaurants, etc) --:)  Thank you again for being our guest.  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: Exceptional staff
review: For the second year we have visited the Longboat Key resort and it has more than lived up to our expectations. Very friendly and helpful staff, great room, excellent restaurants and very fine service. We can really recommend this place!

title: I wouldn't choose it for a vacation
review: Dear Birget F: You for your “5” review!  We appreciate your kind mention of our staff as well as the restaurants and accommodations. Personal recommendations is still the best way for us to find new customers.  We look forward to seeing you again for your 3rd year!  Yours in hospitality,  Rick Benninghove Director of Resort Operations Longboat Key Club and Resort rick.benninghove@longboatkeyclub.com

title: vacation
review: Overall this is a very good hotel. Nice location, nice rooms, all the usual characteristics of a very good hotel. What stood out for me, however, was the level of service and the exceptional attitude of the staff. While on vacation there my husband became ill and was hospitalized for a couple of days. During this period, just about every staff member I came into contact with asked about him, and I could tell that the concern was genuine. In particular, I would like to recognize one person, Matthew Gordon, who was working on the front desk. When I mentioned to him that our rental car was stranded at the medical centre from which the ambulance took us to the hospital, he offered to drive me there to retrieve the rental. He in fact drove me in his personal vehicle and on the return…

title: Great all around family vacation
review: We came down from NY for Presidents week. I am very happy with the hotel. We were able to upgrade via AMEX platinum to a deluxe two bedroom. The room was seriously amazing. 2 beds 2 baths full kitchen and large living room. My apt in NYC is not this big. Partly I think we got it because of the woodpecker outside my window banging away EVERY AM, but whatever, kids are up early anyway. The kitchen had everything we needed. The pool is nice and never overcrowded. No need to fight for chairs at the crack of dawn. I also had no trouble finding parking spots for the car. The beach is terrific and clean. Lots of chairs and staff on the beach. Kids found tons of shells. The food was OK, but every meal had loads of service charges and really very little goes to the server so you feel…

title: Outstanding Resort
